articles.title: Monhyɛ Honhom mu Akode 6
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa!

Ɛnnɛ yɛkɔ so hwehwɛ ayɔnkofa mu na yɛkyɛ: Ɛsɛ sɛ Kristofo hyɛ honhom mu akode a Onyankopɔn de ma no da biara.

Ɔkasa 6: Fa nkwagye dade kyɛw hyɛ na kura Honhom Kronkron nkrante

Momma yemmue yɛn Bible no nkyerɛ Efesofo 6:17 na yɛne yɛn ho nkenkan sɛ: Na monhyɛ nkwagye dade kyɛw, na monfa Honhom nkrante a ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn asɛm no;

1. Fa nkwagye dade kyɛw hyɛ

(1) Nkwagye

Awurade ayɛ ne nkwagye, na wada ne trenee adi wɔ amanaman no ani so;
Monto dwom mma AWURADE na monhyira ne din! Ka Ne nkwagye ho asɛm da biara! Dwom 96:2

Nea ɔde asɛmpa, asomdwoe, asɛmpa, ne nkwagye ba no ka kyerɛ Sion sɛ: Wo Nyankopɔn di hene! Hwɛ sɛnea ɔbarima yi nan a ɔforo bepɔw no yɛ fɛ! Yesaia 52:7

Asɛmmisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na nkurɔfo hu Onyankopɔn nkwagye?

Mmuae: Bɔne fafiri - afei wo nim nkwagyeɛ!

Hyɛ no nsow: Sɛ wo nyamesom "ahonim" te afobu nka bere nyinaa a, wɔrentew ɔdebɔneyɛfo no ahonim ho na wɔmfa mfiri no! Anka worenhunu Onyankopɔn nkwagyeɛ - Hwɛ Hebrifoɔ 10:2.
Ɛsɛ sɛ yegye nea Onyankopɔn ka wɔ Bible mu no di sɛnea ne nsɛm te. Amen! Sɛdeɛ Awurade Yesu kaa sɛ: Me nguan te me nne, na menim wɔn, na wɔdi m’akyi - Reference John 10:27
Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ne nkurɔfo behu nkwagye denam wɔn bɔne fafiri so...

Ɔhonam nyinaa behu Onyankopɔn nkwagye! Luka 1:77,3:6

Asɛmmisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na wɔde yɛn bɔne firi?

Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

(2) Nkwagye a ɛnam Yesu Kristo so

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn ne nkwagye a ɛwɔ Kristo mu?

Mmuae: Gye Yesu di! Gye asɛmpa no di!

(Awurade Yesu) kaa sɛ: "Bere no abam, na Onyankopɔn ahenni abɛn. Monsakra mo adwene na gye asɛmpa no nni!"

(Paulo kaa sɛ) M’ani nwu asɛmpa no ho; Asɛmpa yi mu na wɔda Onyankopɔn tenenee adi; Sɛnea wɔakyerɛw no: “Gyidi mu na treneefo bɛtra ase.”

Enti wogye Yesu ne asɛmpa no di! Saa asɛmpa yi yɛ Yesu Kristo nkwagyeɛ Sɛ wogye asɛmpa yi di a, wobɛtumi de wo bɔne akyɛ, agye wo nkwa, asan awo, na woanya daa nkwa! Amen.

Asɛmmisa: Wogye asɛmpa yi di dɛn?

Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

[1] Gye di sɛ na Yesu yɛ ɔbaabun a Honhom Kronkron nyinsɛn no na wɔwoo no - Mateo 1:18,21
[2] Gyidie sɛ Yesu yɛ Onyankopɔn Ba-Luka 1:30-35
[3] Gye di sɛ Yesu baa honam mu - 1 Yohane 4:2, Yohane 1:14
[4] Yesu mu gyidie ne mfitiaseɛ asetena kwan ne asetena hann - Yohane 1:1-4, 8:12, 1 Yohane 1:1-2
[5] Gye Awurade Nyankopɔn a ɔde yɛn nyinaa bɔne too Yesu so no di - Yesaia 53:6

[6] Gye Yesu dɔ di! Ɔwui wɔ asɛnnua no so maa yɛn bɔne, wosiee no, na ɔsɔree da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa. 1 Korintofoɔ 15:3-4

(Hyɛ no nsow: Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne!

1 ama yɛn nyinaa anya ahofadi afi bɔne mu - Romafo 6:7;

2 Wɔade wɔn ho afiri mmara ne ne nnome ho - Romafoɔ 7:6, Galatifoɔ 3:13;
3 Wogyee no firii Satan tumi mu - Asomafo no Nnwuma 26:18
4 Wogyee no firi Wiase - Yohane 17:14
Na wɔasie no!
5 Fa yɛn ho firi nipasu dedaw no ne ne nneyɛe ho - Kolosefoɔ 3:9;
6 Efi wɔn ankasa ho Galatifo 2:20
Wɔnyanee no da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa!

7 Kristo wusɔre no asan awo yɛn na wabu yɛn bem! Amen. 1 Petro 1:3 ne Romafo 4:25

[7] Wɔfa wɔn sɛ Onyankopɔn mma-Galatiafo 4:5
[8] Monhyɛ nipa foforo no, monhyɛ Kristo - Galatifo 3:26-27
[9] Honhom Kronkron ne yɛn honhom di adanseɛ sɛ yɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma - Romafoɔ 8:16
[10] Kyerɛ yɛn (onipa foforo no) ase kɔ Onyankopɔn Ba a ɔdɔ no no ahenni mu - Kolosefo 2:13
[11] Yɛn asetena foforɔ a yɛasan awo no no, wɔde asie Kristo wɔ Onyankopɔn mu - Kolosefoɔ 3:3
[12] Sɛ Kristo yi ne ho adi a, yɛn nso yɛne no bɛda yɛn ho adi wɔ anuonyam mu - Kolosefo 3:4

Yei ne Yesu Kristo nkwagyeɛ.Obiara a ɔgye Yesu di no yɛ Onyankopɔn ba. Amen.

2. Kura Honhom Kronkron nkrante

(1) Nya Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ no

Asɛmmisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na yebetumi anya Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ no?

Mmuae: Tie asɛmpa no, nokware kwan no, na gye Yesu di!

Ne mu na wɔde bɔhyɛ Honhom Kronkron no sɔɔ mo ano, berɛ a mo nso mogyee Kristo dii berɛ a motee nokorɛ asɛm, mo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no. Efesofo 1:13
Sɛ nhwɛsoɔ no, Simon Petro kaa asɛmpa no wɔ "Amanaman" Kornelio fie. Nhwehwɛmu Asomafo no Nnwuma 10:34-48

(2) Honhom Kronkron de yɛn koma di adanse sɛ yɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma

Na wɔn a Onyankopɔn Honhom di wɔn kwan no nyinaa yɛ Onyankopɔn mma. Woannya nkoasom honhom sɛ wobɛtena ehu mu, a yɛteɛm sɛ, “Abba, Agya Honhom Kronkron no ne yɛn honhom di adanseɛ sɛ yɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma a; mma, Ɛne sɛ adedifo, Onyankopɔn adedifo, Kristo yɔnko adedifo. Sɛ yɛne No hunu amane a, yɛne No nso bɛhyɛ yɛn animuonyam.
Romafo 8:14-17

(3) Wɔde ademude no gu dɔte anwenne mu

Yɛwɔ saa ademude yi wɔ dɔte nkuku mu de kyerɛ sɛ tumi kɛse yi fi Onyankopɔn na ɛnyɛ yɛn hɔ. 2 Korintofoɔ 4:7

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn ne ademude yi?

Mmuae: Ɛyɛ nokware Honhom Kronkron! Amen

"Sɛ modɔ me a, mubedi m'ahyɛde so. Na mɛsrɛ Agya no, na ɔbɛma mo Ɔwerɛkyekyefo foforo (anaa Ɔwerɛkyekyefo; ɔno ara wɔ ase hɔ), na ɔne mo bɛtena daa, ɔno ne nokware no. Wiase." ntumi nnye Honhom Kronkron no ntom, ɛfiri sɛ ɛnhunu No na ɛnnim No, na mmom monim No, ɛfiri sɛ ɔne mo tena na ɔbɛtena mo mu Yohane 14:15-17.

3. Ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn Asɛm

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn ne Onyankopɔn Asɛm?

Mmuae: Asɛmpa a wɔaka akyerɛ wo no yɛ Onyankopɔn asɛm!

(1) Mfiase no na Tao wɔ hɔ

Mfitiaseɛ no na Tao wɔ hɔ, na Tao ka Onyankopɔn ho, na Tao nso yɛ Onyankopɔn. Na Asɛm yi ka Onyankopɔn ho mfiase no. Yohane 1:1-2

(2) Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ ɔhonam

Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ honam na ɔtenaa yɛn mu, a adom ne nokorɛ ahyɛ no ma. Na yɛahu n’anuonyam, anuonyam a ɛte sɛ Agya no ba koro no de. Yohane 1:14

(3) Gye asɛmpa no di na wosan wo bio.

Nhyira nka yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo Nyankopɔn ne n’Agya! Sɛdeɛ ne mmɔborɔhunu kɛseɛ teɛ no, ɔnam Yesu Kristo wusɔreɛ so awo yɛn bio akɔ anidasoɔ a ɛte aseɛ mu... Wɔanwo wo foforɔ, ɛnyɛ aba a ɛnsɛe na mmom aba a ɛnsɛe, Ɛnam Onyankopɔn asɛm a ɛte aseɛ na ɛtra hɔ daa so. ...Awurade Asɛm nko ara na ɛwɔ hɔ daa.

Eyi ne asɛmpa a wɔka kyerɛɛ mo no. 1 Petro 1:3,23,25

Anuanom mmarima ne mmea!

Kae sɛ wobɛboaboa ano.

Asɛmpa no nkyerɛwee a efi:

asafo a ɛwɔ owura yesu kristo mu

2023.09.17

articles.title: Monhyɛ Honhom mu Akode 5
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa!

Ɛnnɛ yɛkɔ so hwehwɛ ayɔnkofa mu na yɛkyɛ: Ɛsɛ sɛ Kristofo hyɛ honhom mu akode a Onyankopɔn de ma no da biara.

Ɔkasa 5: Fa gyidi di dwuma sɛ kyɛm

Momma yemmue yɛn Bible no nkyerɛ Efesofo 6:16 na yɛne no nkenkan: Bio nso, momfa gyidi kyɛm a etumi dum ɔbɔnefo agyan a ɛredɛw nyinaa;

(Hyɛ no nsow: Krataa so de no yɛ "vine"; ɛlɛtrɔnik de no yɛ "shield")

1. Gyidi

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn ne gyidi?
Mmuae: "Gyidie" kyer3 gyidie, nokwaredi, nokware, ne amen" kyer3 suban, kronkron, tenenee, odo, anigye, asomdwoe, boasetɔ, ayamye, papayɛ, nokwaredi, odwo, ne ahosodi.

2. Ahotoso a obi wɔ

(1) krataa

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn ne krataa?

Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

Gyidi yɛ nneɛma a wɔhwɛ kwan no mu ade titiriw, nneɛma a wonhu ho adanse. Ná tetefo no wɔ adanse a ɛyɛ nwonwa wɔ krataa yi mu.
Gyidi so na yenim sɛ Onyankopɔn asɛm na ɛbɔɔ wiase ahorow no sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔmmɔ nea wohu no amfi nea ɛda adi pefee no mu. ( Hebrifo 11:1-3 ) .

Sɛ nhwɛso no, okuafo bi redua awi wɔ afuw mu Ɔhwɛ kwan sɛ sɛ awi aba bi hwe fam na wodua a, ɛbɛsow aba pii daakye. Eyi ne nneɛma a wɔhwɛ kwan no mu nsɛm, nneɛma a wonhu ho adanse.

(2) Egyina gyidi ne gyidi so

Asɛmpa yi mu na wɔda Onyankopɔn tenenee adi; Sɛnea wɔakyerɛw no: “Gyidi mu na treneefo bɛtra ase.”

(3) Gyidi ne bɔhyɛ

Gye Yesu di na nya daa nkwa:
“Onyankopɔn dɔ wiase araa ma ɔde ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro no mae, na obiara a ogye no di no nsɛe na mmom obenya daa nkwa (Yohane 3:16)
Efi gyidi mu kɔ gyidi mu:
Egyina gyidi so: Gye Yesu di na nya nkwa na nya daa nkwa! Amen.
Ɛde besi sɛ wubegye adi: Di Yesu akyi na wo ne no nantew nkɔka asɛmpa no, na nya anuonyam, akatua, abotiri, ne owusɔre a eye kyɛn so. Amen!

Sɛ wɔyɛ mma a, ɛnde wɔyɛ adedifo, Onyankopɔn adedifo ne Kristo yɔnko adedifo. Sɛ yɛne No hunu amane a, yɛne No nso bɛhyɛ yɛn animuonyam. ( Romafo 8:17 ) .

3. Gyidi a wobɛfa sɛ kyɛm

Bio nso, momfa gyidi kyɛm a mode bɛdum ɔbɔnefo no agyan a ɛredɛw nyinaa (Efesofo 6:16);

Asɛmmisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na yɛde gyidi bedi dwuma sɛ kyɛm?

Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

(1)Gyidie

1 Gye di sɛ ɔbaabun na ɔnyinsɛn Yesu na Honhom Kronkron woo no - Mateo 1:18,21
2 Gye di sɛ Yesu ne Asɛm a wɔayɛ no honam - Yohane 1:14
3 Gyidie sɛ Yesu yɛ Onyankopɔn Ba-Luka 1:31-35
4 Gye Yesu di sɛ Agyenkwa, Kristo, ne Mesia - Luka 2:11, Yohane 1:41
5 Awurade mu gyidie de yɛn nyinaa bɔne to Yesu so - Yesaia 53:8
6 Gye di sɛ Yesu wui wɔ asɛnnua no so maa yɛn bɔne, wosiee no, na ɔsɔree da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa - 1 Korintofoɔ 15:3-4
7 Gyidie se Yesu sɔre firii awufoɔ mu na ɔsan woo yɛn - 1 Petro 1:3
8 Gyidie a yɛwɔ wɔ Yesu wusɔreɛ mu no ma yɛbu yɛn bem - Romafoɔ 4:25
9 Esiane sɛ Honhom Kronkron te yɛn mu nti, yɛn nipasu foforo no mfi nipasu dedaw ne honam dedaw no mu bio - Romafo 8:9
10 Honhom Kronkron ne yɛn honhom di adanseɛ sɛ yɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma - Romafoɔ 8:16
11 Monhyɛ wo ho foforo, hyɛ Kristo - Gal 3:26-27
12 Gye di sɛ Honhom Kronkron ma yɛn akyɛdeɛ ahodoɔ, tumi ne tumi ahodoɔ (te sɛ asɛmpa no a yɛka, ayarefoɔ a wɔsa wɔn yareɛ, tu ahonhommɔne, anwonwadeɛ yɛ, kasa foforɔ a wɔka, ne nea ɛkeka ho) - 1 Korintofoɔ 12:7-11
13 Yɛn a Awurade Yesu gyidi nti yehuu amane no, wɔbɛka ne ho anuonyam - Romafo 8:17
14 Owusɔreɛ a ɛwɔ nipadua a ɛyɛ papa-Hebrifoɔ 11:35

15 Wo ne Kristo nni hene mfe apem ne daa! Amen-Adiyisɛm 20:6,22:5

(2) Gyidi yɛ kyɛm de dum ɔbɔnefo no agyan a ɛredɛw nyinaa

1 Hu ɔbɔnefoɔ nnaadaa - Efesofoɔ 4:14
2 betumi ako atia ɔbonsam nhyehyɛe - Efesofo 6:11
3 Pow sɔhwɛ nyinaa-Mateo 18:6-9
(Sɛ nhwɛso no: wiase yi amanne, abosom, kɔmputa so agodie, mobile network, artificial intelligence... di honam ne koma akɔnnɔ akyi - Efesofo 2:1-8)
4. Sɛ yɛbɛko atia ɔtamfo wɔ ɔhaw da mu - Efesofo 6:13
(Sɛnea wɔakyerɛw wɔ Bible mu no: Satan bɔɔ Hiob na ɔmaa no akisikuru firii ne nan so kɔɔ ne ti so - Hiob 2:7; Satan somafoɔ de nsɔe guu Paulo honam mu - 2 Korintofoɔ 12:7)
5 Mese mo sɛ: Monhwɛ yie wɔ Farisifoɔ (a wɔnam mmara so bu wɔn bem) ne Sadukifoɔ (a wɔnnye awufoɔ wusɔreɛ nni) mmɔreka ho wote ase? ” Mateo 16:11
6 Monsɔre tia no, na monyɛ pintinn wɔ gyidi mu, efisɛ munim sɛ mo nuanom a wɔwɔ wiase nyinaa nso rehyia amanehunu koro no ara. Adom nyinaa Nyankopɔn a wafrɛ mo aba ne daa anuonyam mu wɔ Kristo mu no, sɛ mohunu amane kakra akyi no, Ɔno ankasa bɛma mo ayɛ pɛ, ahyɛ mo den, na wama mo ahoɔden. 1 Petro 5:9-10

7 Enti, tie Onyankopɔn. Monsɔre tia ɔbonsam, na ɔbɛdwane afiri mo nkyɛn. Bɛn Onyankopɔn, na Onyankopɔn bɛbɛn wo...Yakobo 4:7-8

(3)Wɔn a wɔnam Yesu so di nkonim

(Eye sen ɔbonsam, eye sen wiase, eye sen owu!)

Na obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no di wiase so nkonim; Hena na odi wiase so nkonim? Ɛnyɛ nea ogye di sɛ Yesu yɛ Onyankopɔn Ba no? 1 Yohane 5:4-5

1 Obiara a ɔwɔ aso no, ɔnte nea Honhom no ka kyerɛ asafo ahorow no! Nea odi nkonim no, mɛma no adi nkwa dua no aba wɔ Onyankopɔn Paradise no mu. ’” Adiyisɛm 2:7
2 ...Deɛ odi nkonim no, owuo a ɛtɔ so mmienu no rempira no. ’”
Adiyisɛm 2:11
3 ...Deɛ odi nkonim no, mɛma no mana a ahintaw no, na mede ɔbo fitaa bi a wɔakyerɛw din foforo wɔ so, a obiara renhu gye nea ogye no. ’” Adiyisɛm 2:17
4 Deɛ ɔdi me mmaransɛm so nkonim na ɔdi so kɔsi awieɛ no, mɛma no tumi wɔ amanaman no so ... na mede anɔpa nsoromma bɛma no; Adiyisɛm 2:26,28
5 Obiara a odi nkonim no, ɔbɛhyɛ atade fitaa, na merempopa ne din mfi nkwa nhoma no mu na ɔbɛka ne din wɔ m’Agya anim ne n’abɔfo nyinaa anim. Adiyisɛm 3:5
6 Nea odi nkonim no, mɛyɛ odum wɔ me Nyankopɔn asɔredan mu, na ɔremfi hɔ bio. Na mɛtwerɛ me Nyankopɔn din ne me Nyankopɔn kuro no din a ɛne Yerusalem Foforo a ɛfiri soro sian ba no, me Nyankopɔn ne me din foforɔ. Adiyisɛm 3:12

7 Nea odi nkonim no, mɛma no ne me atra m’ahengua so, sɛnea midii nkonim na me ne m’agya tenaa n’ahengua so no. Adiyisɛm 3:21

Asɛmpa no nkyerɛwee a efi:

asafo a ɛwɔ owura yesu kristo mu

anuanom mmarima ne mmea
Kae sɛ wobɛboaboa ano

2023.09.10

articles.title: Monhyɛ Honhom mu Akode 4
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa!

Ɛnnɛ yɛkɔ so hwehwɛ ayɔnkofa mu na yɛkyɛ sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ Kristofo hyɛ honhom mu akode a Onyankopɔn de ama no da biara da

Ɔkasa 4: Asomdwoe Asɛmpa a Wɔka

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible ahorow no nkyerɛ Efesofo 6:15 na yɛne yɛn abom nkenkan sɛ: “Moasiesie mo nan so de asomdwoe asɛmpa no anantew.”

1. Asɛmpa

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn ne asɛmpa no?

Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

(1)Yesu kae sɛ

Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Nea meka kyerɛɛ mo bere a na me ne mo wɔ hɔ no ni: ɛsɛ sɛ biribiara a wɔakyerɛw afa me ho wɔ Mose Mmara, Adiyifo ne Nnwom no mu no ba mu.” wobetumi ate Kyerɛwnsɛm no ase, na wɔaka akyerɛ wɔn sɛ: “Wɔakyerɛw sɛ, Kristo behu amane na wasɔre afi awufo mu da a ɛto so abiɛsa, na wɔaka adwensakra ne bɔne fafiri ho asɛm wɔ ne din mu, atrɛw afi Yerusalem akɔ aman nyinaa (Luka Asɛmpa no. 24:44-47 ) .

2. Petro kae sɛ

Nhyira nka yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo Nyankopɔn ne n’Agya! Sɛnea ne mmɔborohunu kɛse te no, wama yɛn awo foforo ama anidaso a ɛte ase denam Yesu Kristo wusɔre so afi awufo mu akɔ agyapade a ɛnporɔw, ɛho ntew, na ɛnsɛe, a wɔde asie ɔsoro ama mo. ...Wɔnam Onyankopɔn asɛm a ɛte ase na ɛtra hɔ daa so na wɔawo wo foforo, ɛnyɛ aba a ɛporɔw mu, na mmom nea ɛnporɔw mu. ...nanso Awurade asɛm no tena hɔ daa. Eyi ne asɛmpa a wɔka kyerɛɛ mo no. (1 Petro 1:3-4,23,25)

3. Yohane kae sɛ

Mfitiaseɛ no na Tao wɔ hɔ, na Tao ka Onyankopɔn ho, na Tao nso yɛ Onyankopɔn. Na Asɛm yi ka Onyankopɔn ho mfiase no. ( Yohane 1:1-2 ) .

Ɛdefa mfitiaseɛ nkwa asɛm no ho firi mfitiaseɛ no, yei ne deɛ yɛate, ahunu, yɛde yɛn ankasa ani ahunu, na yɛde yɛn nsa aka. (Saa nkwa yi ada adi, na yɛahu, na afei yɛdi adanseɛ sɛ yɛde daa nkwa a na ɛwɔ Agya no nkyɛn na ɛdaa adi wɔ yɛn mu no rema mo.) (1 Yohane 1:1-2)

4. Paulo kae sɛ

Na sɛ moannye nni kwa na mmom mokura deɛ meka kyerɛ mo no mu denneennen a, mobɛnya nkwagyeɛ. Na nea mede maa mo nso: nea edi kan no, Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne sɛnea Kyerɛwnsɛm no kyerɛ no, wosiee no, na wonyan no da a ɛto so abiɛsa sɛnea Kyerɛwnsɛm no kyerɛ no (1 Korintofo 15 :2-4)

2. Asomdwoe Asɛmpa no

(1)Ma wo home

Mo a moayɛ adwumaden na moasoa mo duru nyinaa, mommra me nkyɛn, na mɛma moahome. Momfa me kɔndua nto mo so na monsua mfi me hɔ, ɛfiri sɛ medwo na mebrɛ me ho ase wɔ akoma mu, na mobɛnya ahomegyeɛ ama mo kra. ( Mateo 11:28-29 ) .

(2) wɔbɛsa no yare

Ɔsɛn dua no so na ɔsoaa yɛn bɔne ankasa sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a, esiane sɛ yɛawu ama bɔne nti, yɛbɛtra ase ama trenee. Wɔnam ne mpire so saa mo yareɛ. (1 Petro 2:24) .

(3) Nya daa nkwa

“Onyankopɔn dɔ wiase araa ma ɔde ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro no mae, na obiara a ogye no di no nsɛe na mmom obenya daa nkwa (Yohane 3:16)

(4) wɔbɛhyɛ wɔn anuonyam

Sɛ wɔyɛ mma a, ɛnde wɔyɛ adedifo, Onyankopɔn adedifo ne Kristo yɔnko adedifo. Sɛ yɛne No hunu amane a, yɛne No nso bɛhyɛ yɛn animuonyam.

( Romafo 8:17 ) .

3. Fa asomdwoe asɛmpa no si wo nan so sɛ mpaboa de siesie wo ma nantew

(1)Asɛmpa no yɛ Onyankopɔn tumi

M’ani nwu asɛmpa no ho, ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn tumi a ɛde nkwagyeɛ ma obiara a ɔgye di, Yudani kane ne Helafoɔ nso. Asɛmpa yi mu na wɔda Onyankopɔn tenenee adi; Sɛnea wɔakyerɛw no: “Gyidi mu na treneefo bɛtra ase.”

(2) Yesu kaa ɔsoro ahenni ho asɛmpa no

Yesu tuu kwan faa nkuro ne akuraa biara mu, kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn hyiadan mu, kaa ahennie no ho asɛmpa, na ɔsaa nyarewa ne nyarewa biara. Bere a ohuu nnipakuw no, ohuu wɔn mmɔbɔ, efisɛ na wɔyɛ mmɔbɔ na wontumi nyɛ hwee, te sɛ nguan a wonni oguanhwɛfo. ( Mateo 9:35-36 Union Nkyerɛase)

(3) Yesu somaa adwumayɛfo sɛ wɔnkɔtwa nnɔbae no

Enti ɔka kyerɛɛ n'asuafoɔ no sɛ, "Otwa adwuma dɔɔso, nanso adwumayɛfoɔ sua. Enti, monsrɛ otwa wura sɛ ɔnsoma adwumayɛfoɔ mmra ne twa mu."

So wonka sɛ, ‘Asram anan da so ara wɔ hɔ ansa na wɔatwa’? Meka kyerɛ wo sɛ, momma mo ani so na monhwɛ mfuo mu. Otwafo no nsa ka n’akatua na ɔboaboa aburow ano ma daa nkwa, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ogufo ne otwafo no bɛbom adi ahurusi. Sɛnea wɔka no: ‘Obiako gu, ɔfoforo twa’, na ɛda adi sɛ eyi yɛ nokware. Masoma mo sɛ mommɛtwa deɛ moayɛ adwumaden, na mo ani gye afoforɔ brɛ ho. ”(Yohane 4:35-38) .

Asɛmpa no nkyerɛwee a efi:

asafo a ɛwɔ owura yesu kristo mu

anuanom mmarima ne mmea

Kae sɛ wobɛboaboa ano

2023.09.01 na ɛwɔ hɔ

articles.title: Honhom mu Akode a Wɔhyɛ 3
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa!

Ɛnnɛ yɛkɔ so hwehwɛ fekubɔ ne kyɛfa a yɛwɔ mu no, ɛsɛ sɛ Kristofo hyɛ honhom mu akode a Onyankopɔn de ma no da biara da:

Ɔkasa 3: Fa trenee di dwuma sɛ nkataso de kata wo nufu so

Momma yemmue yɛn Bible no nkyerɛ Efesofo 6:14 na yɛnkenkan no: Enti munnyina pintinn, fa nokware abɔso kyekyere w’asen, na fa trenee nkatabo nkata mo moma so;


1. Atɛntrenee

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn ne atɛntrenee?
Mmuae: "Gong" kyerɛ atɛntrenee, atɛntrenee ne nokwaredi;

Bible nkyerɛase! “Trenee” kyerɛ Onyankopɔn trenee!

2. Nnipa trenee

Asemmisa: So nnipa wɔ "trenee"?

Mmuae: Dabi.

【Ɔtreneeni biara nni hɔ】

Sɛnea wɔakyerɛw no:
Ɔtreneeni biara nni hɔ, obiako mpo nni hɔ.
Ntease biara nni hɔ;
Obiara nni hɔ a ɔhwehwɛ Onyankopɔn;
Wɔn nyinaa reyera afi ɔkwan pa so, .
bɛyɛ nea mfaso nni so bom.
Obiara nni hɔ a ɔyɛ papa, obiako mpo nni hɔ.

( Romafo 3:10-12 ) .

【Biribiara a nnipa yɛ no yɛ bɔne】

Wɔn menewa yɛ adamoa a wɔabue;
Wɔde wɔn tɛkrɛma daadaa, .
Adder home a awuduru wom no wɔ n’ano, .
Nnome ne awerɛhow ahyɛ n’ano ma.
Awudi ne mogya a ɛtɔ, .
Wɔn nan tu, .
Atirimɔdensɛm ne atirimɔdensɛm bɛba wɔ kwan no so.
Asomdwoe kwan a wonnim;
Onyankopɔn ho suro biara nni wɔn ani so.

( Romafo 3:13-18 ) .

【Gyidi na ɛma wobu no bem】

(1) .

Asɛmmisa: Ná Noa yɛ ɔtreneeni!

Mmuae: Noa (gye dii) Awurade, ɔyɛɛ biribiara a Onyankopɔn hyɛe, enti Onyankopɔn frɛɛ Noa sɛ ɔtreneeni.

Nanso Noa nyaa adom wɔ Awurade ani so.
Wɔakyerɛw Noa asefo ho kyerɛwtohɔ wɔ ase hɔ. Ná Noa yɛ ɔtreneeni ne onipa a ɔyɛ pɛ wɔ n’awo ntoatoaso mu. Noa ne Onyankopɔn nantew. ...Ɛno na Noa yɛeɛ. Biribiara a Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ no no, ɔyɛɛ saa.

(Genesis 6:8-9,22) .

(2) .

Asɛmmisa: Ná Abraham yɛ ɔtreneeni!
Mmuae: Abraham (gye dii) sɛ Yehowa, Onyankopɔn buu no bem!
Enti ɔde no kɔɔ abɔnten na ɔkae sɛ: “Hwɛ ɔsoro na kan nsoromma. Na woka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: “Saa ara na Abram gyee AWURADE dii, na AWURADE dii yei akyi.” ne trenee.

( Genesis 15:5-6 ) .

(3) .

Asɛmmisa: So na Hiob yɛ ɔtreneeni?

Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

"Adwuma"

1 Nokwaredi a edi mũ:

Na ɔbarima bi wɔ hɔ a wɔfrɛ no Hiob wɔ Us asase so Na ɔyɛ onipa a ɔyɛ pɛ na ɔteɛ, ɔbarima a osuro Onyankopɔn na ɔkwati bɔne. ( Hiob 1:1 ) .

2 Apuei famfo a wɔsen biara:

N’agyapadeɛ ne nguan mpem nson, yoma mpem mmiɛnsa, anantwi mmienu ahanu, mfurum mmaa ahanu, ne nkoa ne mmaawa bebree. Saa ɔbarima yi yɛ ɔkɛseɛ wɔ Apueeɛ famfoɔ mu. ( Hiob 1:3 ) .

3 Hiob frɛ ne ho ɔtreneeni

Mehyɛ trenee atade me ho, .
Hyɛ atɛntrenee sɛ w’atade ne w’abotiri.
Mene anifuraefo ani, .
Anan a ɛyɛ apakye.
Meyɛ ahiafoɔ agya;
Mihu obi a minhyiaa no da no asɛm.
...M’anuonyam dɔɔso wɔ me mu;
Me tadua nyin yɛ den wɔ me nsam. ...Mepaw wɔn akwan, na metena nea edi kan no mu....

(Hiob 29:14-16,20,25) .

Bere bi Hiob kae sɛ: Meyɛ ɔtreneeni, nanso Onyankopɔn ayi m’atɛntrenee afi me nsam;

Hyɛ no nsow: (Hiob adwensakra) Hiob 38 kosi 42 no, Yehowa buaa Hiob asɛm no Bere a Hiob tiee Yehowa nsɛm no akyi//

Ɛnna AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Hiob sɛ: Ɔkasakasafoɔ ne Ade Nyinaa so Tumfoɔ no bɛgye akyinnyeɛ? Wɔn a wɔne Onyankopɔn gye akyinnye no betumi abua eyinom! ...(Hiob) Meyɛ abofono! Dɛn na mede bebua mo? Ná ɛsɛ sɛ mede me nsa kata m’ano. Mekaa no pɛnkoro na mammua Mekaa no mprenu na manka bio. (Hiob 40:1-2,4-5) .

Mesrɛ wo tie me, mepɛ sɛ mekasa Mesrɛ wo, mesrɛ wo kyerɛ me. Mate wo ho asɛm pɛn, .
Yɛbɛhunu wo seesei de m’ankasa m’ani. Enti metan me ho (anaa nkyerɛaseɛ: me nsɛm) na mesakyera me ho wɔ mfuturo ne nsõ mu. ( Hiob 42:4-6 ) .

Akyiri yi, Awurade dom Hiob, na akyiri yi Awurade hyiraa no sen kan mpo.

Enti, na Hiob trenee yɛ nnipa trenee (ne ho trenee), na na ɔsen biara wɔ nnipa a wɔwɔ Apuei fam no mu. "Ɔkaa sɛ, "Mepuee kɔɔ kuro no pon ano na mede nkongua sii hɔ wɔ abɔnten so. Mmabun no huu me na wɔkwatii me, na mmapɔmma no sɔre gyinaa hɔ na wɔde wɔn nsa kataa wɔn ano akannifo yɛɛ komm na wɔde wɔn tɛkrɛma kyekyeree wɔn ano atifi. Nea ɔde n’aso tie me no frɛ me nhyirafo;

...m’anuonyam dɔɔso wɔ me nipadua mu; Sɛ nkurɔfo te me a, wɔma wɔn ani so twɛn komm twɛn m’akwankyerɛ.

...Mepaw wɔn akwan, na metenaa ase kan...(Hiob 29:7-11,20-21,25)

---Na dɛn na Awurade Yesu kae? --- .

“Monnue, sɛ obiara ka mo ho asɛmpa a!...” (Luka 6:26).

Hiob kaa sɛ ɔyɛ ɔtreneeni na “ɔtreneeni”, nanso asiane too ɔne n’abusua so Akyiri yi, Hiob nuu ne ho wɔ Awurade anim! Metee wo ho asɛm pɛn, nanso seesei mede m’ani hunu wo. Enti metan me ho (anaa nkyerɛaseɛ: me nsɛm), na mesakyera me ho wɔ mfuturo ne nsõ mu! Awiei koraa no, Onyankopɔn hyiraa Hiob de nhyira pii sen kan no.

3. Onyankopɔn trenee

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn ne Onyankopɔn trenee?

Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

【Onyankopɔn trenee】

Nea ɛka ho ne: ɔdɔ, ayamye, kronkronyɛ, ɔdɔ mmɔborohunu, abufuw brɛoo, bɔne bi a wonsusuw ho, ayamye, anigye, asomdwoe, abodwokyɛre, ayamye, papayɛ, nokwaredi, odwo, ahobrɛase, ahosodi, trenee, trenee, hann, . trenee Ɔkwan no yɛ nokware, nkwa, hann, ayaresa, ne nkwagye. Owu maa nnebɔneyɛfo, wosiee no, wonyanee no da a ɛto so abiɛsa, na ɔforo kɔɔ soro! Momma nkurɔfoɔ nnye asɛmpa yi nni na wɔgye wɔn nkwa, nyan wɔn, wɔsan nwo wɔn bio, nnya nkwa, na wɔnnya daa nkwa. Amen!

Me mma nkumaa, merekyerɛw yeinom ama mo na moanyɛ bɔne. Sɛ obi yɛ bɔne a, yɛwɔ ɔtemmufoɔ bi wɔ Agya no nkyɛn, Yesu Kristo ɔtreneeni. (1 Yohane 2:1)

4. Atɛntrenee

Asɛmmisa: Hena na ɔyɛ ɔtreneeni?

Mmuae: Onyankopɔn yɛ ɔtreneeni! Amen.

Ɔde trenee bebu wiase atɛn, na ɔde trenee abu aman atɛn. ( Dwom 9:8 ) .
Trenee ne atɛntrenee yɛ w’ahengua fapem; ( Dwom 89:14 ) .
Efisɛ Awurade tenenee na ɔdɔ trenee; ( Dwom 11:7 ) .
Awurade na wabɔ ne nkwagye, na wada ne trenee adi wɔ amanaman no ani so (Dwom 98:2)
ɛfiri sɛ ɔba sɛ ɔrebɛbu asase atɛn. Ɔde trenee bebu wiase atɛn, na ɔde atɛntrenee bebu aman atɛn. ( Dwom 98:9 ) .
Awurade bu atɛntrenee na ɔtɔ wɔn a wɔafom wɔn nyinaa so were. ( Dwom 103:6 ) .
Awurade yɛ ɔdomfoɔ ne ɔtreneeni; ( Dwom 116:5 ) .
Wo tenenee, Awurade, na w’atemmuo tene! ( Dwom 119:137 ) .
Awurade yɛ ɔtreneeni wɔ n’akwan nyinaa mu, na ɔyɛ mmɔborɔhunufo wɔ n’akwan nyinaa mu. ( Dwom 145:17 ) .
Nanso ade nyinaa so Tumfoɔ no deɛ, ne trenee nti, wɔama Onyankopɔn Kronkron no ho. ( Yesaia 5:16 ) .
Esiane sɛ Onyankopɔn teɛ nti, ɔbɛtua amanehunu so ka ama wɔn a wɔma mo haw (2 Tesalonikafoɔ 1:6) .

Mehwɛɛ na mehunuu sɛ ɔsoro abue. Na ɔpɔnkɔ fitaa bi wɔ hɔ, na na wɔfrɛ nea ɔte ne so no Ɔnokwafo ne Nokwarefo a obu atɛn na ɔko wɔ trenee mu. (Adiyisɛm 19:11)

5. Fa trenee di dwuma sɛ nkatabo a wode kata wo nufu so

Asɛmmisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na wode trenee bɛbɔ wo koma ho ban?

Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

Ɛkyerɛ sɛ yɛbɛyi nipa dedaw no afi hɔ, ahyɛ nipa foforo no, na yɛahyɛ Kristo! Fa Awurade Yesu Kristo trenee siesie wo ho da biara, na ka Yesu dɔ ho asɛm: Onyankopɔn yɛ ɔdɔ, ayamye, kronkronyɛ, ɔdɔ mmɔborohunu, ɔbrɛ abufuw, ɔmfa bɔne bi nsusuw ho, ɔdɔ, anigye, asomdwoe, abodwokyɛre, ayamye , papayɛ, Nokwaredi, odwo, ahobrɛase, ahosodi, nokwaredi, trenee, hann, kwan, nokware, nkwa, nnipa hann, ayaresa, ne nkwagye. Owu maa nnebɔneyɛfo, wosiee no, wonyanee no da a ɛto so abiɛsa, na ɔforo kɔɔ soro maa yɛn bem! Tena Ade Nyinaa so Tumfoɔ no nifa. Momma nkurɔfoɔ nnye asɛmpa yi nni na wɔgye wɔn nkwa, nyan wɔn, wɔsan nwo wɔn bio, nnya nkwa, na wɔnnya daa nkwa. Amen!

6. Fa Tao no sie, sie nokware no, na bɔ koma no ho ban

Asɛmmisa: Wobɛyɛ dɛn akura nokware kwan no mu na woabɔ wo koma ho ban?

Mmuae: Fa wo ho to Honhom Kronkron no so na bata nokware ne akwan pa no ho pintinn! Eyi yɛ nea wɔde bɛbɔ koma no ho ban, te sɛ ahwehwɛ.

1 Bɔ wo koma ho ban

Ɛsɛ sɛ wowɛn wo koma sen biribiara.
Efisɛ nea efi asetra mu ba no fi komam.

( Mmebusɛm 4:23 ne) .

2 Fa wo ho to Honhom Kronkron no so na ama woadi ɔkwan pa no so

Fa gyidi ne ɔdɔ a ɛwɔ Kristo Yesu mu no sie nsɛm pa a woate fi me nkyɛn no. Ɛsɛ sɛ wowɛn akwan pa a Honhom Kronkron a ɔte yɛn mu no de ahyɛ wo nsa no.

( 2 Timoteo 1:13-14 ) .

3 Obiara a ɔte asɛm no nanso ɔnte ase

Obiara a ɔte ɔsoro ahennie asɛm no nte aseɛ, afei ɔbɔnefoɔ no ba bɛfa deɛ wɔadua wɔ n’akoma mu no, wɔdua no kwan ho. ( Mateo 13:19 ) .

Enti, so wote ase?


7. Wo ne Onyankopɔn nantew

Awurade akyerɛ wo, O onipa, nea eye.
Dɛn na ɔpɛ fi wo hɔ?
Bere tenten a wodi atɛntrenee na wodɔ mmɔborohunu no, .
Fa ahobrɛase ne wo Nyankopɔn nantew.

( Mika 6:8 ) .

8. Nnipa 144,000 dii Yesu akyi

Na mehwɛe, na mehunuu Oguammaa no sɛ ɔgyina Bepɔ Sion so, na nnipa mpem ɔha aduanan nnan ka ne ho, na wɔakyerɛw ne din ne n’Agya din wɔ wɔn moma so. ... Wɔmfa mmaa nkekaa saa nkurɔfoɔ yi ho fĩ; Wɔdi Oguammaa no akyi baabiara a ɔbɛkɔ. Wɔtɔɔ wɔn fii nnipa mu sɛ aba a edi kan maa Onyankopɔn ne Oguammaa no. (Adiyisɛm 14:1,4)

Asɛmpa no nkyerɛwee a efi:

asafo a ɛwɔ owura yesu kristo mu

Anuanom mmarima ne mmea!

Kae sɛ wobɛboaboa ano.

2023.08.30 na ɛwɔ hɔ

articles.title: Monhyɛ Honhom mu Akode 2
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa!

Ɛnnɛ yɛkɔ so hwehwɛ kar akwan a wɔkyɛ mu

Ɔkasa 2: Hyɛ honhom mu akode da biara

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no mu nkyerɛ Efesofo 6:13-14 na yɛnbom nkenkan:

Enti, momfa Onyankopɔn akodeɛ nyina ara, na moatumi ako atia ɔtamfo amanehunu da, na moayɛ ne nyinaa awie no, moagyina. Enti gyina pintinn, fa nokware no abɔ wo ho ban...

1: Fa nokware kyekyere w’asen

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn ne nokware?

Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

(1) Honhom Kronkron yɛ nokware

Honhom Kronkron yɛ nokware:

Oyi ne Yesu Kristo a ɔnam nsuo ne mogya nko ara so baeɛ, na mmom ɔnam nsuo ne mogya so na ɔdii Honhom Kronkron no adanseɛ, ɛfiri sɛ Honhom Kronkron yɛ nokorɛ. (1 Yohane 5:6-7) .

Nokware Honhom no:

"Sɛ modɔ me a, mubedi m'ahyɛde so. Na mɛsrɛ Agya no, na ɔbɛma mo Ɔwerɛkyekyefo foforo (anaa Ɔwerɛkyekyefo; ɔno ara wɔ ase hɔ), na ɔne mo bɛtena daa, ɔno ne nokware no. Wiase." ntumi nnye No ntom, ɛfiri sɛ ɛnhunu No na ɛnnim No, na mmom monim No, ɛfiri sɛ ɔne mo tena na ɔbɛtena mo mu (Yohane 14:15-17).

(2) Yesu ne nokware no

Dɛn ne nokware?
Pilato bisaa no se, "Woyɛ ɔhene ana, Yesu buae se, "Woka sɛ meyɛ ɔhene. Yei nti na wɔwoo me, na eyi nti na mebaa wiase sɛ merebɛdi nokware no ho adanseɛ. Deɛ ɔdi nokware no tie." me nne so Pilato bisae sɛ, “Dɛn ne nokware?”

( Yohane 18:37-38 ) .

Yesu ne nokware no:

Yesu kaa sɛ, “Mene kwan ne nokorɛ ne nkwa;

(3) Onyankopɔn yɛ nokware

Asɛm no ne Onyankopɔn:

Mfitiaseɛ no na Tao wɔ hɔ, na Tao ka Onyankopɔn ho, na Tao nso yɛ Onyankopɔn. Na Asɛm yi ka Onyankopɔn ho mfiase no. ( Yohane 1:1-2 ) .

Onyankopɔn Asɛm yɛ nokware:

Wɔnnyɛ wiase de, sɛnea me nso menyɛ wiase no. Tew wɔn ho wɔ nokware mu; Sɛdeɛ wosomaa me baa wiase no, saa ara na masoma wɔn aba wiase. Wɔn nti na metew me ho, na wɔnam nokware no so atew wɔn nso ho.

( Yohane 17:16-19 ) .

Hyɛ no nsow: Mfiase no na Tao wɔ hɔ, na Tao ka Onyankopɔn ho, na Tao nso yɛ Onyankopɔn! Onyankopɔn ne Asɛm no, nkwa Asɛm (hwɛ 1 Yohane 1:1-2 ). W’asɛm yɛ nokware, enti, Onyankopɔn yɛ nokware. Amen!

2: Ɔkwan bɛn so na wode nokware abɔ w’asen?

Asɛmmisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na wode nokware abɔ w’asen?

Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

Hyɛ no nsow: Nokware a wode bedi dwuma sɛ abɔso de abɔ w’asen, kyerɛ sɛ, Onyankopɔn kwan, Onyankopɔn nokware, Onyankopɔn nsɛm, ne Honhom Kronkron honhom, yɛ tumi ne tumi ma Onyankopɔn mma ne Kristofo! Amen.

(1) Awo foforo
1 Nsuo ne Honhom mu awo no - Yohane 3:5-7
2 Wɔwoo wɔn firii asɛmpa no gyidie mu - 1 Korintofoɔ 4:15, Yakobo 1:18

3 Onyankopɔn woo no - Yohane 1:12-13

(2) Hyɛ wo ho foforo no na hyɛ Kristo

Fa onipa foforo no hyɛ:

Na hyɛ nipa foforo a wɔabɔ no Onyankopɔn suban so wɔ nokware trenee ne kronkronyɛ mu no. ( Efesofo 4:24 ) .

Fa onipa foforo hyɛ. Wɔma onipa foforo no yɛ foforo wɔ nimdeɛ mu ma ɔyɛ ne Bɔfo no suban. ( Kolosefo 3:10 ) .

Fa Kristo hyɛ:

Enti mo nyinaa nam Kristo Yesu mu gyidie so yɛ Onyankopɔn mma. Mo mu dodoɔ a wɔbɔɔ wɔn asu wɔ Kristo mu no, mohyɛ Kristo. ( Galatifo 3:26-27 )

Momfa Awurade Yesu Kristo nhyɛ wo ho bere nyinaa na nnyɛ nhyehyɛe mma honam no nni n’akɔnnɔ ho dwuma. ( Romafo 13:14 ) .

(3) Tena Kristo mu

Onipa foforo no tena Kristo mu.

Afei afobu biara nni hɔ mma wɔn a wɔwɔ Kristo Yesu mu. (Romafo 8:1 KJV) .

Obiara a ɔtena Ne mu no nnyɛ bɔne; (1 Yohane 3:6 KJV) .

(4) Ahotoso-Menyɛ nea ɔte ase mprempren no bio

Wɔabɔ me ne Kristo asɛnnua mu, na ɛnyɛ me na mete ase bio, na mmom Kristo te me mu, na nkwa a seesei mete mu wɔ honam mu no, mede gyidie na ɛbɔ wɔ Onyankopɔn Ba a ɔdɔɔ me na ɔde ne ho maeɛ maa me no mu. ( Galatifo 2:20 KJV ) .

(5) Onipa foforo no kɔka Kristo ho na onyin bɛyɛ ɔpanyin

Sɛ yɛbɛsiesie ahotefoɔ ama ɔsom adwuma, na yɛakyekye Kristo nipadua no, kɔsi sɛ yɛn nyinaa bɛduru gyidie ne Onyankopɔn Ba no nimdeɛ baakoyɛ mu, ama mmarimayɛ a ɛho akokwa, akɔduru sɛdeɛ ne kɛseɛ teɛ Kristo ahyɛ mu ma,... Ɔdɔ nko ara so na ɔka nokware na onyin wɔ nneɛma nyinaa mu kɔ Nea ɔyɛ Ti no mu, Kristo, a ɔnam ne so kura nipadua no nyinaa mu na wɔde hyɛ mu, a nkwaa biara di n’atirimpɔw ho dwuma na ɛboa wɔn ho wɔn ho sɛnea akwaa biara dwumadi, na ɛma nipadua no nyin na ɛkyekye ne ho wɔ ɔdɔ mu. (Efesofo 4:12-13,15-16 KJV)

(6) Akwakoraa no "honam" no sɛe nkakrankakra

Sɛ woate n’asɛm, woagye n’akwankyerɛ, na woasua ne nokware a, ɛnde ɛsɛ sɛ woyi wo nipasu dedaw a ɛyɛ wo nipasu dedaw a ɛnam n’akɔnnɔ nnaadaa so sɛe no ngu (Efesofo 4:21-22 Union Version). ) .

(7) Wɔyɛ onipa foforo “honhom mu nipa” no foforo da biara da wɔ Kristo mu

Enti, yɛn koma nnyae. Ɛwom sɛ wɔresɛe akyi nipadua no de, nanso emu nipadua no reyɛ foforo da biara da. Yɛn amanehunu a emu yɛ hare ne bere tiaa mu amanehunu bɛyɛ adwuma ama yɛn anuonyam mu duru a enni awiei a wontumi mfa ntoto ho. Ɛbɛdaa adi sɛ ɛnyɛ nea wohu no ho hia yɛn, na mmom nea wonhu no, efisɛ nea wohu no yɛ bere tiaa mu de, na nea wonhu no yɛ daa. (2 Korintofo 4:16-18 KJV)

Na mo gyidie rengyina nnipa nyansa so na mmom Onyankopɔn tumi so. (1 Korintofo 2:5 KJV) .

Hyɛ nso:

Paulo yɛ ma Onyankopɔn asɛm ne asɛmpa no! Honam mu no, onyaa ahohiahia ne nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn wɔ wiase no mu Bere a wɔde no too afiase wɔ Filipi no, ohuu ɔsraani afiasehwɛfo no sɛ ɔhyɛ akode a edi mũ. Enti ɔtwerɛɛ krataa kɔmaa ahotefoɔ a wɔwɔ Efeso nyinaa.

Monhwɛ mo ho yie, na monnyɛ sɛ nkwaseafoɔ, na mmom sɛ anyansafoɔ. Fa bere no di dwuma yiye, efisɛ nna yi yɛ bɔne. Nnyɛ ɔkwasea, na mmom te nea Awurade pɛ yɛ ase. Hwɛ Efesofo 5:15-17

Mmiɛnsa: Kristofo sɛ Kristo asraafo

Hyɛ nea Onyankopɔn de ama wo da biara da

- Honhom mu Akode: .

Titiriw bere a Kristofo rehyia sɔhwɛ, ahohiahia, ne ahohiahia wɔ honam fam no, bere a Satan abɔfo a wɔwɔ wiase no tow hyɛ Kristofo nipadua so no, ɛsɛ sɛ Kristofo sɔre anɔpa biara, hyɛ honhom mu akode a edi mũ a Onyankopɔn de ama wɔn, na wɔde nokware no di dwuma sɛ wɔn abɔso. Fa abɔso bɔ w’asen na siesie wo ho ma da koro adwuma.

(Sɛnea Paulo kae no) Mewɔ asɛm biako a etwa to: Monyɛ den wɔ Awurade ne Ne tumi mu. Monhyɛ Onyankopɔn akodeɛ nyinaa, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wobɛtumi agyina ɔbonsam nsisi ano. Na yɛne honam ne mogya na yɛne aperepere, na mmom yɛne atumfoɔ ne tumidi ne wiase sum mu atumfoɔ ne honhom mu amumɔyɛ a ɛwɔ sorɔnsorɔmmea. Enti, momfa Onyankopɔn akodeɛ nyina ara, na moatumi ako atia ɔtamfo amanehunu da, na moayɛ ne nyinaa awie no, moagyina. Enti gyina pintinn, fa nokware abɔso abɔ wo ho...(Efesofo 6:10-14 KJV)

Asɛmpa no nkyerɛwee a efi:

asafo a ɛwɔ owura yesu kristo mu

Anuanom mmarima ne mmea!

Kae sɛ wobɛboaboa ano

2023.08.27 na ɛwɔ hɔ

articles.title: ɔdɔ
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
---Sɛnea wobɛhunu nsonsonoeɛ a ɛda ɔdɔ ne awaresɛeɛ ntam---

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛhwehwɛ ayɔnkofa mu kyɛfa: ɔdɔ ne awaresɛe

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nkɔ Genesis Ti 2, nkyekyem 23-25, na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ:
Ɔbarima no kaa sɛ: Eyi yɛ me nnompe mu dompe ne me honam mu nam Wobɛtumi afrɛ no ɔbaa ɛfiri sɛ wɔfaa no firii ɔbarima nsam.

Enti ɔbarima begyaw n’agya ne ne maame akɔbata ne yere ho, na wɔn baanu no abɛyɛ ɔhonam koro. Saa bere no na awarefo no da adagyaw na na wɔn ani nwu.

1. Ɔdɔ

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn ne ɔdɔ?

Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

(1)Ɔdɔ a ɛda Adam ne Hawa ntam

--Na awarefoɔ no da adagyaw na wɔn ani nwu--

1 Adam ka kyerɛɛ Hawa se, "Eyi yɛ me nnompe mu dompe ne me honam mu nam, ma memfrɛ wo ɔbaa"!
"Mmea" yɛ akyɛde a ɛyɛ fɛ sen biara a Onyankopɔn de ama mmarima, ɛyɛ nokware, ayamye ne ahoɔfɛ! Ɛyɛ nkamfo, ɔhokafo, awerɛkyekye, ne ɔboafo!
2 Ɔbarima begyaw n’awofo hɔ;
3 Kɔka wo yere ho, .
4 Wɔn baanu no bɛyɛ biako.

5 Ná ɔbarima no ne ne yere da adagyaw, na wɔn ani awu.

[Hyɛ no nsow] Na Adam ne Hawa wɔ Eden Turo mu, na wɔn koma mu tew, kronkron, nokware dɔ, nokware, papayɛ ne ahoɔfɛ! Enti, okunu ne ɔyere da adagyaw na wonni aniwu biara Eyi ne ɔdɔ a ennya nkɔɔ nnipa mu.)

(2)Ɔdɔ a ɛda Isak ne Rebeka ntam

Enti Isak de Rebeka baa ne na Sara ntamadan mu, na ɔwaree no, na ɔdɔɔ no. Isak nyaa awerɛkyekye afei a na ne maame nni hɔ bio no. Genesis 24:67

[Hyɛ no nsow] Isak yɛ Kristo ho mfonini, na Rebeka yɛ asɔre no ho nhwɛso! Isak waree Rebeka na ɔdɔ no! Ɛne sɛ, Kristo ware asafo no na ɔdɔ asafo no.

(3)Nnwom Nnwom mu dɔ

【Ɔdɔfo Ɔbarima ne Awarefo】

"Ɔdɔfo" yɛ Kristo ho nhwɛso, .
"Awarefo a Wɔsen Biara":
1 yɛ ɔbaabun a ne ho tew no ho mfonini-2 Korintofo 11:2, Adiyisɛm 14:4;
2 yɛ asɔre no ho nhwɛso-Efesofo 5:32;

3 yɛ Kristo ayeforo no ho nhwɛso - Adiyisɛm 19:7.

Mene Saron nhwiren ne bonhwa mu sukooko.
Me dɔfo wɔ mmea mu, sɛ sukooko wɔ nsɔe mu.
Me dɔfo wɔ nnipa mu sɛnea apɔw-mu-teɛteɛ dua wɔ nnua mu no.
Mede anigye tenaa ne sunsuma ase na mekaa n’aba no hwɛe, .

Ɛte nka sɛ ɛyɛ dɛ. Ɔde me ba apontow dan no mu na ɔde ɔdɔ si ne frankaa so wɔ me so. Nnwom mu Dwom 2:1-4

Mesrɛ wo, fa me to wo koma so sɛ nsɔano na soa me wɔ wo nsa so te sɛ stamp.

Na ɔdɔ mu yɛ den sɛ owuo, ahoɔyaw yɛ atirimɔden sɛ hellgya; Nsu pii ntumi nnum ɔdɔ, na saa ara nso na nsuyiri ntumi nmene no. Sɛ obi de n’abusua mu ademude nyinaa sesa ɔdɔ a, wobebu no animtiaa. Nnwom mu Dwom 8:6-7

2. Awaresɛe

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn ne awaresɛe ne awaresɛe?

Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

(1) Sɛnea gyidi honhom kronkron a wɔsan wo no te no:

1 Wiase nnamfo--hwɛ Yakobo 4:4
2 Asɔre no ne asase so ahene yɛɛ biako--Hwɛ Adiyisɛm 17:2

3. Wɔn a wɔgyina mmara so--hwɛ Romafoɔ 7:1-3, Gal

(2) Sɛdeɛ ɔhonam ahyɛdeɛ no mu ahyɛdeɛ teɛ:

1 Nsɛe aware--Exodus 20:14
2 Obiara a obegyae ne yere na waware foforo no, ɔsɛe aware; ” Luka 16:18

3 Obiara a ɔde akɔnnɔ hwɛ ɔbaa no, ɔne no abɔ aware dedaw wɔ ne koma mu - Mateo 5:27-28

3. Sɛnea yebehu nsonsonoe a ɛda ɔdɔ ne awaresɛe ntam

Asɛmmisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na Kristofo hu ɔdɔ?

Mmuae: Aware a Onyankopɔn yɛ ho nhyehyɛe yɛ ɔdɔ!

1 Obi pɛ sɛ ogyaw n’awofo, .
2 Wo ne wo yere nyɛ biako, .
3 Wɔn baanu no bɛyɛ biako, .
4 Ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn biakoyɛ, .
5 Mma obiara nntetew mu--Hwɛ Mateo 19:4-6
6 Na wɔn baanu nyinaa da adagyaw, .

7 Ɛnyɛ aniwu--Hwɛ Genesis 2:24

Asɛmmisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na Kristofo hu awaresɛe?

Mmuae: Akɔnnɔ biara "akyi" Onyankopɔn aware a wɔayɛ no biako no yɛ awaresɛe.

(Nhwɛso:) Genesis 6:2 Bere a Onyankopɔn mma huu nnipa mmabea a wɔn ho yɛ fɛ no, wɔfaa wɔn yerenom a wɔn ankasa pɛ.

(Hyɛ no nsow:) Bere a ohu ɔbarima babea ahoɔfɛ (ɔhonam akɔnnɔ, aniwa akɔnnɔ) no, ɔpaw sɛnea ɔpɛ (ne asetra yi mu ahantan) na ɔfa no sɛ ne yere (biara mfi Agya no hɔ “ . Onyankopɔn”) → Ɛnyɛ aware a Onyankopɔn na ɔhyehyɛ . Hwɛ Yakobo 2:16
Genesis 3-4 (ɛnyɛ) Onyankopɔn ne nnipa mmea yɛ biako ma wɔwo mma → "mmarima akɛse, akokodurufo ne nnipa a wɔagye din" → "abran, abosom, ahantanfo, ahantanfo" a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔyɛ "ahene" na wɔma nkurɔfo som wɔn anaa wɔsom wɔn kasa tia .
Na AWURADE hunuu sɛ onipa amumuyɛ dɔɔso wɔ asase so, na n’adwene nyinaa yɛ bɔne nko ara daa, Genesis 6:5

4. Suban ne ne su ahorow a (ɔdɔ, awaresɛe) .

Asɛmmisa: Nneyɛe bɛn na ɛyɛ ɔdɔ? So saa nneyɛe no yɛ awaresɛe?

Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

(1) Okunu ne ɔyere

1 Onyankopɔn biakoyɛ ho aware

Ɔbarima begyaw n’awofo hɔ na wabata ne yere ho, na wɔn baanu no abɛyɛ ɔhonam biako! Aware a Onyankopɔn de ne ho abɔ mu no, onipa ntumi ntetew mu. Sɛ nhwɛso no, okunu werɛ fi ne yere anaa ɔyere kyɛ ne kunu Wɔn baanu no da adagyaw na "wɔayɛ biako" a aniwu nnim → eyi ne ɔdɔ. Yɛsrɛ sɛ hwɛ 1 Korintofo 7:3-4.
Nhwɛsoɔ: Adam ne Hawa - hwɛ Genesis 2:18-24
Nhwɛsoɔ: Abraham ne Sara - hwɛ Genesis 12:1-5

Nhwɛsoɔ: Isak ne Rebeka - hwɛ Genesis 24:67

2 Aware a Onyankopɔn ahyira so

Nhwɛsoɔ: Noa ne n’abusua - hwɛ Genesis 6:18
Nhwɛsoɔ: Ná Onyankopɔn dɔ Yakob, na ne yerenom mmienu ne ne mmaawa mmienu woo Israel mmusuakuo dumienu no.

Nhwɛsoɔ: Rut ne Boas – Nhwehwɛmu Luka: 4:13

3 Ɛnyɛ aware a Onyankopɔn na ɔhyehyɛ

Sɛ nhwɛso no, sɛ Abraham fa mpena na ɔne Hagar da a, Abraham bɛte "aniwu" nka wɔ ne koma mu efisɛ ɔmfata ne yere Sara! Enti, ɛyɛ aware a ɛnsɔ Onyankopɔn ani. Awiei koraa no, Hagar asefo dodow no ara a "wɔwoo" Ismael no twee wɔn ho fii Onyankopɔn akwan ho na wogyaw Onyankopɔn.

4 Onyankopɔn nhwɛ nnipa nneyɛe

Nhwɛso: Tamas ne Yuda

Na wobu Tamar, asew, ne n'asew sɛ "aguamammɔ" bɔne sɛnea honam mmara kyerɛ no, Onyankopɔn ansusuw Tamar suban ho Onyankopɔn ne ne gyidi a ɔwɔ sɛ ɔbɛwo ɔbabarima ama Yuda fie no, Onyankopɔn buu no treneefo din wɔ Yesu abusua anato mu. Hwɛ Genesis 38:24-26, Mateo 1:3 ne Deuteronomium 22 "Ahotew ho Mmara".

Nhwɛsoɔ: Lahab ne Salmon--Mateo 1:5

Nhwɛso: Dawid ne Bat-Seba

Dawid yɛɛ "awaresɛe na ɔfɛm nkrante sɛ obekum no." Na esiane sɛ na Dawid fi ne koma nyinaa mu dɔ Onyankopɔn na odii Onyankopɔn apɛde akyi wɔ biribiara mu (na ɔmaa Israelfo no de wɔn ho too Onyankopɔn so) nti, wɔfrɛɛ no onipa a Onyankopɔn ankasa koma te. Hwɛ Asomafo no Nnwuma 13:22 ne 2 Samuel 11-12.

(2) Mmarima ne mmea a wɔnwaree

"Mmarimaa ne mmeawa" kyerɛ mmarima ne mmea a wɔnwaree Mmarimaa ne mmeawa dɔ wɔn ho wɔn ho na wɔpɛ sɛ wofi abusua ase. Sɛ wo ne onipa foforo no wɔ akɔnnɔ bɔne wɔ wo komam a, ɛnde na woresɛe aware.

Sɛnea Awurade Yesu kae no: Nanso mise mo sɛ, obiara a ɔde akɔnnɔ hwɛ ɔbea no ne no asɛe aware dedaw wɔ ne koma mu. Mateo 5:28

(3) Akunafo

Mese mo sɛ, obiara a ɔbɛgyae ne yere, gye nna mu ɔbrasɛeɛ no, ɔbɔ awaresɛeɛ, na obiara a ɔbɛware ɔbaa a wɔagyae no awareɛ no nso asɛe awareɛ. ” Mateo 19:9

[Sɛnea Paulo ankasa adwene te no].

1 Wɔde kɔma wɔn a wɔnwaree ne akunafo

Sɛ wuntumi nyɛ hwee a, wubetumi aware. Sɛ́ anka akɔnnɔ bɛhyew no, ɛbɛyɛ papa sɛ wobɛware. 1 Korintofo 7:9

2 Sɛ wo kunu wu a, wubetumi asan aware

Bere a okunu no te ase no, wɔkyekyere ɔyere no sɛ okunu no wu a, ɔyere no wɔ ahofadi sɛ ɔbɛsan aware sɛnea ɔpɛ, nanso onipa a ɔwɔ Awurade mu nkutoo. 1 Korintofo 7:39

(4) Aware akyi nsɛm
"Hongxing fi ɔfasu no mu ba" ka ɔbea bi a ɔrefifi na ne nna ho akɔnnɔ yɛ adwuma wɔ estrus bere mu no kyerɛ sɛ ɔyere no ne ɔbarima bi da na ɔne ɔbarima bi da. Sɛ́ ɔbarima bi ne aware akyi aware anaa ɔbea bi wɔ aware akyi a, wɔn suban yɛ awaresɛe.
(5)Aguamammɔ
Mmarima ne mmea ntam aguamammɔ ne aguamammɔ nyinaa yɛ awaresɛe nneyɛe.
Enti, Onyankopɔn de wɔn hyɛɛ aniwu akɔnnɔ mu. Wɔn mmaa adan wɔn awosu mu dwumadie a ɛnyɛ awosu mu dwumadie, na saa ara na wɔn mmarima nso agyae wɔn awosu mu dwumadie, na akɔnnɔ ne wɔn ho akɔnnɔ asɛe wɔn, na mmarima ne nnipa yɛ aniwusɛm, na wɔfata wɔn ankasa aweredi. Hwɛ Romafo 1:26-27
(6)Nneɛma a wɔde wɔn ho hyɛ mu

"Bɔne mu anigye": Mmarima anaa mmea binom nya honam fam abotɔyam ne anigye fi bɔne mu denam ɔbarima ne ɔbea nna a wɔde wɔn ho hyɛ mu ne wɔn ho a wɔde hyɛ wɔn ho wɔn ho mu akyi no, wɔte ahonu, ɛyaw, ne ade hunu nka wɔ wɔn akra mu.

(7)Anadwo daeɛ (wet dreams) .

"Adwene da biara, dae dae anadwo biara": Ɔbarima nipadua yi androgen hormone fi "semen" fi mu Anadwo, obedi ne nipadua akɔnnɔ akyi Sɛ ɔda a, ɔda dae sɛ ɔne ɔbea bi a onim no bɛda honam fam nnim; saa ara na ɛte wɔ mmea fam." Sɛ woda dae sɛ wo ne ɔbarima bi bɛda bere a woanyinsɛn a, na woreyɛ awaresɛe.

Leviticus 15:16-24, 22:4 Wɔabu "Ɔbarima anadwo mframa" sɛ nea ɛho ntew, na saa ara na ɛte wɔ mmea ho.

5. Obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no renyɛ bɔne da

Asɛmmisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na obi betumi akwati awaresɛe?

Mmuae: Nea ɛsɛ sɛ "wowo no foforo" na Onyankopɔn awo no no renyɛ awaresɛe.

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn ntia?

Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

1 Onipa foforo a wawo no foforo no mfi honam mu - twe adwene si Romafo 8:9
2 Tena Kristo Yesu mu--Hwɛ Romafoɔ 8:1
3 Wɔde asie Kristo wɔ Onyankopɔn mu--Hwɛ Kolosefo 3:3

4 Nea Onyankopɔn awo no no wɔ honhom nipadua, a ɔhonam akɔnnɔ ne akɔnnɔ nnim (Onipa foforo no) ɔnware na wɔmfa mma no. Hwɛ 1 Korintofo 15:44 ne Mateo 22:30.

【Hyɛ nso】

Obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no na wɔanyan no no wɔ honhom nipadua - twe adwene si 1 Korintofo 15:44; honam akɔnnɔ bɔne ne akɔnnɔ, na ɔnware anaasɛ ɔware te sɛ ɔbɔfo a ofi soro! Onipa foforo a wɔasan awo no no renyɛ bɔne, na ɔrensɛe aware nso.

Sɛ nhwɛsoɔ no, honam mu ayɛyɛdeɛ mu mmaransɛm:

1 Nkum nnipa

Yesu kaa sɛ, "Wiase yi mu nnipa ware na wɔde wɔn ma awareɛ; na wɔn a wɔbu wɔn sɛ wɔfata saa wiase no nware na wɔmfa wɔn mma wɔn a wɔte ase firi awufoɔ mu, ɛfiri sɛ wɔrentumi nwu bio te sɛ abɔfoɔ; na ɛfiri sɛ wɔanyan wɔn, Sɛ Onyankopɔn Ba Luka 20:34-36.

[Hyɛ no nsow:] Nnipa foforo a wɔsan wo wɔn na wonyan wɔn no ntumi nwu bio, te sɛ abɔfo. Saa bere no, so ehia sɛ wudi ahyɛde a ɛne sɛ "Nni awu" no so?Dabi, ɛnte saa? owu anaa nnome. Hwɛ Adiyisɛm 21:4, 22:3!

2 Nsɛe aware

Nhwɛsoɔ: Nnipa a wɔpɛ sigaretnom ne nnipa a wɔn ani nnye sigaretnom no, wɔtɔn wɔn honam ma bɔne (hwɛ Romafoɔ 7:14) Wɔpɛ bɔne mmara (hwɛ Romafoɔ 7:23) na wɔn koma di akyi Honam ani gye sigaretnom;

Hyɛ no nsow: Esiane sɛ onipa foforo a wɔawo no foforo no yɛ honhom nipadua na onni ɔhonam akɔnnɔ bɔne ne akɔnnɔ bɔne nti, wɔnware na wɔnware, te sɛ abɔfo te sɛ nea enti obiara a wɔawo no foforo no renyɛ bɔne na ɔrensɛe aware!

Na baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ (hwɛ Romafo 4:15) .

Onipa foforo a wɔawo no foforo no de ne ho afi mmara no ho dedaw, na ɛho nhia sɛ wudi mmaransɛm (nsɛ sɛ wosɛe aware) ne ɔhonam nhyehyɛe so. So wote eyi ase?

3 Mma nnwia ade

Hyɛ no nsow: Wɔn a ɔhyɛɛ wɔn ato hɔ no nso ɔfrɛɛ wɔn a ɔfrɛɛ wɔn bem no nso ɔhyɛɛ wɔn anuonyam; Romafo 8:30 . Wɔ saa tebea yi mu no, so korɔnbɔ da so ara wɔ Onyankopɔn ahenni mu So ɛho da so ara hia sɛ wodi "Wɔnnwia ade" so?

4 Nni atoro adanse

Hyɛ no nsow: Onipa foforo a wɔawo no foforo no wɔ Agya no wɔ ne mu, Kristo asɛm wɔ ne koma mu, na Honhom Kronkron no yɛ ne ho foforo sɛ ɔbɛyɛ nneɛma a ɛsɔ Agya no ani Saa kwan yi so no, so obetumi adi "atoro adanse"? teɛ efisɛ Honhom Kronkron tumi te nneɛma nyinaa ase, Onyankopɔn Asɛm wɔ yɛn mu, na yetumi hu yɛn koma mu nsusuwii ne adwene mpo. Enti ɛho da so ara hia sɛ wudi mmara ahorow yi so?

5 Mma wo nni adifudepɛ

Hyɛ no nsow: Mo a Onyankopɔn awo mo no nyinaa yɛ Ɔsoro Agya no mma na moyɛ Ɔsoro Agya no agyapadeɛ. Deɛ wannya n’ankasa ne Ba, na mmom ɔde no maeɛ maa yɛn nyinaa no, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na ɔne no remfa nneɛma nyinaa mma yɛn kwa? Romafo 8:32 . Saa kwan yi so no, sɛ wowɔ wo soro Agya no agyapade a, so wobɛda so ara kɔn dɔ afoforo nneɛma?

Anuanom, monkae sɛ mobɛboaboa ano

Asɛmpa no nkyerɛwee a efi:

asafo a ɛwɔ owura yesu kristo mu

articles.title: Hu Wo Nokware Nyankopɔn Koro
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa!

Ɛnnɛ yɛhwehwɛ fekubɔ no mu na yɛkyɛ "Nokware Nyankopɔn no nim".

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nkyerɛ Yohane 17:3, na yɛndan no na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ:

Yei ne daa nkwa: sɛ mɛhunu wo, nokware Nyankopɔn koro no, ne Yesu Kristo a wosomaa no no.

1. Hu wo nokware Nyankopɔn koro pɛ

Asɛmmisa: Nokware Nyankopɔn biako no din de dɛn?

Mmuae: Yehowa ne ne din!

Enti nokware Nyankopɔn koro pɛ, Ne din ne Yehowa! Amen.

Sɛnea Mose kae no ara pɛ: Wo din de dɛn?

Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: "Mene me"... Onyankopɔn nso ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: "Sei na ka kyerɛ Israelfoɔ sɛ: Awurade, mo agyanom Nyankopɔn, Abraham Nyankopɔn, Isak Nyankopɔn.' , na Yakob Nyankopɔn asoma me aba mo nkyɛn

Asɛmmisa: Hu wo nokware Nyankopɔn koro pɛ, efisɛ wo nkutoo ne nokware Nyankopɔn!
Dɛn nti na nnipa a wɔwɔ wiase som abosom, atoro anyame, ne ahonhommɔne pii? Te sɛ Sakyamuni Buddha, Guanyin Bodhisattva, Muhammad, Mazu, Wong Tai Sin, ɔpon nyame a ɔwɔ fie, ahonyade nyame, asetra mu ntini nyame a ɔwɔ akuraa no ase, Bodhisattva, ne nea ɛkeka ho, na anyame pii wɔ hɔ a wonnim?

Mmuae: Efisɛ wiase no nnim hwee na wonnim nokware Nyankopɔn no.

Sɛnea Paulo kae wɔ Asomafo no Asomafo no Nnwuma mu no: "Merekyinkyin no, mihuu nea mosom, na mihuu afɔremuka bi a wɔakyerɛw so sɛ 'Onyankopɔn a wonnim no'. Afei mereka nea mosom no kyerɛ mo, na monnsom." nim Bɔ amansan ne nneɛma a ɛwɔ mu nyinaa Onyankopɔn a ɔyɛ ɔsoro ne asase Wura no ntena asɔredan a wɔde nnipa nsa ayɛ mu, na nnipa nsa nsom no, te sɛ nea ohia biribiara; sɛ ɔbɛbɔ adesamma aman nyinaa ma wɔatena asase nyinaa so, na ɔsan nso hyɛɛ wɔn mmere ne baabi a wɔbɛtra ahye, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛhwehwɛ Ebia wɔbɛte Onyankopɔn ase, nanso ɔne yɛn mu biara ntam nware; . Onyankopɔn nhwɛ, nanso seesei ɔhyɛ obiara a ɔwɔ baabiara sɛ ɔnnu ne ho, ɛfiri sɛ wahyɛ da bi a ɔbɛbu wiase atɛn wɔ trenee mu denam onipa a wahyɛ no so, na ɔde ahotosoɔ bɛma nnipa nyinaa denam no a ɔbɛma no so afiri Adanse a wɔawuwu.”

2. Onyame biara nni hɔ gye Yehowa

Asɛmmisa: So onyame foforo bi wɔ hɔ a ɛnyɛ nokware Nyankopɔn biako no?

Mmuae: Mene AWURADE, na onyame foforo biara nni m’anim; Ɛwom sɛ wunnim me deɛ, nanso mɛbɔ w’asen (kyerɛ sɛ, wode nokware bɛbɔ w’asen, na woahu nokware no, na woahu nokware Nyankopɔn no).

Efi baabi a owia pue kosi baabi a ɛkɔtɔ no, ma obiara nhu sɛ onyame foforo biara nni hɔ gye me. Mene AWURADE; Yesaia 45:5-6

【Obiara a ɔgye AWURADE di no, wɔbɛgye no nkwa】

Mobɛka na momfa mo nsusuiɛ akyerɛ, na momma wɔne wɔn ho wɔn ho nsusu ho. Hena na ɔtwee adwene sii so fi tete? Hena na ɔkaa ho asɛm fi tete? Ɛnyɛ me AWURADE? Onyame biara nni hɔ gye me; Monhwɛ me, asase ano nyina ara, na mobɛgye mo nkwa; Yesaia 45:21-22

3. Nokware Nyankopɔn koro no wɔ nnipa baasa

(1)Agya, Ɔba, Honhom Kronkron

Yesu baa wɔn nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, "Wɔde tumi nyinaa ama me ɔsoro ne asase so. Enti monkɔ nkɔyɛ amanaman nyinaa asuafo, na mommɔ wɔn asu Agya ne Ɔba ne Honhom Kronkron din mu." " mommɔ wɔn asu Agya ne Ɔba ne Honhom Kronkron din mu) na monkyerɛkyerɛ wɔn sɛ wonni biribiara a mahyɛ mo so, na me ne mo wɔ hɔ daa, kosi mfe no awiei.” -20

(2)Agya, Ɔba, ne Honhom Kronkron din

Asemmisa: Agya, Ɔba, ne Honhom Kronkron din mu! So ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn din? Anaasɛ asɛmti bi?

Mmuae: "Agya, Ɔba" yɛ abodin, ɛnyɛ din! Sɛ nhwɛso no, wo papa ne nea wofrɛ no "Agya" nyɛ edin a wɔde ama wo. Enti, so wote ase?

Asemmisa: Agya, Ɔba, ne Honhom Kronkron din ne dɛn?

Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

1 Agya no din: Agya Yehowa--Exodus 3:15
2 Ɔba no din: Ɔba Yehowa! Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ honam na wɔfrɛɛ no Yesu! Hwɛ Mateo 12:21, Luka 1:30-31

3 Honhom Kronkron din: wɔsan frɛ no Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ anaa Ɔsrafoɔ--Yohane 14:16, 1 Yohane 2:27

(3) Nokware Nyankopɔn koro no wɔ nnipa baasa

Asemmisa: Agya, Ɔba, Honhom Kronkron! Anyame baahe na wɔwɔ hɔ a wɔte sɛ eyi?

Mmuae: Onyankopɔn biako pɛ na ɔwɔ hɔ, nokware Nyankopɔn koro!

Na yɛwɔ Nyankopɔn baako, Agya a ɔfiri ne nkyɛn na yɛfiri ne nkyɛn, ne Awurade baako, Yesu Kristo a ɔnam ne so na nneɛma nyinaa ba na yɛnam ne so. 1 Korintofoɔ 8:6

Asɛmmisa: Nnipa baasa no ne dɛn?

Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

1 Honhom Kronkron yɛ baako
Akyɛdeɛ ahodoɔ wɔ hɔ, nanso Honhom korɔ no ara. 1 Korintofo 12:4
2 Nanso Awurade baako na ɔwɔ hɔ, Awurade Yesu Kristo!
Ɔsom ahorow ahorow wɔ hɔ, nanso Awurade yɛ ade koro. 1 Korintofo 12:5
3 Onyankopɔn yɛ biako

Dwumadi ahorow gu ahorow, nanso ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn koro no ara na ɔyɛ nneɛma nyinaa adwuma wɔ ne nyinaa mu. 1 Korintofo 12:6

Asemmisa: Honhom Kronkron yɛ baako, Awurade yɛ baako, na Onyankopɔn yɛ baako! So eyi nyɛ anyame baasa? Anaasɛ onyame bi?

Mmuae: "Onyankopɔn" yɛ Onyankopɔn, nokware Nyankopɔn koro pɛ!

Nokware Nyankopɔn biako no wɔ nnipa baasa: Honhom Kronkron biako, Awurade biako, ne Onyankopɔn biako! Amen.

(Sɛnea) nipadua biako ne Honhom biako wɔ hɔ, sɛnea wɔfrɛɛ mo kɔɔ anidaso biako mu no. Awurade baako, gyidie baako, asubɔ baako, Onyankopɔn ne Agya baako a ɔhwɛ ne nyinaa so, wɔ ne nyinaa so, ɛnam ne nyinaa so, ne ne nyinaa mu. Efesofo 4:4-6

Enti, so wote ase?

Okay, momma yɛnkyɛ fekubɔ no wɔ ha nnɛ!

Momma yɛnbom mmɔ Onyankopɔn mpae sɛ: Yɛda wo ase Abba Ɔsoro Agya, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, na yɛda Honhom Kronkron ase sɛ wabue yɛn honhom mu aniwa ama yɛahu na yɛate honhom mu nokware! Yei ne daa nkwa, sɛ mɛhunu wo, nokware Nyankopɔn koro no, ne Yesu Kristo a wosomaa no no! Amen

Awurade Yesu din mu! Amen

Asɛmpa a wɔahyira so ama me maame dɔfo.

Anuanom mmarima ne mmea! Kae sɛ wobɛboaboa ano.

Asɛmpa no nkyerɛwee a efi:

asafo a ɛwɔ owura yesu kristo mu

articles.title: Nantew Honhom mu 2
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa!

Ɛnnɛ yɛkɔ so hwehwɛ, kar akwan, na yɛkyɛ!

Ɔkasa 2: Sɛnea Kristofo Di Bɔne Ho Dwuma

Momma yemmue Bible no nkyerɛ Galatifo 5:25 na yɛne yɛn bom nkenkan: Sɛ yɛde Honhom no bɔ yɛn bra a, ɛsɛ sɛ yɛnam Honhom so nso nantew.

Dan kɔ Romafoɔ 8:13 bio sɛ mobɔ bra sɛdeɛ honam teɛ a, mobɛwuo na sɛ mode Honhom no kum nipadua no nneyɛeɛ a, mobɛtena ase.

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn na yɛbɛyɛ wɔ honam mmarato ho?

Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

1 Ɛnyɛ sɛ yɛmfa wɔn (nipa dedaw) mfomso nto wɔn (onipa foforo no so), na mmom wɔde mpata nkrasɛm ahyɛ yɛn nsa--Hwɛ 2 Korintofo 5:19
2 Sɛ yɛde Honhom no bɔ yɛn bra a, ɛsɛ sɛ yɛde Honhom no nso nantew - Reference Gal 5:25
3 Fa Honhom Kronkron kunkum nipadua no nnwuma--Hwɛ Romafoɔ 8:13
4 Mortify wo asɔremma a wɔwɔ asase so - hwɛ Kolosefoɔ 3:5
5 Wɔbɔɔ yɛn (ɔbarima dedaw no) ne Kristo asɛnnua mu, na ɛnyɛ me na mete ase bio--Hwɛ Gal 2:20
6 Bu mo ho sɛ (ɔpanyin) awu ama bɔne - Hwɛ Romafo 6:11
7 Obiara a ɔtan ne (nipa dedaw bɔne) nkwa wɔ wiase yi mu no, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔkora ne (onipa foforo) nkwa so ma daa nkwa. Twe adwene si bɛyɛ 12:25 so

8 Abrabɔ Mmara ma Agyidifoɔ Foforo--Hwɛ Efesofoɔ 4:25-32

[Apam Dedaw] Enti, wɔ Apam Dedaw no mu no, na mmara ne nhyehyɛe ahorow wɔ hɔ, nanso na obiara mfa mmara no mmu no bem wɔ Onyankopɔn anim Enti, Paulo kae sɛ, sɛ wode wo ho to saa mmara yi so de di ɔhonam so a, akɔnnɔ wɔ hɔ nkɛntɛnso biara nni mu--Hwɛ Kolosefo 2:20-23

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn nti na entu mpɔn?

Mmuae: Efisɛ obiara a ɔnam mmara so yɛ adwuma no wɔ nnome ase... Wɔnam mmara so mmu obiara bem wɔ Onyankopɔn anim.

[Apam Foforo] Apam Foforo mu no, mo nso moam Kristo nipadua so awu ama mmara no...na seesei woade wo ho afiri mmara no ho - hwɛ Romafoɔ 7:4,6 ɛfiri sɛ woade wo ho afiri mmara no mu,! afei woawo wo foforɔ Kristofoɔ wɔ Honhom Kronkron no anim Sɛ yɛtena ase wɔ Honhom Kronkron mu a, ɛsɛ sɛ yɛfa Honhom Kronkron nso so nantew - hwɛ Galatifoɔ 5:25. Ɛne sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ yɛde yɛn ho to Honhom Kronkron no so sɛ obekum ɔhonam akɔnnɔ bɔne nyinaa, atan (onipa dedaw no) bɔne asetra, na yɛakora (onipa foforo) no so akɔ daa nkwa mu! (Onipa foforo) Ɛnam Honhom Kronkron so sow: ɔdɔ, anigye, asomdwoe, boasetɔ, ayamye, papayɛ, nokwaredi, odwo, ahosodi Honhom Kronkron aba! Galatifo 5:22-23. Enti, so wote ase?

9. Fa ademude no to dɔte ahina no mu

Yɛwɔ saa ademude yi wɔ dɔte nkuku mu de kyerɛ sɛ tumi kɛse yi fi Onyankopɔn na ɛnyɛ yɛn hɔ. 2 Korintofoɔ 4:7

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn ne akokoaa?

Mmuae: "Akorade" no ne nokore Honhom Kronkron - twe adwene si Yohane 15:26-27

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn ne dɔte anwenne?

Mmuae: "Dase anwenne" kyer3 s3 Onyankop)p3 s3 3de wo di dwuma s3 anwenne a 3som bo - twe adwene si 2 Timoteo 2:20-21 Akorade a wode ato dwea anwenne no mu ne Honhom Kronkron a wode ato y3n nipa fofor a wasan awo no so.

Asɛmmisa: Adɛn ntia?Ɛtɔ da bi a yɛantumi ankyerɛ tumi a Honhom Kronkron wɔ?

Te sɛ: nyarewa a wɔsa, adaemone a wɔpam, anwonwade a wɔyɛ, kasa foforo a wɔka...ne nea ɛkeka ho!

Mmuae: Tumi kɛse yi fi Onyankopɔn hɔ, ɛnyɛ yɛn hɔ.

Sɛ nhwɛso no: Bere a Kristofo dii kan gyee Yesu dii no, na wɔn ankasa behu anisoadehu ne adaeso pii, na na nneɛma a ɛyɛ nwonwa pii atwa wɔn ho ahyia. Nanso afei nkakrankakra ɛntaa mma anaa mpo ɛyera? de akyerɛ Honhom Kronkron no tumi.

10. Owu yɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn mu ma ɛda Yesu asetra adi

Yɛde Yesu wuo ka yɛn ho daa sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a Yesu nkwa nso bɛda adi wɔ yɛn mu. ...Saa kwan yi so no, owuo reyɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn mu, nanso nkwa reyɛ adwuma wɔ mo mu. 2 Korintofoɔ 4:10,12

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn ne owu a wofi ase?

Mmuaeɛ: Yesu wuo no yɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn mu sɛn na Yesu wuiɛ? Sɛ yɛne no ayɛ biako wɔ ne wuo sɛso mu a, yɛne no nso bɛyɛ biako wɔ ne wusɔreɛ nsɛsoɔ mu - Hwɛ Romafoɔ 6:5 Sɛ yɛka ne ho bom wɔ owuo nsɛsoɔ mu a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ owuo yɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn mu na yɛsoa Yesu honhom ka yɛn ho daa.Fa w’asɛnnua na yɛ Awurade kwan a, wobɛnya Yesu nkwa. 35. Sɛ wowɔ Yesu nkwa a, wobɛtumi ada Yesu asetena adi Honhom Kronkron no asetena Tumi yɛ Yesu abrabɔ ho adanseɛ!

"Ansa na saa da no", ɛsɛ sɛ obiara wu pɛnkoro, na obiara a ɔwɔ wiase no benya honam fam "awo, onyin, yare ne owu" na mpo wawu esiane nneɛma afoforo nti nanso ɛsɛ sɛ Kristofo bɔ Awurade Yesu mpae pii na wɔmma wɔn honam fam nipadua "awo, onyin". Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛbɔ Awurade Yesu mpae sɛ ɔmma Ne wu no nyɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn nipa dedaw no mu Ɛsɛ sɛ yenya ɔpɛ sɛ yɛbɛfa yɛn asɛnnua, adi Yesu akyi, yɛahwere yɛn nkwa dedaw no ama nokware ne asɛmpa no, na yɛne Kristo anya owu mu osuahu! Ebia sɛ woabɔ akwakoraa a, nea eye sen biara ne sɛ wubewu honam fam wɔ wo nna mu anaasɛ wubewu wɔ awosu mu na asomdwoe mu wɔ wo nna mu.

11. Akwakoraa no de nkakrankakra dan bɔne, na onipa foforo no nso nyin nkakrankakra

Enti, yɛn koma nnyae. Ɛwom sɛ wɔresɛe akyi nipadua no de, nanso emu nipadua no reyɛ foforo da biara da. 2 Korintofoɔ 4:16

Hyɛ nso:

(Akwakoraa) "Akyi nipadua"ne nipadua a wotumi hu firi abɔnten Ɛwom sɛ wɔsɛe no de, nanso saa akwakoraa yi honam de nkakrankakra yɛ bɔne ɛnam akɔnnɔdeɛ nnaadaa nti - hwɛ Efesofoɔ 4:22

(Onipa Foforo) Nea wɔsɔre ne Kristo ne honhom nipadua - twe adwene si 1 Korintofo 15:44;" ") - Twe adwene si Romafo 7:22 so.

→→Onipa a aniwa nhu (onipa foforo) a Onyankopɔn awo no, a ɔde ne ho abɔ Kristo ho no, nyin nkakrankakra bɛyɛ onipa, na ɔma Kristo kɛseyɛ a edi mũ no kɛse yɛ mmamu - hwɛ Efesofo 4:12-13

Enti, yɛn koma nnyae. Ɛwom sɛ wɔsɛe akyi nipadua (onipa dedaw no honam) de, nanso wɔreyɛ emu nipadua (onipa foforo a wɔsan wo no) no foforo da biara da na "enyin abɛyɛ onipa." Yɛn bere tiaa mu amanehunu ne nea emu yɛ hare (a yɛde onipa dedaw no amanehunu to nkyɛn) bɛma yɛn (onipa foforo no) ayɛ anuonyam mu duru a ɛso bi nni na ɛtra hɔ daa. Ɛbɛda adi sɛ nea yehu (onipa dedaw no) mfa yɛn ho, na mmom nea yenhu (onipa foforo no) ho hia yɛn efisɛ nea yehu (onipa dedaw no) yɛ bere tiaa mu de, na mmom nea yenhu hwɛ (onipa foforo no) yɛ daa. Hwɛ 2 Korintofo 4:16-18 So wote eyi ase?

12. Kristo yi ne ho adi, na onipa foforo no pue na ɔhyɛn daa nkwa mu

Sɛ Kristo a ɔyɛ yɛn nkwa no yi ne ho adi a, mo nso mo ne no bɛda adi anuonyam mu. Kolosefo 3:4

1 Anuanom adɔfo, yɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma seesei, na wɔnnya nkyerɛɛ nea yɛbɛyɛ daakye, nanso yɛnim sɛ sɛ Awurade yi ne ho adi a, yɛbɛyɛ sɛ ɔno, ɛfiri sɛ yɛbɛhunu no sɛdeɛ ɔteɛ. 1 Yohane 3:2
2 Nanso wɔn a wɔada wɔ Kristo mu no, Onyankopɔn nso de wɔn bɛka Yesu ho - ɛfiri sɛ - hwɛ 1 Tesalonikafoɔ 4:13-14
3 Wɔn a wɔte ase na wɔtena hɔ, wɔ bere tiaa bi mu, wɔ aniwa mu no, wɔdan honam a ɛporɔw no ma ɛbɛyɛ honhom nipadua a ɛnporɔw no - hwɛ 1 Korintofo 15:52
4 Wɔsakraa ne nipadua a ɛba fam no ma ɛbɛyɛɛ sɛ n’ankasa anuonyam nipadua--Hwɛ Filipifo 3:21
5 Wɔbɛfa no ne wɔn akɔ mununkum mu akɔhyia Awurade wɔ wim - hwɛ 1 Tesalonikafoɔ 4:17
6 Sɛ Kristo yi ne ho adi a, yɛn nso yɛne no bɛda yɛn ho adi wɔ anuonyam mu--Hwɛ Kolosefo 3:4
7 Asomdwoe Nyankopɔn no ntew wo ho koraa! Na wo honhom, wo kra, ne wo nipadua bɛkora so a asɛm biara nni ho wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo mmae mu! Nea ɔfrɛ mo no yɛ ɔnokwafo na ɔbɛyɛ. Nhwehwɛmu 1 Tesalonikafo 5:23-24

Asɛmpa a wɔahyira so ama me maame dɔfo

Asɛmpa no nkyerɛwee a efi:
asafo a ɛwɔ owura yesu kristo mu
Eyinom ne nnipa kronkron a wɔn nko ara na wɔte hɔ na wɔnkan wɔn wɔ aman no mu.
Te sɛ mmaabun a wɔn ho tew 144,000 a wodi Awurade Oguammaa no akyi.
Amen!
→→Mehu no fi bepɔw no atifi ne koko so;
Eyi yɛ nkurɔfo a wɔn nkutoo na wɔte hɔ na wɔnkan wɔn wɔ aman nyinaa mu.
Numeri 23:9
Awurade Yesu Kristo adwumayɛfoɔ na ɛnam: Onua Wang*Yun, Onuabaa Liu, Onuabaa Zheng, Onua Cen... ne adwumayɛfoɔ foforɔ a wɔde anigyeɛ boa asɛmpa no adwuma denam sika ne adwumaden a wɔde ma so, ne ahotefoɔ foforɔ a wɔne yɛn yɛ adwuma wɔn a wɔgye asɛmpa yi di no, Wɔatwerɛ wɔn din wɔ nkwa nwoma no mu. Amen!
Hwɛ Filipifo 4:3
Anuanom mmarima ne mmaa pii wɔ akwaaba sɛ wɔmfa wɔn browsers hwehwɛ - . asafo a ɛwɔ owura yesu kristo mu - Klik so Twe.Boaboa ano Kɔka yɛn ho na yɛbom nyɛ adwuma mfa nka Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no.
