articles.title: Ɔkra Nkwagye (Ɔkasa 6)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea adɔfo a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no mu nkɔ 1 Korintofo 15 ne nkyekyem 44 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Nea wodua no yɛ honam nipadua, nea wɔsɔre no yɛ honhom nipadua. Sɛ honam nipadua wɔ hɔ a, ɛsɛ sɛ honhom nipadua nso wɔ hɔ.

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "Akra Nkwagye". Daabi. 6. 6. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbaa pa [asɔre no] soma adwumayɛfoɔ: ɛnam nokorɛ asɛm a wɔatwerɛ na wɔkyɛ wɔ wɔn nsam, a ɛyɛ yɛn nkwagyeɛ, yɛn anuonyam, ne yɛn nipadua agyedeɛ ho asɛmpa no so. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn kra ani na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware: Momma yennye asɛmpa no nni na yennya Yesu kra ne ne nipadua! Amen .

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Mmabarima ne mmabea a Onyankopɔn awo wɔn

---Nya Kristo Nipadua---

1. Gye di na wo ne Kristo tena

bisa: sɛn( lɛtɛ ) ne Kristo nyanee no?
anoyie: Sɛ yɛne no ayɛ biako wɔ ne wuo sɛso mu a, yɛne no nso bɛka abom wɔ ne wusɔreɛ nsɛsoɔ mu (Romafoɔ 6:5)

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na yɛne no bɛyɛ biako wɔ honam fam?
anoyie: Kristo nipadua sɛn dua no so, .

( lɛtɛ ) Me nipadua sɛn dua no so, .
( lɛtɛ )Kristo nipadua yɛ me nipadua, .
( lɛtɛ ) Bere a Kristo wui no, me bɔne nipadua wui, .
→→eyi Kɔka ne ho wɔ owu kwan so ! Amen
( lɛtɛ ) Kristo nipadua mu asie no yɛ me nipadua mu asie.
( lɛtɛ ) Kristo nipadua wusɔre no yɛ me nipadua wusɔre.
→→eyi sɛ wɔne no bɛyɛ biako wɔ owusɔre kwan so ! Amen
Enti, so wote ase?
Sɛ yɛne Kristo wuwu a, yɛgye di sɛ yɛne no bɛtena. Nkyekyɛm (Romafo 6:8) .

2. Kristo nyanee yɛn fii awufo mu na ɔsan woo yɛn

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na wɔwo yɛn foforo?
anoyie: Gye asɛmpa no di →Te nokware no ase!

1 Nsu ne Honhom na wɔwoo wɔn --Hwɛ Yohane 3:5
2 Wɔwoo wɔn firii asɛmpa no mu nokware no mu --Hwɛ 1 Korintofoɔ 4:15
3 Onyankopɔn na ɔwoo no --Hwɛ Yohane 1:12-13
Nhyira nka yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo Nyankopɔn ne n’Agya! Sɛnea ne mmɔborohunu kɛse kyerɛ no, ɔnam Yesu Kristo wusɔreɛ so asan awo yɛn bio ama yɛayɛ anidasoɔ a ɛte aseɛ.

3. Owusɔreɛ yɛ honhom nipadua

bisa: Wɔne Kristo nyanee yɛn, yɛyɛ honam fam nipadua Owusɔre?
anoyie: Owusɔre no yɛ honhom nipadua ; Daabi honam fam wusɔre .

Nea wodua no yɛ honam nipadua, nea wɔsɔre no yɛ honhom nipadua. Sɛ honam nipadua wɔ hɔ a, ɛsɛ sɛ honhom nipadua nso wɔ hɔ. Nkyekyɛm (1 Korintofo 15:44) .

bisa: Dɛn ne honhom fam nipadua?
Mmuae: Kristo nipadua → ne honhom nipadua!

bisa: So Kristo nipadua no yɛ soronko wɔ yɛn ho?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Kristo yɛ ( kwan ) bɛyɛɛ honam;
2. 2. Kristo yɛ ( nyame ) bɛyɛɛ honam;
3. 3. Kristo yɛ ( honhom ) bɛyɛɛ honam;
4. 4. kristo nipadua Nea enwu da Yɛn nipadua hu sɛ ɛreporɔw
5. 5. kristo nipadua Owu a wonhu ;Yɛn nipadua hu owu.

bisa: Ɛhe na yɛwɔ mprempren a yɛn nipadua a wɔanyan no wɔ Kristo nsusuwii mu no wɔ?
Mmuae: Wɔ yɛn koma mu! Yɛn akra ne yɛn nipadua ahintaw ne Kristo wɔ Onyankopɔn mu →Honhom Kronkron de yɛn akoma di adanseɛ sɛ yɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma. Amen! Hwɛ Romafo 8:16 ne Kolosefo 3:3

bisa: Adɛn nti na yentumi nhu nipadua a Onyankopɔn awo no?
anoyie: Yɛn nipadua a wɔanyan no ne Kristo → Yiw honhom nipadua ,yɛn( akwakoraa ) . aniwa a ɛda hɔ kwa Wontumi nhu ( Ɔba foforo ) ankasa honhom nipadua.

Sɛnea Ɔsomafo Paulo kae no → Enti, yɛn koma nnyae. ( a wotumi hu ) Ɛwom sɛ akyi nipadua no sɛe de, nanso emu nipadua ( obi a ɔyɛ foforo a aniwa nhu ) no reyɛ foforo da biara da. Yɛn bere tiaa mu amanehunu ne hare mu amanehunu bɛyɛ adwuma ama yɛn anuonyam mu duru a enni awiei a ɛboro ntotoho biara so. Ɛbɛdaa adi sɛ yɛnyɛ nea Gu Nian hui ( Nipadua ), nanso nea wonhu ho a wodwen ( honhom nipadua ) efisɛ nea wohu no yɛ bere tiaa mu de (); Awiei koraa no, nipadua no bɛsan ayɛ mfutuma ), nea wontumi nhu ( . honhom nipadua ) yɛ daa. Enti, so wote ase? Nkyekyɛm (2 Korintofo 4:16-18) .

bisa: nea enti a asomafo no aniwa a ɛda hɔ kwa Yesu nipadua a wɔanyan no a wotumi hu no?
anoyie: Yesu nipadua a wɔanyan no no yɛ honhom nipadua →Yesu honhom mu nipadua no ntumi nhyɛ ahunmu, bere, anaa nneɛma ano hye Ebetumi ada adi ama anuanom bɛboro 500 wɔ bere koro mu, anaasɛ wobetumi de asie wɔn ani so →Wɔbuee wɔn ani, na wohuu No. Mpofirim ara Yesu yerae. Nhwehwɛmu (Luka 24:3) ne 1 Korintofo 15:5-6

bisa: Bere bɛn na yɛn honhom nipadua no da adi?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

1 Da a Kristo bɛsan aba!

Efisɛ moawu na mo nkwa ahintaw Kristo nkyɛn wɔ Onyankopɔn mu. Sɛ Kristo a ɔyɛ yɛn nkwa no yi ne ho adi a, mo nso mo ne no bɛda adi anuonyam mu. Nhwehwɛmu ( Kolosefo 3:3-4 ) .

2 Ɛsɛ sɛ wuhu ne su ankasa

Mohu ɔdɔ a Agya no de ato yɛn so, sɛ wɔbɛfrɛ yɛn Onyankopɔn mma na yɛyɛ ne mma ampa. Ɛno nti na wiase nnim yɛn ( wɔsan wo onipa foforo ), efisɛ minnim no da ( Yesu ). Anuanom adɔfo, yɛyɛ Nyankopɔn mma seesei, na deɛ yɛbɛyɛ daakye no, wɔnnya nyii no adi, nanso yɛnim sɛ sɛ Awurade yi ne ho adi a, yɛbɛyɛ sɛ Ɔno, ɛfiri sɛ yɛbɛhunu no sɛdeɛ Ɔte;

→→ Hyɛ nso: “Sɛ Awurade yii ne ho adi a, yebehu ne suban ankasa, na sɛ yɛne no yi yɛn ho adi a, yebehu yɛn ankasa honhom nipadua nso”! Amen. Enti, so wote ase? Nkyekyɛm (1 Yohane 3:1-2) .

Anan: Yɛyɛ ne nipadua no akwaa

Munnim sɛ wo nipadua yɛ Honhom Kronkron asɔredan? Honhom Kronkron yi a ofi Nyankopon mu no te mo mu;

bisa: So yɛn nipadua yɛ Honhom Kronkron asɔredan?
anoyie: Wɔwoo no fii Onyankopɔn hɔ ( a wontumi nhu ) → " honhom nipadua "Ɛyɛ Honhom Kronkron asɔredan."

bisa: Adɛn?
anoyie: Esiane sɛ nipadua a wotumi hu →fi Adam hɔ nti, akyi nipadua no bɛsɛe nkakrankakra, ayare na awu →nsã nhoma dedaw yi ntumi nkura bobesa foforo ( Honhom Kronkron ), tumi tu, enti yɛn honam nyɛ Honhom Kronkron asɔredan;

【 . honhom kronkron asɔrefie 】Aane Ɛkyerɛ nea aniwa nhu → honhom nipadua , yɛ Kristo nipadua, yɛyɛ ne nipadua akwaa, eyi ne Honhom Kronkron asɔredan! Amen. Enti, so wote ase?

→Efisɛ yɛyɛ ne nipadua akwaa (tete nhoma mmobɔwee bi de ka ho sɛ: Ne nnompe ne ne honam). Nkyekyɛm (Efesofo 5:30) .

【 . afɔrebɔ a ɛte ase 】Romafo 12:1 Enti, me nuanom, mesrɛ mo, Onyankopɔn mmɔborohunu nti, momfa mo nipadua mmra sɛ afɔrebɔ a ɛte ase...

bisa: So afɔrebɔ a ɛte ase no kyerɛ me honam nipadua?
anoyie : 1 . Afɔrebɔ a ɛte ase kyerɛ awo foforo " honhom nipadua ” → Kristo nipadua yɛ afɔrebɔ a ɛte ase, na yɛyɛ ne nipadua no akwaa a yɛyɛ afɔrebɔ a ɛte ase → Kronkron na ɛsɔ Onyankopɔn ani, eyi ne wo honhom mu som

Hyɛ nso: Sɛ woante awo foforo ne nhumu ase a, wode wo nipadua bɛbɔ afɔre → Nipadua yi fi Adam hɔ, ɛyɛ fĩ na ɛho ntew, ɛhyɛ porɔwee ne owu ase, na ɛyɛ owu afɔre.
Sɛ wobɔ afɔre a ɛte ase a Onyankopɔn pɛ a, na worebɔ afɔre a awu a, Susuw sɛnea ebefi mu aba no ho. Nifa! Enti, ɛsɛ sɛ wuhu sɛnea wobɛyɛ kronkron.

5. Di Awurade Anwummeduan no na di adanse sɛ wubegye Awurade nipadua

Kuruwa a yehyira no nyɛ Kristo mogya no bi? Abodoo a yɛbubu no nni Kristo nipadua no bi anaa? ( 1 Korintofo 10:16 ) .

bisa: ( lɛtɛ ) ne Kristo nyanee no, so na onni Kristo nipadua dedaw? Dɛn nti na woda so ara pɛ sɛ wugye ne nipadua no?
anoyie: ME( lɛtɛ ) sɛ yebenya Kristo honhom nipadua no a, ɛsɛ sɛ yɛsan nso ɔdanseni Nya Kristo nipadua na wobɛnya pii daakye suahunu Honhom mu honam fam adiyi →Yesu a aniwa hu” keeki "Sɛ anka ne nipadua (nkwa paanoo), wɔ kuruwa mu". bobe nsuo a wɔde yɛ nsuo "Sɛ́ anka ɛbɛyɛ ne de no." Mogya , . nkwa , . ɔkra →Di Awurade Anwummeduan Botaeɛ refrɛ yɛn di bɔhyɛ so , de sie ma nneɛma afoforo Mogya wɔde sii hɔ ne yɛn Apam Foforo , kura kwan so, fa ( . gyidie ) de nea Onyankopɔn awo no sie ( ɔkra nipadua )! Kosi sɛ Kristo bɛsan aba na nipadua ankasa no apue → Ɛsɛ sɛ mohwehwɛ mo ho mu hwɛ sɛ mowɔ gyidi anaa, na mosɔ mo ho hwɛ. Wunnim sɛ, sɛ woanpo wo a, wowɔ Yesu Kristo wɔ wo mu? Enti, so wote ase? Nkyekyɛm (2 Korintofo 13:5) .

6. Sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom te mo akoma mu a, morennyɛ honam mu.

Sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom te mo mu a, monyɛ ɔhonam mufo bio na mmom Honhom no mufo. Sɛ obi nni Kristo Honhom a, ɔnyɛ Kristo dea. ( Romafo 8:9 ) .

bisa: Onyankopɔn Honhom te akoma mu, enti adɛn nti na yɛnyɛ honam mufoɔ?
anoyie: Sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom tena mo koma mu a, mobɛyɛ onipa foforo a wɔasan awo Mo (. Ɔba foforo )Aane a wontumi nhu → ne "." honhom nipadua "Onyankopɔn na ɔwoo wo". Ɔba foforo "Honhom nipadua no nyɛ ( akwakoraa )nam. Akwakoraa no nipadua wui esiane bɔne nti, ne ne kra ( honhom nipadua ) asetra a wɔde gyidi bu no bem. Enti, so wote ase?
Sɛ Kristo wɔ mo mu a, bɔne nti nipadua no awu, na trenee nti ɔkra no te ase. Nkyekyɛm (Romafo 8:10) .

7. Obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no renyɛ bɔne da

1 Yohane 3:9 Obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no nyɛ bɔne, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn asɛm te ne mu na ɔrentumi nyɛ bɔne, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔwoo no.

bisa: Adɛn nti na wɔn a Onyankopɔn awo wɔn no nyɛ bɔne?
anoyie: Esiane sɛ Onyankopɔn asɛm (mfitiase nkyerɛwee kyerɛ "aba") wɔ ne koma mu nti, ontumi nyɛ bɔne →
1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Sɛ Onyankopɔn Asɛm, Onyankopɔn Honhom, ne Onyankopɔn Honhom Kronkron wɔ wo koma mu a, wɔwo wo foforo ( Ɔba foforo ), .
2. 2. Onipa foforo no ne honhom nipadua ( ɛnyɛ ne dea ) akwakoraa a ɔyɛɛ bɔne wɔ honam mu, .
3. 3. Onipa foforo no kra ne ne nipadua ahintaw ne Kristo wɔ Onyankopɔn mu. Ɔsoro! Wɔasan awo mo sɛ abɔdeɛ foforɔ wɔ soro. Amen – hwɛ Efesofoɔ 2:6
4. 4. Akwakoraa nipadua no wu a ɛnam bɔne so, kɔ Kristo wu mu no, wɔadum na wɔasie wɔ ɔdamoa mu. Ɛnyɛ me na mete ase bio, ɛyɛ Kristo na ɔte ase ma me Afei ". Ɔba foforo". Bɔne bɛn na wobetumi ayɛ wɔ Kristo mu? So woteɛ? Enti Paulo kaa sɛ → Ɛsɛ sɛ wo nso wode obuo ma bɔne ( hwɛ ) n’ankasa awu, daa ( hwɛ ) kosi sɛ ne nipadua a ɛyɛ bɔne no bɛsan akɔ dɔte mu no, obewu na wahu Yesu wu. Enti, so wote ase? Hwɛ Romafo 6:11

8. Obiara a ɔyɛ bɔne no, onnim Yesu

1 Yohane 3:6 Obiara a ɔtena ne mu no nyɛ bɔne;

bisa: Adɛn nti na nnipa a wɔyɛ bɔne nnim Yesu da?
anoyie: ɔdebɔneyɛfoɔ, ɔdebɔneyɛfoɔ →

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Manhu no da, na onnim Yesu da , .
2. 2. Wɔnte akra nkwagye a ɛwɔ Kristo mu no ase, .
3. 3. Wonnyaa Onyankopɔn bayɛ , .
4. 4. Nnipa a wɔyɛ bɔne → wɔnsan nwo wɔn bio .
5. 5. Nnipa a wɔyɛ nsɛmmɔnedi no yɛ ɔwɔ mfe → wɔyɛ ɔwɔ ne ɔbonsam mma .

Yenim sɛ obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no renyɛ bɔne da; Nkyekyɛm (1 Yohane 5:18) .

Hyɛ nso: Wɔwoo no fii Onyankopɔn hɔ →" honhom nipadua "Wɔde ne ho ahintaw Onyankopɔn mu ne Kristo. Kristo wɔ Agya Nyankopɔn nsa nifa so mprempren wɔ soro. W'asetra a wɔasan awo no nso wɔ hɔ. Ɔbɔnefo no wɔ asase so na gyata a ɔbobom no kyinkyin. Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na apira wo? Ɛte saa! Enti Paulo Ka → Ma asomdwoe Nyankopɔn ntew mo ho koraa, na mo honhom ne mo kra ne nipadua no nkora so a asɛm biara nni ho wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo mmae mu no, nea ɔfrɛ mo no yɛ ɔnokwafo no, Ɔbɛyɛ! Nkyekyɛm (1 Tesalonikafo 5:23-24) .

Asɛmpa nkyerɛwee a wɔkyɛ, a Onyankopɔn Honhom na ɛkanyan no Yesu Kristo Adwumayɛfoɔ, Onua Wang*Yun, Onuabaa Liu, Onuabaa Zheng, Onua Cen, ne mfɛfoɔ adwumayɛfoɔ foforɔ boa na wɔbom yɛ adwuma wɔ Yesu Kristo Asɔre no asɛmpa adwuma no mu. Wɔka Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no, asɛmpa a ɛma kwan ma wɔgye nnipa nkwa, hyɛ wɔn anuonyam, na wɔgye wɔn nipadua! Amen

Hymn: Adom a Ɛyɛ Nwonwa

articles.title: Ɔkra Nkwagye (Ɔkasa 5)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea adɔfo a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nkɔ Yohane ti 6 nkyekyem 53 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Yesu kaa sɛ, "Nokware, nokware, mise mo sɛ, sɛ monni Onipa Ba no nam na monom ne mogya a, monni nkwa wɔ mo mu. Obiara a odi me honam na ɔnom me mogya no wɔ daa nkwa, awiei koraa no." da a mɛnyan no

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "Akra Nkwagye". Daabi. 5. 5. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea pa [asɔre no] soma adwumayɛfo: wɔnam wɔn nsa so kyerɛw na wɔka nokware asɛm, yɛn nkwagye, yɛn anuonyam, ne yɛn nipadua agyede ho asɛmpa. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn kra ani na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware: Momma yennye asempa no nni - nya Yesu Mogya. Nkwa.Ɔkra! Amen .

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

---Abofra a wɔwoo no kra nipadua---

1: Wɔawie adebɔ adwuma no

bisa: Bere bɛn na wobewie adebɔ adwuma no?
anoyie: Onyankopɔn bɔɔ ɔsoro ne asase wɔ nnansia mu na ɔhome da a ɛtɔ so nson!
→→Biribiara ayɛ krado. Eduu da a ɛto so ason no, na Onyankopɔn adwuma a ɔde bɔɔ abɔde no wiei, enti ogyee n’ahome fii n’adwuma nyinaa mu da a ɛto so ason no. Nkyekyɛm (Genesis 2:1-2) .

2: Wɔawie ogye adwuma no

Hebrifo Ti 4:3 Nanso yɛn a yɛagye adi no betumi akɔ saa ahomegye no mu, sɛnea Onyankopɔn kae sɛ: "Maka ntam wɔ m'abufuw mu sɛ, wɔrenkɔ m'ahomegye mu!'" Nokwarem no, adebɔ adwuma no fi ase wɔ adebɔ mu no awie fi wiase yi mu.

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na yɛbɛhyɛn Kristo home mu?
anoyie: ( lɛtɛ ) . Kristo agyede adwuma no awie

Bere a Yesu kaa vinegar no hwɛe no, ɔkae sɛ, “ . Mawie ! "Ɔde ne ti too fam, ." Fa wo kra ma Onyankopɔn . Nkyekyɛm (Yohane 19:30) .

Hyɛ nso: Yesu kae sɛ: “ Mawie "! Afei ɔbrɛɛ ne ti ase, . Fa wo kra ma Onyankopɔn . Amen! Onyankopɔn somaa ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro Yesu sɛ ɔmmɛyɛ eyi mma yɛn →→【 akra nkwagye 】Wɔawie na wɔahyɛne ahomegye mu! →→Sɛnea Onyankopɔn wiee n’adebɔ adwuma wɔ nnansia mu no, saa ara na Onyankopɔn gyee n’ahome fii n’adwuma nyinaa mu na ɔhome da a ɛto so ason no. Enti, so wote ase?

bisa: sɛn( lɛtɛ ) akɔ Kristo nkaeɛ no mu?
anoyie: ( lɛtɛ ) wui, wosiee no, na ɔne Kristo nyanee no → awo foforo, Onyankopɔn awo no, . nya Ne kra nipadua! wo nya Kristo kra nipadua ne abofra a Onyankopɔn awo no →Seesei wowɔ ( Kristo ), ɛnyɛ ( ) mu. Adam )ri →→ Eyi ne Kristo nkae no mu a worehyɛn . Enti, so wote ase?

Mmiɛnsa: Nya Yesu mogya a ɛsom bo no

-------( nkwa, ɔkra )------- .

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na yebetumi anya Yesu mogya a ɛsom bo no?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

(1)AWURADE apopa nnipa nyinaa amumuyɛ ( san ) wɔ Yesu mu

Yɛn nyinaa te sɛ nguan ayera; Nkyekyɛm ( Yesaia 53:6 ) .

bisa: Bɔne bɛn na AWURADE de ba? san ) wɔ Yesu mu?
anoyie: (Ne nyinaa Bɔne) Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

1 Bɔne (de) Yesu so , .
2 Bɔne (de) Yesu so , .
3 Bɔne no (de) Yesu so . Amen

Hyɛ nso: Yehowa Nyankopɔn yɛ nnipa nyinaa “bɔne”, “bɔne” ne “bɔne” →→( san ) wɔ Yesu mu→→Ɛnam Yesu wu so, nnipa nyinaa bɔne→→

1 "gyae" bɔne, .

2 “Montew” bɔne, .
3 “Wɔpata” bɔne, . Bɔne ketewaa bi mpo nka obiara mu → frɛ sɛ wɔmfa ogye mma ;
4 Nnianim asɛm (Yongyi) . Wobebu wo bem daa na woanya daa nkwa! Amen.

Sɛ wogyae ebinom a " . Mpenaba "Wo mu, wobɛyɛ bɔne; afei." Onyankopɔn Asɛm a yɛde reba ( Ahotew aba ) wɔ wo koma mu, worentumi nyɛ bɔne da. Enti, so wote ase? Hwɛ 1 Yohane 3:9 .
“Wɔahyɛ adapɛn aduɔson ama wo man ne wo kuro kronkron, sɛ wɔmfa nwie mmarato, na wɔmfa bɔne ntwa, wɔmfa mpata mma amumuyɛ, na wɔde daa trenee bɛba, na wɔasɔ anisoadehunu ne nkɔmhyɛ nsɔano, na wɔasra Ɔkronkronni no ( anaa: Nkyerɛaseɛ) Nkyerɛkyerɛmu (Daniel 9:24).

(2)Wɔbɔɔ Kristo asɛnnua mu na owu maa yɛn bɔne

bisa: Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne →Atirim bɛn nti na?
anoyie: " Botaeɛ "ɔde asetɔre( Adam )’s bɔne nipadua no yɛ ( yɛn ) bɔne nipadua → gye yɛn fi bɔne mu, fi mmara ne mmara nnome mu, ne Adam dedaw no mu.
→→Ɛbɛdaa adi sɛ Yesu dɔ na ɛkanyan yɛn. Efisɛ yesusuw sɛ obi " . ma "Sɛ nnipa nyinaa wuwu a, wɔn nyinaa wuwu (hwɛ 2 Korintofo 5:14). Wɔn a wɔawuwu no de wɔn ho fi bɔne ho (hwɛ Romafo 6:7) → Efi ( lɛtɛ )Obiara awu, enti ɛsɛ sɛ ɛyɛ ( lɛtɛ ) na obiara de ne ho fii bɔne mu, firii mmara ne mmara no nnome mu, na wɔyii akwakoraa no too hɔ. Amen

(3)Kristo de ( Mogya ) nsuo a ɛfiri adi

Nanso bere a wɔbaa Yesu nkyɛn na wohuu no sɛ wawu no, wɔmmubu ne nan. Nanso asraafo no mu biako de peaw tow n’afã, na amonom hɔ ara obi Mogya na nsuo sen fi adi . Nkyekyɛm (Yohane 19:33-34) .

(4)Yɛ( Mogya ) ne Kristo de ( Mogya ) ɛsen bom fi adi

bisa: yɛn Mogya sɛnea ɛte wɔ ne ho Mogya Wobɛbom apue?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

1 AWURADE de ɔman no nyinaa bɔne baa ne so →Ɛyɛ obiara kra ne ne nipadua ( san ) wɔ Yesu Kristo mu, .
2 Wɔbɔɔ Yesu asɛnnua mu →Ɛyɛ yɛn na wɔbɔɔ yɛn asɛnnua mu, .
3 Yesu de( Mogya ) nsuo a ɛfiri adi →Ɛyɛ yɛn ( Mogya ) sen fi adi, .
4 ( Mogya )ɛyɛ nkwa, ɔkra ! Yesu gyaee ( nkwa ) . →Ɛyɛ yɛn Bu abam Nkwa a efi Adam hɔ →" hwere "nkwa, " hwere "Adam (ɔkra) a ne ho ntew na ne ho ntew, ."
5. Obi nkwa ne ne kra a “ɔhwere.” →" Fa hyɛ " Nya Yesu nkwa ne ne kra →→Ɛno ara ne no Gye me nkwa ne me kra ! Amen. Enti, so wote ase?

Sɛnea Awurade Yesu kae no: “Na obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ogye ne kra (anaa wɔkyerɛ ase sɛ: ɔkra; ɔno ara wɔ ase hɔ no) bɛhwere no; 35) .

(5)Na wɔasie no

Hyɛ no nsow: Yesu wui denam dua no so a ɔsɛn no so → kyerɛ sɛ, yɛn bɔne nipadua wui, na wɔsɛee Yesu nipadua no → kyerɛ sɛ, wosiee yɛn bɔne nipadua, na yɛn nso”; mfuturo "Awiei koraa no, nipadua a ɛba no san kɔ dɔte mu na ɛsan kɔ ɔdamoa mu. Hwɛ Genesis 3:19; Adam de ( Mogya ) no, wɔansie no, na mmom ɔyerae, wogyaw no hɔ, na ɛsen faa asɛnnua no ase. Enti, so wote ase?

(6) Wɔnyanee no da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa

Kristo wusɔre → Bu yɛn bem , . Owusɔreɛ, awoɔ foforɔ, nkwagyeɛ, gye a wɔgye wɔn sɛ mma, Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ, ne daa nkwa a ɛne No ! Amen.
Wɔgyee Yesu maa yɛn mmarato na wɔnyanee no maa yɛn bem (anaa wɔkyerɛɛ aseɛ sɛ: Wɔgyee Yesu maa yɛn mmarato nti na wɔnyanee no maa yɛn bem). Nkyekyɛm (Romafo 4:25) .

Hyɛ nso: Wɔne Kristo nyan yɛn → wɔsan wo no foforo Ɔba foforo " Fa hyɛ " Kristo Honhom· Mogya ·Asetra·Ɔkra ne Nipadua ! Amen. Enti, so wote ase?

Mmofra a Onyankopɔn awo wɔn:

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Kan no yɛ nnipa asefo; seesei yɛ mmea asefo
2. 2. Kan no na wɔyɛ Adam mma; seesei yɛ Kristo dea mmɔfra
3. 3. Bere bi a atwam no na ɛyɛ Adam honhom; seesei yɛ Kristo dea honhom
4. 4. Bere bi a atwam no na ɛyɛ Adam mogya; seesei yɛ Kristo dea Mogya
5. 5. Ansa na Adam nkwa wɔ hɔ; seesei yɛ Kristo dea nkwa
6. 6. Adam kra ;seesei yɛ Kristo dea ɔkra
7. Kan no yɛ Adam nipadua; seesei yɛ Kristo dea Nipadua

Hyɛ nso: asɔre ahorow pii nkyerɛkyerɛ Mfomso no ne sɛ ( frafra ) ntumi ntetew mu, wɔbɛ →→
1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Adam Honam Honhom ne Kristo Honhom frafra honhom bi nti
2. 2. Yɛn nipa dedaw no honhom ne Honhom Kronkron frafra honhom bi nti
3. 3. Yɛn nipa dedaw no mogya ne Kristo mogya frafra Mogya biako
sɛ ɛno nkutoo a (afrafra) . Asɛnka betumi asɛe, na asɔre ahorow pii “ . Ɛno na ɛyɛ bɔne "Yɛn nipa dedaw no honhom ne Honhom Kronkron a yɛde bɛka abom ( frafra ) yɛ honhom.

ɛfiri Honhom a ɛwɔ Agya no mu ne Honhom Kronkron, honhom a ɛwɔ Yesu mu no yɛ Honhom Kronkron, na honhom a ɛwɔ mmofra a wɔasan awo wɔn mu no nso yɛ Honhom Kronkron → Wɔn nyinaa fi honhom biako mu (Honhom Kronkron) . !

Sɛnea dade ne atɛkyɛ ntumi mmɔ mu no, saa ara na ngo ne nsu ntumi nfra. Enti, so wote ase?

(7) Di Awurade Anwummeduan no na di adanse sɛ wo nsa aka Yesu mogya

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na Yesu ne yɛn yɛ apam foforo?
anoyie: Yesu de ne ( Mogya ) ne yɛn yɛ apam foforo
Luka 22:20 Saa ara na adidi akyi no, ɔfaa kuruwa no kaa sɛ, “Kuruwa yi ne fa me di dwuma Mogya apam foforo , ma wo ɛsen fii mu bae .

Mmuae: Gye asɛmpa no di ! Awo foforo, owusɔre, ne agyede sɛ Onyankopɔn mma →→ Di Awurade Anwummeduan ( Di Awurade nipadua , . Monnom nnom fi Awurade hɔ Mogya ) ne sɛ wobedi adanse na woagye Awurade nipadua, Awurade mogya, Awurade nkwa, Awurade kra ! Amen. Enti, so wote ase?

articles.title: Ɔkra Nkwagye (Ɔkasa 4)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea adɔfo a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no nkyerɛ Efesofo ti 1 nkyekyem 13 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Ne mu na wɔde bɔhyɛ Honhom Kronkron no sɔɔ mo ano, berɛ a mo nso mogyee Kristo dii berɛ a motee nokorɛ asɛm, mo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no. Amen

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "Akra Nkwagye". Daabi. 4. 4. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea pa [asɔre no] soma adwumayɛfo: wɔnam wɔn nsa so kyerɛw na wɔka nokware asɛm, yɛn nkwagye, yɛn anuonyam, ne yɛn nipadua agyede ho asɛmpa. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn kra ani na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware: Momma yennye asɛmpa no nni-nya Yesu Honhom! Amen.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Mmofra a wɔwoo wɔn fi Onyankopɔn hɔ no akra nipadua

1. Yesu Honhom a yebenya

bisa: wɔ Yesu mu( honhom ) →Honhom bɛn na ɛyɛ?
anoyie: wɔ Yesu mu( honhom )→Ɛyɛ Ɔsoro Agya Honhom, Yehowa Honhom, Onyankopɔn Honhom →Ɛyɛ Honhom biako ( Honhom Kronkron )!
Hyɛ nso: nya ( Honhom Kronkron ), kyerɛ sɛ, sɛ wobenya →Yesu Honhom, Ɔsoro Agya Honhom, Yehowa Honhom, Onyankopɔn Honhom! Amen. So wote eyi ase?

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na yebetumi anya Honhom Kronkron a Onyankopɔn ahyɛ ho bɔ no?
Mmuae: Gye asɛmpa no di!
Marko 1:15 [Yesu] kaa sɛ, “Bere no aba mu, na Onyankopɔn ahennie abɛn, monnu mo ho. Gye asɛmpa no di ! "

bisa: Dɛn ne asɛmpa no?
anoyie: te sɛ asomafo no ( paul ) Asɛmpa a wɔde kɔma Amanaman mufo
Afei anuanom, mereka asɛmpa a meka kyerɛɛ mo a mo nso monyaa mu na mogyina mu no kyerɛ mo; wɔbɛgye wɔn nkwa denam asɛmpa yi so . Nkyekyɛm (1 Korintofo 15:1-2) .

bisa: Ɛsɛ sɛ wonya nkwagye denam asɛmpa yi a wubegye adi so.
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha
[1 Korintofo 15:3] Na nea mede maa mo nso ne sɛ: Nea edi kan no, Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne sɛnea Kyerɛwnsɛm no kyerɛ no.

bisa: Bere a Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne no, ɔhaw bɛn na odii ho dwuma?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

(1) Yɛde yɛn ho fi bɔne ho

Kristo ma yɛn " . amumuyɔ "Wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu na owui → Kristo nko ara". ma "Sɛ nnipa nyinaa wuwu a, wɔn nyinaa wuwu (hwɛ 2 Korintofo 5:14) → Wɔn a wɔawuwu no de wɔn ho fi bɔne ho (hwɛ Romafo 6:7)
Hyɛ no nsow: Kristo yɛ onipa biako". ma "Sɛ nnipa nyinaa wuwu a, wɔn nyinaa wuwu → Nea wawu no, wɔde ne ho fi bɔne ho, na wɔn nyinaa wuwu, ( lɛtɛ ) na obiara de ne ho fii bɔne mu. Amen

(2) Wɔde wɔn ho afi mmara ne mmara nnome ho
Nanso esiane sɛ yɛwui maa mmara a ɛkyekyere yɛn nti, . Afei de moade mo ho afiri mmara no ho , a ɔsrɛ yɛn sɛ yɛnsom Awurade sɛnea honhom foforo (ɔkra: anaa wɔkyerɛ ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron) te na ɛnyɛ sɛnea amanne dedaw no te. Nkyekyɛm (Romafo 7:6) ne Gal

【1 Korintofoɔ 15:4】Na wɔsiee no

(3) Fa akwakoraa no ne ne nneyɛe to nkyɛn
Monnni atoro nkyerɛ mo ho mo ho, ɛfiri sɛ moatwe akwakoraa ne ne nnwuma ato hɔ (Kolosefoɔ 3:9)
Hyɛ nso: Wɔbɔɔ me ne Kristo asɛnnua mu, na wɔsɛee bɔne nipadua → Wogyee me fii owu nipadua mu. Hwɛ Romafo 7:24-25

【1 Korintofoɔ 15:4】...na wɔnyanee no da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa sɛdeɛ Bible kyerɛ no, .

(4) Kristo wusɔre → ɛma yɛyɛ bemfo, wɔne no nyan yɛn, wɔsan wo, wɔgye yɛn nkwa, wɔfa yɛn sɛ mma, nya Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ no, na yɛnya daa nkwa! Amen.
Wɔgyee Yesu maa yɛn mmarato; Wonyanee no maa yɛn bem ). Nkyekyɛm (Romafo 4:25) .

(5)Wɔguan fii Hades tumi a ɛyɛ sum no mu
Wagye yɛn afiri esum tumi mu na wakyerɛ yɛn ase akɔ ne Dɔba no ahennie mu (Kolosefoɔ 1:13)

(6) Fi (ɔwɔ, ɔtweaseɛ) ɔbonsam Satan mu
Mesoma mo wɔn nkyɛn, na wɔn ani abue, na wɔadan afi sum mu akɔ hann mu. Dan fi Satan tumi so kɔ Onyankopɔn so Na ɛnam me mu gyidie so nya bɔne fafiri ne agyapadeɛ ne wɔn a wɔate wɔn ho nyina ara. ’” Nkyekyɛm (Asomafo no Nnwuma 26:18) .

(7) Fi wiase no mu

Mede w’asɛm ama wɔn. Na wiase tan wɔn efisɛ wɔnyɛ wiase de, sɛnea me nso menyɛ wiase no. Nkyekyɛm (Yohane 17:14) .

(8) Tu yɛn kɔ yɛn Ba a yɛdɔ no no ahenni mu na kyerɛw yɛn din wɔ nkwa nhoma no mu
Wagye yɛn afiri esum tumi mu na wakyerɛ yɛn ase akɔ ne Dɔba no ahennie mu (Kolosefoɔ 1:13)

Hyɛ nso: Onyankopɔn ayi yɛn akɔ ne Ba dɔfo no ahenni mu → edin a wɔakyerɛw wɔ nkwa nwoma no mu no kyerɛ sɛ wayi yɛn akɔ Yesu ahennie ne Onyankopɔn ahennie → a ɛyɛ ɔsoro ahennie no mu! Amen

Gye nea wɔhyɛɛ ho bɔ【 Honhom Kronkron 】 ne agyiraehyɛde no
Ne mu na wɔde bɔhyɛ Honhom Kronkron no sɔɔ mo ano, berɛ a mo nso mogyee Kristo dii berɛ a motee nokorɛ asɛm, mo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no. Nkyekyɛm (Efesofo 1:13) .

bisa: Dɛn ne nokware asɛm no? Asɛmpa a ɛgye yɛn nkwa no?
anoyie: Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne, wosiee no, na ɔsɔree da a ɛto so abiɛsa sɛnea Bible kyerɛ no!

1 Fa yɛn ho firi bɔne mu
2 Ahofadi a wonya fi mmara ne ne nnome ho
3 Fa akwakoraa ne ne nneyɛe to nkyɛn
4 Kristo wusɔreɛ → ɛma yɛyɛ bemfoɔ, wɔne no nyane yɛn, wɔsan wo, wɔgye yɛn nkwa, gye yɛn sɛ mma, nya Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ no, na yɛnya daa nkwa! Amen
5 Oguan fii Hades tumi a ɛyɛ sum no mu
6 Wɔade wɔn ho afi (ɔwɔ, ɔtweaseɛ) ɔbonsam Satan nsam

7 fi wiase
8 Momma wɔmfa yɛn din nkɔ yɛn Ba a yɛdɔ no no ahennie mu na wɔnkyerɛw wɔ nkwa nwoma no mu! Amen
Eyi ne nokware asɛm, mo nkwagye ho asɛmpa, nea moagye no adi, nea moanya bɔhyɛ no. Honhom Kronkron 】Ma agyiraehyɛde no! Amen.
( Hyɛ nso: " lɛtɛ "Nkurɔfo a wɔka asɛmpa yi →." Wɔde Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ no asɔ ano ;" Nnye nni "Nkurɔfo a wɔka asɛmpa yi →." Wontumi nnya Honhom Kronkron nsɔano . ) Enti, wote ase?

Hyɛ nso: Onyaa nea wɔhyɛɛ bɔ【 Honhom Kronkron 】ma agyiraehyɛde →kyerɛ sɛ nya Yesu Honhom, Agya no Honhom ! Amen.
Romafoɔ 8:16 Honhom Kronkron ne yɛn honhom di adanseɛ sɛ yɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma, ɛyɛ yɛn tekiti a yɛde hyɛn ɔsoro ahennie mu, na ɛyɛ adanseɛ ne adanseɛ a ɛkyerɛ sɛ yɛwɔ yɛn soro Agya agyapadeɛ → Honhom Kronkron yi ne adanse a ɛkyerɛ sɛ yɛanya agyapade (mfitiase nkyerɛwee yɛ bɔhyɛ) , kosi sɛ wobegye Onyankopɔn nkurɔfo (nnipa: mfitiase nkyerɛwee: agyapade), sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛkamfo N’anuonyam. Nkyekyɛm (Efesofo 1:14), wote eyi ase?

YOO! Ɛnnɛ yɛhwehwɛ, yɛyɛ fekubɔ, na yɛkyɛ sɛdeɛ yɛbɛgye Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ no sɛ nsɔano →Sɛ wobɛnya Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ no bɔ no a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ wobɛgye Yesu Honhom ne Ɔsoro Agya Honhom ! Amen

Kɔ so nya kyɛfa wɔ nsɛmma nhoma a edi hɔ no mu: Ɔkra nkwagye

1 Sɛnea yebenya Yesu Mogya ( nkwa, ɔkra ) .

2 Sɛnea yebenya Yesu amu

Asɛmpa nkyerɛwee a wɔkyɛ, a Onyankopɔn Honhom na ɛkanyan no Yesu Kristo Adwumayɛfoɔ, Onua Wang*Yun, Onuabaa Liu, Onuabaa Zheng, Onua Cen, ne mfɛfoɔ adwumayɛfoɔ foforɔ boa na wɔbom yɛ adwuma wɔ Yesu Kristo Asɔre no asɛmpa adwuma no mu. Wɔka Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no, asɛmpa a ɛma kwan ma wɔgye nnipa nkwa, hyɛ wɔn anuonyam, na wɔgye wɔn nipadua! Amen

YOO! Eyi de yɛn sɔhwɛ, fekubɔ, ne kyɛfa a yɛyɛ nnɛ no ba awiei. Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Agya Nyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron honhom nka mo nyinaa. Amen

articles.title: Ɔkra Nkwagye (Ɔkasa 3)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea adɔfo a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no mu nkɔ Mateo Ti 1 ne nkyekyem 18 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Wɔakyerɛw Yesu Kristo awo ho kyerɛwtohɔ sɛnea edidi so yi: Na ne maame Maria ahyɛ Yosef ayeforo, nanso ansa na wɔreware no, Maria nam Honhom Kronkron so nyinsɛnee. .

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "Akra Nkwagye". Daabi. 3. 3. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea pa [asɔre no] soma adwumayɛfo: wɔnam wɔn nsa so kyerɛw na wɔka nokware asɛm, yɛn nkwagye, yɛn anuonyam, ne yɛn nipadua agyede ho asɛmpa. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn kra ani na ɔmmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware: ntease Yesu Kristo kra ne ne nipadua! Amen.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Adam a Otwa To: Yesu Ɔkra Nipadua

1. Yesu Honhom

(1)Yesu Honhom no te ase

bisa: Henanom mu na wɔwoo Yesu?
anoyie: Ɔsoro Agya no na ɔwoo Yesu bere nyinaa ɔka kyerɛɛ Hena na ɔka sɛ: "Woyɛ me ba, ɛnnɛ mawo wo"? Ehena na ɔtwe adwene si so na ɔka sɛ: "Mɛyɛ n'Agya, na ɔno nso ayɛ me ba"? Nkyekyɛm (Hebrifo 1:5) .

bisa: Yesu de . honhom So ɛyɛ raw? Anaasɛ wɔayɛ?
anoyie: Esiane sɛ Agya no na ɔwoo Yesu nti, Ne ( honhom ) nso, Ɔsoro Agya no na ɔwoo wɔn, ɛnte sɛ Adam a ɔbɔɔ onipa no. honhom ".".

(2)Ɔsoro Agya Honhom

bisa: Yesu de . honhom →Ɛyɛ hena honhom?
anoyie: Ɔsoro Agya deɛ honhom →Ɛne sɛ, Onyankopɔn Honhom, Yehowa Nyankopɔn Honhom, ne Ɔbɔadeɛ no Honhom → Mfitiaseɛ no, Onyankopɔn bɔɔ ɔsoro ne asase. Na asase no nni nsɛso na hwee nni hɔ, na na esum akata bun no ani; onyame honhom Nsu so mmirikatu. (Genesis 1:1-2).

Hyɛ nso: yesu honhom →Ɛyɛ Agya Honhom, Onyankopɔn Honhom, Yehowa Honhom, Ɔbɔadeɛ Honhom no na ɔbɔɔ onipa →→ Ɛwom Onyankopɔn wɔ honhom Ɔwɔ tumi a ɛdɔɔso a ɔde bɛbɔ nnipa bebree So ɛnyɛ Ɔbɔɔ onipa baako pɛ? Dɛn nti na wɔbɔ onipa biako pɛ? Ɛyɛ Ɔno na ɔpɛ sɛ nnipa nya asefo a wosuro Onyankopɔn...Nkyerɛkyerɛmu (Malaki 2:15) .

(3) Agya Honhom, Ɔba Honhom, ne Honhom Kronkron → yɛ honhom biako

bisa: Dɛn ne Honhom Kronkron no din?
anoyie: Wɔfrɛ no Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ, wɔsan frɛ no sradeɛ → Mebisa Agya no, na ɔbɛma mo Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ foforɔ (anaa Nkyerɛaseɛ: Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ; saa ara wɔ aseɛ ha), sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a ɔne mo bɛtena daa, nokware Honhom... Nkyerɛkyerɛmu (Yohane 14:16-17) ne 1 Yohane 2:27.

bisa: Honhom Kronkron Ɛhe na efi bae?
Mmuaeɛ: Honhom Kronkron no firi Ɔsoro Agya hɔ →Nanso mɛsoma mo Boafoɔ a ɔfiri Agya a ɔwɔ hɔ no hɔ nokware Honhom a ofi Agya no mu ba no ; Nkyekyɛm (Yohane 15:26) .

bisa: wɔ Agya no mu ( honhom ) →Honhom bɛn na ɛyɛ?
anoyie: wɔ Agya no mu ( honhom ) → yɛ Honhom Kronkron !

bisa: wɔ Yesu mu( honhom ) →Honhom bɛn na ɛyɛ?
anoyie: wɔ Yesu mu( honhom ) → Honhom Kronkron nso
→ Wɔbɔɔ nnipa no nyinaa asu, na wɔbɔɔ Yesu asu. Bere a merebɔ mpae no, ɔsoro buei, . Honhom Kronkron baa ne so , nsɛso te sɛ aborɔnoma, na ɛnne bi fi soro bae sɛ, “Woyɛ me dɔfo, m’ani gye wo ho yiye” (Luka 3:21-22)

Hyɛ nso:

1 Sɛnea (honhom) kyerɛ no:
Honhom a ɛwɔ Ɔsoro Agya mu, Onyankopɔn Honhom, Yehowa Honhom → ne Honhom Kronkron !
Honhom a ɔte Yesu mu, Kristo Honhom, Awurade Honhom → Honhom Kronkron nso !
Honhom Kronkron Ɛyɛ Agya Honhom ne Yesu Honhom ne nyinaa fi biako mu, na wɔyɛ “. Honhom biako ” → Honhom Kronkron . Nkyekyɛm (1 Korintofo 6:17) .

2 Sɛnea (onipa) kyerɛ no:
Akyɛdeɛ ahodoɔ wɔ hɔ, nanso Honhom korɔ no ara.
Ɔsom ahorow ahorow wɔ hɔ, nanso Awurade yɛ ade koro.
Dwumadi ahorow gu ahorow, nanso ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn koro no ara na ɔyɛ nneɛma nyinaa adwuma wɔ ne nyinaa mu. (1 Korintofo 12:4-6)

3 Ka sɛnea (asɛmti) te .
Agya, Ɔba, ne Honhom Kronkron →Wɔfrɛ Agya no din Agya Yehowa, wɔfrɛ Ɔba no din Yesu Ɔba, na wɔfrɛ Honhom Kronkron din Ɔwerɛkyekyefo anaa Ɔsrafo. Hwɛ Mateo Ti 28 Nkyekyɛm 19 ne Apam Ti 14 Nkyekyɛm 16-17
【1 Korintofoɔ 6:17】Nanso deɛ ɔne Awurade yɛ baako no wɔ hɔ Mo ne Awurade bɛyɛ honhom baako . So na Yesu ne Agya no yɛɛ biako? wɔ! Nifa! Yesu kaa sɛ →Mewɔ Agya no mu na Agya no wɔ me mu → Me ne me papa yɛ biako . "Nkyerɛkyerɛmu (Yohane 10:30) ."
Sɛnea wɔakyerɛw no, saa ara na →Nipadua baako ne Honhom baako na ɛwɔ hɔ, sɛdeɛ wɔfrɛɛ mo kɔɔ anidasoɔ baako mu no. Awurade baako, gyidie baako, asubɔ baako, Onyankopɔn ne Agya baako a ɔhwɛ ne nyinaa so, wɔ ne nyinaa so, ɛnam ne nyinaa so, ne ne nyinaa mu. Nkyekyɛm (Efesofo 4:4-6). Enti, so wote ase?

2. Yesu Ɔkra

(1) Yesu Kristo nni bɔne

bisa: Wɔwoo Yesu wɔ mmara ase anaa?
anoyie: Wɔammu mmara biara so! Amen

bisa: Adɛn?
anoyie: Efisɛ baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ, na mmara sobu biara nni hɔ → Efisɛ mmara no hyɛ abufuw. Nkyekyɛm (Romafo 4:15) .

Hyɛ nso: Ɛwom sɛ wɔwoo Yesu Kristo wɔ mmara ase deɛ, nanso ɔnyɛ mmara no muni → Ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔsɔfoɔ, ɛnyɛ sɛdeɛ honam mu ahyɛdeɛ (mmara) teɛ, na mmom sɛdeɛ nkwa a ɛnni ano (mfitiaseɛ, ɛnsɛe) tumi teɛ (Onyankopɔn som ). Nkyekyɛm (Hebrifo 7:16). Sɛnea Yesu wɔ " . Homeda "Saa nnipa yareɛ sɛdeɛ ɔhonam mmara teɛ. → Yesu buu "Homeda" a ɛwɔ mmara no mu "Mmara Du" no so, enti Yudafoɔ Farisifoɔ no bɔɔ mmɔden biara sɛ wɔbɛkyere Yesu na wɔasɛe Yesu! Ɛfiri sɛ ɔbuu mmara so "Mmara" no no nni akyi". Homeda ". Nkyekyɛm (Mateo 12:9-14) .

Galatifoɔ [5:18] Na sɛ Honhom no na ɛkyerɛ mo kwan a, monni mmara no ase
Honhom Kronkron na ɔdii Yesu kwan →Ɛwom sɛ wɔwoo no wɔ mmara ase deɛ, nanso wansom Onyankopɔn sɛdeɛ ɔhonam mmara teɛ, na mmom sɛdeɛ nkwa a ɛnni ano tumi teɛ, enti ɔno Ɛnyɛ ha Mmara no te sɛ nea edidi so yi:

1 Baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ -Hwɛ Romafoɔ 4:15
2 Sɛ mmara nni hɔ a, bɔne awu --Hwɛ Romafoɔ 7:8
3 Sɛ mmara nni hɔ a, bɔne nyɛ bɔne --Hwɛ Romafoɔ 5:13

[Yesu] Mmara a ɔhonam nhyehyɛɛ nni mu no nni mmara ase; Homeda Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛsa nnipa nyarewa, sɛnea mmara kyerɛ no, " Bu afobu ho akontaa ”, nanso onni mmara → Bɔne nyɛ bɔne . Sɛ mmara nni hɔ a, mmara sobu biara nni hɔ a, bɔne bɛn na wɔbɛyɛ? So woteɛ? Sɛ wowɔ mmara → bu atɛn na bu fɔ sɛnea mmara te. Enti, so wote ase? Hwɛ Romafo 2:12 .

1 Yesu anyɛ bɔne

Efisɛ yɛn sɔfo panyin no ntumi nnya yɛn mmerɛwyɛ ho tema. Wɔsɔɔ no hwɛe wɔ biribiara mu sɛnea yɛte no, . Ɛyɛ sɛ wanyɛ bɔne bi kɛkɛ . (Hebrifo 4:15) ne 1 Petro 2:22

2 Yesu nni bɔne
Onyankopɔn bu wɔn a wonni bɔne bem Nea na onnim bɔne biara no bɛyɛɛ bɔne maa yɛn, na yɛabɛyɛ Onyankopɔn trenee wɔ ne mu. (2 Korintofo 5:21) ne 1 Yohane 3:5.

(2)Yesu yɛ kronkron

Efisɛ wɔakyerɛw sɛ: “Monyɛ kronkron, efisɛ meyɛ kronkron . "Nsɛm a wɔde kyerɛw (1 Petro 1:16) ."
Ɛfata sɛ yɛnya ɔsɔfoɔ panin a ɔte saa a ɔyɛ kronkron, bɔne biara nni ne ho, ne ho ntew, ɔtetew ne ho firi nnebɔneyɛfoɔ ho, na ɔkorɔn sen ɔsoro. ( Hebrifo 7:26 ) .

(3)Kristo deɛ ( Mogya ) . mfomso biara nni ho, enni fĩ

1 Petro Ti 1:19 Na ɛnam Kristo mogya a ɛsom bo so, te sɛ oguammaa a nkekae ne nkekae biara nni ho.

Hyɛ nso: Kristo deɛ". mogya a ɛsom bo "Nea nkekae biara nni ho, enni fĩ →." nkwa te ase Mogya mfinimfini →eyi nkwa Ɛno ne no → ɔkra !
Yesu Kristo Ɔkra → Ɛho nkekae, ɛho ntew, na ɛyɛ kronkron! Amen.

3. Kristo Nipadua

(1)Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ honam
Asɛm bɛyɛɛ ɔhonam , te yɛn mu, adom ne nokware ahyɛ no ma. Na yɛahu n’anuonyam, anuonyam a ɛte sɛ Agya no ba koro no. ( Yohane 1:14 ) .

(2) Onyankopɔn bɛyɛɛ ɔhonam
Yohane 1:1-2 Mfitiaseɛ no na Asɛm no wɔ hɔ, na Asɛm no wɔ Onyankopɔn nkyɛn; Asɛm no ne Onyankopɔn . Na Asɛm yi ka Onyankopɔn ho mfiase no.
Hyɛ no nsow: Na Tao no wɔ hɔ mfiase no, na na Tao no ka Onyankopɔn ho → Tao no bɛyɛɛ honam → Onyankopɔn bɛyɛɛ honam! Amen. Enti, so wote ase?

(3) “Honhom” bɛyɛɛ ɔhonam
Hyɛ nso: Onyankopɔn yɛ "Honhom" →". nyame "bɛyɛɛ honam → ne". honhom "Bɛyɛ honam!→→." Onyankopɔn yɛ honhom (anaasɛ onni asɛm biara) . , enti ɛsɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔsom no no som no honhom ne nokware mu. Nhwehwɛmu (Yohane 4:24) → Ɔbaabun Maria nyinsɛn no fi “Honhom Kronkron” no mu! Enti, so wote ase? Hwɛ Mateo Ti 1 Nkyekyɛm 18

(4) Kristo honam nsɛe

bisa: Adɛn nti na Kristo nipadua ( Daabi ) hwɛ porɔwee?
anoyie: Efisɛ Kristo a ɔwɔ honam mu no yɛ → 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa honam mu a wɔbae , . 2. 2. ɔsoro honam , . 3. 3. Honhom nipadua ! Amen. Enti, ne nipadua no nsɛe → Dawid a ɔyɛ odiyifoɔ na ɔnim sɛ Onyankopɔn aka ntam akyerɛ no sɛ n’asefoɔ no mu baako bɛtena n’ahengua so no, ɔhunuu yei na ɔkaa Kristo wusɔreɛ ho asɛm sɛ: ‘ . Ne kra nka Hades; . ’ Nkyekyɛm (Asomafo no Nnwuma 2:30-31) .

(5) Wonyanee Yesu fii awufo mu na na owu ntumi mfa no nkɔto afiase

Onyankopɔn kyerɛkyerɛɛ owu mu yaw mu na onyanee no, efisɛ na owu ntumi mfa no nkɔto afiase. . Nkyekyɛm (Asomafo no Nnwuma 2:24) .

bisa: Dɛn nti na yɛn honam nipadua no hu sɛ ɛreporɔw? So wobenyin, wɔbɛyare, anaa wobewuwu?
anoyie: Efisɛ yɛn nyinaa yɛ yɛn nana Adam asefo, .

Na Adam nipadua no yɛ "". mfuturo "Wɔabɔ →."
Na yɛn nipadua nso yɛ " . mfuturo “Wɔabɔɔ;
Bere a Adam wɔ honam mu no, na ɔwɔ " " . Tɔn "wɔama no bɔne, .
Yɛn nipadua nso wɔ " . Tɔn "Ma amumuyɔ
ɛfiri【 amumuyɔ 】Adwumayɛfo bo yɛ wu →Enti yɛn honam nipadua no bɛporɔw, anyin, ayare, awu, na awiei koraa no asan ayɛ mfutuma.

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na yɛn nipadua betumi ayɛ nea porɔwee, nyarewa, awerɛhow, ɛyaw, ne owu nni mu?

anoyie: Awurade Yesu kae →Ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ saa awo foforo ! Hwɛ Yohane 3:7 .

1 Nsu ne Honhom na wɔwoo wɔn
2 Wɔwoo wɔn firii asɛmpa no mu nokware no mu
3 Onyankopɔn na ɔwoo no
4 Onyankopɔn Bayɛ a Yebenya
5 Nya Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ no
6 Nya Yesu amu
7 Nea onyaa Yesu Mogya (nkwa, ɔkra) .
Saa kwan yi so nkutoo na yebetumi anya daa nkwa! Amen

( Hyɛ nso: Anuanom mmarima ne mmea! 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Kristo a wobenya". honhom "Ɛne sɛ, Honhom Kronkron, . 2. 2. Nya Kristo". Mogya "Seesei ara nkwa, ɔkra , . 3. 3. Nya Kristo nipadua →Wɔbu wɔn sɛ mmofra a Onyankopɔn awo wɔn! anyɛ saa a wo Wɔyɛ nyaatwomfo, wɔyɛ wɔn ho sɛ Onyankopɔn mma, te sɛ mmoa ne akraman a wɔyɛ wɔn ho sɛ nnipa. Mprempren, asɔre mpanyimfo, asɔfo, ne asɛnkafo pii nte akra nkwagye ase wɔ Kristo mu, na wɔn nyinaa reyɛ wɔn ho sɛ Onyankopɔn mma.
Sɛnea Awurade Yesu kae no: “Biribiara ma me ne asɛmpa no ( . hwere ) a nkwa wom → hwere W’ankasa wo kra nipadua ne Nya Kristo kra ne ne nipadua → Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔkora so nkwa ,ɛyɛ Gye me kra nipadua ".)

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na wobetumi anya Kristo kra nipadua no?

anoyie: Kɔ so nya kyɛfa wɔ nsɛmma nhoma a edi hɔ no mu: Ɔkra nkwagye

Asɛmpa nkyerɛwee a wɔkyɛ, a Onyankopɔn Honhom na ɛkanyan no Yesu Kristo Adwumayɛfoɔ, Onua Wang*Yun, Onuabaa Liu, Onuabaa Zheng, Onua Cen, ne mfɛfoɔ adwumayɛfoɔ foforɔ boa na wɔbom yɛ adwuma wɔ Yesu Kristo Asɔre no asɛmpa adwuma no mu. Sɛnea wɔakyerɛw wɔ Bible mu no: Mɛsɛe anyansafo nyansa na matow anyansafo ntease agu - wɔyɛ Kristofo kuw bi a wofi mmepɔw so a wɔn amammerɛ sua na wonsuaa ade pii wɔn , frɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnka Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no, asɛmpa a ɛma wotumi gye nnipa nkwa, hyɛ wɔn anuonyam, na wɔgye wɔn nipadua! Amen

YOO! Eyi de yɛn sɔhwɛ, fekubɔ, ne kyɛfa a yɛyɛ nnɛ no ba awiei. Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Agya Nyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron honhom nka mo nyinaa. Amen

articles.title: Ɔkra Nkwagye (Ɔkasa 2)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea adɔfo a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nkyerɛ Sakaria ti 12 nkyekyem 1 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Awurade Asɛm a Ɛfa Israel Ho. AWURADE a ɔtrɛw ɔsoro mu, ɔhyehyɛɛ asase fapem, na ɔhyehyɛɛ honhom wɔ onipa mu no se.

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "Akra Nkwagye". Daabi. 2. 2. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa【 asɔre 】Soma adwumayɛfoɔ: ɛnam nokorɛ asɛm a wɔatwerɛ wɔ wɔn nsam na wɔnam wɔn so ka, a ɛyɛ yɛn nkwagyeɛ, anuonyam ne yɛn nipadua agyedeɛ ho asɛmpa no so. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn kra ani na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware: Te nana Adam kra nipadua no ase.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Adam, adesamma nana→→ɔkra nipadua

1. Adam Honhom

(1) Wɔbɔɔ Adam (honhom) no

bisa: So wɔbɔɔ Adam honhom no? Woda so ara yɛ raw?
anoyie: Adam deɛ". honhom "wɔabɔ →→【 Ɔno na ɔbɔɔ honhom a ɛwɔ onipa mu 】→→Hena na ɔbɔɔ onipa? honhom ” → → → AWURADE se → AWURADE asɛm a ɛfa Israel ho Mommɔ ɔsoro na monkyekye asase fapem. Ɔno na ɔbɔɔ honhom a ɛwɔ onipa mu Awurade se: Nsεmfua (Sakaria 12:1) .

(2) Wɔbɔ abɔfo (honhom) nso

bisa: So wɔbɔ abɔfo "honhom" nso?
anoyie: "Nsoromma a ɛhyerɛn, anɔpa ba", kerubim a wɔkata apam adaka no so → kerubim no ne " Bɔfoɔ "→ɔbɔfo deɛ". ɔkra nipadua “Onyankopɔn na ɔbɔɔ wɔn nyinaa→ efi da a wɔbɔɔ wo no Na wodi pɛ wɔ w’akwan nyinaa mu, nanso afei wohuu nea ɛnteɛ wɔ wo mu. Nkyekyɛm (Hesekiel 28:15) .

(3) Adam (honhom) honam ne ne mogya

bisa: Adam deɛ". honhom "Efi he?"
anoyie: "Onipa Abɔde Mu". honhom "Ne →→Yehowa Nyankopɔn bɛpɛ". abufuo "Mommɔ ne hwene mu, na ɔbɛdan biribi ( honhom ) a ɛfa onipa teasefo bi a wɔfrɛ no Adam ho! →→Awurade Nyankopɔn de asase so mfutuma hyehyɛɛ onipa na ɔhome nkwa home guu ne hwene mu, na ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔteasefoɔ a wɔfrɛ no Adam. Nkyekyɛm (Genesis 2:7) .

bisa: So Adam "honhom" no yɛ abɔde mu de?
anoyie: Adam deɛ". honhom ” Abɔdeɛ →→ Enti wɔatwerɛ sɛ: “Onipa a ɔdi kan, Adam, bɛyɛɛ honhom ( Honhom: anaasɛ wɔkyerɛ ase sɛ mogya ) onipa a ɔte ase"; Adam a otwa to no bɛyɛɛ honhom a ɛma nnipa te ase. Nanso honhom mu de no nyɛ nea edi kan, Abɔde mu de no di kan , na afei honhom famfo nso bɛba. Nkyekyɛm (1 Korintofo 15:45-46) .

2. Adam Ɔkra

(1) Adam a obuu apam so

---Di papa ne bɔne ho nimdeɛ dua no aba--- .

Awurade Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ no sɛ, "Wobɛtumi adi turo no mu dua biara aba kwa, nanso ɛnsɛ sɛ wodi papa ne bɔne ho nimdeɛ dua no bi, ɛfiri sɛ da a wobɛdi bi no, wobɛwuo ampa!" Genesis Ti 2) Nkyekyɛm 16-17) .
bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na Adam buu apam no so?
anoyie: Enti bere a ɔbea no (Hawa) hui sɛ dua no aba ye ma aduan, ɛsɔ ani, na ɛsɔ aniwa, na ɛma nnipa nya nyansa no, ɔfaa aduaba no dii, na ɔde maa ne kunu ( Adam). Me kunu nso dii. Nkyekyɛm (Genesis 3:6) .

(2) Mmara no na wɔdomee Adam

bisa: Dɛn na efii apam a Adam buu so no mu bae?
anoyie: Wɔ Mmara Nnome ase →" Bere tenten a wubedi no, akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ wubewu. "
Yehowa Nyankopɔn →→Na ɔka kyerɛɛ Adam sɛ, "Esiane sɛ wo tiee wo yere na wodii dua a mehyɛɛ wo sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ wodi no bi nti, wo nti wɔadome asase no; ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ adwuma wo nkwa nna nyinaa na woanya biribiara a wobɛdi." efi mu . Nsɔe ne nsɔe befifi ama wo; twe adwene si ( Genesis 3:17-19 ) .

(3) Adam kra ho fi

bisa: So Adam asefo (akra) nso ho agu fĩ?
anoyie: Adam deɛ". ɔkra ” → Yɛ Ɔwɔ.Ɔtweaseɛ.Ɔbonsam.Satan.Efĩ. . Yɛn a yɛyɛ nnipa nyinaa yɛ yɛn nana Adam asefo, na honhom a ɛsen wɔ yɛn mu no te saa Mogya "→ Ɛho ntew dedaw, ɛnyɛ nea ɛho tew na ɛnyɛ nea ɛho ntew," nkwa "Seesei ara" ɔkra "wɔn nyinaa aka wɔn". ɔwɔ "Efĩ no."
Sɛnea wɔakyerɛw →Anuanom adɔfo, esiane sɛ yɛwɔ saa bɔhyɛ ahorow yi nti, . Monhohoro mo ho mfi nipadua ne ɔkra efĩ nyinaa ho , monsuro Onyankopɔn na monyɛ kronkron. Nkyekyɛm (2 Korintofo 7:1) .

3. Adam nipadua

(1)Adam nipadua

...wɔde mfutuma ayɛ...

bisa: Ɛhe na nana Adam a odi kan no nipadua fi?
anoyie: " mfuturo "Wɔbɔɔ → Yehowa Nyankopɔn de asase mfutuma kyekyeree onipa, na ne din de Adam! →→ Yehowa Nyankopɔn de asase mfutuma yɛɛ onipa, na ɔhome nkwa guu ne hwene mu, na ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔteasefo, honhom mu nipa, na." ne din ne Adam Twe adwene si (Genesis 2:7), wɔde dɔte na ɛbɔɔ Adam; Na yɛn a yɛyɛ nnipa nyinaa yɛ Adam asefo, na yɛn nipadua nso yɛ asase so de. → Onipa a odi kan no fi asase so bae na ɔyɛ asase no dea;...Nkyerɛkyerɛmu (1 Korintofo 15:47)

(2) Wɔatɔn Adam ama bɔne

bisa: Hena na Adam a obuu apam so tɔn maa no?
anoyie: "Adam" . 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Asase so dea, . 2. 2. Ɔhonam ne mogya mu, . 3. 3. Bere a yɛwɔ honam mu no, wɔtɔn yɛn maa amumuyɔ ” → Yɛn nyinaa yɛ n’asefoɔ, na wɔtɔn yɛn maa no berɛ a yɛwɔ honam mu. amumuyɔ ” → Yenim sɛ mmara no yɛ honhom mu de, nanso me de, meyɛ honam de, . Wɔatɔn ama bɔne . Nkyekyɛm (Romafo 7:14) .

bisa: Bɔne akatua ne dɛn?
anoyie: Aane wu →→Bɔne akatua ne owuo, na Onyankopɔn akyɛdeɛ ne daa nkwa wɔ yɛn Awurade Kristo Yesu mu. ( Romafo 6:23 ) .

bisa: Ɛhe na owu fi?
anoyie: wu firi amumuyɔ Ba → Sɛdeɛ bɔne nam onipa baako so baa wiase, Adam, na owuo firii bɔne mu baeɛ no, saa ara na owuo baa obiara so ɛfiri sɛ obiara yɛɛ bɔne. ( Romafo 5:12 ) .

bisa: So obiara bewu?
anoyie: Efisɛ obiara ayɛ bɔne na ɔtɔ Onyankopɔn anuonyam
→" amumuyɔ "Akatua ne owuo → Wɔahyɛ sɛ nnipa nyinaa nwu pɛnkoro, na ɛno akyi no atemmuo. Nkyerɛkyerɛmu (Hebrifoɔ 9:27)

bisa: Ɛhe na nkurɔfo kɔ bere a wɔawuwu akyi?
anoyie: nnipa" wu "Atemmu bɛba akyiri yi → Onipa nipadua yɛ asase dea, na nipadua no bɛsan aba asase so wɔ owuo akyi; sɛ obi anyɛ saa a". lɛtɛ "Yesu Kristo agyede, onipa de". ɔkra "bɛ →." 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa “sian kɔ Hades”; 2. 2. Ɔsɛe Da Atemmu → din Wɔnkae wɔn nkwa nhoma Sɛ ɔsɔre a, wɔbɛtow no agu ogya tare no mu → Ogya tare yi ne nea edi kan owu a ɛto so abien , . "Ɔkra" no yera daa . →→Na mehunuu awufoɔ, akɛseɛ ne nketewa, sɛ wɔgyinagyina ahengua no anim. Wobuee nhoma ahorow no, na wobuee nhoma foforo a ɛyɛ nkwa nhoma no. Wɔbuu awufoɔ atɛn sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ wɔ nwoma yi mu ne wɔn nnwuma teɛ. Enti ɛpo no gyaee awufoɔ a wɔwɔ wɔn mu, na owuo ne Hades gyaee awufoɔ a wɔwɔ wɔn mu, na wɔbuu wɔn mu biara atɛn sɛdeɛ wɔn nnwuma teɛ. Wɔtow Owu ne Hades nso guu ogya tare no mu; Sɛ wɔankyerɛw obi din wɔ nkwa nwoma no mu a, wɔbɛtow no agu ogya tare no mu. Nkyekyɛm (Adiyisɛm 20:12-15), wote eyi ase?

(3) Adam nipadua bɛporɔw

bisa: Dɛn na ɛto asase so nipadua no?
anoyie: Sɛ́ nea ɔyɛ asase soni no, saa ara na asase sofo nyinaa te; Nkyekyɛm (1 Korintofo 15:48).

Hyɛ no nsow: ɛyɛ asase dea Wo nipadua te dɛn? →Efi awo kosi onyin, nya awo, mpanyinyɛ, yare ne owu mu osuahu →Asase so nipadua no sɛe nkakrankakra, na awiei koraa no ɛsan kɔ mfutuma mu →→Ɛsɛ sɛ wo fifiri fi w’anim na ama woanya asetrade kosi sɛ wobɛsan aba asase so, efisɛ wɔwoo wo fi asase so. Wɔka Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no, asɛmpa a ɛma kwan ma wɔgye nnipa nkwa, hyɛ wɔn anuonyam, na wɔgye wɔn nipadua! Amen

Asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa! Amen

Momma yenbue Bible no nkyerɛ Hebrifo Ti 11 Nkyekyɛm 4 Gyidie so na Habel bɔɔ afɔdeɛ a ɛkyɛn deɛ Kain de maeɛ no maa Onyankopɔn, na ɔnam saayɛ so nyaa ne bem ho adanseɛ, Onyankopɔn adanseɛ a ɛfa n’akyɛdeɛ ho. Ɛwom sɛ owui de, nanso gyidi yi nti na ɔda so ara kasae.

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "Akra Nkwagye". Daabi. 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa【 asɔre 】Soma adwumayɛfoɔ: ɛnam nokorɛ asɛm a wɔatwerɛ wɔ wɔn nsam na wɔnam wɔn so ka, a ɛyɛ yɛn nkwagyeɛ, anuonyam ne yɛn nipadua agyedeɛ ho asɛmpa no so. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn kra ani na ɔmmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware→ Te ase sɛ ɔkra no kasa.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

1. Ɔkra no kasa

(1) Habel kra kasa

bisa: Habel wui wɔ honam fam nanso na ɔda so ara kasa? Dɛn na ɛrekasa?
anoyie: Ɔkra no kasa, ɛyɛ Habel kra na ɔkasa!

(2) Habel mogya teɛteɛɛm frɛɛ Onyankopɔn

2. Ɔkra tumi kasa a nipadua no nka ho

(1)Ɔkra no kasa denneennen

Adiyisɛm 6:9-10 Bere a obuee nsɔano a ɛto so anum no, mihuu wɔn a wokunkum wɔn esiane Onyankopɔn asɛm ne adansedi nti no akra wɔ afɔremuka no ase; teɛm denneennen "O Awurade, kronkron ne nokwafo, ebegye bere tenten ansa na Woabu wɔn a wɔte asase so atɛn na woatɔ yɛn mogya so were?"

anoyie: ɔhotefo! Wokunkum wɔn honam fam maa Kristofo a wɔkoraa nokware no so na wodii adanse maa Yesu Wɔn "." ɔkra "Wɔatetew ne ho afi nipadua no ho, ne". ɔkra "Fa Onyankopɔn mogya so were. Sɛnea Awurade Yesu kae no: "Nsuro wɔn a wokum nipadua nanso wontumi nkum ɔkra no, na mmom munsuro nea obetumi asɛe nipadua ne ɔkra nyinaa wɔ hellgya mu. ” Nkyekyɛm ( Mateo 10:28 ) .

(2) Nea enni nipadua mu " . ɔkra "Kasa, yentumi nte."

bisa: " ɔkra "Ɔkasa → So nnipa aso betumi ate?"
anoyie: nko ara" ɔkra "Sɛ yɛrekasa a, obiara ntumi nte! Sɛ nhwɛso no, sɛ woka komm wɔ wo komam sɛ: "Hello" → eyi ne "." nkwa kra "Kasa! Nanso eyi". ɔkra "Sɛ worekasa a, sɛ nnyigyei no antwa honam ano a, onipa aso ntumi nte, "" nkwa kra "Sɛ nnyigyei fa tɛkrɛma ne anofafa mu ba a, nnipa aso tumi te;

Nanso onipa nipadua." aniwa a ɛda hɔ kwa Wontumi nhu". ɔkra ", ntumi nka". ɔkra ", wontumi mfa nni dwuma ne ". ɔkra "Di nkitaho na wuntumi nte". ɔkra "Nne a ɛkasa."

Yakobo 2:26 Sɛdeɛ nipadua a ɔkra nni mu awuo no, saa ara na gyidie a nnwuma nni mu nso awu.

articles.title: FAQ: Gyidi a nnwuma nni mu awu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa! Amen

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no mu nkyerɛ Yakobo Ti 2, nkyekyem 19-20, na yɛnbom nkenkan: Wogye di sɛ Onyankopɔn baako pɛ na ɔwɔ hɔ, na wogye di yie, abonsam nso gye di, nanso ehu aka wɔn. Wo onipa kwa, wopɛ sɛ wuhu sɛ gyidi a nnwuma nnim awu?

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "Gyidi a nnwuma nni mu awu". Bɔ mpae: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya Kronkron, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa【 asɔre 】Soma adwumayɛfoɔ: ɛnam nokorɛ asɛm a wɔatwerɛ wɔ wɔn nsam na wɔnam wɔn so ka, a ɛyɛ yɛn nkwagyeɛ, anuonyam ne yɛn nipadua agyedeɛ ho asɛmpa no so. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn kra ani na ɔmmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware→ Te aseɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn mu gyidie a wonni Agyenkwa Yesu mu gyidie ne gyidie a Honhom Kronkron nnyɛ foforɔ no awu.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

1. Ahotoso ne Suban

(1) Yudafo no gye Onyankopɔn di nanso wonnye Yesu di, na wɔn nneyɛe a ɛne sɛ wobedi mmara so no awu

Yakobo 2:19-20 Mogye di sɛ Onyankopɔn baako pɛ na ɔwɔ hɔ, na mogye di yie, na ahonhommɔne nso gye di, nanso wɔn ho popo. Wo onipa kwa, wopɛ sɛ wuhu sɛ gyidi a nnwuma nnim awu?

bisa: Dɛn nti na Yudafo mmara sodi suban no awu?
anoyie: "Yudafoɔ". gyidie ”→Gye Onyankopɔn di, . Nanso nnye Yesu nni ! Yakobo kaa sɛ → Wogye di sɛ Onyankopɔn baako pɛ na ɛwɔ hɔ Wogye di yie.

bisa: "Yudafoɔ". Suban "Ɛyɛ dɛn?"
anoyie: di mmara no so

bisa: Dɛn nti na nneyɛe a wodi mmara so awu?
anoyie: Sɛ woanni mmara no so a, wobɛtena mmara no nnome ase hwie gui wɔ yɛn fam no, ɛyɛ nea yɛayɛ bɔne atia Onyankopɔn. Nkyekyɛm (Daniel 9:11) .

(2) Yudafo (a wogye) Yesu di na wodi mmara (su) so no nso awu

Yakobo Ti 2 Nkyekyɛm 8 Wɔakyerɛw sɛ, "Dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho."

bisa: Adɛn nti na Yudafo a wogye Yesu di na wodi mmara so no "adwuma" awu?
anoyie: Efisɛ obiara a odi mmara no nyinaa so na ɔto hintidua wɔ asɛm biako mu no, odi fɔ sɛ wabu ne nyinaa so. Ɛbɛdaa adi sɛ deɛ ɔkaa sɛ, "Nsɛe awareɛ" no nso kaa sɛ, "Nni awudisɛm mpo sɛ woansɛe awareɛ na mmom awudisɛm a, woda so ara bu mmara so. ( Yakobo 2:10-11 ) .

→James kaa sɛ: "Monyɛ asɛm no yɛfo, na ɛnyɛ atiefoɔ nko ara."

Yakobo bisae sɛ onnye Yesu nni ". bio "Yudafo anuanom a wodi mmara so no, akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ wobehyira wɔn sɛ wɔde mmara no trenee di dwuma → So wobetumi de mmara no trenee adi dwuma? Dabi, dɛn ne eyi?" fa hyɛ "Ɛdefa nnipa fam no, wontumi nni mmara no trenee no mmamu koraa."

(3) Wogye Yesu di na wɔn suban a wɔde di mmara so no hwe ase fi adom mu.

bisa: Adɛn nti na wontumi mfa mmara no trenee ntra ase?
anoyie: Obiara a ɔde mmara no bɔ ne bra no wɔ nnome ase; ɛda adi pefee;

nti( paul ) kaa→→Mo a mohwehwɛ sɛ monam mmara so bu mo bem no, moatwe mo ho afiri Kristo ho na ɛno nti moayɛ Ɔhwe ase fi adom mu . Nkyekyɛm (Galatiafo 5:4) .

2. Kristofo Gyidi ne Suban

(1) Fa Honhom Kronkron tra ase na fa Honhom Kronkron yɛ ade

" gyidie →"Gye Yesu di," Suban "Ɛnam Honhom Kronkron no so."

yɛ

Galatifo 5:25: Sɛ yɛfa Honhom so na yɛte ase a, momma yɛn nso yɛnante Honhom no mu.

bisa: Dɛn ne nkwa a ɛnam Honhom Kronkron so?
anoyie: Gye asɛmpa no di.Te nokware kwan no ase.Esiane sɛ woagye Kristo adi nti, wɔde Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ no bɔ no asɔ wo ano →→ Eyi ne sɛ wode Honhom Kronkron bɛtra ase! Amen. Hwɛ Efesofo 1:13

bisa: Dɛn na ɛkyerɛ sɛ obi nam Honhom no so nantew?
anoyie: Bere a yɛde Honhom Kronkron bɔ yɛn bra no, ɛsɛ sɛ yɛde yɛn ho to “ . Honhom Kronkron "Adwuma wɔ yɛn mu →→." yɛ adwuma a wɔayɛ no foforo , yei nam Honhom Kronkron so nantew. " gyidie "→ Gye Yesu di," Suban "Monam Honhom mu nantew, monnantew mmara so, sɛnea." Kristofo nneyɛe →Ɛyɛ “ . Honhom Kronkron "Adwuma foforo a wobɛyɛ wɔ Kristoni mu → Honhom Kronkron a wɔreyɛ no foforo → ɛhɔ na Honhom Kronkron akyɛde bɛba →." Sɛ ebi wɔ hɔ a Akyɛdeɛ adeyɛ a ɛfa asɛmpa no a wɔka ho ne sɛ wɔbɛka Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛgye nnipa nkwa, ahyɛ wɔn anuonyam, na wɔagye wɔn nipadua; ahonhommɔne nneyɛe wɔ hɔ a wɔde yɛ anwonwade na wɔka kasa horow Akyɛde ne ofiehwɛ ho nneyɛe...ne nea ɛkeka ho. Nhwehwɛmu (1 Korintofoɔ 12:4-11), yei yɛ Kristofoɔ gyidie ne suban. Enti, so wote ase?

3. Gyidi betumi ayɛ pɛ denam nneyɛe so

Yakobo Ti 2 Nkyekyɛm 22 Yebetumi ahunu sɛ gyidie ne ne nnwuma kɔ, na gyidie nam ne nnwuma so na ɛyɛ pɛ.

bisa: Gyidi ne nnwuma kɔ bom.
anoyie: "Honhom Kronkron adwuma". Suban "Ɛyɛ pɛ →→." lɛtɛ Onyankopɔn, a Honhom Kronkron yɛ no foforo na ɔnam Honhom Kronkron so yɛ adwuma". Suban "Perfect. Enti, wote ase?

(1)Abraham gyidie ne ne suban

Yakobo 2:21-24 So ɛnyɛ yɛn agya Abraham de nnwuma buu no bem bere a ɔde ne ba Isak bɔɔ afɔre wɔ afɔremuka no so no? Yebetumi ahu sɛ gyidi ne ne suban kɔ, na gyidi nya mmamu esiane ne suban nti. Wei maa kyerɛwsɛm a ɛka sɛ, “Abraham gyee Onyankopɔn dii, na wɔbuu no sɛ trenee maa no nso sɛ Onyankopɔn adamfo.” Sɛ yɛhwɛ saa a, nnipa nam nnwuma so na wobu wɔn bem, na ɛnyɛ gyidi nkutoo so.

bisa: Gyidi bɛn na na Abraham wɔ bere a ɔde Isak bɔɔ afɔre no?
anoyie: lɛtɛ Nyankopɔn a ɔnyane awufoɔ na ɔde biribiara yɛ nneɛma→→" gyidie "! Nea Abraham gye dii ne Onyankopɔn a onyan awufo na ɔma nneɛma ba. Ɔno ne yɛn nnipa agya wɔ Awurade anim. Sɛnea wɔakyerɛw sɛ: "Mayɛ wo aman pii agya. ” ( Romafo 4:17 ) .

bisa: Dɛn ne adeyɛ a Abraham yɛe bere a ɔde Isak bɔɔ afɔre no?
anoyie: " lɛtɛ "Onyankopɔn adwuma ne ne nneyɛe," . lɛtɛ "Onyankopɔn asiesie nneyɛe," . lɛtɛ "Abrabɔ a Awurade Honhom kyerɛ no kwan, Abraham de Isak bɔɔ afɔre → Yebetumi ahu sɛ gyidi ne ne suban kɔ, na ɛnam gyidi so nam suban so ma ɛyɛ pɛ. Sɛ yɛhwɛ saa a, nnipa nam suban so bu nnipa bem, ɛnyɛ gyidi nko na ɛnam saa kwan yi so, So wote ase?

Hyɛ nso: Bible kyerɛ sɛ na Abraham yɛ mmerɛw a na osuro owu, nanso Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ ɔmfa Isak mmɔ afɔre dɛn nti na otumi yɛɛ saa? Esiane sɛ na ogye Onyankopɔn di nti, Onyankopɔn buu no bem → Ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔmaa no gyidi, na Onyankopɔn Honhom kyerɛɛ no sɛ ɔmfa Isak mmɔ afɔre wɔ Bepɔw Moria so! Amen. Enti, so wote ase?

(2) Rahab gyidi ne ne nneyɛe

Yakobo Ti 2 Nkyekyɛm 25 So ɛnyɛ saa ara na ɔnam nnwuma so buu aguaman Rahab bem bere a ogyee abɔfo no maa wɔn kwan foforo so fii adi no? (Yakobo 2:25) .

bisa: Rahab gyedie→Dɛn ne gyidie?
anoyie: Gyidi a ɔwɔ sɛ Onyankopɔn betumi agye n’abusua nkwa

bisa: Dɛn ne Rahab suban?
anoyie: ɔno lɛtɛ nyame, Ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom na ɔkyerɛɛ ne suban kwan wɔ ɔbɔfo no a ogyee no mu .

nti" Yakob "Me nuanom Yudafoɔ → Me nuanom, mfasoɔ bɛn na ɛyɛ onipa sɛ ɔka sɛ ɔwɔ gyidie, nanso onni nnwuma biara? So ne gyidie bɛgye no nkwa?"

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Yudani no gyee Onyankopɔn dii nanso wannye Yesu nni, ne suban a ɛne sɛ ogye Onyankopɔn di na odi mmara so no antumi annye no nkwa;

2. 2. Adeyɛ a ɛne sɛ wobegye Yesu adi na wɔadi mmara no so no ntumi nnye no mfi adom mu hwe ase;

3. 3. Sɛ yɛgye Yesu di, Honhom Kronkron ma yɛyɛ no foforɔ, na yɛde yɛn ho to Honhom Kronkron adwuma so nko ara na yɛbɛtumi atena ase.

Saa kwan yi so no, sɛ gyidi biara nni hɔ a ( . Honhom Kronkron Foforo ) suban awu. Enti, so wote ase?

Asɛmpa nkyerɛwee a wɔkyɛ, a Onyankopɔn Honhom na ɛkanyan no Yesu Kristo Adwumayɛfoɔ, Onua Wang, Onuabaa Liu, Onuabaa Zheng, Onua Cen, ne adwumayɛfoɔ foforɔ, boa na wɔbom yɛ adwuma wɔ Yesu Kristo Asɔre no asɛmpa adwuma no mu. Wɔka Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no, asɛmpa a ɛma kwan ma wɔgye nnipa nkwa, hyɛ wɔn anuonyam, na wɔgye wɔn nipadua! Amen

Ɔrekɔwo ɔbabarima, ɛsɛ sɛ wode ma no Wɔtoo din Yesu , efisɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ogye ne nkurɔfo fi wɔn bɔne mu. ” (Mateo 1:18,20-21) .

bisa: Edin Yesu no kyerɛ dɛn?
anoyie: 【 . Yesu 】Edin no kyerɛ sɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ogye ne nkurɔfo fi wɔn bɔne mu. Amen!

Asɛmfua a wɔatwa no tiaa ma Amerika Aman Nkabom → USA . Enti, so wote ase pefee?

2. Yesu din yɛ nwonwa

bisa: Yesu din no yɛ nwonwa dɛn?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

(1)Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ honam --Nkyerɛkyerɛmu (Yohane 1:14) .
(2) Onyankopɔn bɛyɛɛ ɔhonam --Nkyerɛkyerɛmu (Yohane 1:1) .
(3)Honhom no bɛyɛɛ ɔhonam --Nkyerɛkyerɛmu (Yohane 4:24) .

Hyɛ nso : Mfitiaseɛ no na Tao wɔ hɔ, na Tao ka Onyankopɔn ho, na Tao yɛ Onyankopɔn→→". kwan "Ɔhonam a wobɛyɛ no yɛ". nyame "Monyɛ honam, Onyankopɔn yɛ Honhom, ɔbaabun no na Honhom Kronkron na ɛnyinsɛnee →--". honhom "Ɔbɛyɛɛ honam." Yesu 】So edin no yɛ nwonwa? nwanwa! Yiw anaasɛ dabi! →→Efisɛ wɔawo abofra ama yɛn, wɔde ɔbabarima ama yɛn, na aban no bɛda ne mmati so. Wɔfrɛ ne din Anwonwade, Ɔfotufo, Tumfoɔ Nyankopɔn, Daa Agya, Asomdwoe Hene. ( Yesaia 9:6 ) .

[Yesu] din no yɛ nwonwa dɛn? Ne din de Nwanwa, .

1 Ɔkwankyerɛfo: Ɔno na wɔbɔɔ wiase ahorow no--Hwɛ Hebrifo 1 ti 2
2 Ade Nyinaa so Tumfoɔ Nyankopɔn: Ɔno ne Onyankopɔn anuonyam hyerɛn, Onyankopɔn nipasu ho mfonini pɛpɛɛpɛ, na ɔnam ne tumi ahyɛde so gyina nneɛma nyinaa akyi. Bere a ɔtew nnipa ho fii wɔn bɔne mu wiei no, ɔtenaa Anuonyam no nifa wɔ soro. Hwɛ Hebrifo 1:3
3 Daa Agya no: Yesu din no bi ne" agya "→→Deɛ wahunu me no ahunu Agya no; ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na woka sɛ, 'Kyerɛ yɛn Agya no'? Mewɔ Agya no mu, na Agya no wɔ me mu. Monnye nni? Deɛ meka kyerɛ mo no ne." ɛnyɛ nea egyina Nea meka so ne sɛ Agya a ɔte me mu no yɛ n’ankasa ade.
4 Asomdwoe Hene: Yesu ne Ɔhene, Asomdwoe Hene, Amansan Hene, “Ahene mu Hene ne awuranom mu Awurade” – hwɛ Adiyisɛm 19:16 ne Yesaia 9:7
5 Ɔno ne onipa ko a meyɛ --Hwɛ Ti 3, Nkyekyɛm 14
6 Ɔno ne Alfa ne Omega --Awurade Nyankopɔn kaa sɛ: "Mene Alfa ne Omega (Alfa, Omega: Hela nkyerɛwde abien a edi kan ne nea etwa to), Ade Nyinaa so Tumfoɔ, a na ɔwɔ hɔ, nea ɔwɔ hɔ, na ɔreba (Adiyisɛm)." Kyerɛwtohɔ 1:8) .
7 Ɔno ne nea odi kan ne nea odi akyiri -- Me ne Alfa ne Omega Mene nea edi kan ne nea otwa to; ” (Adiyisɛm 22:13)→→【 Yesu 】Edin no yɛ nwonwa! Enti, so wote ase pefee?

3. Wɔ Awurade Yesu din mu

(1)Yesu ne Kristo no

Yesu kaa sɛ, “Mose meyɛ hena?”(Mateo 16:15)
Mateo 16:15-16 Yesu bisae se, “Wose mene hena?”
Yohane 11:27 Marta kaa sɛ, “Aane, Awurade, megye di sɛ wone Kristo, Onyankopɔn Ba a ɔbɛba wiase no.”

(2)Yesu ne Mesia no

Yohane 1:41 Odii kan kɔɔ ne nua Simon nkyɛn kɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Yɛahu Mesia no.”
Yoh.

(3) Bɔ mpae: Wɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu

1 Kristo ne yɛn Awurade

1 Korintofoɔ 1:2 Yɛde kɔma Onyankopɔn asafo a ɛwɔ Korinto, wɔn a wɔate wɔn ho na wɔafrɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnyɛ ahotefoɔ wɔ Kristo Yesu mu, ne obiara a ɔbɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din wɔ baabiara. Kristo ne wɔn Awurade ne yɛn Awurade.

2 Awurade Yesu din mu

Kolosefoɔ 3:17 Biribiara a mobɛyɛ, sɛ ɛyɛ asɛm anaa nneyɛeɛ mu no, monyɛ Awurade Yesu din mu , de aseda ma Agya Nyankopɔn nam ne so.

3 Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu

1 Korintofoɔ 6:11 Bere bi na mo mu binom te sɛ yei; wɔ owura yesu kristo din mu , ahohoro, kronkron, buu wɔn bem denam yɛn Nyankopɔn Honhom so.

Wɔka Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no, asɛmpa a ɛma kwan ma wɔgye nnipa nkwa, hyɛ wɔn anuonyam, na wɔgye wɔn nipadua! Amen

articles.title: Hena ne Yesu?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
bisa: Hena ne Yesu?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

(1) Yesu yɛ Ɔsorosoroni Nyankopɔn no Ba

---*Abɔfoɔ di adanseɛ sɛ: Yesu yɛ Onyankopɔn Ba*---
Ɔbɔfo no ka kyerɛɛ no se, "Nsuro, Maria! Woanya Onyankopɔn anim dom. Wobɛfa nyinsɛn na woawo ɔbabarima, na wobɛto no din Yesu. Ɔbɛyɛ kɛse na wɔbɛfrɛ no Ɔba." Ɔsorosoroni no dea; Onyankopɔn de n'agya Dawid ahengua bɛma no, na wadi Yakob fie so hene daa, na n'ahenni rennya awiei." Maria ka kyerɛɛ ɔbɔfo no sɛ, "Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na eyi ato me efisɛ menwaree? " Ɔbuaa sɛ, "Honhom Kronkron bɛba mo so, na Ɔsorosoroni no tumi bɛkata mo so enti wɔbɛfrɛ kronkron a wɔbɛwo no no sɛ Onyankopɔn Ba." Onyankopɔn ba) (Luka 1:30-35).

(2)Yesu ne Mesia no

Yohane 1:41 Odii kan kɔɔ ne nua Simon nkyɛn kɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Yɛahu Mesia no.”
Yohane 4:25 Ɔbaa no kaa sɛ, “Minim sɛ Mesia (a wɔfrɛ no Kristo) no reba, na sɛ ɔba a ɔbɛka ne nyinaa akyerɛ yɛn.”

(3)Yesu ne Kristo no

Bere a Yesu duu Kaesarea Filipi asase so no, obisaa n’asuafo no sɛ, “Hena na wɔka sɛ meyɛ Onipa Ba?” anaasɛ adiyifo no mu biako sɛ: “Mose meyɛ hena.” Wone Kristo, Onyankopɔn teasefo no Ba . ” ( Mateo 16:13-16 ) .

Marta kaa sɛ, "Awurade, yiw, megye di sɛ wone Kristo, Onyankopɔn Ba a ɔbɛba wiase no."

Hyɛ nso: Kristo yɛ " " . obi a wɔasra no "," agyenkwa ", ɛkyerɛ agyenkwa no! Enti, wote ase? → 1 Timoteo Ti 2:4 Ɔpɛ sɛ wɔgye nnipa nyinaa nkwa na wɔhunu nokorɛ no."

(4)Yesu: “Meyɛ nea meyɛ”!

Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: "Mene nea meyɛ";

(5) Yesu kae sɛ: “Mene nea odi kan ne nea odi akyiri.”

Bere a mihuu no no, mehwee ne nan ase te sɛ nea mawu. Ɔde ne nsa nifa too me so kaa sɛ, "Nsuro! Mene deɛ ɔdi kan ne deɛ ɔdi akyire, deɛ ɔte aseɛ. Na mawuo, na hwɛ, mete ase daa daa, na mekura owuo wɔ me nsam." ." ne Hades nsafe (Adiyisɛm 1:17-18).

(6) Yesu kaa sɛ: "Mene Alfa ne Omega".

Awurade Nyankopɔn se: "Mene Alfa ne Omega (Alfa, Omega: Hela nkyerɛwde mu nkyerɛwde abien a edi kan ne nea etwa to), Ade Nyinaa so Tumfoɔ, a na ɔwɔ hɔ, nea ɔwɔ hɔ, na ɔreba (Adiyisɛm 1 Ti 8)."

(7) Yesu kae sɛ: “Mene mfiase na mene awiei” .

Afei ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ, "Wɔawie! Mene Alfa ne Omega, mfitiaseɛ ne awieeɛ. Mede nkwa asubura nsuo bɛma deɛ sukɔm de no kwa sɛ ɔnnom."
"Hwɛ, mereba ntɛm! M'akatua wɔ me nkyɛn, sɛ mede bɛma obiara sɛnea ne nneyɛe te. Mene Alfa ne Omega; Me ne nea odi kan ne nea odi kan; me ne nea odi kan, me ne Awiei no." ( Adiyisɛm 22:12-13 )

Hyɛ nso: Sɛ yɛhwehwɛ atifi hɔ kyerɛwsɛm kyerɛwtohɔ ahorow no mu a, yebetumi ahu: Hena ne Yesu? 》→→ Yesu Onyankopɔn Ba, Ɔsorosoroni, Mesia, Kristo, Ɔhene a Wɔasra no, Ogyefo, Ogyefo, ME NE, Nea Odi Kan, Nea Otwa To, Alfa, Omega , ne mfiase ne awiei.

→→Efi daa, efi wiase mfiase kosi awiei no, [ Yesu ]! Amen. Sɛnea Bible ka no: “Awurade abɔde mfiase, mfiase, ansa na ɔrebɔ nneɛma nyinaa no, na mewɔ hɔ.
Efi daa, efi mfiase, ansa na wiase no reba no, wɔde me asi hɔ.
Bun biara nni hɔ, nsu kɛse biara nni hɔ, . Mawo awo .
Ansa na wɔde mmepɔw no ato hɔ, ansa na nkoko no ahyehyɛ, . Mawo awo .
Na AWURADE mmɔ asase ne n’afuo ne n’asase, . Mawo awo .
Ɔde ɔsoro sii hɔ, na na mewɔ hɔ na Ɔyɛɛ kurukuruwa twaa bun no anim ho hyiae.
Wɔ soro no ɔma wim yɛ den, ase hɔ no ɔma nsuten no gyina pintinn, ɔma ɛpo no anohyeto, ɔmma nsu no ntwa n’ahyɛde, na ɔde asase fapem si hɔ.
Saa bere no, na me ( Yesu ) wɔ ne mu ( ɔsoro agya ) faako a na ɔyɛ ɔdansifo a ne ho akokwaw, na ɔdɔ no da biara da, na n’ani gye bere nyinaa wɔ n’anim, na odi ahurusi wɔ beae a osiesiee sɛ nnipa bɛtra mu no, na odi ahurusi wɔ ne mu. te ase wiase no mu.
Afei, me mma, muntie me, na nhyira ne deɛ ɔdi m’akwan so. Amen! Nkyekyɛm (Mmebusɛm 8:22-32), wote ase pefee?

(8) Yesu yɛ ahene mu Hene ne awuranom mu Awurade

Mehwɛɛ na mehunuu sɛ ɔsoro abue. Na ɔpɔnkɔ fitaa bi wɔ hɔ, na na wɔfrɛ nea ɔte ne so no Ɔnokwafo ne Nokwarefo a obu atɛn na ɔko wɔ trenee mu. N’ani te sɛ ogyaframa, na abotiri bebree wɔ ne tiri so na wɔatwerɛ din bi a obiara nnim gye ɔno ara. Na ɔhyɛ mogya; Asraafo a wɔwɔ soro nyinaa di n’akyi, wɔtete apɔnkɔ fitaa so na wɔhyɛ nwera pa a ɛyɛ fitaa na ɛho tew. ...na wɔakyerɛw din wɔ n'atade ne n'asen so sɛ: " Ahene mu hene, awuranom mu Awurade . ” (Adiyisɛm 19:11-14, nkyekyem 16)

articles.title: Honhom Kronkron na ɛnyinsɛn Yesu na ɔbaabun woo no
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
(1) Nkɔmhyɛ a ɛfa ɔbaabun nyinsɛn ne awo ho

Ɛnna AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Ahas sɛ: “Mmisa sɛnkyerɛnne firi AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn hɔ, wɔ bun mu anaa sorɔnsorɔmmea so.” Yesaia kaa sɛ, "O Dawid fie, montie! Ɛnyɛ ade ketewaa bi sɛ mowoo nnipa, na mmom mobɛwo me Nyankopɔn? Ɛno nti Awurade ankasa bɛma mo sɛnkyerɛnne: ɔbaabun bɛnyinsɛn na wawo ɔbabarima ama no." no." Wɔtoo no din Immanuel (kyerɛ sɛ, . Onyankopɔn ka yɛn ho) (Yesaia 7:10-14).

bisa: Dɛn ne nsɛnkyerɛnne?
anoyie: " mega "Ɛyɛ agyiraehyɛde. Ɛyɛ biribi a wudi kan nim ansa na asi;" tire "Ɛkyerɛ mfiase." Omen 】Ɛyɛ sɛ wobɛhunu nneɛma mfitiaseɛ ne deɛ ɛbɛsi daakye ansa na asi.

bisa: Dɛn ne ɔbaabun?
anoyie: Nea edi kan no, yɛkyekyɛ ɔkwan a ɔbea fa so fi awo mu kosi onyin kosi ne nkwakoraabere→→

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Efi abeawa a wɔawo no foforo so kosi mfe ason so abɔfra , mmofraberem fã;
2. 2. Efi mfe awotwe kosi ansa na ɔbarima ne ɔbea nna ho akɔnnɔ aba mmarima ne mmea ntam no, wɔfrɛ no " nkaa nsuo “Ahotew ho asɛnka agua;
3. 3. Sɛ ɔbaa kɔ brayɛ mu a, ne nipadua nya mmarima ne mmaa nna ho akɔnnɔ, a wɔfrɛ no " abaayewa "Huaichun asɛnka agua so;
4. 4. Sɛ ɔbaa ware ɔbarima na ɔwo mma a, wɔfrɛ no " "." ɔbaa "prama;
5. 5. Sɛ ɔbaa gyae brayɛ kɔsi sɛ ɔbɛbɔ akwakoraa a, wɔfrɛ no " ". ɔbaa panyin "prama.
nti" nkaa nsuo "Ɛne sɛ, wɔfrɛ abeawa "efi mfe awotwe kosi ansa na ɔrekɔ brayɛ ne nna ho akɔnnɔ a ɛda mmarima ne mmea ntam." nkaa nsuo "Ɔbaabun a ne ho tew! Wote ase pefee?

(2) Abɔfo dii adanse sɛ ɔbaabun no nam Honhom Kronkron so nyinsɛn

bisa: Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na ɔbaabun atumi anyinsɛn a onni brayɛ, aware, anaa nkabom?

anoyie: Ɔbaabun Maria nam Honhom Kronkron so nyinsɛnee, efisɛ nyinsɛn a ɛwɔ ne mu no fi Honhom Kronkron → Yesu Kristo awo no ho kyerɛwtohɔ wɔ ase ha: Wɔde ne maame Maria hyɛɛ Yosef ayeforo, nanso ansa na wɔreware no, Maria nyinsɛnee denam Kronkron no so Honhom. . ...Bere a ɔredwennwen yei ho no, Awurade bɔfoɔ yii ne ho adi kyerɛɛ no wɔ daeɛ mu na ɔkaa sɛ, "Yosef, Dawid ba, nsuro! Fa Maria sɛ wo yere, ɛfiri sɛ deɛ wɔanyinsɛn wɔ ne mu no firi." Honhom Kronkron no." (Mateo 1:18,20)

bisa: Ɔbaabun no nam Honhom Kronkron so nyinsɛnee.
anoyie: Ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn Ba, Ɔsorosoroni → Maria ka kyerɛɛ ɔbɔfoɔ no sɛ, “Minwaree, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na yei atumi aba?” kata mo so, na wɔbɛwo Ɔkronkronni no sɛ Onyankopɔn Ba (Luka 1:34-35).

(3) Nea ɛbɛyɛ na odiyifo no nsɛm no abam no, ɔbaabun benyinsɛn na wawo ɔbabarima

Ɔbɛwo ɔbabarima, na woto ne din Yesu, ɛfiri sɛ ɔbɛgye ne nkurɔfoɔ afiri wɔn bɔne mu. Eyinom nyinaa sii de maa nea Awurade nam odiyifo no so kae no baa mu, na ɔkae sɛ, “Hwɛ, ɔbaabun benyinsɛn na wawo ɔbabarima; ” (Emmanuel kyerɛ ase sɛ “Onyankopɔn ka yɛn ho.”) ( Mateo 1:21-23 )

bisa: Bobɔ ne din Yesu! Edin Yesu no kyerɛ dɛn?
anoyie: [Yesu] din kyerɛ sɛ obegye ne nkurɔfo afi wɔn bɔne mu. Enti, so wote ase?

bisa: Immanuel kyerɛ dɛn?
anoyie: Immanuel kyerɛ ase sɛ "Onyankopɔn ka yɛn ho"!

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na Onyankopɔn ka yɛn ho?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

(1)Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔwo wo foforo

1 Nsu ne Honhom na wɔwoo wɔn --Hwɛ Yohane 3 nkyekyem 5-7
[Honhom Kronkron] Ka yɛn ho daa→→Mɛsrɛ Agya no, na Agya no bɛma mo Ɔwerɛkyekyefo foforo (anaa Nkyerɛase: Ɔwerɛkyekyefo; saa ara wɔ ase hɔ), na ɔne mo atena daa, nokware Honhom Kronkron mpo , Eyi yɛ biribi a wiase no ntumi nnye ntom efisɛ enhu No na ennim No. Nanso monim no, ɛfiri sɛ ɔne mo tena na ɔbɛtena mo mu. ( Yohane 14:16-17 ) .

2 Wɔwoo wɔn firii asɛmpa no mu nokware no mu --Hwɛ 1 Korintofoɔ 4:15 ne Yakobo 1:18

3 Onyankopɔn na ɔwoo no --Hwɛ Yohane 1:12-13

(2) Di na nom Awurade nipadua ne ne mogya

Obiara a ɔdi me honam na ɔnom me mogya no wɔ daa nkwa, na mɛnyane no da a ɛdi akyire no. Me honam yɛ aduan ampa, na me mogya yɛ anonne. Nea odi me honam na ɔnom me mogya no te me mu, na me nso mete ne mu. ( Yohane 6:54-56 ) .

(3)Yɛyɛ Kristo nipadua

1 Korintofoɔ 12:27 Moyɛ Kristo nipadua, na mo mu biara yɛ akwaa.
Efesofoɔ 5:30 Na yɛyɛ ne nipadua akwaa (kyerɛwsɛm bi de ka ho sɛ: ne nnompe ne ne honam).

Hyɛ nso: " Immanuel na ɔkyerɛwee "."Onyankopɔn ka yɛn ho"→→efisɛ Onyankopɔn awo yɛn". Ɔba foforo". Ɛyɛ Awurade nipadua ne ne nkwa, ne nnompe ne ne honam, ne Kristo nipadua akwaa, enti “ . Immanuel Onyankopɔn ka yɛn ho daa "Enti, wote ase?
→→ Honhom Kronkron Montena Kristo nipadua no mu, a eye asɔredan no mu. asɔre "Sɛ wɔboaboa wɔn ano a, ɛhɔ na mewɔ wɔn mfinimfini (Mateo 18:20)

(Nnɛyi, agyidifo pii a wɔnte awo foforo ase gye di sɛ sɛ mayɛ bɔne a, Onyankopɔn ne me ntam kwan ware; sɛ menyɛɛ bɔne a, Onyankopɔn ka me ho, enti wɔtaa bɔ Onyankopɔn mpae". Bra "Ka me ho" → Wɔte ase sɛ "Onyankopɔn ka yɛn ho" kyerɛ → sɛ nnipa bom bere a wɔabom anaa wɔreboaboa wɔn ho ano Sɛ nnipa kɔ a, wonni hɔ bio, te sɛ okunu yere a wakɔ akyi natal home, okunu ne ɔyere nni hɔ bio, nnipa binom gye di sɛ Onyankopɔn boro bere ne ahunmu so, sɛ Onyankopɔn ka asɔre no ho bere a aman a ɛwɔ wiase nyinaa ahyiam no, na Onyankopɔn fi hɔ bere a asɔre no ahyiam akyi →→Wɔnte saa nkurɔfo yi adwene ase yiye. Immanuel na ɔkyerɛwee ” Onyankopɔn anim.

Na yɛn Nyankopɔn yɛ kɛseɛ sene wiase → 1 Yohane 4:4 Mma nkumaa, mofiri Onyankopɔn, na moadi wɔn so nkonim, ɛfiri sɛ deɛ ɔwɔ mo mu no yɛ kɛseɛ sene deɛ ɔwɔ wiase.
Wɔn a Onyankopɔn awo wɔn no te Kristo mu → wɔyɛ ne nipadua nnompe, ne honam, na yɛwɔ Onyankopɔn ahenni mu, enti Onyankopɔn ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Wɔn ani gye " . Immanuel na ɔkyerɛwee "Mente ase, ɛyɛ sɛ mente ase". awo foforo "Mente nea enti a ɛte saa no ase), enti, wote ase pefee?

articles.title: ɔbea aseni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
1: Yesu yɛ ɔbaa no aseni

bisa: So na Yesu yɛ ɔbarima anaa ɔbea aseni?

Mmuae: Yesu ne ɔbea no aseni

(1) Ɔbaabun bi a Honhom Kronkron nyinsɛn no na ɛwoo Yesu

Wɔakyerɛw Yesu Kristo awo ho kyerɛwtohɔ sɛnea edidi so yi: Na ne maame Maria ahyɛ Yosef ayeforo, nanso ansa na wɔreware no, Maria nam Honhom Kronkron so nyinsɛnee. ...efisɛ nea wonyinsɛnee wɔ ne mu no fi Honhom Kronkron no mu. (Mateo 1:18,20) .

(2) Ɔbaabun na ɔwoo Yesu

1 Nkɔmhyɛ a Ɛfa Ɔbaabun Awo Ho →→Enti Awurade ankasa bɛma mo sɛnkyerɛnne: Ɔbaabun bɛnyinsɛn na wawo ɔbabarima, na wɔbɛfrɛ no Immanuel (a ɛkyerɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn ka yɛn ho). ( Yesaia 7:14 ) .

2 Ɔbaabun Awo no mmamu →→Bere a ɔredwennwen yei ho no, Awurade bɔfoɔ bi yii ne ho adi kyerɛɛ no wɔ daeɛ mu na ɔkaa sɛ, "Yosef, Dawid ba, nsuro! Fa Maria sɛ wo yere, ɛfiri sɛ deɛ wɔanyinsɛn wɔ ne mu no firi hɔ." Honhom Kronkron." Bra. Ɔrekɔwo ɔbabarima. Ɛsɛ sɛ woto no din. Ne din de Yesu, efisɛ obegye ne nkurɔfo afi wɔn bɔne mu.” .” Manuel" (wɔakyerɛ ase sɛ "Emmanuel") Onyankopɔn ka yɛn ho.") (Mateo 1:20-23)

(3) Ɔbaabun bi na ɔnam Honhom Kronkron so nyinsɛn Yesu

bisa: So Agya no na ɔwoo Yesu?
anoyie: So Onyankopɔn yɛ Agya Honhom? Aane! →→Onyankopɔn yɛ honhom (anaasɛ onni asɛm biara), enti ɛsɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔsom no no som no wɔ honhom ne nokware mu. (Yohane 4:24), so Agya no Honhom ne Honhom Kronkron? Aane! So Yesu Honhom no yɛ Honhom Kronkron? Aane! So Agya Honhom, Ɔba Honhom ne Honhom Kronkron yɛ biako? So efi honhom biako mu? Aane. Enti, biribiara a Honhom Kronkron awo no na Honhom awo no, Agya no awo no na Onyankopon awo no. Enti, so wote ase? →Ɛfa ne Ba Yesu Kristo yɛn Awurade a wɔwoo no firii Dawid asefoɔ mu honam fam, na ɔnam awufoɔ mu sɔreɛ so kaa no sɛ ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn Ba wɔ kronkronyɛ honhom mu. ( Romafo 1:3-4 ) .

2: Yɛgye di sɛ Yesu nso yɛ ɔbaa no aseni

bisa: Hena asefo na yɛn awofo awo yɛn wɔ honam fam?
anoyie: Wɔyɛ mmarima asefoɔ→Biribiara a wɔwo no firi ɔbarima ne ɔbaa nkabom mu no yɛ ɔbarima asefoɔ. Sɛ nhwɛso no, Adam ne ne yere (Hawa) dae bio, na ɔwoo ɔbabarima na ɔtoo no din Set, a ɛkyerɛ sɛ: "Onyankopɔn ama me ɔbabarima foforo asi Habel ananmu, efisɛ Kain kum no nso." awo ɔbabarima Ɔwoo ɔbabarima na ɔtoo no din Enos. Saa bere no, nkurɔfo bɔ Awurade din. ( Genesis 4:25-26 ) .

bisa: Hena aseni na yegye Yesu di?
anoyie: yɛ mmea asefo ! Adɛn? →→Yesu yɛ ɔbaa aseni? Aane! Afei henanom na wɔwo yɛn firii hɔ berɛ a yɛgye Yesu Kristo di?

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa wɔde nsu ne honhom awo wɔn , .

2. 2. wɔde asɛmpa no nokware awo wɔn , .

3. 3. wɔwoo no fi onyame

→→Wɔwoo yɛn wɔ Yesu Kristo mu a asɛmpa no mu nokorɛ na ɛwɔ hɔ, ɛnam sɛ Yesu yɛ ɔbaa asefoɔ nti, wɔwoo yɛn wɔ Yesu Kristo mu→Enti yɛyɛ ɔbaa asefoɔ nso, ɛfiri sɛ ɔkra ne nipadua a wɔsan wo no no nam Awurade, na yɛyɛ Ne nipadua akwaa ne ne nkwa → sɛnea Awurade Yesu kae no: ""Obiara a odi me honam na ɔnom me mogya no wɔ daa nkwa (kyerɛ sɛ, nea ɔwɔ Yesu nkwa no wɔ daa nkwa), na mɛnyane no da a ɛdi akyire no. ( Yohane 6:54 ) So wote eyi ase?

articles.title: Nnipa asefo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Nnipa asefo

bisa: Hena asefo na wɔwoo yɛn fi yɛn awofo hɔ honam fam?
anoyie: Nnipa asefo , .

Mmofra a wɔwoo wɔn nyinaa fi ɔbarima ne ɔbea nkabom mu yɛ ɔbarima asefo, te sɛ mmofra a "nana a odi kan" Adam ne ne yere Hawa woo wɔn → Da bi, ɔbarima "Adam" ne ne yere Hawa dae , na Hawa nyinsɛnee woo Kain (a ɛkyerɛ sɛ wobenya), na ɔkae sɛ: AWURADE ama me ɔbarima. Ná Habel yɛ oguanhwɛfo; ( Genesis 4:1-2 ) .
Adam ne ne yere dae bio, na ɔwoo ɔbabarima, na ɔtoo no din Set, a ɛkyerɛ sɛ, “Onyankopɔn ama me ɔbabarima foforo asi Habel ananmu, efisɛ Kain nso woo ɔbabarima.” na ɔtoo no din Enos. Saa bere no, nkurɔfo bɔ Awurade din. ( Genesis 4:25-26 ) .

bisa: "Adesamma nana a odi kan". Adam "Ɛhe na efi bae?"
anoyie: Efi mfutuma mu ba !

(1) Yehowa Nyankopɔn de mfutuma bɔɔ onipa

AWURADE Nyankopɔn de asase so dɔte kyekyeree onipa na ɔhome nkwa home guu ne hwene mu, na ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔkra teasefoɔ, na ne din de Adam. ( Genesis 2:7 ) .

(2) Adam yɛ awosu

Bible no kyerɛw eyi nso sɛ: "Onipa a odi kan, Adam, bɛyɛɛ ɔteasefo a ɔwɔ honhom (honhom: anaasɛ wɔkyerɛɛ ase sɛ honam)"; ( 1 Korintofo 15:45 )

(3) Nea wɔde dɔte awo no no bɛsan akɔ dɔte mu

bisa: Dɛn nti na nnipa kowie asase so?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

1 Efisɛ nnipa buu mmara so na wɔyɛɛ bɔne na wodii papa ne bɔne ho nimdeɛ dua no aba.

Awurade Nyankopɔn de onipa no too Eden Turo no mu sɛ ɔnyɛ ho adwuma na ɔnhwɛ so. Awurade Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ no sɛ, "Mubetumi adi turo no mu dua biara aba kwa, nanso nnni papa ne bɔne ho nimdeɛ dua no bi, efisɛ da a wubedi bi no, wubewu!" 2:15) -17 nhama) .

2 Apam bi a wobu so na wɔyɛ bɔne, mmara nnome a wonya

Na ɔka kyerɛɛ Adam sɛ: “Esiane sɛ wutie wo yere na wudii dua a mehyɛɛ wo sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ wudi no bi nti, wo nti wɔadome asase no; ." ɛwɔ sɛ Nsɔe ne nsɔe befifi ama wo, wubedi nhabannuru, w’anim fifiri mu na wubedi w’aduan kosi sɛ wobɛsan akɔ mfutuma mu, na mfutuma mu na wowoo wo, na wubesan akɔ mfutuma mu ” ( Genesis 3:17-19 ) .

(4)Obiara yɛ onipa a owu

Sɛnea nkrabea kyerɛ no, wɔahyɛ obiara sɛ obewu pɛnkoro, na owu akyi no atemmu bɛba. ( Hebrifo 9:27 ) .

(5) Owu akyi atemmu bɛba

Hyɛ nso: Onipa asefo mmabarima ne mmabea nyinaa ayɛ bɔne, wɔadi Onyankopɔn anuonyam, na wɔahyɛ mmara nnome ase → Wɔahyɛ sɛ nnipa nyinaa wuwu prɛko, na wobewuwu, na owu akyi no atemmu bɛba, na wɔbɛtwe wɔn aso sɛdeɛ wɔayɛ wɔ mmara ase no teɛ Atemmuo→→yɛ ɔsɛeɛ a ɛtɔ so mmienu--hwɛ Adiyisɛm 20:13-15

Na mihuu awufo akɛse ne nketewa sɛ wogyinagyina ahengua no anim. Wobuee nhoma ahorow no, na wobuee nhoma foforo a ɛyɛ nkwa nhoma no. Wɔbuu awufoɔ atɛn sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ wɔ nwoma yi mu ne wɔn nnwuma teɛ. Enti ɛpo no gyaee awufoɔ a wɔwɔ wɔn mu, na owuo ne Hades gyaee awufoɔ a wɔwɔ wɔn mu, na wɔbuu wɔn mu biara atɛn sɛdeɛ wɔn nnwuma teɛ. Wɔtow Owu ne Hades nso guu ogya tare no mu; Sɛ wɔankyerɛw obi din wɔ nkwa nwoma no mu a, wɔbɛtow no agu ogya tare no mu. Hwɛ Adiyisɛm Ti 20

(6)Yesu kae sɛ! ɛsɛ sɛ wɔwo wo foforo

bisa: Dɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔsan wo yɛn bio?
anoyie: Gye sɛ wɔanwo onipa foforɔ a, ɔrentumi nhunu Onyankopɔn ahennie, na ɔrentumi nkɔ Onyankopɔn ahennie mu nso. Sɛ wɔanwo obi bio a, ɔbɛhunu da a ɛdi akyire no atemmuo → wɔatow no agu ogya tare no mu, a ɛyɛ owuo a ɛtɔ so mmienu (kyerɛ sɛ, ɔkra wuo). Enti, so wote ase?

Enti, Yesu buaa sɛ, “Nokware, nokware, mise mo sɛ, sɛ wɔanwo onipa foforo a, ɔrentumi nhu Onyankopɔn ahenni.”...Yesu kaa sɛ, “Nokware, nokware, mise mo sɛ, gye sɛ wɔanwo onipa nsuo ne Honhom mu Sɛ wɔde honam awo wo a, worentumi nkɔ Onyankopɔn ahennie mu.

articles.title: Mfomso a Ɛwɔ Ɛnnɛ Asɔre Nkyerɛkyerɛ Mu (Ɔkasa 2)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa! Amen

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nhwɛ 1 Timoteo ti 3 nkyekyem 15 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Sɛ metena hɔ kyɛ a, ebia wubesua sɛnea wobɛbɔ wo bra wɔ Onyankopɔn fie. Eyi ne Onyankopɔn teasefo no asafo, nokware odum ne ne fapem .

Ɛnnɛ yɛkɔ so hwehwɛ, yɛ fekubɔ, na yɛkyɛ ". Mfomso a Ɛwɔ Asɔre Nkyerɛkyerɛ Mu Ɛnnɛ "(Daabi. 2. 2. ) Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: "Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa"! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa". asɔre "Momfa nokware asɛm a wɔatwerɛ wɔ wɔn nsam na wɔaka no soma adwumayɛfoɔ, ɛno ne yɛn nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa ne ɔsoro ahennie mu hyɛn mu asɛmpa! Awurade Yesu nkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn kra ani na ɔmmue yɛn adwene." sɛ yɛbɛte Bible ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte, Hwɛ honhom mu nokware→ Kyerɛ yɛn sɛnea yebehu wɔn a wɔka Onyankopɔn abusua, Onyankopɔn teasefo asafo no ho . Amen!

Mpaebɔ, adesrɛ, ntamgyinafo, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

1. Ofie Asɔre

bisa: Dɛn ne abusua?
anoyie: Abusua kyerɛ asetra mu asetra kuw a egyina aware, mogya mu abusuabɔ anaa mmofra a wɔfa wɔn sɛ wɔn mma abusuabɔ so na ɛhyehyɛ, a nkate yɛ abusuabɔ ne abusuafo abusuabɔ.

bisa: Dɛn ne asɔre?
anoyie: Asɔre no yɛ Kristo nipadua, na Kristofo yɛ Kristo mufo. Kyerɛwtohɔ Efesofo

bisa: Dɛn na abusua fa ho?
anoyie: Abusua fa asetena → asetena mu ahiadeɛ titire wɔ asase so, ne sɛdeɛ wɔbɛtu mmirika wɔ asetena mu.

bisa: Dɛn na asɔre no fa ho?
anoyie: Asɔre no fa nkwa ho →Wɔsan wo nkwa, ɔsoro” Ntoma "Monhyɛ nwera pa, monhyɛ Kristo," Aduane "Nom honhom mu nsu, di honhom mu aduan," te ase "Montena Kristo mu," YOO "Honhom Kronkron yɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn mu na ɔyɛ n'adwuma de kyekye Kristo nipadua. Amen."

1 Timoteo 3:15 Na sɛ metwe wo kyɛ a, wobɛtumi asua sɛdeɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wobɔ wo bra wɔ Onyankopɔn fie. Saa fie yi ne Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ asɔre, nokorɛ odum ne ne fapem.

bisa: Dɛn ne Onyankopɔn Teasefo Asɔre?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

1 Asɔre a ɛwɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo mu → Paulo, Silas, ne Timoteo kyerɛw krataa kɔmaa asafo a ɛwɔ Onyankopɔn yɛn Agya ne Awurade Yesu Kristo mu wɔ Tesalonika. Nkyekyɛm (2 Tesalonikafo Ti 1:1) .
2 Asɔre a ɛwɔ fie →Asɔre a ɛwɔ Priskila ne Akwila fie Nkyerɛkyerɛmu (Romafo 16:3-5) .
3 Asɔre a ɛwɔ fie →Yɛkyea anuanom ne Nimphas a wɔwɔ Laodikea, ne asɔre a ɛwɔ ne fie no. Nkyekyɛm ( Kolosefo 4:15 ) .
4 W’asɔre →Na yɛn nuabea Afia, ne yɛn yɔnko ɔsraani Arkipo, ne asafo a ɛwɔ wo fie no. Nkyekyɛm (Filemon 1:2) .

bisa: Bible kyerɛw Onyankopɔn teasefo no asɔre→→ 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Asɔre a ɛwɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo mu, . 2. 2. asɔre a ɛwɔ fie, . 3. 3. asɔre a ɛwɔ fie, . 4. 4. Wo fie asɔre.

Nsonsonoe bɛn na ɛda saa asɔre ahorow yi ne (fie) asɔre ahorow ntam?
Mmuae: Daa Nyankopɔn Asɔre Aane Ka asetra ho asɛm →Momma nnipa nnya nkwa, wonnya nkwa, na wonnya daa nkwa! ;

ne( abusua )Aane Ka asetra ho asɛm →" ofie asɔredan ”→Ɛkyerɛ sɛ yɛbɛka asetena kwan ho asɛm, te sɛ gyidie ne asetena→ Frɛ nkurɔfo ma wonnye Kristo nni Sɛnea wobɛtra ase no kyerɛ sɛ wubedidi yiye, atra ase yiye, na ɛyɛ asetra ho adanse, na ɛnyɛ asetra ho adanse.
