articles.title: Nsɛmmisa ne Mmuae: Sɛ yɛka sɛ yɛnni fɔ a
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
[Twerɛsɛm] 1 Yohane (Ti 1:8) Sɛ yɛka sɛ bɔne nni yɛn mu a, yɛdaadaa yɛn ho, na nokware no nni yɛn mu.

Nnianim asɛm: Saa nkyekyem abiɛsa yi a ɛwɔ 1 Yohane 1:8, 9, ne 10 no ne nkyekyem ahorow a akyinnyegye wom sen biara wɔ asɔre no mu nnɛ.

bisa: Dɛn nti na ɛyɛ nkyekyem a akyinnyegye wom?
anoyie: 1 Yohane (Ti 1:8) Sɛ yɛka sɛ yenni bɔne a, yɛdaadaa yɛn ho na nokware no nni yɛn mu.
na 1 Yohane (5:18) Yenim sɛ obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no nyɛ bɔne da...! Yohane 3:9 nso wɔ hɔ a “Monnyɛ bɔne” ne “Monnyɛ bɔne” → Sɛ yegyina nsɛmfua (a ɛbɔ abira) so bu atɛn → “ . Wɔaka dedaw "Sɛ yɛka sɛ bɔne nni yɛn mu a, yɛdaadaa yɛn ho, na nokware no nni yɛn mu;" Ka ho asɛm akyiri yi "Yɛnim sɛ obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no nyɛ bɔne da; saa ara nso na ɔnyɛ bɔne na ɔrentumi nyɛ bɔne→." Ka sɛ "nsɛmmɔnedi biara nni hɔ" mprɛnsa a ɛtoatoa so ! Ɛnne no yɛ nea ɛkyerɛ sɛ ɛyɛ nokware yiye. Enti, yɛrentumi nnyina nsɛm no nkutoo so nkyerɛ Bible no ase, ɛsɛ sɛ yɛte Onyankopɔn apɛde ase, efisɛ Onyankopɔn nsɛm yɛ honhom ne nkwa! Ɛnyɛ nsɛmfua. Ka honhom mu nsɛm kyerɛ honhom mu nnipa, nanso honam famfo rentumi nte ase.

bisa: Wɔka wɔ ha sɛ "yɛn" yɛ bɔne, nanso "yɛn" renyɛ bɔne.
1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa →" yɛn "Odi fɔ? Anaasɛ wonni fɔ?;
2. 2. →" yɛn "Wobɛyɛ nsɛmmɔnedi? Anaasɛ worenyɛ bɔne?"
anoyie: Yɛhyɛ aseɛ firi【 . awo foforo 】Nnipa foforo ne nnipa dedaw kasa!

1. Yesu a Agya Nyankopɔn woo no no, na bɔne nni ne ho

bisa: Henanom mu na wɔwoo Yesu?
anoyie: Agya Onyankopɔn a ɔwoo no ; Onyankopɔn Ba no) (Luka 1:35).

bisa: So na Yesu wɔ bɔne?
anoyie: Awurade Yesu nni bɔne →Monim sɛ Awurade yii ne ho adi sɛ ɔrebɛyi nnipa bɔne afiri ne mu, ɛfiri sɛ bɔne biara nni ne mu. (1 Yohane 3:5) ne 2 Korintofo 5:21.

2. Yɛn a Onyankopɔn awo yɛn (onipa foforo no) nso nni bɔne

bisa: yɛn lɛtɛ Bere a osuaa Yesu ho ade na wate nokware no ase akyi → Hena na wɔwoo no fii mu?
anoyie:
1 Nsu ne Honhom na wɔwoo wɔn --Yohane 3:5
2 Wɔwoo no wɔ asɛmpa no mu nokware no mu --1 Korintofoɔ 4:15
3 Onyankopɔn na ɔwoo no → Nnipa dodoɔ a wɔgyee no no, Ɔmaa hokwan sɛ wɔbɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma, wɔn a wɔgye Ne din di. Eyinom ne wɔn a wɔmfa mogya nwo wɔn, ɛnyɛ akɔnnɔ anaa onipa apɛde, na mmom Onyankopɔn awo wɔn. Nkyekyɛm (Yohane 1:12-13) .

bisa: So bɔne bi wɔ Onyankopɔn awo no mu?
anoyie: onni fɔ ! Obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no renyɛ bɔne → Yenim sɛ obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no renyɛ bɔne biara (tete nhoma mmobɔwee wɔ hɔ: Nea Onyankopɔn woo no no bɛbɔ ne ho ban), na ɔbɔnefo rentumi Mpira no. Nkyekyɛm (1 Yohane 5:18) .

3. Yɛn a wɔde mogya awo yɛn ( akwakoraa )fɔ

bisa: So yɛn a yefi Adam mu na awofo awo yɛn no di fɔ?
anoyie: fɔ .
bisa: Adɛn?
anoyie: Eyi te sɛ bɔne a efi ( Adam ) Onipa baako baa wiase, na owuo nam bɔne so baeɛ, na owuo baa obiara so ɛfiri sɛ wɔn nyinaa ayɛ bɔne. ( Romafo 5:12 ) .

4. “Yɛn” ne “Mo” wɔ 1 Yohane

1 Yohane 1:8 Sɛ yɛka sɛ yenni bɔne a, yɛdaadaa yɛn ho, na nokware no nni yɛn mu.

bisa: Hena na "yɛn" kyerɛ wɔ ha?
anoyie: Daabi" lɛtɛ "Yesu, a nnipa a wɔnte nokware kwan no ase na wɔanwo wɔn foforo na wɔkae! Sɛ nhwɛso no, sɛ yɛka asɛmpa no kyerɛ abusua mufo, abusuafo, nnamfo, mfɛfo sukuufo, ne mfɛfo adwumayɛfo → yɛde " bedi dwuma." yɛn "Wo ne wɔn nnya abusuabɔ a emu yɛ den," ɔkae yɛn "→ Sɛ woka sɛ wo nni fɔ a, na woredaadaa wo ho! Woremfa asodi nsɛm nni dwuma." wo ".".

Wɔ 1 Yohane mu no, "Yohane" rekasa akyerɛ ne nuanom Yudafo, Yudafo ( lɛtɛ ) Onyankopɔn → Nanso ( . Nnye nni )Yesu, onni". ntamgyinafo "Wɔnntumi mfa agyidifo ne wɔn a wonnye nni nkyekyere wɔn kɔndua pɛpɛɛpɛ." Yohane "Wo ntumi ne wɔn nnya fekubɔ efisɛ wonnim wo." nokware hann “Yesu, anifuraefo na wɔnantew sum mu.

Momma yɛnhwehwɛ mu nkɔ akyiri [1 Yohane 1:1-8]:

(1)Asetra kwan

Nkyekyɛm 1: Ɛfa mfitiaseɛ nkwa asɛm a ɛfiri mfitiaseɛ no ho, a yɛate, yɛahunu, yɛde yɛn ani ahunu, na yɛde yɛn nsa aka.
Nkyekyɛm 2: (Wɔayi nkwa yi adi, na yɛahu, na afei yɛredi adanse sɛ yɛde daa nkwa a na ɛwɔ Agya no nkyɛn na ɔne yɛn yii ne ho adi no ma mo.)
Nkyekyɛm 3: Yɛka nea yɛahu ne nea yɛate kyerɛ mo, na mo ne yɛn anya fekubɔ. Ɛyɛ yɛne Agya no ne Ne Ba, Yesu Kristo fekubɔ.
Nkyemu 4: Yɛtwerɛ yeinom brɛ mo, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a mo (tete nwoma mmobɔwee wɔ hɔ: yɛn) anigyeɛ bɛdɔɔso.

Hyɛ nso:
Ɔfa 1 → Asetra kwan so, .
Ɔfa 2 → Twam ( Asɛmpa ) daa nkwa ma wo, .
Nkyekyɛm 3 → Na mo ne yɛn bɛnya ayɔnkofa, na mo ne Agya no ne ne Ba Yesu Kristo anya ayɔnkofa.
Ɔfa 4 → Yɛde saa nsɛmfua yi ( Twerɛ ) de kɔma wo, .
(“ yɛn " kyerɛ sɛ lɛtɛ Yesu nkurɔfo;" wo ” kyerɛ nnipa a wonnye Yesu nni) .

(2)Onyankopɔn yɛ hann
Nkyekyɛm 5: Onyankopɔn yɛ hann, na esum biara nni Ne mu koraa. Yei ne nkrasɛm a yɛate afiri Awurade hɔ na yɛde asan aba mo nkyɛn.
Nkyekyɛm 6: Sɛ yɛka sɛ yɛne Onyankopɔn wɔ fekubɔ nanso yɛda so ara nantew sum mu a, na yɛredi atoro na yɛnnantew nokware no mu.
Nkyekyɛm 7: Sɛ yɛnantew hann mu, sɛnea Onyankopɔn te hann mu a, yɛne yɛn ho yɛn ho nya ayɔnkofa, na ne Ba Yesu mogya tew yɛn ho fi bɔne nyinaa ho.
Nkyekyɛm 8: Sɛ yɛka sɛ bɔne nni yɛn mu a, yɛdaadaa yɛn ho, na nokware no nni yɛn mu.

Hyɛ nso:
Nkyekyɛm 5 → Onyankopɔn yɛ hann, " yɛn "Ɛkyerɛ wɔn a wogye Yesu di na wodi hann no akyi, na wonya akatua". wo "Nkrasɛm no kyerɛ sɛ asɛmpa no a wɔka no nnyɛ ( lɛtɛ )Yesu, wanni akyi". Kanea "nnipa,

Ɔfa 6 → " yɛn "Ɛkyerɛ sɛ wobɛgye Yesu adi na woadi n'akyi". Kanea "nnipa," te sɛ ” kyerɛ sɛ ɛyɛ nsusuwii hunu Sɛ yɛka sɛ ɛwɔ Onyankopɔn nkyɛn a ( Kanea ) atwa, nanso ɛda so ara nantew sum mu ( yɛn ne" Kanea "Yɛwɔ fekubɔ nanso yɛda so ara nantew sum mu. So yɛredi atoro? Yɛmfa nokware no nni dwuma bio.)
Esiane sɛ yɛne hann no wɔ fekubɔ nti, ɛrentumi nyɛ yiye sɛ yɛbɛda so ara anantew sum mu a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ yɛne hann no nni fekubɔ → yɛredi atoro na yɛnyɛ nokware no. Enti, so wote ase?

Ɔfa 7 → Yɛn → ( te sɛ ) monnantew hann mu, sɛnea Onyankopɔn wɔ hann mu no, na yɛne yɛn ho yɛn ho nnya ayɔnkofa, na ne Ba Yesu mogya tew yɛn ho fi bɔne nyinaa ho.

Ɔfa 8 → Yɛn → ( te sɛ ) Sɛ yɛka sɛ yenni fɔ a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ yɛredaadaa yɛn ho, na nokware no nni yɛn koma mu.
bisa: ha" yɛn "So ɛkyerɛ ansa na wɔasan awo? Anaasɛ awo foforo akyi?"
anoyie: ha" yɛn " kyerɛ sɛ Wɔkae ansa na wɔrewo no bio
bisa: Adɛn?
anoyie: ɛfiri" yɛn "ne" wo "Ɛne sɛ, wɔn → wonnim Yesu! Dabi ( lɛtɛ )Yesu, ansaana wɔrewo no bio→ na ɔyɛ ɔdebɔneyɛfoɔ panin wɔ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ mu na ɔyɛ ɔdebɔneyɛfoɔ→【 yɛn 】Nnim Yesu, nnyɛ ( lɛtɛ )Yesu, ansa na wɔrewo no foforo → saa bere yi【 yɛn 】Sɛ yɛka sɛ yɛnni fɔ a, na yɛredaadaa yɛn ho, na nokorɛ no nni yɛn akoma mu.

yɛn( lɛtɛ )Yesu, te asɛmpa no mu nokware no ase! ( lɛtɛ )Yesu Kristo, Onyankopɔn Ba no mogya tew yɛn ho fi bɔne nyinaa ho→Wɔawo yɛn foforo” Ɔba foforo "Wo nko ara na wobɛtumi ne Onyankopɔn adi nkitaho, wo ne hann adi nkitaho, na woanantew hann mu, sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ hann mu no. So wote yei ase?

Hymn: Mmeamudua no kwan

Ɛyɛ! Ɛno ne ɛnnɛ de, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Nsɛm nketenkete: Anigye a Wonya wɔ Bɔne Mu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Hebrifoɔ 11:24-25 Gyidie nti, berɛ a Mose nyinii no, wampene sɛ wɔbɛfrɛ no Farao babaa ba. Ɔbɛpɛ sɛ ɔne Onyankopɔn nkurɔfo behu amane sen sɛ obenya bere tiaa mu anigye a bɔne wom.


bisa: Dɛn ne bɔne mu anigye?
anoyie: Wɔ bɔne wiase mu no, bɔne mu anigye a obi benya no, wɔfrɛ no bɔne mu anigye.

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na yebetumi ahu nsonsonoe a ɛda bɔne mu anigye ne anigye a ɛwɔ Onyankopɔn mu anigye mu?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

1. Wɔatɔn honam ama bɔne

Yɛnim sɛ mmara no firi honhom mu, na me deɛ, mefiri honam mu na wɔatɔn me ama bɔne. Nhwehwɛmu (Romafo 7:14) → Sɛ nhwɛso no, na Mose a ɔwɔ Misraim no yɛ Farao mma ba, na Misraim gyina hɔ ma wiase, wiase a bɔne wom no. Bere a Israelni Mose nyinii no, na onim sɛ ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn nkurɔfo a wɔapaw wɔn, nnipa kronkron a wɔapaw wɔn. Ɔpowee sɛ wɔbɛfrɛ no Farao mma ba na wanya Misraim ahonyade mu anigye → a Misraim nimdeɛ, adesua, aduan, anonne ne anigyede nyinaa ka ho. Na ɔbɛpɛ sɛ ɔne Onyankopɔn nkurɔfo behu amane sen sɛ obenya bɔne mu anigye bere tiaa bi Bere a ohuu amanehunu a nnipa no rehyia no, ohuu Kristo animguase → Ɔpowee sɛ ɔbɛyɛ Farao mma no ba na oguan kɔɔ Misraim kɔɔ sare so bere a na wadi mfe 40. Mfeɛ aduanan akyi a ɔde hwɛɛ nguan wɔ Midian no, ne werɛ firii ne nipasu sɛ ɔyɛ Misraim Farao babarima ne ne babaa, na ne werɛ firii nimdeɛ, adesua ne talente a ɔwɔ wɔ Misraim no nyinaa Israelfo no fii Misraim. Sɛnea Awurade Yesu kae sɛ: "Nokware mise mo sɛ, obiara a ɔnte sɛ abofra no rentumi nkɔ Onyankopɔn ahenni mu." abofra yɛ mmerɛwyɛ na ɔmfa ne ho nto wiase nimdeɛ ne nyansa so, na ɔde ne ho to Onyankopɔn nyansa nkutoo so. Enti, so wote ase?
Mose yɛ Farao mma ba, a ɛyɛ honam a wɔtɔn maa bɔne no ho mfonini, ne honam a ɛrenya Misraim hene bɔne no agyapade ne aduan, anonne, agodie, ne anigyede nyinaa mu anigye. Honam fam anigye a ɛwɔ saa anigyede ahorow yi mu → wɔfrɛ no bɔne anigye!
Enti, Mose powee sɛ ɔbɛyɛ Farao mma no ba, na mmom na ɔwɔ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔne nkurɔfo no behu amane wɔ honam mu → efisɛ nea ohuu amane wɔ honam mu no agyae bɔne. Nkyekyɛm (1 Petro Ti 4:1), wote yei ase?

2. Wɔn a Onyankopɔn awo wɔn no mfi ɔhonam mu

Sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom te mo mu a, monyɛ ɔhonam mufo bio na mmom Honhom no mufo. Sɛ obi nni Kristo Honhom a, ɔnyɛ Kristo dea. Nkyekyɛm (Romafo 8:9) .
bisa: Adɛn nti na nneɛma a Onyankopɔn awo no nyɛ honam dea?
anoyie: Onyankopɔn Honhom, Agya Honhom, Kristo Honhom, ne Onyankopɔn Ba Honhom yɛ “honhom biako” na ɛno ne Honhom Kronkron sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom, Honhom Kronkron no te mo koma mu a! → kyerɛ sɛ, Honhom Kronkron no te Kristo mu (yɛyɛ Ne nipadua akwaa), Esiane sɛ moyɛ Kristo nipadua no nti, monyɛ "Adam" honam no mufo no yɛ Honhom Kronkron no dea! Kristo wɔ wo mu, (Adam nipadua no nyɛ yɛn dea) bɔne nti nipadua no awu , nanso honhom (Honhom Kronkron) no nam trenee so te ase. ( Romafo 8:10 ), so wote eyi ase?

3. Bɔne mu anigye ne anigye a ɛwɔ Onyankopɔn mu anigye

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na yebetumi ahu nsonsonoe a ɛda bɔne mu anigye ne anigye a ɛwɔ Onyankopɔn mu anigye mu?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

(1) Bɔne mu anigye

1 Wɔatɔn honam ama bɔne --Hwɛ Romafoɔ 7:14
2 Sɛ́ obi bedwen honam fam nneɛma ho no yɛ owu --Hwɛ Romafoɔ 8:6
3 Aduan yɛ yafunu, na yafunu yɛ aduan, nanso Onyankopɔn bɛma wɔasɛe abien no nyinaa. --Hwɛ 1 Korintofoɔ 6:13

Hyɛ nso: Bere a na yɛwɔ honam mu no, na wɔatɔn yɛn ama bɔne dedaw → Sɛ wudi honam akyi na wunya adwene wɔ honam so a, ɛno ne owu, efisɛ bɔne akatua ne owu. Aduan ne yafunu, na honam yafunu nso yɛ aduan → → Wodwen honam ho, bere nyinaa wudi yiye, nom yiye, di agoru yiye, na nya honam mu anigye → → nya bɔne anigye! Sɛ nhwɛso no, sɛ woyɛ adwumaden de nya sika a, bere nyinaa wudidi yiye ma wo nipadua, wosiesie wo ho yiye ma wo nipadua, na wotɔ villa a wobɛtra mu yiye Sɛ wo nipadua ani gye anigye a ɛte sɛɛ ho a, na worenya bɔne mu anigye . Agodie, abosom drama, agumadi, asaw, akwahosan ho nhyehyɛe, ahoɔfɛ, akwantu... ne nea ɛkeka ho nso wɔ hɔ! Ɛkyerɛ sɛ [tena ase] wɔ Adam mu, wɔ Adam nipadua mu, wɔ Adam [bɔnefo] nipadua mu → nya anigye ne anigye a ɛwɔ [bɔne nipadua] mu. Eyi ne honam akyidi ne honam mu nneɛma ho a wodwen → bɔne mu anigye. Enti, so wote ase?
Onipa foforo a Onyankopɔn awo yɛn no mfi honam mu. Nneɛma a ɛfa nipadua ho → Bere tenten a wowɔ aduan ne ntade no, ɛsɛ sɛ w’ani gye . Nkyekyɛm (1 Timoteo 6:8) .

(2)Nya Nyankopɔn anigye

1 honhom mu ayeyi nnwom --Efesofoɔ 5:19
2. Bɔ mpae mpɛn pii --Luka 18:1
3 Yɛda mo ase mpɛn pii --Efesofoɔ 5:20
Momfa aseda mma Agya Nyankopɔn daa wɔ biribiara ho wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu.
4. Nya ɔpɛ sɛ wode ntoboa bɛma adwumayɛfoɔ de atrɛw asɛmpa no mu na wɔde nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no abrɛ nnipa. --2 Korintofoɔ 8:3
5 Fa ntoboa ne ademude gu soro --Mateo 6:20
6 Adwumayɛfo a wogye fax akwan → “Obiara a ɔbɛma mo akwaaba no ma me akwaaba;
7 Fa w’asɛnnua so na ka ɔsoro ahennie ho asɛmpa no --Marko 8:34-35 na ɛwɔ hɔ. Ɛwom sɛ yehu amane na yehu amane wɔ honam mu esiane Onyankopɔn asɛm nti de, nanso yɛda so ara wɔ anigye kɛse wɔ yɛn akra mu Eyi ne anigye a ɛwɔ Onyankopɔn mu anigye wɔ Kristo mu! Amen. Enti, so wote ase?

Hymn: Wo ne Anuonyam Hene

Ɛyɛ! Ɛno ara ne nea yɛakyɛ nnɛ Ma Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛso nka mo ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Nsɛmmisa ne Mmuae: Nsɛmmɔnedi a Wɔhyɛ da Yɛ (Ɔkasa 2)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Nhwehwɛmu a wɔyɛ no bere ne bere mu, kar akwantu, kyɛ FAQs "Nsɛmmɔnedi a Wɔhyɛ da Yɛ". Daabi. 2. 2. Sɛ yɛrekasa a, Onyankopɔn mma yɛn koma a ɛyɛ komm, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ɛmfa ho nea yehu anaa yɛte no, yɛbɛte w’apɛde ase! Amen

5. Abɔde nyinaa wɔ pɛsɛmenkominya akɔnnɔ

(1) Ɛhe na Adam bɔne no fi bae?

bisa: Adam deɛ". amumuyɔ "Efi he?"
anoyie: Adam ne Hawa

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Ɔhonam mu mmerɛwyɛ ( . ɛfiri ) Mmara no Ahyɛdeɛ → "Nanso nnni papa ne bɔne ho nimdeɛ dua no aba, ɛfiri sɛ da a wobɛdi bi no wobɛwu."
2. 2. →( ɔwɔ ) daadaa ɔbea Hawa, .
3. 3. →Wɔsɔɔ Hawa hwɛe, honam fam". ɛfiri "Mmara( awoɔ )Akɔnnɔ bɔne nso yɛ pɛsɛmenkominya akɔnnɔ, .
4. 4. →Bere a Adam ne Hawa nyinsɛn honam akɔnnɔ no, wɔ " . di "Apae ne bɔne ho nimdeɛ dua no aba, .
5. 5. →Kɛkɛ ( awoɔ ) fi bɔne mu bae, na sɛ bɔne nyin a, .
6. 6. →Eda a mobedi bi no, esi pi se mobewu, na eye bone se wobebu mmara no so - tenenee awo a wu Bra.
nti" wu "firi" amumuyɔ "Bra;" amumuyɔ "Ɛnam honam so ( ɛfiri ) a wɔde mmara awo no. Enti, so wote ase?

(2) "Nsoromma a Ɛhyerɛn, Anɔpa Ba" Nsɛmmɔnedi

bisa: Satan deɛ" amumuyɔ "Efi he?"
anoyie: (ɔwɔ) Satan yɛ nneɛma bɔne →

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa (Hesekiel 28:15) Woyɛ pɛ wɔ w’akwan nyinaa mu fi da a wɔbɔɔ wo no, nanso wohuu nea ɛnteɛ wɔ wo mu → Nea ɛnteɛ nyinaa yɛ bɔne. Nkyekyɛm (1 Yohane 5:17) .
2. 2. ( Hesekiel 28:16 ) Esiane sɛ wodi gua pii nti, basabasayɛ ahyɛ wo ma. Ɔkwan foforo so no, Satan nyinsɛnee bere a na n’ankasa akɔnnɔ ahyɛ no ma no. 】, a ɛde nsɛmmɔnedi ba【 wo bɔne 】, ɛno nti mɛpam wo afiri Onyankopɔn bepɔ no so ɛfiri sɛ woagu kronkronbea hɔ fĩ. Kerubim a wɔkataa apam adaka no so, masɛe mo afiri aboɔden aboɔ a ɛhyerɛn sɛ ogya no mu.

Hyɛ nso: Onyankopɔn nnye abɔfo a wɔyɛɛ bɔne na wɔhwee ase no nkwa, enti yɛrensua anaa yɛrenkyerɛkyerɛ mu wɔ ha. Anuanom mmarima ne mmaa, yɛsrɛ sɛ monhwɛ (Hebrifo 2:16) ne (Adiyisɛm 20:7-10) .

6. Wɔn a wɔhyɛ mmara ase no a wɔbɛgye

(1)Wɔde wɔn ho fi mmara ho

bisa: Dɛn nti na wobɛtwe wo ho afi mmara no ho?
anoyie: Mmara no ne ɛfiri Honam yɛ mmerɛw na entumi nyɛ biribiara →→Sɛ yɛwɔ honam mu a, yɛrentumi nyɛ trenee a mmara hwehwɛ no, na honam nso bɛyɛ ( ɛfiri )Mmara → Akɔnnɔ bɔne awo yɛ akɔnnɔ, akɔnnɔ de bɔne ba bere a wɔanyinsɛn no, na bɔne, sɛ enyin a, ɛde owu ba →→ Enti Onyankopɔn somaa n’ankasa Ba sɛ ɔmmɛyɛ bɔne afɔre, na obuu bɔne fɔ mu honam - a wode nnadewa abɔ asɛnnua no mu Nyankopɔn, nam owuo so gye yɛn firi mmara no mu. Hwɛ Romafo ti 8 nkyekyem 3 ne ti 7 nkyekyem 6

(2) Sɛ wɔde wɔn ho fi mmara no nnome mu

Kristo gyee yɛn fii mmara no nnome mu denam nnome a ɔbɛyɛɛ maa yɛn no so efisɛ wɔatwerɛ sɛ: “Wɔadome obiara a ɔsɛn dua so (Galatifo) (Nwoma 3:13)

(3) Gye wɔn a wɔhyɛ mmara ase no

→→Momma yennya Onyankopɔn bayɛ!

Dane kɔ (Galatifoɔ 4:4-7) na mommom nkenkan sɛ: Nanso berɛ a ɛwie pɛyɛ duruiɛ no, Onyankopɔn somaa ne Ba a ɔbaa woo no, a wɔwoo no wɔ mmara ase, sɛ ɔmmɛgye wɔn a na wɔwɔ mmara no ase, Na yɛatumi nya ɔbayɛ. Esiane sɛ moyɛ mma nti, Onyankopɔn asoma ne Ba no Honhom akɔ mo (mfitiase nkyerɛwee: yɛn) koma mu, asu sɛ, “Abba, Agya, mubetumi ahu sɛ efi seesei rekɔ no, monyɛ akoa bio, na mmom moyɛ ɔba!” na esiane sɛ woyɛ ɔba nti, wode wo ho to Onyankopɔn Adedifo so.

bisa: So ɔbayɛ wɔ mmara no ase?
anoyie: Wɔn a wɔhyɛ mmara ase no yɛ nkoa, bɔne nkoa → Esiane sɛ wɔyɛ “nkoa” nti, wɔnyɛ mma. Sɛnea Awurade Yesu kae no → Akoa ntumi ntra fie daa; Nkyekyɛm (Yohane 8:35), wote ase?

7. Bere a yɛasua nokware no akyi

bisa: Nokware bɛn na yesua?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

(1) Wosuaa ade → Sɛ yɛwɔ honam mu a, ɛno ne sɛ “ . mmara "ne【 awoɔ 】Akɔnnɔ bɔne, kyerɛ sɛ, akɔnnɔ, yɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn akwaa mu. Romafo 7:5 ne Yakobo 1:18) .
(2) Wosuaa ade → Esiane sɛ na mmara no yɛ mmerɛw esiane honam nti na entumi nyɛ biribi nti, Onyankopɔn somaa n’ankasa Ba a ɔte sɛ bɔne honam sɛ ɔmmɛyɛ bɔne afɔre, na obuu bɔne a ɛwɔ honam mu fɔ (Romafo 8:3)
(3) Wosuaa ade →Fi mmara no mu! Nanso ɛfiri sɛ yɛwuwu maa mmara a ɛkyekyere yɛn no, seesei yɛade yɛn ho afiri mmara no ho, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛsom Awurade sɛdeɛ honhom foforɔ (honhom: anaa wɔkyerɛ aseɛ sɛ Honhom Kronkron) na ɛnyɛ sɛdeɛ tete kwan no teɛ amanne kwan so. ( Romafo 7:6 ) .
(4) Wosuaa ade →Wɔguan fii mmara no nnome mu! Kristo gyee yɛn fii mmara no nnome mu denam bɛyɛɛ nnome maa yɛn so;
(5) Wosuaa ade → Wɔwoo Kristo wɔ mmara ase sɛ ɔmmɛgye wɔn a na wɔwɔ mmara ase no ama yɛanya ɔba ! Nkyekyɛm (Galatiafo 4:4-7) .

8. Sɛ wohyɛ da yɛ bɔne a, bɔne ho afɔrebɔ remma bio.

Na sɛ yɛhyɛ da yɛ bɔne bere a yɛanya nokware no ho nimdeɛ akyi a, bɔne ho afɔrebɔ biara nni hɔ bio (Hebrifo 10:26)

bisa: Dɛn ne nsɛmmɔnedi a wɔhyɛ da yɛ?
anoyie: Efisɛ bere a yenya nokware kwan no akyi no, yenim pefee sɛ: 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Sɛ yɛwɔ honam mu a, ɔhonam ( ɛfiri )Mmara→ awoɔ Akɔnnɔ bɔne, akɔnnɔ bɔne na ɛwo bɔne bere a wɔanyinsɛn wɔn, na sɛ bɔne nyin koraa a, ɛwo owu;

2. 2. Esiane sɛ mmara no yɛ mmerɛw esiane honam nti, entumi nyɛ biribi → mmara no trenee betumi ayɛ bɔne nkutoo;

3. 3. Kristo bɛyɛɛ yɛn bɔne afɔrebɔ, wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu na owui;

4. 4. Gye yɛn fi mmara ne ne nnome mu;

5 Sɛ yɛbɛgye wɔn a na wɔwɔ mmara no ase, na wɔama yɛn ayɛ mma→→【 . Sɛ wunnye nni a 】Eyi ne nokware kwan no, . Frɛ

Nsɛmmɔnedi a wɔhyɛ da yɛ.

bisa: Dɛn nti na bere a woasua nokware kwan no akyi no, . Sɛ wunnye nokware no nni a Nsɛmmɔnedi a wɔahyɛ da ayɛ ara kwa?
anoyie: Efisɛ wɔ mmara ase no woyɛ akoa, bɔne akoa, ɔhonam bɛyɛ ɛfiri Mmara no na ɛwoo bɔne. Wopɛ na wohyɛ da wɔ mmara ase → wunim sɛ wubu mmara so, di mmara so, mmara a wobu so no yɛ bɔne → eyi na wɔfrɛ no bɔne a wɔahyɛ da ayɛ . Enti, so wote ase?

bisa: Sɛ wohyɛ da yɛ bɔne a, bɔne ho afɔrebɔ remma bio?
anoyie: Bɔne afɔrebɔ biako pɛ na ɛwɔ hɔ! Mpata a ɛtɔ so mmienu anaa dodoɔ biara nni hɔ.

bisa: Adɛn?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha
1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Kristo nko ara prɛko Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ honam, wɔwoo no wɔ mmara ase--Gal
2. 2. Kristo nko ara prɛko Bɔ bɔne ho afɔre— Hebrifo 10:10-14
3. 3. Ɔwu maa bɔne, nko ara prɛko --Romafoɔ 6:10
4. 4. Kristo nko ara prɛko Mogya a wohwie gui no tew onipa bɔne ho--Hebrifo 9:12-14

Na sɛ yɛnya nokware nimdeɛ wie a, bɔne mpata biara nni hɔ gye yɛn Agyenkwa Kristo; Sɛ wunnye nni a! Bɔne afɔre biara nni hɔ bio .
Sɛ Kristo mpata bɔne mpɛn pii a, anka ɛsɛ sɛ owu mpɛn pii ;
Sɛ Kristo hohoroo bɔne firii hɔ mpɛn pii a, anka ɛsɛ sɛ ɔhwie ne mogya gui mpɛn pii ;
Sɛ ɛte saa a, ɛbɛyɛ sɛ ɔhunuu amane mpɛn pii firi berɛ a wɔbɔɔ wiase - hwɛ Hebrifoɔ 9:25-26.

Nanso Kristo a owu maa bɔne no nkutoo prɛko , gye wo firi mmara ase, fa wo ho firi mmara ho→ Baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ . Sɛ wosan kɔ na wodi mmara no so na wowɔ ɔpɛ sɛ wobɛyɛ akoa wɔ mmara ase a, wobɛyɛ bɔne akoa → Wobɛyɛ sɛ ɔkraman a ɔdan ne ho na ɔwe aduane a ɔtetew, anaa mprako a wɔahohoro no na afei ɔsan hwirew ne ho wɔ atɛkyɛ no mu. nti, Sɛ woannye nokorɛ no nni na woagyaa Agyenkwa Yesu Kristo a, bɔne ho afɔrebɔ remma bio. → Fa ehu twɛn atemmu ne ogya a ɛhyew a ɛbɛhyew atamfo nyinaa (atemmu a etwa to) nkutoo. ( Hebrifo 10:27 ) So wote eyi ase?

Asɛmpa nkyerɛwee a wɔkyɛ, a Onyankopɔn Honhom na ɛkanyan no, Yesu Kristo adwumayɛfoɔ: Onua Wang*yun, Onuabaa Liu, Onuabaa Zheng, Onua Cen - ne adwumayɛfoɔ foforɔ, boa na wɔbom yɛ adwuma wɔ Yesu Kristo Asɔre no asɛmpa adwuma no mu. Wɔka Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no, asɛmpa a ɛma kwan ma wɔgye nnipa nkwa, hyɛ wɔn anuonyam, na wɔgye wɔn nipadua! Amen

Hymn: Megye di! Nanso minni gyidi a ɛdɔɔso, enti mesrɛ Awurade sɛ ɔmmoa me

articles.title: Nsɛmmisa ne Mmuae: Nsɛmmɔnedi a Wɔhyɛ da Yɛ (Ɔkasa 1)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nkɔ Hebrifo Ti 10, nkyekyem 26-27, na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Sɛ yɛhyɛ da yɛ bɔne bere a yɛahu nokware no akyi a, bɔne afɔre no befi hɔ.

Ɛnnɛ momma yɛnhwehwɛ, yɛnkɔ ayɔnkofa, na yɛnkyɛ deɛ ɛwɔ hɔ "Nsɛmmɔnedi a Wɔhyɛ da Yɛ". Daabi. ( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) Ɔkasa na ɔbɔ mpae sɛ: Yɛda wo ase, Abba, Ɔsoro Agya, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, na yɛda wo ase, Honhom Kronkron, sɛ wo ne yɛn wɔ hɔ daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea pa [asɔre no] soma adwumayɛfo a wɔnam wɔn nsa so kyerɛw na wɔka nokware asɛm, a ɛyɛ yɛn nkwagye asɛmpa no. Bɔ mpae sɛ Awurade Yesu bɛyɛ adwuma pa wɔ asɔre no mu, abubu ɔtamfo no nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn ne akwanside nyinaa, na wadi mmofra no nyinaa anim asan akɔ asɔre no mu ma wɔate Bible no mu nokware no ase. Agyenkwa no hyerɛn yɛn akoma ani daa na ɔbue yɛn adwene - yɛbɛtumi ate Bible no ase → yɛbɛtumi ate na yɛahunu honhom mu nokorɛ → Te nea nsɛmmɔnedi a wɔhyɛ da yɛ no ase !

Awurade mmua yɛn mpaebɔ, yɛn nkotɔsrɛ, yɛn ntamgyinafo, aseda, ne nhyira wɔ Awurade Yesu din mu! Amen

1. Nsɛmmɔnedi a wɔhyɛ da yɛ

bisa: Dɛn ne nsɛmmɔnedi a wɔhyɛ da yɛ?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

(1) . " wɔahyɛ da ayɛ "Kanton kasa". Kanea soronko, kanea soronko "Ɛkyerɛ sɛ wɔhyɛ da, wɔhyɛ da, wɔhyɛ da, wɔhyɛ da;
(2) . " amumuyɔ ” kyerɛ sɛ mmara a wobu so ne mmara no mu mmara nsɛm ne nhyehyɛɛ a wobu so no yɛ bɔne;
(3) . " nsɛmmɔnedi a wɔhyɛ da yɛ "Ɛkyerɛ "hann soronko" a ɛhyɛ da, ɛhyɛ da, ne nimdeɛ → nim a wonim sɛ mmara a wobu so ne mmara mmara a wobu so no yɛ bɔne → mmarahyɛ ne mmara a wɔahyɛ da abu so → wɔfrɛ no bɔne a wɔahyɛ da ayɛ. Wɔ saa kwan yi so." , wote ase pefee ?

2. “Bɔne” nkyerɛase → mmara a wobu so

bisa: Dɛn ne bɔne?
anoyie: Mmara a wobu so no yɛ bɔne → Obiara a ɔyɛ bɔne no bu mmara so no yɛ bɔne. Nkyekyɛm (1 Yohane 3:4) .

3. Sɛnea wonyɛ nsɛmmɔnedi

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na worenyɛ bɔne?
anoyie: Mmara biara nni hɔ!

bisa: Adɛn?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha
(1) Baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ --Hwɛ Romafoɔ 4:15
(2) Sɛ mmara nni hɔ a, wommu bɔne sɛ bɔne --Hwɛ Romafoɔ 5:3
(3) Sɛ mmara nni hɔ a, bɔne awu --Hwɛ Romafoɔ 7:8

" Abusuabɔ a ɛda mmara ne bɔne ntam” . : Sɛnea Paulo kae no → Dɛn na yebetumi aka? Mmara no yɛ bɔne? Ɛnyɛ saa koraa! Ɛyɛ kɛkɛ sɛ sɛ ɛnyɛ mmara no a, anka minnim nea bɔne yɛ → (Ɛne sɛ, sɛ ɛnyɛ mmara no a, anka minnim nea bɔne yɛ, efisɛ mmara no yɛ to ma nkurɔfoɔ nhunu bɔne – hwɛ Romafoɔ 3:21). Mmara no ka sɛ, "Mma w'ani nnye" → " Mma wo nni adifudepɛ "Ɛyɛ ahyɛde a etwa to wɔ Mmara no Mmara Nsɛm Du no mu. → Na minnim nea ɛyɛ adifudepɛ. Nanso, bɔne faa hokwan no de "mmara" ahyɛde no dii dwuma de maa adifudepɛ ahorow nyinaa yɛɛ adwuma wɔ me mu. Efisɛ me." ankɔ mmara no ho, Paulo kaa sɛ → na mete ase a mmara no nni mu no, bɔne bɛyɛɛ nkwa → ɛfiri sɛ bɔne akatua ne owuo → mewuiɛ. 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Na baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ; 2. 2. Mmara biara nni hɔ, na bɔne nso nyɛ nsɛmmɔnedi Sɛ nhwɛso no, tete mmere mu no, na ɛnyɛ bɔne sɛ akuafo bɛforo bepɔw no akɔtwa nnua, efisɛ na mmara biara nni hɔ saa bere no mmara a wɔde "bara nnuatwa." So wote ase? 3. 3. Sɛ mmara nni hɔ a, bɔne awu → Baabi a mmara wɔ no, bɔne te ase , wode " . amumuyɔ "Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wotena ase a, ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ saa." wu ," amumuyɔ "Ɛnam mmara ne mmaransɛm so na wokunkum mo. Enti, so moka kyerɛ mo ho sɛ → Ɛyɛ papa sɛ yebenya mmara? Anaasɛ yenni mmara no? Nkyerɛkyerɛmu (Romafo 7:7-13)

4. Nipadua ɛfiri Mmara no na ɛwoo bɔne

Romafoɔ (Ti 7:5) Na yɛwɔ honam mu no, na akɔnnɔ bɔne a wɔde mmara woo yɛn no reyɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn akwaa mu, na ɛsow owuo aba.

(1) Ɔhonam ɛfiri akɔnnɔ bɔne a efi mmara mu ba

bisa: Dɛn ne akɔnnɔ bɔne?
anoyie: " bɔne "Ɛne sɛ bɔne, nneyɛe bɔne, ne nsusuwii bɔne;" pɛ "Ɛne sɛ, akɔnnɔ, akɔnnɔ, honam akɔnnɔ." akɔnnɔ bɔne ” kyerɛ nneyɛe bɔne, nsusuwii bɔne ne honam akɔnnɔ nneyɛe.

bisa: nam ɛfiri Mmara no ma akɔnnɔ bɔne ba?
anoyie: Efisɛ bere a na yɛwɔ honam mu no, ɛno ɛfiri Akɔnnɔ bɔne a mmara awo no no yɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn akwaa mu, na ɛde owu aba → kyerɛ sɛ, honam de ba ɛfiri →【 mmara 】→“ awoɔ "Nneyɛe bɔne, adwene bɔne, ne honam akɔnnɔ". akɔnnɔ bɔne "Afei honam akɔnnɔ yɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn akwaa mu → honam akɔnnɔ yɛ adwuma wɔ nyinsɛn mu na ɛwo". amumuyɔ "Bra → na woasow owu aba."

(2) Pɛsɛmenkominya akɔnnɔ nyinsɛn no yɛ bɔne awo.

( Yakobo 1:15 ) Sɛ akɔnnɔ nyinsɛn a, ɛwo bɔne na sɛ bɔne nyin koraa a, ɛwo owu.

Hyɛ nso: Bere a na yɛwɔ honam mu no, ɛno ɛfiri " mmara "ne【 awoɔ 】Akɔnnɔ bɔne, kyerɛ sɛ, akɔnnɔ, yɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn akwaa mu.

bisa: " wu "Efi he?"
anoyie: " wu" →Efi “bɔne” mu--Romafo 5:12

bisa: Ɛhe na "bɔne" fi?
anoyie: "Bɔne" → efi honam mu ( ɛfiri) mmara→ awoɔ Akɔnnɔ bɔne, akɔnnɔ bɔne yɛ pɛsɛmenkominya akɔnnɔ bere a wosusuw ho ara pɛ→ awoɔ Fi adi a wudi fɔ.

Enti "abusuabɔ a ɛda honam, mmara, bɔne, ne owu ntam": 【Honam】→ Esiane 【Mmara】→ Wo 【Bɔn】→ Wo 【Owu】 .

Enti, so wote ase?

Asɛmpa nkyerɛwee a wɔkyɛ, a Onyankopɔn Honhom na ɛkanyan Yesu Kristo Adwumayɛfoɔ, Onua Wang*Yun, Onuabaa Liu, Onuabaa Zheng, Onua Cen, ne mfɛfoɔ adwumayɛfoɔ foforɔ, boa na wɔbom yɛ adwuma wɔ Yesu Kristo Asɔre no asɛmpa adwuma no mu . Wɔka Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no, asɛmpa a ɛma kwan ma wɔgye nnipa nkwa, hyɛ wɔn anuonyam, na wɔgye wɔn nipadua! Amen

articles.title: FAQ: Worentumi mma wonnu wɔn ho bio
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
【Twerɛsɛm】Hebrifoɔ 6:6 Sɛ wɔtwe wɔn ho fi nkyerɛkyerɛ no ho a, ɛrentumi nyɛ yie sɛ wɔde wɔn bɛsan aba adwensakyera mu. Efisɛ wɔbɔɔ Onyankopɔn Ba no asɛnnua mu foforo, na wɔde no aniwu bae.


1. Sɛ wogyae nokware no a

bisa: Nnyinasosɛm bɛn na ɛsɛ sɛ yegyae?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

(1) Wɔade wɔn ho afi bɔne nkyerɛkyerɛ no ho

Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne (wɔ asɛnnua no so)--Hwɛ 1 Korintofo 15:3-4
Sɛ onipa baako wu ma obiara a, ɛnneɛ obiara wuwu - hwɛ 2 Korintofoɔ 5:14
Wɔn a wɔawuwu no anya ahofadi afi bɔne mu--hwɛ Romafo 6:7

Hyɛ nso: Wɔade wɔn ho afi bɔne nkyerɛkyerɛ ho→Kristo nkutoo” ma "Sɛ nnipa nyinaa wu a, wɔn nyinaa wuwu, na awufo nso de wɔn ho fi bɔne mu. → Sɛ wɔn nyinaa wu a, wɔn nyinaa de wɔn ho fi bɔne mu. Obiara a ogye no di no, wonmmu no fɔ." Wɔn a wonnye nni sɛ “wɔde wɔn ho fi bɔne mu” . , wɔasi nsɛmmɔnedi no ho gyinae. Enti, so wote ase? Hwɛ Yohane 3:18

(2) Kristo afɔrebɔ biako no ma wɔn a wɔatew wɔn ho no yɛ pɛ daa

Ɛnam saa apɛdeɛ yi so nam Yesu Kristo nipadua afɔrebɔ a wɔde ma no so tew yɛn ho prɛko pɛ, na wɔama wɔn a wɔate wɔn ho no ayɛ pɛ daa, wɔabu wɔn bem daa, wɔnni bɔne daa, na wɔayɛ wɔn kronkron daa. Nkyekyɛm (Hebrifo 10:10-14) .

(3)Yesu mogya hohoro yɛn bɔne nyinaa

Sɛ yɛnantew hann mu, sɛnea Onyankopɔn wɔ hann mu no a, yɛne yɛn ho yɛn ho nya ayɔnkofa, na ne Ba Yesu mogya tew yɛn ho fi bɔne nyinaa ho. Nkyekyɛm (1 Yohane 1:7) .

(4) Mmara nkyerɛkyerɛ a wɔbɛtwe wɔn ho afi ho

Nanso ɛfiri sɛ yɛwuwu maa mmara a ɛkyekyere yɛn no, seesei yɛade yɛn ho afiri mmara no ho, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛsom Awurade sɛdeɛ honhom foforɔ (honhom: anaa wɔkyerɛ aseɛ sɛ Honhom Kronkron) na ɛnyɛ sɛdeɛ tete kwan no teɛ amanne kwan so. Nkyekyɛm (Romafo 7:6) .

(5) Fa akwakoraa no nnyinasosɛm ne ne nneyɛe to nkyɛn

Monnni atoro nkyerɛ mo ho mo ho, ɛfiri sɛ moatwe akwakoraa ne ne nnwuma ato hɔ (Kolosefoɔ 3:9)

(6) Guan fii Satan asase ase wiase a ɛyɛ sum no tumi mu

Wagye yɛn afiri esum tumi mu na wakyerɛ yɛn ase akɔ ne Dɔba no ahennie mu (Kolosefoɔ 1:13)

(7) Nkyerɛkyerɛ a ɛma yetumi bu yɛn bem, nyan yɛn, san wo bio, gye yɛn nkwa, na yenya daa nkwa

Nhyira nka yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo Nyankopɔn ne n’Agya! Sɛnea ne mmɔborohunu kɛse kyerɛ no, ɔnam Yesu Kristo wusɔreɛ so asan awo yɛn bio ama yɛayɛ anidasoɔ a ɛte aseɛ.

2. Yɛrentumi mma wɔnnu wɔn ho bio.

bisa: Dɛn na wopɛ sɛ woka bere a worentumi mma wɔnsakra bio no?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

( Hebrifo 6:4 ) Ɛdefa wɔn a wɔanya hann, asɔ ɔsoro akyɛde no ahwɛ, na wɔabɛyɛ Honhom Kronkron no bi ho no, .

bisa: Hann bɛn na wɔanya?
anoyie: Nyankopɔn na ɔma hann ne asɛmpa no hann→ Esiane sɛ motee nokware asɛm→ Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne, wosiee no, na ɔsɔree da a ɛto so abiɛsa→ 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Wɔade wɔn ho afi bɔne nkyerɛkyerɛ no ho, . 2. 2. Ɔbɔɔ afɔre prɛko pɛ, na ɔtew daa pɛyɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ no ho, . 3. 3. Ne mogya tew onipa ho fi bɔne nyinaa ho, . 4. 4. Wɔde wɔn ho afi mmara nkyerɛkyerɛ ho, . 5. 5. Ɔde akwakoraa ne ne nneyɛe nnyinasosɛm ahorow to nkyɛn, . 6. 6. Wɔade wɔn ho afi esum nnyinasosɛm ne Hades tumi ho, . 7. Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wobebu wo bem, anyan wo, awo wo bio, agye wo nkwa, anya Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ no, na woanya daa nkwa! →Ɛno ne asɛmpa a ɛnam so nya nkwagyeɛ, na mobɛka ɔsoro akyɛdeɛ no ahwɛ, na moabɛyɛ Honhom Kronkron no mu kyɛfafoɔ.

( Hebrifo 6:5 ) Wɔn a wɔaka Onyankopɔn asɛm pa ahwɛ na wonim tumi a ɛwɔ mmere a ɛreba no mu no, .

bisa: Dɛn ne ɔkwan pa no?
anoyie: " ɔkwan pa ” → Mo a moate nokorɛ asɛm, mo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa → a ɛyɛ ɔkwan pa no Na mo a moasɔ Onyankopɔn asɛm pa no ahwɛ na moahunu tumi a ɛwɔ mmerɛ a ɛreba no mu → Honhom Kronkron a ɔbu bem no, ɔnyane , ɔsan wo, gye, na ogye bɔhyɛ ahorow , nnipa a wɔwɔ daa nkwa So wote ase?

( Hebrifo 6:6 ) Sɛ wogyae nkyerɛkyerɛ no a, wɔrentumi mfa wɔn nsan mma wɔnsakra. Efisɛ wɔbɔɔ Onyankopɔn Ba no asɛnnua mu foforo, na wɔde no aniwu bae.

bisa: Sɛ yegyae nokware no a → nnyinasosɛm bɛn na yɛregyae?
anoyie: Ɛyɛ sɛ wobegyaw nea wɔaka wɔ atifi hɔ ". nnɔnson "Nnyinasosɛm→【 nkwagye nokware 】Kristo wui wɔ asɛnnua so maa yɛn bɔne, na ɔde yɛn ho fii bɔne mu → Sɛ wo " . Nnye nni "Sɛ yɛde yɛn ho firi bɔne nkyerɛkyerɛ, mmara nkyerɛkyerɛ no ho a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ yɛbɛgyae saa nkyerɛkyerɛ yi. Sɛ nhwɛsoɔ no, ɛnnɛ asɔre pii kyerɛkyerɛ sɛ Yesu ahohoro bɔne no ansa na meregye Awurade adi; ɔkyena bɔne, bɔne a ɛwɔ." ɔkyena akyire, na adwene no bɔne nnhohoro net? →Eyi ne ". gya si hɔ "Kristo afɔrebɔ baako ma wɔn a wɔate wɔn ho no yɛ pɛ daa, na ne mogya tew wɔn ho fi bɔne nyinaa ho→." Saa nokware yi . Wɔn nso wɔ hɔ a wɔnu wɔn ho wɔ wɔn nnwuma a awuo ho da biara, wɔka wɔn bɔne na wɔsakyera da biara, na wɔbɔ mpaeɛ srɛ Awurade mogya da biara sɛ ɔbɛpopa wɔn bɔne na wɔahohoro wɔn bɔne → bu apam a ɛtew no ho no mogya sɛnea ɛte biara → saa nkurɔfo yi yɛ atirimɔdenfo, atuatewfo, na wɔnsakra wɔn adwene, na wɔbɛyɛ Satan afiri → gya si hɔ Kristo nkwagye ho nkyerɛkyerɛ ne nokorɛ; Sɛnea ɔkraman dan ne ho di nea ɔfe no; Wɔn gyidi yɛ twe a wɔtwe wɔn ho fi nkwagye ho nokware no ho → Yɛrentumi mma wonnu wɔn ho bio. , ɛfiri sɛ wɔbɔɔ Onyankopɔn Ba no asɛnnua mu foforɔ, na wɔde no aniwuo pefee. Enti, so wote ase?

Hymn: Megye Awurade Yesu Dwom Di

YOO! Ɛno ne yɛn nhwehwɛmu, fekubɔ, ne kyɛfa nnɛ Ma Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Agya Nyankopɔn no dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo ho daa. Amen

articles.title: Nsɛmmisa ne Mmuae: Gye sɛ mobɛyɛ sɛ mmofra a, worenkɔ ɔsoro ahenni no mu da
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoeɛ nka anuanom mmarima ne mmaa nyinaa, Amen!

Momma yɛnbue Bible no mu nkyerɛ Mateo Ti 18 Nkyekyɛm 3 na yɛnbom nkenkan. “Yesu” kaa sɛ, “Nokware mise mo sɛ, sɛ monsane na monyɛ sɛ mmofra nkumaa a, morenkɔ ɔsoro ahennie mu da.

Ɛnnɛ yɛbom hwehwɛ, di nkitaho na yɛkyɛ "Gye sɛ monsan nkɔ mmofra nsɛso mu a, worenkɔ ɔsoro ahenni no mu da." Bɔ mpae sɛ: "Abba Agya Kronkron dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa"! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea pa “asɔre” no soma adwumayɛfo nam nokware asɛm a wɔakyerɛw na wɔaka wɔ wɔn nsam no so, a ɛyɛ yɛn nkwagye ne ɔsoro ahenni mu a yɛbɛhyɛn ho asɛmpa no! Awurade Yesu nkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn kra ani na mmue yɛn adwene mu nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware. Te sɛnea Honhom Kronkron no di yɛn nyinaa kwan ma yɛsan kɔ mmofra nsɛso so na ɔda ahintasɛm a ɛfa ɔsoro ahenni asɛmpa no mu a yɛbɛhyɛn ho adi kyerɛ yɛn no ase. . Amen!

Mpaebɔ, adesrɛ, ntamgyinafo, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

【Kyerɛwsɛm】Mateo 18:1-3 Saa berɛ no, asuafoɔ no baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛbisaa sɛ, “Hena na ɔyɛ kɛseɛ wɔ ɔsoro ahennie mu?” ka kyerɛ mo sɛ, gye sɛ modane na mobɛyɛ sɛ mmofra nkumaa a, morenkɔ ɔsoro ahennie mu da.

1. Abofra kwan a wɔfa so yɛ ade

bisa: Dɛn ne mmofra su?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

1 Fa n’anim hwɛ sɛnea abofra no te : Benevolence → Obiara ani gye ho sɛ ohu a Mmofra wɔ asomdwoe, ayamye, odwo, ahonim pa, cuteness, innocence...ne nea ɛkeka ho!
2 Fi wo komam hwɛ abofra no su : Nnaadaa, ntɛnkyea, amumɔyɛ, adwemmɔne, awaresɛe, ahohwibra, abosonsom, abayisɛm, awudi, asabow, ahonhonsɛmdi, ne nea ɛkeka ho nni hɔ.
3 Hwɛ sɛnea abofra no su fi ne ho a wode bɛto so no mu : Fa wo ho to w’awofo so bere nyinaa, fa wo ho to w’awofo so, na mfa wo ho nto wo ho so da.

2. Mmofra nni mmara biara

bisa: So mmara wɔ hɔ ma mmofra?
anoyie: Mmara biara nni hɔ ma mmofra.

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Sɛnea wɔatwerɛ no → Efisɛ mmara hyɛ abufuw abufuw na baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ. Nkyekyɛm (Romafo 4:15) .
2. 2. Baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ → Esiane sɛ mmara nni hɔ nti, wɔmfa mmarato sɛ mmarato, sɛnea awofo a wohu sɛ wɔn mma reto mmara no nyɛ mmarato.
3. 3. Apam Foforo Ɔsoro Agya renkae mo mmarato → ɛfiri sɛ mmara biara nni hɔ! Mo soro Agya renkae mo mmarato, sɛ mmara nni hɔ a, ɔrentumi mmu mo fɔ → “Eyi ne apam a me ne wɔn bɛyɛ wɔ saa nna no akyi, Awurade na ɔseɛ: Mɛtwerɛ me mmara wɔ wɔn akoma mu, na mede ahyɛ mu wɔn." Afei ɔkaa sɛ, "Merenkae wɔn bɔne ne wɔn mmarato bio." Seesei a wɔde saa bɔne yi akyɛ no, ɛho nhia sɛ wɔbɔ bɔne ho afɔre bio. Nkyekyɛm (Hebrifo 10:16-18) .

bisa: Fa mmara no hyɛ wɔn komam, wonni mmara no?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

1 Mmara no awiei ne Kristo →Hwɛ Romafo 10:4.
2 Mmara no yɛ nneɛma pa sunsuma →Esiane sɛ mmara no yɛ nneɛma pa a ɛbɛba no sunsuma nti, ɛnyɛ ade no suban ankasa--hwɛ Hebrifo 10:1.
3 Mmara no suban ne ne su ankasa ne Kristo →Hwɛ Kol. 2:17. Saa kwan yi so no, Onyankopɔn ne wɔn yɛɛ apam foforo, na ɔkae sɛ: “Mɛkyerɛw me mmara wɔ wɔn koma so na mede ahyɛ wɔn mu → kyerɛ sɛ, Onyankopɔn bɛyɛ [ . Kristo 】Wɔakyerɛw wɔ yɛn koma so, te sɛ Nnwom Dwom Ti 8:6 Mesrɛ wo fa me hyɛ wo koma mu sɛ nsɔano, na soa me sɛ stamp wɔ wo basa so...! Na ɔde bɛhyɛ wɔn mu → Onyankopɔn bɛpɛ kristo nkwa 】Fa to yɛn mu. Saa kwan yi so no, so wote apam foforo a Onyankopɔn ne yɛn ayɛ no ase?

3. Mmofra nnim bɔne

bisa: Adɛn nti na mmofra nnim bɔne?
anoyie : Efisɛ mmofra nni mmara biara.

bisa: Dɛn ne mmara no dwumadi?
anoyie: Mmara no dwumadie ne Bu nkurɔfo fɔ wɔ bɔne ho →Enti wɔnam mmara nnwuma so renbu ɔhonam biara bem wɔ Onyankopɔn anim, ɛfiri sɛ Mmara no atirimpɔw ne sɛ ɛbɛma nkurɔfo ahu wɔn bɔne . Nkyekyɛm (Romafo 3:20) .

Ɛyɛ mmara sɛ wobɛma nkurɔfo ahu wɔn bɔne. Esiane sɛ mmofra nni mmara nti, wonnim bɔne;

1 Na baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ --Hwɛ Romafoɔ 4:15
2 Sɛ mmara nni hɔ a, bɔne nyɛ bɔne --Hwɛ Romafoɔ 5:13
3 Sɛ mmara nni hɔ a, bɔne awu --Romafoɔ 7:8, 9

Nkyem ahorow te sɛ " . paul "Ka sɛ → na mete ase a mmara nni mu; nanso bere a mmara no ahyɛde bae no, bɔne baa nkwa mu bio → "Bɔne akatua ne owu," na mewui. So wopɛ mmara no a?" → tena bɔne mu, kɔ na yi " . amumuyɔ "Sɛ wote ase → wobɛwu. Wote ase?"
Enti, sɛ abofra nni mmara no a, onni mmarato biara a, sɛ abofra nni mmara no a, wɔmfa bɔne nyɛ bɔne; ntumi mmu abofra fɔ. Kɔ bisa mmaranimfo a ɔyɛ adwumaden sɛ ebia mmara betumi abu abofra fɔ anaa. Enti, so wote ase?

4. Awo foforo

bisa: Mɛyɛ dɛn atumi asan akɔ abofra no tebea so?
Mmuae: Awo foforo!

bisa: Dɛn nti na wɔwo wo foforo?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

(1) Nana Adam bɔɔ onipa
Efisɛ Yehowa Nyankopɔn de mfutuma bɔɔ "Adam", na na Adam yɛ onipa a wanyin a onni " . awoɔ ". Na yɛyɛ Adam asefo, na yɛn honam nipadua no fi Adam mu. Sɛnea " abɔ "Ka sɛ yɛn nipadua yɛ mfutuma → ɛntwam". awoɔ "Ɛyɛ material ma mpanyimfo". mfuturo ". (Eyi nnyina Adam ne Hawa aware ne awo ho nsusuwii so, na mmom adebɔ ho nneɛma "mfutuma"). Enti, wote ase? Hwɛ Genesis 2:7.

(2) Wɔatɔn Adam nipadua ama bɔne

1 Bɔne nam Adam nkutoo so baa wiase
Sɛdeɛ bɔne nam onipa baako so baa wiase, na owuo nam bɔne so baeɛ no, saa ara na owuo baa obiara so ɛfiri sɛ wɔn nyinaa ayɛ bɔne. Nkyekyɛm (Romafo 5:12) .
2 Wɔatɔn yɛn honam ama bɔne
Yɛnim sɛ mmara no firi honhom mu, na me deɛ, mefiri honam mu na wɔatɔn me ama bɔne. Nkyekyɛm (Romafo 7:14) .
3 Bɔne akatua ne owu
Na bɔne akatua ne owuo, na Onyankopɔn akyɛdeɛ ne daa nkwa wɔ yɛn Awurade Kristo Yesu mu. Nkyekyɛm (Romafo 6:23) → Enti wɔ Adam mu no wɔn nyinaa wuwui.

bisa: Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na wɔasan awo yɛn te sɛ mmofra?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

(1) Nsu ne Honhom na wɔwoo no --Yohane 3:5
(2) Wɔwoo no fii asɛmpa no nokware asɛm no mu --1 Korintofoɔ 4:15 ne Yakobo 1:18
(3) Efi Onyankopɔn hɔ --Yohane 1:12-13

Hyɛ nso: Na "Adam" a wɔadi kan abɔ no no yɛ asase so de → wɔbɔɔ no sɛ onipa kɛse; awiei no firi" Adam "Wɔwoo Yesu honhom mu na ɔyɛ abofra! Na ɔyɛ abofra a ɔbɛyɛɛ Asɛm, Onyankopɔn, ne Honhom →→【 Abɔfra 】Mmara biara nni hɔ, bɔne ho nimdeɛ biara nni hɔ, bɔne biara nni hɔ →→Adam Yesu a otwa to no nni bɔne” Munnim nsɛmmɔnedi no ” → Onyankopɔn ma no yɛ obi a onni bɔne ( Ɛnyɛ fɔ: mfitiase nkyerɛwee no yɛ afobu ho nimdeɛ a wonni ), bɛyɛɛ bɔne maa yɛn, na yɛabɛyɛ Onyankopɔn trenee wɔ ne mu. Nkyekyɛm (2 Korintofoɔ 5:21)→→Enti yɛn 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa wɔde nsu ne Honhom awo wɔn, . 2. 2. wɔde asɛmpa no nokware awo wɔn, . 3. 3. Wɔwoo no firii Onyankopɔn hɔ →→ ne Adam kumaa a otwa toɔ → → onni mmara, ɔnnim bɔne, na onni bɔne → → te sɛ abofra!

Eyi ne nea Awurade Yesu kae: “Nokware mise mo sɛ, sɛ monsane na monyɛ sɛ mmofra nkumaa a, morenkɔ ɔsoro ahenni mu da→→ Mfitiase adwene a ɛne sɛ wɔbɛsan adan abofra tebea ne 【 . awo foforo 】→→Obiara a wɔde nsuo ne Honhom Kronkron awo no, wɔde asɛmpa no nokware asɛm awo no, anaa Onyankopɔn awo no no bɛtumi akɔ ɔsoro ahennie mu. Reference (Mateo 18:3), wote yei ase?

nti" Awurade kaa saa "Obiara a ɔbrɛ ne ho ase te sɛ abofra ketewa yi". Gye asɛmpa no di "Ɔno ne kɛse wɔ ɔsoro ahenni mu. Obiara a ɔbɛma abofra a ɔte sɛ eyi akwaaba esiane me din nti". Mmofra a Onyankopɔn awo wɔn, Onyankopɔn nkoa, Onyankopɔn adwumayɛfo”, Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wobegye me ara kwa . "Nsɛm a wɔde kyerɛw (Mateo 18:4-5) ."

Asɛmpa nkyerɛwee a wɔkyɛ, a Onyankopɔn Honhom na ɛkanyan Yesu Kristo Adwumayɛfoɔ, Onua Wang*Yun, Onuabaa Liu, Onuabaa Zheng, Onua Cen, ne mfɛfoɔ adwumayɛfoɔ foforɔ, boa na wɔbom yɛ adwuma wɔ Yesu Kristo Asɔre no asɛmpa adwuma no mu . Wɔka Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no, asɛmpa a ɛma kwan ma wɔgye nnipa nkwa, hyɛ wɔn anuonyam, na wɔgye wɔn nipadua! Amen

articles.title: Nsɛmmisa ne Mmuae: Saa nkurɔfo yi nyinaa wuwui wɔ gyidi mu na wɔannye bɔhyɛ ahorow no
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Hebrifo 11:13, 39-40 Eyinom nyinaa wuwui wɔ gyidi mu, na wɔannya bɔhyɛ ahorow no, na mmom wohuu wɔn wɔ akyirikyiri na wɔde anigye gyee wɔn fɛw so, na wɔkae sɛ wɔyɛ ahɔho wɔ wiase, Ɛyɛ ahɔhoyɛ.

... Eyinom ne wɔn a wɔnam gyidie so anya adanseɛ pa, nanso wɔnnya nnyaa bɔhyɛ no, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn asiesie nneɛma a ɛyɛ papa ama yɛn, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wɔrentumi nyɛ pɛ gye sɛ wɔne yɛn nnye.

1. Tetefo nyaa adanse a ɛyɛ nwonwa fii krataa yi mu

1 Habel gyidi

Gyidie so na Habel bɔɔ afɔdeɛ a ɛkyɛn deɛ Kain de maeɛ no maa Onyankopɔn, na ɔnam saayɛ so nyaa ne bem ho adanseɛ, Onyankopɔn adanseɛ a ɛfa n’akyɛdeɛ ho. Ɛwom sɛ owui de, nanso gyidi yi nti na ɔda so ara kasa. ( Hebrifo 11:4 ) .
bisa: Habel wui wɔ honam fam nanso na ɔda so ara kasa? Dɛn na ɛrekasa?
anoyie: Ɔkra no kasa, ɛyɛ Habel kra na ɔkasa!
bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na Habel kra kasa?
anoyie: AWURADE kaa sɛ, "Dɛn na woayɛ (Kain)? Wo nua (Habel) mogya de nne firi fam frɛ me. Reference (Genesis 4:10)
bisa: Mogya Ɛnne bi teɛɛm firii asase so frɛɛ Onyankopɔn sɛ, “ Mogya "So nne ahorow bɛba a ɛbɛkasa nso?"
anoyie: " Mogya "Ɛne sɛ nkwa, ɛfiri sɛ mogya mu na nkwa wɔ → Leviticus 17:11 Na abɔdeɛ teasefoɔ nkwa wɔ mogya mu. Mede mogya yi ama mo sɛ momfa mpata mma mo nkwa wɔ afɔrebukyia no so; ɛfiri sɛ mogya mu na ɛwɔ." Nkwa, enti ebetumi apata bɔne.
bisa: " Mogya "Nkwa wɔ mu → So "nkwa" yi yɛ ɔkra?
anoyie: nnipa" Mogya "Nkwa wɔ mu," . mogya nkwa "Ɛyɛ onipa kra →". Mogya "Ɛne bi wɔ hɔ a ɛkasa, kyerɛ sɛ". ɔkra "Ɔkasa! Ɛnyɛ nipadua". ɔkra "Wo nso wobɛtumi akasa!"
bisa: " ɔkra "Kasa → So nnipa aso betumi ate?"
anoyie: nko ara" ɔkra "Sɛ yɛrekasa a, obiara ntumi nte! Sɛ nhwɛso no, sɛ woka komm wɔ wo komam sɛ: "Hello" → eyi ne "." nkwa kra "Kasa! Nanso eyi". ɔkra "Sɛ worekasa a, sɛ nnyigyei no antwa honam ano a, nnipa aso ntumi nte, "" nkwa kra "Sɛ nnyigyei fa tɛkrɛma ne anofafa mu ba a, nnipa aso tumi te;
Nhwɛso foforo ne sɛ nnipa pii gye di sɛ “ . fi nipadua mu "akyinnyegye, bere a". ɔkra "Ofi nipadua no mu," . ɔkra "Wobɛtumi ahunu w'ankasa wo nipadua. Nanso onipa nipadua." aniwa a ɛda hɔ kwa Wontumi nhu". ɔkra ", ntumi mfa nsa nka". ɔkra ", wontumi mfa nni dwuma ne ". ɔkra "Di nkitaho na wuntumi nte". ɔkra "Ɔkasa nne. Efisɛ." Onyankopɔn yɛ honhom →→Enti metumi ate Habel “ . ɔkra "Ɔkasa nne yɛ nea yɛn honam aso ntumi nte na yɛn ani adagyaw ntumi nhu."

Ɛdefa wɔn a wonnye nni sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ no ho no, wonnye nni sɛ nnipa wɔ akra honhom mu nneɛma.Saa ara. nokorɛ" ɔkra "Wɔn a wotumi fi nipadua no mu na wɔn nkutoo tra ase no nso tumi kasa! Wote eyi ase? Okay! About". ɔkra "Ɛno ne ma kyɛfa. Mebɛkyɛ bere foforo【 akra nkwagye ] Momma yɛnka ho asɛm nkɔ akyiri.
(1) Nkwa anaa ɔkra →→Hwɛ Mateo 16:25 Na obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔgye ne kra ( Nkwa: anaa ɔkra ;
(2) Ɔkra no kasa ma atɛntrenee →→Hwɛ Adiyisɛm 6:9-10 Bere a obuee nsɔano a ɛto so anum no, mihuu wɔn a wokunkum wɔn esiane Onyankopɔn asɛm ne adansedi nti no wɔ afɔremuka no ase. Ɔkra, teɛm denneennen "O Awurade, kronkron ne nokwafo, ebegye bere tenten ansa na Woabu wɔn a wɔte asase so atɛn na woatɔ yɛn mogya so were?"

2 Henok Gyidi

Gyidi nti na wɔfaa Henok kɔe sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ɔrenhu owu, na obiara antumi anhu no, efisɛ na Onyankopɔn afa no dedaw, nanso ansa na wɔrefa no no, na wanya adanse a emu da hɔ a ɛkyerɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn ani gye ne ho. Nkyekyɛm (Hebrifo 11:5) .

3 Noa gyidi

Gyidi so no, Noa a Onyankopɔn bɔɔ no kɔkɔ wɔ nneɛma a onnya nhuu ho no de ahodwiriw yɛɛ n’ade na osiesiee adaka bi sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wobetumi agye n’abusua nkwa. Enti ɔbuu saa awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ no fɔ, na ɔno ara bɛyɛɛ tenenee a ɛfiri gyidie mu ba no dedifoɔ. ( Hebrifo 11:7 ) .

4 Abraham, Isak ne Yakob Gyidi

Gyidie nti, Abraham dii ahyɛdeɛ no so na ɔfirii adi kɔɔ baabi a ɔbɛfiri adi berɛ a wɔafrɛ no no. Gyidie nti ɔtenaa bɔhyɛ asase no so sɛ ɔhɔhoɔ te sɛ ananafoɔ asase so, na ɔtenaa ntomadan mu te sɛ Isak ne Yakob a wɔn nso yɛ bɔhyɛ korɔ no ara mufoɔ. ( Hebrifo 11:8-9 ) .

2. Saa nnipa yi nyinaa wuwui wɔ gyidie mu na wɔannya deɛ wɔhyɛɛ bɔ no.

Hyɛ nso: Te sɛ Abraham no, Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ bɔ sɛ n’asefo bɛdɔɔso te sɛ nsoromma a ɛwɔ wim na wontumi nkan wɔn te sɛ anhwea a ɛwɔ mpoano → nanso wanhu n’asefo bere a na ɔte ase no, na wowuwui dodow te sɛ nsoromma a ɛwɔ wiem. →→Sara, Mose, Yosef, Gideon, Barak, Samson, Yefta, Dawid, Samuel, ne adiyifoɔ no gyidie... Afoforo nso gyinaa fɛwdi, mpire, nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn, afiasenna, ne sɔhwɛ afoforo ano, wosiw wɔn abo ma wowuwui, wɔsɔɔ wɔn hwɛe, wɔsɔɔ wɔn hwɛe, wɔde nkrante kunkum wɔn, wɔde nguan ne mpapo nwoma nantew, wohuu ohia, ahohiahia, ne ɛyaw Harms, . a wɔkyinkyin sare so, mmepɔw so, abodan, ne asase ase abodan mu no, yɛ nnipa a wɔmfata wiase. →→
Saa nkurɔfo yi gye Onyankopɔn bɔhyɛ a ɛwɔ wiase no di, nanso wofi akyirikyiri hu na wɔde anigye gye tom nso sɛ wɔyɛ ahɔho ne ahɔho wɔ wiase. Wɔn a wɔka nsɛm a ɛtete saa no kyerɛ sɛ wɔpɛ sɛ wonya fie wɔ soro Wogyina aseresɛm, mpire, nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn, afiasenna, ne sɔhwɛ ahorow nyinaa ano, wosiw wɔn abo ma wowuwu, wotwa wɔn ma wowuwu, wɔsɔ wɔn hwɛ, na wokum wɔn nkrante a wɔkyinkyin wɔ nguan ne mpapo nwoma mu, wohu amane wɔ ohia mu , ahohiahia, amanehunu, kyinkyin sare so, mmepɔw, abodan, ne asase ase abodan → Esiane sɛ wɔnyɛ wiase dea na wɔnsɛ sɛ wɔte wiase nti, wowuwu a wonnya biribiara wɔ wiase → Saa nnipa yi nyinaa agye nkwa Nea wawu wɔ gyidi mu no nnyaa nea wɔhyɛɛ bɔ no. Nkyekyɛm (Hebrifo 11:13-38) .

3. Enti wonntumi nyɛ pɛ gye sɛ wɔne yɛn gye

Nnipa yi nyinaa nam gyidie so nyaa adanseɛ pa, nanso wɔnnya nnyaa deɛ wɔhyɛɛ bɔ no, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn asiesie nneɛma pa ama yɛn, na wɔrentumi nyɛ pɛ, gye sɛ wɔne yɛn nnye. ( Hebrifo 11:39-40 ) .

bisa: Ade a ɛkyɛn so bɛn na Onyankopɔn asiesie ama yɛn?
anoyie: yesu kristo nkwagye →→ Onyankopɔn somaa ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro, Yesu Kristo, a ɔbɛyɛɛ honam → Wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu na owu maa yɛn bɔne, wosiee no, na ɔsɔree da a ɛto so abiɛsa. →→ Momma wɔnbu yɛn bem, momma yɛnsan nwo yɛn bio, nyan yɛn, nnye yɛn nkwa, nnya Kristo nipadua, nnya Kristo nkwa, nnya Onyankopɔn bayɛ, nnya Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ no, na yennya daa nkwa! Ɛnyɛ ɔbayɛ nko na Onyankopɔn ma yɛn, na mmom ɔma yɛn owusɔre a ɛma yɛn animuonyam, akatua, abotiri, ne nipadua a ɛyɛ fɛ sen saa nso! Amen.
Tetefoɔ a wɔwɔ Apam Dedaw mu no nyinaa de gyidie wuwuiɛ, nanso wɔannya Honhom Kronkron a Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ ho bɔ berɛ a wɔwuwuiɛ no! Sɛ Honhom Kronkron nni hɔ a, Onyankopɔn bayɛ biara nni hɔ. Efisɛ saa bere no Yesu Kristo ogye adwuma 】Wɔnnya nwiei → Apam Dedaw mu no, sɛ Honhom Kronkron tumi tu wɔ onipa mu mpo a, Ɔhene Saul yɛ nhwɛsoɔ. Honhom Kronkron ntena onipa dedaw no bobesa nwoma nipadua dedaw no mu, na Kristo nipadua no ne Honhom Kronkron no asɔredan. Enti, so wote ase?

Nnipa a wɔwɔ Apam Foforo no mu, wɔn a wɔgye Yesu di wɔ yɛn awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ mu no na wɔahyira wɔn paa→→【 Kristo agyede adwuma no awie pɛyɛ 】→→ Obiara a ogye Yesu di no di Ne nipadua —onya Ne nipadua, nom Ne mogya —nya Ne mogya a ɛsom bo, nya Kristo kra ne ne nkwa, nya Onyankopɔn bayɛ, na onya daa nkwa! Amen

Nnipa a wɔwɔ Apam Dedaw no mu nyinaa nam gyidi so nyaa adanse pa, nanso wɔda so ara nnyaa nea wɔhyɛɛ bɔ no sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a sɛ wɔne yɛn annye a, wɔrenyɛ pɛ. Enti, akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ Onyankopɔn bɛma wɔn a wɔwɔ Apam Dedaw no mu a wogye Onyankopɔn di no kwan ma wɔahyira wɔn te sɛ yɛn na wɔabom anya ɔsoro ahenni no agyapade. Amen!

nti" paul "Ka sɛ →." Sɛ yegye di sɛ Yesu wuiɛ na ɔsɔree bio a, Onyankopɔn nso de wɔn a wɔada wɔ Yesu mu no bɛka Yesu ho na wɔakyere yɛn wɔ mununkum mu, ama wɔakora wɔn akra ne wɔn nipadua so na wɔagye wɔn nipadua - the nokware nipadua pue , hyia Awurade wɔ wim, na saa kwan yi so no, yɛbɛka Awurade ho daa. Amen ! Enti, so wote ase? Nkyekyɛm (1 Tesalonikafo 4:14-17) .

Asɛmpa nkyerɛwee a wɔkyɛ, a Onyankopɔn Honhom na ɛkanyan no Yesu Kristo Adwumayɛfoɔ, Onua Wang*Yun, Onuabaa Liu, Onuabaa Zheng, Onua Cen, ne mfɛfoɔ adwumayɛfoɔ foforɔ boa na wɔbom yɛ adwuma wɔ Yesu Kristo Asɔre no asɛmpa adwuma no mu. Yesu Kristo asɛmpa a yɛka no yɛ asɛmpa a ɛma nnipa tumi gye wɔn nkwa, hyɛ wɔn anuonyam, na wɔgye wɔn nipadua. Amen

Nnwom: Awurade! mewɔ ha

Wɔma anuanom mmarima ne mmaa pii akwaaba sɛ wɔmfa wɔn browser no hwehwɛ - Asɔre a ɛwɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo mu - sɛ wɔbɛka yɛn ho na yɛabom ayɛ adwuma de aka Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no.

YOO! Ɛno ara ne nea yɛrekyɛ nnɛ.

articles.title: Kristoni Ɔkwantufo Nkɔso (Ɔkasa 8)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea adɔfo a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nkɔ Luka ti 23 nkyekyem 42-43 na yɛnbom nkenkan: Ɔka kyerɛɛ no se, “Yesu, kae me sɛ woba w’ahenni mu a, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Nokware mise wo sɛ, ɛnnɛ wobɛka me ho wɔ paradise.”

Ɛnnɛ yɛbom sua, yɛbɔ fekuo, na yɛkyɛ Pilgrim’s Progress no "Owu a Ɛyɛ Pɛ, Bom wɔ Paradise". Daabi. 8. 8. Nsɛm a wɔka kyerɛ Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea pa [asɔre no] soma adwumayɛfo: wɔnam wɔn nsa so kyerɛw na wɔka nokware asɛm, yɛn nkwagye, yɛn anuonyam, ne yɛn nipadua agyede ho asɛmpa. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn kra ani na ɔmmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu wo nsɛm, a ɛyɛ honhom mu nokware→ Fa w’asɛnnua da biara da, na obiara a ɔbɛhwere ne kra ama Awurade ne asɛmpa no bɛgye ne nkwa! Kora nkwa so kɔ daa nkwa mu → owu a ɛyɛ pɛ na wo ne Awurade ntra paradise → nya anuonyam, akatua, ne abotiri. Amen !

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

bisa: Dɛn ne paradise? Paradise wɔ he?
anoyie: Ɔsoro fie a ɛyɛ anigye, Apam Dedaw no yɛ Kanaan ho mfonini, asase a nufusu ne ɛwo sen so Apam Foforo no ne ɔsoro Yerusalem, ɔsoro ahenni, ɔsoro, Onyankopɔn ahenni, Agya ahenni, ɔdɔfo ahenni Ɔba, ne kurom a ɛyɛ nwonwa no.

Kyerɛwnsɛm a Wɔde Kyerɛw Nsɛm:

Ɔkaa sɛ, "Yesu, mesrɛ wo, sɛ woba w'ahenni mu a, kae me sɛ, "Nokware mise wo sɛ, ɛnnɛ wobɛka me ho wɔ paradise."

Menim onipa bi a ɔwɔ Kristo mu a wɔkyeree no kɔɔ ɔsoro a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa mfeɛ dunan a atwam ni (Sɛ na ɔwɔ nipadua no mu a, mennim; anaasɛ na ɔwɔ nipadua no akyi a, mennim; Onyankopɔn nko ara na ɔnim. ) Minim onipa yi (Sɛ́ ɔwɔ nipadua mu anaasɛ ofi nipadua mu no, minnim, Onyankopɔn nkutoo na onim.) Wɔkyeree no kɔɔ Paradise na ɔtee kokoam nsɛm a onipa biara ntumi nka. 2 Korintofoɔ 12:2-4

Nea ɔwɔ aso no, ma ɔntie nea Honhom Kronkron ka kyerɛ asafo ahorow no! Nea odi nkonim no, mɛma no adi nkwa dua no aba wɔ Onyankopɔn Paradise no mu. "Adiyisɛm 2:7."

【1】Nkwagye asɛmpa a wɔka

"Enti monnsuro wɔn; na biribiara nni hɔ a ahintaw a wɔrenna adi, na biribiara nni hɔ a ahintaw a wɔrenhu. Nea maka akyerɛ mo wɔ kokoam no, monka pefee; na nea mote wɔ mo aso mu no, monka pefee." Monnsuro wɔn a wokum nipadua nanso wontumi nkum ɔkra no;

Hyɛ nso: Yesu kaa "ahintasɛm a wɔde asie daa" kyerɛɛ yɛn na ɔkaa nkwagye asɛmpa no! Amen. Monnsuro wɔn a wokum nipadua nanso wontumi nkum ɔkra → Nanso Onyankopɔn tumi hyɛ mo koma den sɛnea asɛmpa a mekae ne Yesu Kristo a mekaa no, ne ahintasɛm a wɔde asie daa no te. Hwɛ Romafo 16:25

Adansefo pii a wowuwui wɔ gyidi mu

Hyɛ nso: Esiane sɛ yɛwɔ adansefo pii a wɔatwa yɛn ho ahyia te sɛ mununkum nti, momma yɛmfa adesoa biara ne bɔne a ɛyɛ mmerɛw sɛ ɛbɛfa yɛn afiri no nto nkyɛn, na momma yɛmfa boasetɔ ntu mmirika a wɔde asi yɛn anim no, nhwɛ yɛn gyidi Kyerɛwfo ne Ɔkyerɛwfo no .Yesu a Otwa To (anaa nkyerɛase: hwɛ Yesu a ɔyɛ nokware no kyerɛwfo na ɔyɛ pɛ). Anigyeɛ a wɔde sii n’anim no nti ɔgyinaa asɛnnua no ano, na ɔbuu n’aniwuo animtiaa, na ɔtenaa Onyankopɔn ahengua no nifa. Hebrifo Ti 12 Nkyekyem 1-2 → Te sɛ Habel, Noa, Abraham, Samson, Daniel... ne adiyifo afoforo a wasakra a ɔne Yesu, Stefano, Yakobo Anuanom, Asomafo, Kristofo→ Wɔnam gyidi so brɛɛ atamfo ahenni ase, yɛɛ trenee, nyaa bɔhyɛ, siw gyata ano, dum ogya tumi, guan fii nkrante ano, wɔn mmerɛwyɛ yɛɛ den, wɔbɛyɛɛ akokodurufo wɔ ɔko mu, na wodii aman foforo so nkonim . Ɔbea bi maa wonyan n’ankasa awufo ma wonyan nkwa. Afoforo nso gyinaa ayayade a emu yɛ den ano na wɔpowee sɛ wobegyaa wɔn (mfitiase nkyerɛwee no yɛ ogye) sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wobenya owusɔre a eye. Afoforo nso gyinaa fɛwdi, mpire, nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn, afiasenna, ne sɔhwɛ afoforo ano, wosiw wɔn abo ma wowuwui, wɔsɔɔ wɔn hwɛe, wɔsɔɔ wɔn hwɛe, wɔde nkrante kunkum wɔn, wɔde nguan ne mpapo nwoma nantew, wohuu ohia, ahohiahia, ne ɛyaw Harms, . a wɔkyinkyin sare so, mmepɔw so, abodan, ne asase ase abodan mu no, yɛ nnipa a wɔmfata wiase. Nnipa yi nyinaa nam gyidie so nyaa adanseɛ pa, nanso wɔnnya nnyaa deɛ wɔhyɛɛ bɔ no, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn asiesie nneɛma pa ama yɛn, na wɔrentumi nyɛ pɛ, gye sɛ wɔne yɛn nnye. Hebrifo 11:33-40

[2] Fa w’asɛnnua da biara na di Yesu akyi

Afei Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nnipadɔm no sɛ: "Sɛ obi pɛ sɛ odi m'akyi a, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔpo ne ho na ɔfa n'asɛnnua da biara na odi m'akyi. Na obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ogye ne kra (nkwa: anaa ɔkra a wɔakyerɛ ase; saa ara wɔ ase hɔ) no bɛhwere." it.Obiara a ɔbɛhwere ne nkwa "me nti" obegye ne nkwa sɛ onya wiase nyinaa nanso ɔhwere ne ho a

1 Fa w’asɛnnua so na suasua Kristo
Filipifo 3:10-11 Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a mahu Kristo ne ne wusɔre tumi, na me ne no ahu amane na mayɛ sɛ ne wu, na manya owusɔre afi awufo mu nso "kyerɛ sɛ, me gye.” nipadua."

2 Ɔko pa a wobɛko
Sɛnea "Paulo" kae no → Seesei wɔrehwie me agu sɛ anonne afɔrebɔ, na dɔn a mɛkɔ no adu. Mako ɔko pa no, mawie mmirikatu no, makura gyidi no mu. Efi saa bere yi rekɔ no, wɔde trenee abotiri asie ama me, na Awurade a obu atɛn trenee no de bɛma me saa da no, na ɛnyɛ me nko, na mmom wɔn a wɔdɔ ne ho adi nyinaa nso. Hwɛ 2 Timoteo Ti 4 Nkyekyɛm 6-8

3 Bere adu sɛ yefi ntomadan no mu
Sɛnea "Petro" kae no → Misusuwii sɛ ɛho hia sɛ mekae mo na mehyɛ mo nkuran bere a meda so ara wɔ ntamadan yi mu a minim sɛ bere reba sɛ mefi ntomadan yi mu, sɛnea yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo akyerɛ me no. Na mɛyɛ nea metumi biara sɛ mede saa nneɛma yi bɛkae mo wɔ me wu akyi. 2 Petro 1:13-15

4 Nhyira ne wɔn a wowuwu Awurade mu
Metee nne bi firii soro se, "Twerɛ: Efi seesei rekɔ no, nhyira ne awufoɔ wɔ Awurade mu!" ” Adiyisɛm 14:13

【3】Pilgrim’s Progress no aba awiei, yɛabom wɔ Paradise

(1) Kristofo guan fi fie

Kristofoɔ fa wɔn asɛnnua na wɔdi Yesu akyi, wɔka ɔsoro ahennie ho asɛmpa, na wɔtu mmirika Pilgrim’s Progress:

ɔfã a edi kan " Gye owu di "Abɔnefo" a wogye onipa dedaw no di no bewuwu;
ɔfã a ɛto so abien " Hwɛ owuo "Hwɛ nnebɔneyɛfo wuwu; hwɛ foforo no te ase."
Ɔfã a ɛto so abiɛsa no " Ɔtan a ɛkɔ owu mu "Kyi wo nkwa; sie kɔ daa nkwa mu."
Ɔfã 4 " Pɛ sɛ wuwu "Wɔbɔ wo ne Kristo asɛnnua mu sɛ momsɛe bɔne nipadua na monyɛ bɔne akoa bio."
ɔfã a ɛto so anum " San kɔ owu mu "Ɛnam asubɔ so na moabom ne no abom wɔ ne wuo sɛso mu, na mobɛka ne ho nso wɔ ne wusɔreɛ nsɛsoɔ mu."
Ɔfã a ɛto so asia " bue ano Owuo" da Yesu asetena adi.
Ɔfã 7 " osuahu owu "Sɛ wo ne Kristo hunu amane wɔ asɛmpaka no fã a, wɔbɛhyɛ wo anuonyam ne No."
Ɔfã 8 " Owu koraa "Onyankopɔn na ɔbubuu honam ntamadan no → ɛhɔ." anuonyam , . abasobɔdeɛ , . ahenkyɛ Wɔakora so ama yɛn → wɔ Paradise ne Kristo. Amen!

(2)Wɔ ne Awurade bɛtena paradise

Yohane Ti 17 Nkyem 4 Mahyɛ wo anuonyam wɔ asase so, na mawie adwuma a wode maa me sɛ menyɛ no.
Luka 23:43 Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Nokware mise wo sɛ, ɛnnɛ wobɛka me ho wɔ Paradise.”
Adiyisɛm 2:7 Nea odi nkonim no, mɛma no adi nkwa dua a ɛwɔ Onyankopɔn paradise mu no aba. "

(3) Wɔkora honhom, ɔkra ne nipadua so

Onyankopɔn ankasa bɛma mo ayɛ pɛ: adom nyinaa Nyankopɔn a ɔfrɛɛ mo kɔɔ ne daa anuonyam mu wɔ Kristo mu no, bere a moahu amane kakra akyi no, Ɔno ankasa bɛma mo ayɛ pɛ, ahyɛ mo den, na wama mo ahoɔden. Tumi no mmra no daa daa. Amen! 1 Petro 5:10-11

Asomdwoe Nyankopɔn no ntew wo ho koraa! Na mewɔ anidaso sɛ wo Wɔkora honhom, ɔkra ne nipadua so , a asɛm biara nni ho koraa wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo mmae mu! Nea ɔfrɛ mo no yɛ ɔnokwafo na ɔbɛyɛ. 1 Tesalonikafo 5:23-24

Asɛmpa nkyerɛwee a wɔkyɛ, a Onyankopɔn Honhom na ɛkanyan Yesu Kristo Adwumayɛfoɔ, Onua Wang*Yun, Onuabaa Liu, Onuabaa Zheng, Onua Cen, ne mfɛfoɔ adwumayɛfoɔ foforɔ, boa na wɔbom yɛ adwuma wɔ Yesu Kristo Asɔre no asɛmpa adwuma no mu . Wɔka Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no, asɛmpa a ɛma kwan ma wɔgye nnipa nkwa, hyɛ wɔn anuonyam, na wɔgye wɔn nipadua! Amen, wɔatwerɛ wɔn din wɔ nkwa nwoma no mu. Amen! →Sɛnea Filipifo 4:2-3 ka no, Paulo, Timoteo, Euodia, Sintike, Klemente, ne afoforo a wɔne Paulo yɛɛ adwuma no, wɔn din wɔ asetra a ɛkorɔn nhoma no mu. Amen!

Hymn: Aman nyinaa bɛba abɛyi Awurade ayɛ

Ma anuanom mmarima ne mmaa pii akwaaba sɛ wɔmfa mo browser no nhwehwɛ - Asɔre a ɛwɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo mu - klik Twe.Boaboa ano Kɔka yɛn ho na yɛbom nyɛ adwuma mfa nka Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no.

Wo ne QQ 2029296379 nni nkitaho

Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Kristoni Ɔkwantufo Nkɔso (Ɔkasa 7)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea adɔfo a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nkɔ 1 Korintofo 15, nkyekyem 3-4, na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Nea mede maa mo nso ne sɛ: nea edi kan no, Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne sɛnea Kyerɛwnsɛm no kyerɛ no, na wosiee no da a ɛto so abiɛsa sɛnea Kyerɛwnsɛm no kyerɛ no ne No tena 2 Timoteo 2:11

Ɛnnɛ yɛbom sua, yɛ fekubɔ, na yɛkyɛ Pilgrim’s Progress no wɔ bere ne bere mu "Owuo mu suahunu, nkwa firi aseɛ wɔ wo mu". Daabi. 7. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea pa [asɔre no] soma adwumayɛfo: ɛnam nokware asɛm a wɔakyerɛw na wɔaka wɔ wɔn nsam, a ɛyɛ wo nkwagye ne w’anuonyam ne wo nipadua agyede ho asɛmpa no so. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn kra ani na ɔmmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu wo nsɛm, a ɛyɛ honhom mu nokware → Te aseɛ sɛ yɛfa yɛn asɛnnua na yɛnya owuo mu suahunu sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a Yesu nkwa bɛda adi wɔ yɛn mu! Amen.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din kronkron mu! Amen

1. Ɛnyɛ me na mete ase bio, ɛyɛ Kristo na ɔte ase ma me.

Wɔabɔ me ne Kristo asɛnnua mu, na ɛnyɛ me na mete ase bio, na mmom Kristo te me mu, na nkwa a seesei mete mu wɔ honam mu no, mede gyidie na ɛbɔ wɔ Onyankopɔn Ba a ɔdɔɔ me na ɔde ne ho maeɛ maa me no mu. Galatifo 2:20
Na me fam no, nkwa a mɛtena no yɛ Kristo, na owu yɛ mfaso. Filipifo 1:21 .

bisa: Afei ɛnyɛ me na mete ase bio → Hena na ɔte ase?
anoyie: Ɛyɛ Kristo na ɔte me mu → "ɔte ase" ma me → efisɛ mete ase ne Kristo; Kristo fi Agya Nyankopɔn anuonyam mu. Amen! →Enti “Paulo” kaa wɔ Filipifo 1:21 →Me fam sɛ mɛtena ase ne Kristo, na owu yɛ mfaso. Enti, so wote ase?

Mmienu: Yɛne No hunu amane, na yɛne No bɛhyɛ anuonyam

bisa: "Amanehunufoɔ ne Kristo". Botaeɛ "Ɛyɛ dɛn?"
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

(1) Wɔahyɛ yɛn sɛ yebehyia ahokyere

Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛfa nsɛnnennen pii mu ansa na yɛakɔ Onyankopɔn ahenni mu. Asomafo no Nnwuma 14:22
Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ahohiahia ahorow renwosow obiara. Na mo ankasa munim sɛ wɔahyɛ yɛn sɛ yebehu amane. 1 Tesalonikafo 3:3

(2) Anigye kɛse wɔ sɔhwɛ ahorow nyinaa mu

Bu no sɛ ɛyɛ anigye nyinaa bere a wuhyia sɔhwɛ ahorow pii, a wunim sɛ wo gyidi sɔhwɛ ma wo boasetɔ ba. Nanso momma boasetɔ nso nni nkonim, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wo, "yɛn" bɛyɛ pɛ na edi mũ, a wunni hwee. Yakobo 1:2-4
Momma mo ani nnye anidaso mu; Romafo 12:12

(3) Honam nipadua mu amanehunu ne bɔne a wɔtwe wɔn ho fi ho

Esiane sɛ Awurade huu amane wɔ honam mu nti, ɛsɛ sɛ wode saa adwene yi nso yɛ akode, efisɛ nea wahu amane wɔ honam mu no agyae bɔne. Nkyekyɛm (1 Petro Ti 4:1) .

(4) Momma wɔnhyɛ yɛn anuonyam!

Sɛ wɔyɛ mma a, ɛnde wɔyɛ adedifo, Onyankopɔn adedifo ne Kristo yɔnko adedifo. Sɛ yɛne No hunu amane a, yɛne No nso bɛhyɛ yɛn animuonyam. Romafo 8:17

Hyɛ no nsow: Sɛ worehu amane wɔ wiase denam nnipa a wokum wɔn, wohwɛ, woyɛ bɔne, na woyɛ hwene so a, na worehu amane wɔ w'ankasa wo de a ɛde ba no ho a, ɛnyɛ Awurade kwan so amanehunu amanehunu yi. Enti, so ɛda adi pefee?
Nanso mommma mo mu biara nhunu amane esiane sɛ odi awu, owia ade, ɔyɛ bɔne anaa ɔde ne ho gye mu nti. Nkyekyɛm (1 Petro 4:15) .

3. Monhyɛ Onyankopɔn akodeɛ nyinaa

Momfa Onyankopɔn akode nyinaa nhyɛ, na moatumi agyina ɔbonsam atirimɔdensɛm ano. ...

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa fa di dwuma nokorɛ sɛ abɔso a wɔde kyekyere asen, .
2. 2. fa di dwuma pɛrepɛreyɛ Fa yɛ nufu mu kyɛm fa kata wo moma so, .
3. 3. Fa di dwuma bio Ahwɛyie Ɛsɛ sɛ wode asɛmpa no si wo nan so sɛ mpaboa de siesie wo ma nantew.
4. 4. Nea ɛka ho no, kura gyidie Sɛ ɔkyɛm a ɛbɛdum ɔbɔnefoɔ agyan a ɛredɛw nyinaa;
5. 5. na hyɛ nkwagye hɛɛmɛte,
6. 6. kuram Honhom Kronkron Ne nkrante yɛ Onyankopɔn asɛm;
7. Wɔde wɔn ho to Honhom Kronkron no so, a wɔasiesie wɔn ho bere nyinaa wɔ akwan nyinaa so bɔ mpae ma ; Hwɛ Efesofo 6:10-18

4. Nya Awurade kwan no mu osuahu → Asetra befi ase wɔ wo mu

(1) Gye nkwagye asɛmpa no di
Nea mede maa mo nso ne sɛ: Nea edi kan no, Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne sɛnea Kyerɛwnsɛm no kyerɛ no, na wade ne ho afi bɔne, mmara, ne mmara nnome ho, na wosiee no, na oyii akwakoraa ne nnome no fii hɔ mmara no ho. Amen! 1 Korintofoɔ 15:3-4

(2) Gye di sɛ akwakoraa no awu

Efisɛ moawu na mo nkwa ahintaw Kristo nkyɛn wɔ Onyankopɔn mu. Sɛ Kristo a ɔyɛ yɛn nkwa no yi ne ho adi a, mo nso mo ne no bɛda adi anuonyam mu. Kolosefo 3:3-4

(3)Nhu Awurade kwan no mu suahu

" wu "Actuate wɔ yɛn mu, .
" awoɔ "Nanso ɛyɛ adwuma wɔ mo mu. Nhwehwɛmu (2 Korintofo 4:10-12)

Fa w’asɛnnua da biara da na di Yesu akyi:
1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa fa asɛnnua no kwan →Sɛe bɔne nipadua, .
2. 2. Fa honhom fam kwan no so →Ka honhom mu nneɛma ho asɛm, .
3. 3. Fa kwan a ɛkɔ soro no →Ka ɔsoro ahennie asɛmpa no.
ɔfã a edi kan " Gye owu di "Gye ɔdebɔneyɛfo di, wu; gye foforo di, tra ase, .
ɔfã a ɛto so abien " Hwɛ owuo "Hwɛ, onipa dedaw no wu; hwɛ onipa foforo no te ase, .
Ɔfã a ɛto so abiɛsa no " Ɔtan a ɛkɔ owu mu "Kyi w'ankasa wo nkwa na fa sie kɔ daa nkwa mu, ."
Ɔfã 4 " dwene wu "Wɔpɛ sɛ wo ne Kristo bom honam fam na wɔbɔ wo asɛndua mu de sɛe bɔne nipadua no, .
ɔfã a ɛto so anum " San kɔ owu mu "Wɔnam asubɔ mu siee no wɔ owu mu, .
Ɔfã a ɛto so asia " fi ase awu ". Ɛda Yesu asetra adi, .
Ɔfã 7 " suahunu Owu". Asetra reyɛ adwuma wɔ wo mu.
"" osuahu owu "→→Akwakoraa no "bɔne nipadua" no sɛee nkakrankakra na ne nipadua a ɛwɔ akyi no sɛee esiane pɛsɛmenkominya akɔnnɔ nti."
" Nya asetra mu osuahu " Ɔba foforo "Wɔ Kristo mu" koma no reyɛ foforo da biara da na ɛrenyin abɛyɛ ɔpanyin, a Kristo kɛseyɛ ahyɛ no ma! Amen!

【 . Hyɛ nso: 】 . →→Ɔfa a ɛtɔ so nson no yɛ asɛmpa no a wɔka ne nokware no.

bisa: dɛn nti na dabi. nson Stage no ne asɛmpaka stage?
anoyie: Sɛ wobɛka asɛmpa no wɔ saa gyinabea yi mu a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ "wobenya owu mu osuahu"; " lɛtɛ "wu" to ". suahunu "Owuo" → Wo nni hɔ, Awurade nko ara na ɛnyɛ wo na wote ase → Wobɛyi w'akɔnnɔ adwene ne w'adwene;* lɛtɛ Live*to" suahunu "Tra ase" → Wɔde ademude no ahyɛ dɔte anwenne mu sɛ wɔbɛda no adi, sɛ wɔbɛda Yesu nkwa adi! Honhom Kronkron "Fa to dɔte anwenne mu na ka asɛmpa no na fa fax asɛm no! Baby". Honhom Kronkron "Ɛyɛ adanseɛ ma Yesu, na ɛyɛ Yesu asetena na wɔayi no adi→→." Momma nnipa nnye asɛmpa no nni na wɔnnya daa nkwa ; Ɛnyɛ sɛ wobɛkyerɛ w’ankasa honam akɔnnɔ, nyansa, nyansa, ne kasa pa.
Saa kwan yi so no, baby". Honhom Kronkron "Asɛmpa a wɔaka no nko ara na ɛwɔ tumi na nokware kwan no betumi ada adi! articles.title: Kristoni Ɔkwantufo no Nkɔso (Ɔkasa 6)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea adɔfo a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nkɔ 2 Korintofo 4, nkyekyem 7 ne 12, na yɛnbom nkenkan: Yɛwɔ saa ademude yi wɔ dɔte nkuku mu de kyerɛ sɛ tumi kɛse yi fi Onyankopɔn na ɛnyɛ yɛn hɔ. ...Saa kwan yi so no, owuo reyɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn mu, nanso nkwa reyɛ adwuma wɔ mo mu.

Ɛnnɛ yɛbom sua, yɛbɔ fekuo, na yɛkyɛ Pilgrim’s Progress no "Owu a Wɔde Fi Ase De Da Yesu Nkwa Adi". Daabi. 6. 6. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea pa [asɔre no] soma adwumayɛfo: ɛnam nokware asɛm a wɔakyerɛw na wɔaka wɔ wɔn nsam, a ɛyɛ wo nkwagye ne w’anuonyam ne wo nipadua agyede ho asɛmpa no so. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn kra ani na ɔmmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu wo nsɛm, a ɛyɛ honhom mu nokware → Te ase sɛ Yesu wu no yɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn mu de tow twetiatwa a ɛyɛ akɔnnɔ no gu; Amen.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din kronkron mu! Amen

1. Fa ademude no gu dɔte ahina no mu

(1)Akokoaa

bisa: Dɛn na "akokoaa" kyerɛ?
anoyie: "Akorade" kyerɛ nokware Honhom Kronkron, Yesu Honhom, ne Ɔsoro Agya Honhom!
Na mɛsrɛ Agya no, na ɔbɛma mo Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ foforɔ a ɔne mo bɛtena daa, mpo nokorɛ Honhom a wiase ntumi nnye no, ɛfiri sɛ ɛnhunu no nso. Nanso monim no, ɛfiri sɛ ɔne mo tena na ɔbɛtena mo mu. Hwɛ Yohane 14:16-17
Esiane sɛ moyɛ mma nti, Onyankopɔn asoma ne Ba no Honhom akɔ mo (mfitiaseɛ no yɛn) koma mu, na ɔreteɛm sɛ, “Abba, Agya!”
Nea odi Onyankopɔn mmara nsɛm so no tena Onyankopɔn mu, na Onyankopɔn te ne mu. Yenim sɛ Onyankopɔn te yɛn mu esiane Honhom Kronkron a ɔde ama yɛn nti. Hwɛ 1 Yohane 3:24

(2)Nkukuo a wɔde yɛ nkukuo

bisa: Dɛn na "nkuku" kyerɛ?
anoyie: Nkuku a wɔde dɔte ayɛ yɛ nkuku a wɔde dɔte ayɛ
1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa wɔ" Sika kɔkɔɔ ne dwetɛ nneɛma ” → Sɛ́ anwenne a ɛsom bo no, ɛyɛ kasakoa ma obi a wɔsan wo no bio na wɔagye no nkwa, onipa a Onyankopɔn awo no.
2. 2. wɔ" nnua a wɔde yɛ nkuku ”→Sɛ́ anwenne a ɛbrɛ ne ho ase no, ɛyɛ kasakoa ma obi a ɔbrɛ ne ho ase, ɔhonam mu akwakoraa.
Wɔ abusua a wodi yiye mu no, ɛnyɛ sika kɔkɔɔ ne dwetɛ nkuku nko na ɛwɔ hɔ, na mmom wɔde nnua nkuku ne dɔte nnwinnade nso di dwuma wɔ nneɛma a ɛkorɔn mu, na wɔde bi yɛ nneɛma a ɛyɛ abofono nso. Sɛ onipa tew ne ho fi deɛ ɛnteɛ ho a, ɔbɛyɛ animuonyam anwenneɛ, kronkron na ɛho wɔ mfasoɔ ama Awurade, a wɔasiesie no ama adwuma pa biara. Hwɛ 2 Timoteo 2:20-21;
Nyame de ogya bɛsɔ onipa biara adansi adwuma ahwɛ sɛ ɛbɛtumi agyina - hwɛ 1 Korintofoɔ 3:11-15.
Munnim sɛ wo nipadua yɛ Honhom Kronkron asɔredan? Hwɛ 1 Korintofo 6:19-20.

[Hyɛ no nsow]: Sɛ wɔbɛde wɔn ho afi nneɛma a ɛho nhia ho → ɛkyerɛ akwakoraa a wɔatew ne ho afi honam ho, efisɛ akwakoraa a Onyankopɔn awo no no nyɛ honam dea → twe adwene si Romafo 8:9; anuonyam anwenne, a wɔatew ho, a ɛfata sɛ Awurade de di dwuma, na wɔasiesie no sɛ wɔnantew nnwuma pa nyinaa →【. nkuku a ɛsom bo ] kyerɛ Awurade Kristo nipadua, [ . dɔte a wɔde yɛ nneɛma 】Ɛsan nso kyerɛ Kristo nipadua → Onyankopɔn bɛ "ademude". Honhom Kronkron "fa to" dɔte a wɔde yɛ nneɛma "Kristo nipadua → da Yesu nkwa adi! Sɛnea Yesu wu a owui wɔ asɛnnua so no hyɛɛ Agya Nyankopɔn anuonyam no, Kristo wusɔre a efi awufo mu no san wo yɛn bio → Onyankopɔn nso bɛyɛ". abɔfra "wɔde ato yɛn a Onyankopɔn awo yɛn sɛ anuonyam anwenne". dɔte a wɔde yɛ nneɛma "Efisɛ yɛyɛ ne nipadua no mufo, eyi". abɔfra "Tumi kɛse fi Onyankopɔn hɔ, ɛnyɛ yɛn hɔ," abɔfra "Sɛ yɛbɛda Yesu asetena adi! Amen. Wote yei ase?

2. Onyankopɔn atirimpɔw a ɛne sɛ obefi owu ase wɔ yɛn mu

(1) Atoko aba bi ho bɛ

Nokware mereka akyerɛ mo sɛ, sɛ awi aba bi hwe fam na ewu a, ɛka aburow baako pɛ na sɛ ewu a, ɛsow aba bebree. Obiara a ɔdɔ ne nkwa no bɛhwere no; Yohane 12:24-25

(2)Woawu dedaw

Efisɛ moawu na mo nkwa ahintaw Kristo nkyɛn wɔ Onyankopɔn mu. Sɛ Kristo a ɔyɛ yɛn nkwa no yi ne ho adi a, mo nso mo ne no bɛda adi anuonyam mu. Kolosefo 3:3-4

(3) Nhyira ne wɔn a wowuwu wɔ Awurade mu

Nhyira ne wɔn a wowuwu wɔ Awurade mu! Honhom Kronkron no kae sɛ: “Yiw, wɔhome fii wɔn adwuma mu, na wɔn adwuma no aba dii wɔn akyi.” ” Adiyisɛm 14:13 .

Hyɛ no nsow: Onyankopɔn atirimpɔw a ɔde fii owu ase wɔ yɛn mu ne sɛ:

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Twetiatwa a wɔde beyi ɔhonam afi hɔ; Kristo "yi" honam twetiatwa no gu - hwɛ Kolosefo 2:11.
2. 2. Ɛfata sɛ wɔde di dwuma titiriw: Sɛ onipa tew ne ho fi deɛ ɛnteɛ ho a, ɔbɛyɛ animuonyam anwenneɛ, kronkron na ɛho wɔ mfasoɔ ama Awurade, a wɔasiesie no ama adwuma pa biara. Hwɛ 2 Timoteo ti 2 nkyekyem 21. Wote ase?

3. Asetra nyɛ me bio, ɛkyerɛ Yesu asetra

(1) Asetra nyɛ me bio

Wɔabɔ me ne Kristo asɛnnua mu, na ɛnyɛ me na mete ase bio, na mmom Kristo te me mu, na nkwa a seesei mete mu wɔ honam mu no, mede gyidie na ɛbɔ wɔ Onyankopɔn Ba a ɔdɔɔ me na ɔde ne ho maeɛ maa me no mu. Hwɛ Galatifo Ti 2 Nkyekyɛm 20
Na me fam no, nkwa a mɛtena no yɛ Kristo, na owu yɛ mfaso. Hwɛ Filipifo 1:21

(2) Onyankopɔn de "ademude" no too "dɔte anwenne" no mu.

Yɛwɔ saa Honhom Kronkron "ademude" yi a wɔde ahyɛ "dɔte anwenne" mu de akyerɛ sɛ saa tumi kɛse yi fi Onyankopɔn hɔ, ɛnyɛ yɛn hɔ. Atamfo atwa yɛn ho ahyia wɔ afanu nyinaa, nanso wɔankyere yɛn, nanso wɔn abam mmu, nanso wɔmmɔ yɛn, nanso wonkum yɛn; Hwɛ 2 Korintofo 4:7-9

(3) Owu yɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn mu ma ɛda Yesu asetra adi

Yɛde Yesu wuo ka yɛn ho daa sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a Yesu nkwa nso bɛda adi wɔ yɛn mu. Efisɛ Yesu nti wɔde yɛn a yɛte ase no ma owu bere nyinaa, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛda Yesu nkwa adi wɔ yɛn nipadua a ewu no mu. Hwɛ 2 Korintofo 4:10-11 .

Hyɛ nso: Onyankopɔn ma owu yɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn mu sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a Yesu nkwa bɛda adi wɔ yɛn nipadua a ewu no mu → de akyerɛ sɛ saa tumi kɛse yi fi Onyankopɔn hɔ na ɛnyɛ yɛn nkyɛn → saa kwan yi so no, owu yɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn mu → ateasefo no Ɛnyɛ me bio → ɛyɛ “Yesu a wɔayi no adi” → sɛ wohu Agyenkwa no a, hwɛ Yesu, gye Yesu di → awoɔ Nanso ɛyɛ adwuma wɔ wo mu . Amen! Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Onyankopɔn ma owu yɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn mu na onya "Awurade asɛm" no mu osuahu → Ɛsono sɛ obiara nya gyidi akyɛde no, ebi yɛ tenten anaa tiawa, ebinom wɔ bere tiaa koraa, na ebinom nso wɔ bere tenten paa, mfe abiɛsa, du mfe, anaa mfe du du pii . Onyankopɔn de "ademude" ahyɛ yɛn "dɔte nkuku" mu de akyerɛ sɛ saa tumi kɛse yi fi Onyankopɔn nkyɛn → Honhom Kronkron no pue wɔ obiara mu ma papa → Ɔmaa asomafo binom, adiyifo binom, ne ebinom Wɔn a wɔka asɛmpa no bi ne asɔfo ne akyerɛkyerɛfo → Wɔnam Honhom Kronkron so maa ɔbarima yi nyansa nsɛm, na Honhom Kronkron maa ɔbarima foforo nso gyidi nsɛm, na Honhom Kronkron no maa ɔbarima foforo nso ayaresa akyɛde. Obi betumi ayɛ anwonwade, obi foforo betumi ayɛ odiyifo, obi foforo betumi ahu ahonhom, obi foforo betumi aka kasa horow, na obi foforo nso betumi akyerɛ kasa horow ase. Honhom Kronkron na ɛyɛ eyinom nyinaa adwuma na wɔkyekyɛ ma obiara sɛnea n’ankasa pɛ. Hwɛ 1 Korintofo 12:8-11

Asɛmpa nkyerɛwee a wɔkyɛ, a Onyankopɔn Honhom na ɛkanyan Yesu Kristo Adwumayɛfoɔ, Onua Wang*Yun, Onuabaa Liu, Onuabaa Zheng, Onua Cen, ne mfɛfoɔ adwumayɛfoɔ foforɔ, boa na wɔbom yɛ adwuma wɔ Yesu Kristo Asɔre no asɛmpa adwuma no mu . Wɔka Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no, asɛmpa a ɛma kwan ma wɔgye nnipa nkwa, hyɛ wɔn anuonyam, na wɔgye wɔn nipadua! Amen

Nnwom: Ademude a wɔde gu dɔte nkuku mu

Wɔma anuanom mmarima ne mmaa pii akwaaba sɛ wɔmfa wɔn browser no hwehwɛ - Asɔre a ɛwɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo mu - sɛ wɔbɛka yɛn ho na yɛabom ayɛ adwuma de aka Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no.

articles.title: Kristoni Ɔkwantufo no Nkɔso (Ɔkasa 5)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea adɔfo a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen

Momma yenbue Bible no nkyerɛ Romafo Ti 6 Nkyekyɛm 4 Enti wosiee yɛn ne no asubɔ mu kɔɔ owuo mu, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛnantew nkwa foforɔ mu, sɛdeɛ wɔnam Agya no anuonyam so nyanee Kristo firii awufoɔ mu no.

Ɛnnɛ yɛbom sua, yɛ fekubɔ, na yɛkyɛ Pilgrim’s Progress no wɔ bere ne bere mu "Kristo Wuo Mu Ɛnam Asubɔ So". Daabi. 5. 5. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea pa [asɔre no] soma adwumayɛfo: wɔnam wɔn nsa so kyerɛw na wɔka nokware asɛm, yɛn nkwagye, yɛn anuonyam, ne yɛn nipadua agyede ho asɛmpa. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn kra ani na ɔmmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu wo nsɛm, a ɛyɛ honhom mu nokware → Sɛ wɔbɔ yɛn asu kɔ owu mu a, ɛma wɔde biribiara a yɛyɛ no toto asetra foforo ho. ! Amen.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din kronkron mu! Amen

(1) nam asubɔ so kɔ owu mu

Munnim sɛ yɛn a wɔbɔɔ yɛn asu kɔɔ Kristo Yesu mu no, wɔbɔɔ yɛn asu kɔɔ ne wu mu? Enti wosiee yɛn ne no asubɔ mu kɔɔ owuo mu, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛnantew nkwa foforɔ mu, sɛdeɛ wɔnam Agya no anuonyam so nyanee Kristo firii awufoɔ mu no. Sɛ yɛne No ayɛ biako wɔ Ne wuo nsɛsoɔ mu a, yɛne no nso bɛka abom wɔ Ne wusɔreɛ nsɛsoɔ mu nso hwɛ Romafoɔ 6:3-5

bisa: Dɛn ne “atirimpɔw” a ɛne sɛ wɔbɛbɔ yɛn asu akɔ Kristo wu mu →?
anoyie: "Botae" ne →

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Kɔka ne ho wɔ owu su mu → sɛe bɔne nipadua;
2. 2. Kɔka ne ho wɔ owusɔre kwan so → ma yɛn nkwa foforo wɔ biribiara a yɛbɛyɛ mu! Amen.

Hyɛ nso: Wɔbɔɔ no asu “kɔ owu mu” → Kristo wu mu, ɔne No wui, Kristo gyaw fam na wɔsɛn no dua so ne “ . wuwu gyina hɔ ” → Ɛyɛ owuo a anuonyam wom na wɔbɔ Kristofoɔ asu, na ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔma yɛnya anuonyam Kristofoɔ ne Adam wuiɛ sɛ ɔhwee fam anaa ɔdaa hɔ, a ɛyɛ owuo a ɛyɛ aniwuo a enni anuonyam Kristo Ɛho hia paa sɛ agyidifoɔ "wɔbɔ asu".

(2) Wo ne no nyɛ biako wɔ owu su mu

Sɛ yɛne no ayɛ biako wɔ ne wuo sɛso mu a, yɛne no nso bɛka abom wɔ ne wusɔreɛ nsɛsoɔ mu (Romafoɔ 6:5)
bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na yɛne No bɛyɛ biako wɔ Ne wu sɛso mu?
anoyie: "Bɔ wo asu"! Wo si gyinae sɛ “wobɛbɔ wo asu” → wobɛbɔ wo asu akɔ Kristo wu mu → ɛno ne sɛ wo ne no bɛka abom wɔ Ne wu nsɛso mu → wɔbɛbɔ wo asɛnnua mu! Wɔbɔɔ wo asu, "wɔ" Kristo wu mu! Onyankopɔn bɛma wɔabɔ wo ne no asɛnnua mu . Enti Awurade Yesu kaa sɛ → Fa me kɔndua to wo so na sua mfi me hɔ, ɛfiri sɛ me kɔndua yɛ mmerɛ na m’adesoa yɛ hare → Wɔbɔɔ wo “asu” kɔɔ ne wuo mu, na wɔbuu wo sɛ wɔne Kristo abɔ asɛnnua mu , so ɛnyɛ mmerɛ sɛ mobɛka ne ho abom wɔ owu suban mu? So adesoa no mu yɛ hare? Yiw, ɛnte saa! Enti, so wote ase?
Twe Romafo 6:6: Na yenim sɛ wɔbɔɔ yɛn dedaw no asɛnnua mu kaa ne ho, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛsɛe bɔne nipadua no, na yɛansom bɔne bio;

(3) Wo ne No nkabom wɔ Ne wusɔreɛ nsɛsoɔ mu

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na yɛne No bɛyɛ biako wɔ Ne wusɔre nsɛso mu?
anoyie: Di na nom Awurade Anwummeduan no! Anadwo a wɔyii Awurade Yesu maeɛ no, ɔfaa paanoo, na ɔdaa ase wieeɛ no, ɔbubuu mu kaa sɛ, “Eyi ne me nipadua a wɔde ama mo ama mo no, ɔno nso faa kuruwa no kaa sɛ, “ Kuruwa yi Ɛyɛ apam foforo a ɛwɔ me mogya mu. ”→Deɛ odi me honam na ɔnom me mogya no tena me mu, na me nso metena ne mu.

Hyɛ nso: Di na nom Awurade deɛ Nam ne Mogya →→Awurade nipadua no wɔ nsɛso bi? Aane! Sɛ yedi Awurade Anwummeduan no a, so yɛne “ . bɔbea "Awurade nipadua ne ne mogya? Yiw! →→." Obiara a ɔdi me honam na ɔnom me mogya no wɔ daa nkwa, na mɛnyane no da a ɛdi akyire no (Yohane 6:54). obenyan no Yen ne no abom wo ne suban mu bere biara a yebedi Awurade anwummere aduane no daa, a ema y[n gyidie firi gyidie mu k] gyidie mu, na y[n denden firi ahoɔden mu kɔ anuonyam mu, na yɛnya nkwa foforɔ da biara da kwan so, wote ase?

(4) Ma yɛn ɔkwan foforo a yɛbɛfa so ayɛ biribiara wɔ biribiara a yɛbɛyɛ mu

Sɛ obi wɔ Kristo mu a, ɔyɛ adebɔ foforo; Hwɛ 2 Korintofo 5:17
Yɛ foforo wɔ w’adwene mu, na hyɛ nipasu foforo a wɔbɔɔ no wɔ Onyankopɔn suban so wɔ nokware trenee ne kronkronyɛ mu. Hwɛ Efesofo 4:23-24

(5) Nom Honhom Kronkron baako na yɛ nipadua baako

Sɛdeɛ nipadua no yɛ baako nanso ɛwɔ akwaa bebree, na ɛwom sɛ akwaa no dɔɔso deɛ, nanso ɛda so ara yɛ nipadua baako, saa ara na ɛte wɔ Kristo fam. Sɛ yɛyɛ Yudafoɔ anaa Helafoɔ, sɛ yɛyɛ nkoa anaa yɛde yɛn ho a, wɔde Honhom Kronkron baako na ɛbɔ yɛn nyinaa asu, yɛbɛyɛ nipadua baako, na yɛnom Honhom Kronkron baako. Hwɛ 1 Korintofo 12:12-13

(6) Si Kristo nipadua, yɛ biako wɔ gyidi mu, nyin, na kyekye wo ho wɔ ɔdɔ mu.

Ɔmaa asomafoɔ binom, adiyifoɔ binom, asɛmpakafoɔ binom, ahwɛfoɔ ne akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ binom, sɛ wɔnsiesie ahotefoɔ no mma ɔsom adwuma, na wɔnkyekyere Kristo nipadua, kɔsi sɛ yɛn nyinaa bɛduru gyidie ne Onyankopɔn nimdeɛ baakoyɛ mu Ne ba no nyinii bɛyɛɛ onipa a ne ho akokwaw, oduu Kristo a ɛyɛ ma no kɛseyɛ mu,... ɔnam ne so kura nipadua no nyinaa mu yiye, a nkwaa biara di n’atirimpɔw ho dwuma, na nkwaa biara boa wɔn ho wɔn ho sɛnea ne dwumadi te nipadua nyinaa, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a nipadua no anyin, na wɔ Ɔdɔ mu Si wo ho. Hwɛ Efesofo 4:11-13,16

[Hyɛ nso]: Yɛnam "asubɔ" so na yɛka Kristo bom → owu a wɔde ahyɛ mu na wɔasie yɛne no → Sɛ yɛne no ayɛ biako wɔ ne wu suban mu a, yɛne no nso bɛyɛ biako wɔ ne wusɔre nsɛso mu → Adeyɛ biara a yɛwɔ nti Nneɛma foforo a wɔde yɛ nneɛma wɔ hɔ. Te sɛ Kristo a wɔnam Agya no anuonyam so nyanee no fii awufo mu no. →Fa onipa foforo no, hyɛ Kristo, nom Honhom Kronkron biako, na yɛ nipadua biako →Ɛyɛ "Yesu Kristo Asɔre" →Di honhom mu aduan na nom honhom mu nsu wɔ Kristo mu, na nyin bɛyɛ onipa a ne ho akokwaw, ayɛ ma of the stature of the fullness of Christ → Ne so na nipadua no nyinaa ka bom yiye, na nkwaa biara wɔ n’adwuma a ɛfata, na ɛboa wɔn ho wɔn ho sɛnea ɔfã biara dwumadi te, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a nipadua no anyin na akyekye ne ho wɔ mu ɔdɔ. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

(7) Di Awurade anammɔn akyi

Sɛ Kristofoɔ tu mmirika Pilgrim’s Progress a, ɛnyɛ wɔn nko ara na wɔtu mmirika, na mmom wɔde wɔn ho hyɛ asraafoɔ dɔm kɛseɛ bi mu , na ɛsɛ sɛ yenya nkonimbo a ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn frɛ a ɛkorɔn wɔ Kristo Yesu mu. Hwɛ Filipifo 3:14 .

Te sɛ Nnwom Nnwom 1:8 Wo ne mmea mu fɛfɛɛfɛ→" ɔbaa "Referring to the church, you are already in the church of Jesus Christ" → Sɛ wunnim a, di nguan no anammɔn akyi kɛkɛ...!

Asɛmpa nkyerɛwee a wɔkyɛ, a Onyankopɔn Honhom na ɛkanyan Yesu Kristo Adwumayɛfoɔ, Onua Wang*Yun, Onuabaa Liu, Onuabaa Zheng, Onua Cen, ne mfɛfoɔ adwumayɛfoɔ foforɔ, boa na wɔbom yɛ adwuma wɔ Yesu Kristo Asɔre no asɛmpa adwuma no mu . Wɔka Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no, asɛmpa a ɛma kwan ma wɔgye nnipa nkwa, hyɛ wɔn anuonyam, na wɔgye wɔn nipadua! Amen

Hymn: Wawu dedaw, wɔasie no dedaw

Wɔma anuanom mmarima ne mmaa pii akwaaba sɛ wɔmfa wɔn browser no hwehwɛ - Asɔre a ɛwɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo mu - sɛ wɔbɛka yɛn ho na yɛabom ayɛ adwuma de aka Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no.

Wo ne QQ 2029296379 nni nkitaho

YOO! Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛne mo nyinaa akyɛ. Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen
