articles.title: (2) Wɔde wɔn ho afi mmara ne mmara nnome ho
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea adɔfo a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no mu nkɔ Romafo ti 7 ne nkyekyem 6 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Nanso ɛfiri sɛ yɛwuwu maa mmara a ɛkyekyere yɛn no, seesei yɛade yɛn ho afiri mmara no ho, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛsom Awurade sɛdeɛ honhom foforɔ (honhom: anaa wɔkyerɛ aseɛ sɛ Honhom Kronkron) na ɛnyɛ sɛdeɛ tete kwan no teɛ amanne kwan so.

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "Detachment" Ti 2. 2. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa 【Asɔre】Soma adwumayɛfo Ɛnam nokorɛ asɛm a wɔde wɔn nsa akyerɛw na wɔaka, a ɛyɛ yɛn nkwagyeɛ ne yɛn animuonyam asɛmpa no so. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu ani na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware → 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa wɔade wɔn ho afi mmara no ho, . 2. 2. bɔne ho ahofadi, . 3. 3. efi owu akuturuku mu, . 4. 4. Guan fii atemmu a etwa to no mu. Amen!

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen.

(1) Ɔhonam akɔnnɔ → ɛnam mmara so wo bɔne

Momma yensua Romafo 7:5 wɔ Bible mu Efisɛ bere a na yɛwɔ honam mu no, na akɔnnɔ bɔne a wɔde mmara awo no reyɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn akwaa mu, na ɛresow owu aba.

Sɛ wonyinsɛn akɔnnɔ bɔne a, ɛwo bɔne; --Yakobo 1:15

[Hyɛ nso]: Sɛ yɛwɔ honam mu → "yɛwɔ akɔnnɔ" → "honam akɔnnɔ" yɛ akɔnnɔ bɔne → efisɛ → "mmara" no yɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn akwaa mu → "akɔnnɔ yɛ adwuma" → "nyinsɛn" no fi ase, ne sɛ akɔnnɔ no ara pɛ nyinsɛn → wɔwo.Sɛ bɔne ba a, bɔne, sɛ anyin a, ɛwo owuo, kyerɛ sɛ, ɛsow owuo aba. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Asemmisa: Ɛhe na "bɔne" fi?

Mmuae: "Bɔne" → bere a yɛwɔ honam mu → "honam akɔnnɔ" → esiane "mmara", "akɔnnɔ a wɔde ahyɛ mu" wɔ yɛn asɔremma mu → "akɔnnɔ a wɔde ahyɛ mu" → fi ase "nyinsɛn" → sɛnea akɔnnɔ no nyinsɛn → wɔwo bɔne. "Bɔne" yɛ "wo" esiane akɔnnɔ + mmara → nti. Enti, so wote ase pefee? Baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, wɔnkan bɔne; Hwɛ Romafo ti 4 nkyekyem 15, ti 5 nkyekyem 13 ne ti 7 nkyekyem 8.

(2) Bɔne tumi ne mmara, na owu yaw yɛ bɔne.

Wu! Ɛhe na wo tumi a wode bedi nkonim no wɔ?

Wu! Wo sting no wɔ he?

Owuo nwene yɛ bɔne, na bɔne tumi ne mmara. --1 Korintofoɔ 15:55-56. Hyɛ no nsow: Owuo nkeka → yɛ bɔne, bɔne akatua → yɛ owuo, na bɔne tumi → ne mmara. Enti, wunim abusuabɔ a ɛda saa baasa yi ntam?

Baabi a "mmara" wɔ hɔ no, → "bɔne" wɔ hɔ, na sɛ "bɔne" wɔ hɔ a → "owu" wɔ hɔ. Enti Bible se → baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, "mfomso" biara nni hɔ → "a mmarato nni mu" → mmara no sobu biara nni hɔ → mmara no sobu biara nni hɔ → bɔne biara nni hɔ, "bɔne nni hɔ" → owuo biara nni hɔ ". Enti , so wote ase yiye?

(3) Ahofadi a wonya fi mmara ne mmara nnome ho

Nanso esiane sɛ yɛwuwui maa mmara a ɛkyekyeree yɛn nti, seesei "wɔade yɛn ho afi mmara no ho" sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi asom Awurade sɛnea honhom foforo (honhom: anaasɛ wɔkyerɛ ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron) te na ɛnyɛ sɛnea amanne dedaw no te Nhwɛsoɔ. --Romafoɔ 7:6

Galatifo 2:19 Na mmara no so na mewu maa mmara no, na manya nkwa ama Onyankopɔn. → Monam Kristo nipadua so wuwui maa mmara no nso, na moayɛ afoforɔ dea, mpo nea wɔanyan no afiri awufoɔ mu no dea, na yɛaso aba ama Onyankopɔn. --Romafoɔ 7:4

Kristo gyee yɛn fii mmara no nnome mu denam nnome a ɔbɛyɛɛ maa yɛn no so efisɛ wɔadome obiara a ɔsɛn dua so -- Galatifo Nhoma 3:13

[Hyɛ no nsow]: Ɔsomafo "Paulo" kae sɛ: "Miwu maa mmara esiane mmara nti → 1 "Miwu maa mmara" nam Kristo nipadua so → 2 "Miwu maa mmara" → 3 wɔ mmara no mu sɛ kyekyeree me Owuo.

bisa: Dɛn ne "atirimpɔw" a ɛwɔ owu ma mmara no?

anoyie: Wɔde wɔn ho fi mmara ne ne nnome ho.

Ɔsomafoɔ "Paulo" kaa sɛ → Wɔbɔɔ me asɛnnua mu na me ne Kristo wuiɛ → 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa bɔne ho ahofadi, . 2. 2. "Wɔde wo ho afi mmara ne mmara nnome ho So wote ase pefee?

Enti nea ɛwɔ hɔ ara ne: 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Sɛ́ wobɛde wo ho afi mmara ho → woade wo ho afi bɔne ho; 2. 2. Sɛ́ wobɛde wo ho afi bɔne ho → wade wo ho afi mmara no tumi ho; 3. 3. Wode wo ho firi mmara tumi mu → woade wo ho afiri mmara atemmuo mu; 4. 4. Sɛ́ wɔade wɔn ho afi mmara atemmu mu → wɔade wɔn ho afi owu akuturuku mu. Enti, so wote ase?

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa. Amen

2021.06.05 na ɛwɔ hɔ

articles.title: (1) Asɛmpa no a yegye di no ma yɛde yɛn ho fi bɔne ho
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea adɔfo a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no nkyerɛ Romafo ti 6 nkyekyem 5-7 na yɛnbom nkenkan: Na sɛ yɛne no abom wɔ ne wuo sɛso mu a, yɛne no nso bɛka abom wɔ ne wusɔreɛ nsɛsoɔ mu, ɛfiri sɛ yɛnim sɛ wɔbɔɔ yɛn dedaw no asɛnnua mu, na wɔasɛe bɔne nipadua no, na yɛasɛe yɛn ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔsom bɔne bio;

Ɛnnɛ mɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na me ne mo nyinaa akyɛ "Nneɛma a wɔayi afi nnipa mu". Daabi. 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbaa pa [asɔre] no nam nokware asɛm a wɔde wɔn nsa akyerɛw na wɔaka, a ɛyɛ yɛn nkwagye ne anuonyam asɛmpa no so soma adwumayɛfo. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu ani na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware → Asɛmpa no ne Kristo asɛnnua no ntease → ma yɛde yɛn ho fi bɔne ho. Meda wo ase Awurade Yesu wɔ ɔdɔ a ɛboro nimdeɛ so!

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen.

(1) Dɛn ne bɔne?

Obiara a ɔbɛyɛ bɔne no bu mmara so; --1 Yohane 3:4

Nea ɛnteɛ nyinaa yɛ bɔne, na bɔne bi wɔ hɔ a ɛnkɔ owu mu. --1 Yohane 5:17

Yesu buaa sɛ, "Nokware, nokware, mise mo sɛ, obiara a ɔyɛ bɔne yɛ bɔne akoa. - Yohane 8:34

[Hyɛ no nsow]: Sɛnea atifi hɔ kyerɛwsɛm kyerɛwtohɔ ahorow no kyerɛ no

bisa: Dɛn ne bɔne?

anoyie: 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Mmara a wobu so yɛ bɔne, . 2. 2. Biribiara a ɛnteɛ yɛ bɔne.

bisa: nea bɔne yɛ". Sɛnea ɛte no "Bɔne a ɛyɛ owu?

anoyie: Onyankopɔn ne onipa so asoɔden". Yɛ apam "Bɔne → ne bɔne a ɛde kɔ owu mu → sɛ nhwɛso no, bɔne a ɛne sɛ "nsɛ sɛ wudi papa ne bɔne ho nimdeɛ dua";" Apam Foforo "-Nnye nni". Apam Foforo 》bɔne.

bisa: nea bɔne yɛ". Ɛnyɛ nea ɛkɔ akyiri "Bɔne a ɛyɛ owu?

anoyie: Bɔne a ɛnyɛ apam a ɛda Onyankopɔn ne onipa ntam → Sɛ nhwɛso no, "ɔhonam bɔne → Onyankopɔn renkae, te sɛ "Dawid ne obi a ofi Korinto asafo mu faa ne mpena na ɔbɔɔ awaresɛe" → Nanso Onyankopɔn bɛkae no." sɛ ɔyɛ eyi a

Enti → sɛ yɛfa Honhom no so bɔ yɛn bra a, momma yɛnam Honhom no so nso nante → denam " " . Honhom Kronkron " Munkum nipadua no nneyɛe bɔne nyinaa. Ɛnyɛ mmara no a wubedi so. So wote eyi ase yiye? Nhwehwɛmu - Galatifo 5:25 ne Kolosefo 3:5.

(2) Bɔne akatua ne owu

Na bɔne akatua ne owuo, na Onyankopɔn akyɛdeɛ ne daa nkwa wɔ yɛn Awurade Kristo Yesu mu. --Romafoɔ 6:23

Sɛdeɛ bɔne nam onipa baako so baa wiase, na owuo nam bɔne so baeɛ no, saa ara na owuo baa obiara so ɛfiri sɛ wɔn nyinaa ayɛ bɔne. ... Sɛdeɛ bɔne dii hene wɔ owuo mu no, saa ara na adom nso nam trenee so di hene kɔ daa nkwa mu denam Yesu Kristo yɛn Awurade so. --Romafoɔ 5:12,21

[Hyɛ nso]: " amumuyɔ "Efi Adam a odi kan → Onipa biako baa wiase, na owu nam bɔne so bae → efisɛ bɔne akatua ne owu → "Bɔne" dii hene wɔ owu mu → na owu baa nnipa nyinaa so, efisɛ wɔn nyinaa ayɛ bɔne; saa ara na ɛte , adom nam trenee so di hene kɔ daa nkwa mu wɔ Kristo mu denam yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo agyede so Amen.

(3) . lɛtɛ Asɛmpa no ma yɛde yɛn ho fi bɔne ho

Romafoɔ 6:5-7 Sɛ yɛne no abom wɔ ne wuo nsɛsoɔ mu a, yɛne no nso bɛyɛ baako wɔ ne wusɔreɛ nsɛsoɔ mu, ɛfiri sɛ yɛnim sɛ wɔbɔɔ yɛn dedaw no ne no asɛnnua mu, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a bɔne nipadua no bɛtumi wɔnsɛee, ama wɔasɛe bɔne nipadua no, yɛnyɛ bɔne nkoa bio;

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na wobetumi aguan bɔne?

anoyie: " onipa a wawu "Wɔde ne ho fi bɔne ho→ Onyankopɔn yɛ nea onni bɔne (a onni bɔne: mfitiase nkyerɛwee no nnim bɔne biara)→". Yesu "," ma "Yɛbɛyɛɛ bɔne→Yesu nko". ma "Sɛ nnipa nyinaa wuwu a, wɔn nyinaa wuwu → "nyinaa" wuwu → "nyinaa" nya ahofadi fi bɔne mu. Amen! Wɔ saa kwan yi so no,

So wote ase yiye? →So "obiara" a ɔwɔ ha no ka wo ho? So wopɛ sɛ wo nipasu dedaw no ne Kristo yɛ biako na wɔbɔ wo asɛndua mu na wobom wuwu? Wogye di sɛ akwakoraa no awu → owufo no "ade ne ho afi bɔne ho" → "wɔade wo ho afi bɔne mu", ɛsɛ sɛ wugye di! Ɛsɛ sɛ wugye nea Awurade Yesu kae no di mma wo ntie saa "nnipa a bɔne adaadaa wɔn nsɛm"→" lɛtɛ" Wɔn a wogye asɛmpa yi di no "wɔrennye" fɔ;" nnipa a wonnye nni "→Wɔabu bɔne no fɔ. Efisɛ wannye Onyankopɔn Ba a ɔwoo no koro no din nni→[Yesu]→"Yesu din" kyerɛ sɛ obegye ne nkurɔfo afi wɔn bɔne mu. "Sɛ woannye nni a"→ wobebu wo fɔ→sɛnea woreyɛ So wote ase pefee sɛ biribiara a wɔyɛ wɔ mmara no ase, sɛ́ ɛyɛ papa anaa bɔne no, wɔde mmara no bu atɛn trenee mu - 2 Korintofo 5:14, 21 ne Yohane 3:17- 18 nkyekyem ahorow

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa. Amen

2021.06.04 na ɛwɔ hɔ

articles.title: Nantwinini no hintiw, na Usa tenee ne nsa de gyinaa apam adaka no so
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa! Amen

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no mu nkɔ 1 Beresosɛm 139 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Berɛ a wɔduruu Keton apuporowbea (Nagon wɔ 2 Samuel 6:6) no, Usa tenee ne nsa sɛ ɔbɛkura adaka no mu ɛfiri sɛ nantwie no ato hintidua.

Ɛnnɛ yɛsua adeɛ, yɛbɔ fekuo, na yɛkyɛ ". Nantwi no hintiw na Usa Yi tenee ne nsa sɛ ɔrekura Apam Adaka no. 》Mpaebɔ: Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. " Ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa “Fa nokware asɛm a wɔde wɔn nsa akyerɛw na wɔaka no soma adwumayɛfo, wɔde wo nkwagye ho asɛmpa no fi soro ba, na wɔde ama yɛn bere mu, na yɛn honhom mu nkwa adɔɔso Amen! Yesu hyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa daa na obue yɛn adwene ma yɛte Bible no ase na ɛma yetumi hu na yɛte honhom mu nokware→ Te Usa kɔkɔbɔ a ɔtenee ne nsa de gyinaa Apam Adaka no akyi bere a nantwinini no hintiw no ase. .

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mebisa yei wɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

1 Beresosɛm 13:7, 9-11

Woyii Onyankopɔn adaka no fii Abinadab fie de guu teaseɛnam foforo mu. Usa ne Ahio na wɔkaa teaseɛnam no. ... Berɛ a wɔduruu Keton apuporowbea (a ɛyɛ Nagon wɔ 2 Samuel 6:6) no, Usa tenee ne nsa sɛ ɔbɛkura adaka no mu ɛfiri sɛ anantwie no ato hintidua. AWURADE bo fuwii no, na ɔhwee no, ɛfiri sɛ ɔtenee ne nsa wɔ adaka no so, na ɔwuiɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn anim. Dawid ho yeraw no efisɛ Awurade kum Usa, na ɔfrɛɛ beae hɔ Peres-Usa de besi nnɛ.

(1) Ná Israelfo no wɔ Mose Mmara no na wɔyɛɛ wɔn ade sɛnea mmara ne nhyehyɛe ahorow te

bisa: Nantwi no hintiw na "ɔhuruw" → So na ɛyɛ bɔne sɛ Usa teɛɛ ne nsa na okura Apam Adaka no?
anoyie: "Usa" anni Mose Mmara no ahyɛde so → "ɔsoaa Onyankopɔn adaka no wɔ nnua ne mmati so" na "wɔtwee n'aso" → efisɛ moansoa adaka no anim na moankɔbisa AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn sɛnea amanne te, enti Ɔtwe Aso (mfitiase nkyerɛwee no ne sɛ obekum) yɛn. "Enti asɔfoɔ, Lewifoɔ, hyiraa wɔn ho sɛ wɔde AWURADE, Israel Nyankopɔn apam adaka no bɛba. Lewi mma de nnua soaa Onyankopɔn adaka no wɔ wɔn mmati so, sɛdeɛ AWURADE nam Mose so hyɛɛ no .Nsɛm a wɔde gyina so - 1 Beresosɛm 15 Ti 13-15

bisa: So na Usa yɛ Lewi aseni anaa?
anoyie:" Onyankopɔn adaka no "wɔde sii Abinadab fie wɔ Bepɔw Kiriat-Yearim so, faako a ɛtraa hɔ mfe 20 - hwɛ 1 Samuel 7:1-2, na na ɛyɛ Lewifo asɛyɛde sɛ wɔwɛn ntamadan no ne "the." utensils of the sanctuary" - -Hwɛ Numeri 18, "Usa" yɛ Abinadab ba, na Abinadab abusua wɔ asɛdeɛ sɛ wɔwɛn Apam Adaka no.

bisa: Wɔde "Apam Adaka" no too "teaseɛnam foforo" no so a "nantwi twe" na Usa teɛɛ ne nsa sɛ "ɔkura" Adaka no → Mmara bɛn na wobuu so?
anoyie: Nanso wɔamfa nteaseɛnam ne anantwinini amma Kohat mma, ɛfiri sɛ na wɔreyɛ kronkronbea adwuma na wɔsoa akronkronneɛ no wɔ wɔn mmati so. Hwɛ Numeri ti 7 nkyekyem 9 --- Ɛberɛ a ɛduruu sɛ wɔsi nsraban mu no, na Aaron ne ne mma no kataa kronkronbea no ne emu nnwinneɛ nyinaa so wie fa wo nsa ka nneɛma kronkron no, na wɔanwuwu. Na Kohat mma na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔsoa saa nneɛma a ɛwɔ ntamadan no mu yi. Numeri 4:15→

Hyɛ no nsow: "Apam Adaka" gyina hɔ ma Kronkronbea Kronkron ne Onyankopɔn ahengua! Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔma so, wɔma so wɔ nnua ne mmati so → Yeremia 17:12 Yɛn kronkronbea yɛ anuonyam ahengua, a wɔde asi soro fi mfiase. ; Onyankopɔn nam nantwi no "ehu" ne Usa "asotwe" so bɔɔ Israelfo ne Ɔhene Dawid kɔkɔ wɔ Usa asɛm no akyi no, Ɔhene Dawid bɛbrɛɛ ne ho ase kɛse → Me nso mɛbrɛ me ho ase na mabrɛ me ho ase wɔ m'ankasa m'ani so - 2 Samuel Ti 6 Nkyekyɛm 22. Enti Onyankopɔn kaa sɛ, “Dawid yɛ onipa wɔ m’ankasa m’akoma mu—hwɛ Asomafoɔ Nnwuma 13 nkyekyɛmu 22. Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛn a yɛyɛ atiefo no nso brɛ yɛn ho ase na yentumi nkɔ soro nsen adwumayɛfo a Onyankopɔn asoma wɔn no!

(2) Amanaman mufo wɔ wɔn ankasa mmara, kyerɛ sɛ, ahonim mmara a ɛsɛ sɛ wɔyɛ wɔ mu

bisa: Filistifoɔ no nso de "Apam Adaka" no too teaseɛnam foforɔ so na wɔde san kɔɔ ne mfitiaseɛ beaeɛ wɔ anantwi so Adɛn nti na na wɔn ho ye? Mmom no, asiane gyaw wɔn?
anoyie: Filistifo "kyerɛ sɛ, Amanaman mufo" nni Mose Mmara no na enhia sɛ wɔyɛ ade sɛnea Mose Mmara no mu nhyehyɛe te na mmom Amanaman mufo wɔ "wɔn ankasa mmara", kyerɛ sɛ, ahonim mmara , na monyɛ mmara no mu nneɛma sɛnea wɔn su te - twe adwene si Roma Yosua 2:14 → Wokaa sɛ, “Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wode Israel ba a Ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔsan de Onyankopɔn adaka no kɔ baabiara, na mmom ɛsɛ sɛ wɔde mpata ma no afɔrebɔde? "Ɛhe na mpata akyɛde no wɔ?" Ɔhaw koro no ara ato mmarima no ne mo mmapɔmma no ... Afei monyɛ teaseɛnam foforɔ, na momfa anantwi mmienu a wɔmfa nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn nhyɛ teaseɛnam no mu, na momfa anantwi mma no mmra fie firi AWURADE hɔ mu, fa to adaka no nkyɛn, na fa adaka no kɔ 1 Samuel 6:3-4, 7-8.

(3) Esiane sɛ mmara no yɛ mmerɛw esiane honam nti, nneɛma bi wɔ hɔ a entumi nyɛ

Esiane sɛ na mmara no yɛ mmerɛw esiane ɔhonam nti na entumi nyɛ biribi nti, Onyankopɔn somaa n’ankasa Ba a ɔte sɛ bɔne honam sɛ ɔmmra bɔne ho afɔre, na obuu bɔne wɔ honam mu fɔ sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a mmara no trenee bɛba mu wɔ yɛn a monntra ase sɛnea ɔhonam te , wɔn a wodi Honhom Kronkron akyi nkutoo. Romafo 8:3-4

Hyɛ nso: Israelfoɔ no wɔ Mose Mmara, na Amanamanmufoɔ nso wɔ wɔn ankasa mmara → Nanso obiara a ɔwɔ wiase ayɛ bɔne na watɔ Onyankopɔn anuonyam denam mmara a ɔbuu so - hwɛ Romafoɔ 3:23. Osian honam mu mmerɛwyɛ nti, onipa antumi anhyɛ mmara no tenenee ma mu Nyankopɔn somaa ne Ba sɛ ɔmmɛyɛ bɔne honam nsɛsoɔ na ɔbɛyɛɛ bɔne afɔdeɛ wɔ honam mu ma enti mmara no tenenee na ebetumi aba mu wɔ yɛn a yenni honam akyi , wɔn a wodi Honhom Kronkron akyi nkutoo. Amen! Enti, so wote ase pefee?

YOO! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ m’ayɔnkofa no Mfitiaseɛ Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Agya Nyankopɔn no dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ wɔ mo nyinaa nkyɛn daa! Amen

2021.09.30

articles.title: Nadab ne Abihu de ogya a ɛyɛ nwonwa bɔɔ afɔre
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa! Amen

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nkɔ Leviticus Ti 10, nkyekyem 1-3, na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Aaron mma Nadab ne Abihu, wɔn mu biara faa n’ankasa aduhuam kotoku, de ogya hyɛɛ mu ma, de aduhuam guu so, na wɔde ogya a ɛyɛ nwonwa bɔɔ AWURADE anim a AWURADE nhyɛɛ wɔn.

Ɛnnɛ yɛsua adeɛ, yɛbɔ fekuo, na yɛkyɛ "Ogya a Ɛyɛ nwonwa". Bɔ mpae: Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Yɛda Awurade ase sɛ wasoma adwumayɛfoɔ a wɔnam wɔn nsa so kyerɛw na wɔka nokorɛ asɛm a ɛyɛ yɛn nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no. Wɔde paanoo fi soro ba na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere ano na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ adefo. Amen! Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi ahu na yɛate honhom mu nokware → So wote nea ogya a ɛyɛ nwonwa a wɔde bɔ afɔre kyerɛ no ase?

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mebisa yei wɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Ogya a ɛyɛ mmerɛw, . Wɔbɔ no fán huǒ, na ɛyɛ China kasa mu asɛmfua a ɛkyerɛ wiasefo nkate mu akɔnnɔ.

kyerɛ mu : Wiasefo nkate fam akɔnnɔ.

Source: Yuan Dynasty Zheng Tingyu "Nin Zi Ji" ti a edi kan: "Sɛ wo suani no amfa sika nni dwuma atirimɔden so a, ogya a ɛyɛ mpapahwekwa bɛhyew me yafunu mu. Mede besie me nsateaa mu wɔ mframa mu te sɛ me wura, na suasua me wura ɔsram a ɛhyerɛn wɔ ne poma ano."

Leviticus 10:1-3 Aaron mma Nadab ne Abihu, wɔn mu biara faa n’ankasa aduhuam kotokuo, de ogya hyɛɛ mu ma, de aduhuam kaa ho, na wɔde ogya a ɛyɛ nwonwa bɔɔ afɔreɛ wɔ AWURADE anim, ɛfiri sɛ na AWURADE anhyɛ wɔn, na ogya nso wɔ hɔ. Momfi AWURADE anim mmra na monhye wɔn, na wɔbɛwuwu AWURADE anim. Afei Mose ka kyerɛɛ Aaron se, “Deɛ AWURADE aka nie: ‘Mɛyɛ kronkron wɔ wɔn a wɔbɛbɛn me no mu, na wɔbɛhyɛ me anuonyam wɔ ɔman no nyinaa anim.’” Aaron yɛɛ komm.

Bible nkyerɛase:

bisa: Dɛn na ogya a ɛyɛ nwonwa kyerɛ?

anoyie: Ogya a ɛyɛ nwonwa kyerɛ asase so ogya, ɛnyɛ ogya a wɔahyira so wɔ ntamadan no afɔremuka so → wɔfrɛ no "ogya a wonnim".

bisa: Dɛn na ogya a ɛyɛ nwonwa gyina hɔ ma?

anoyie: Ogya a ɛyɛ nwonwa yɛ ɔhonam akɔnnɔ ne akɔnnɔ ho mfonini - honam, wiase, efĩ, bɔne, nea enni ahohora → "Sɛ wo ne wo mma hyɛn ahyiae ntamadan mu a, monnom nsa anaa anonne biara, anyɛ saa a wo Owu; eyi na ɛbɛba." ahyɛdeɛ daa mo awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa mu, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a mobɛtetew kronkron ne deɛ ɛho tew ne deɛ ɛho ntew;

Hyɛ nso: Asɔre pii a ɛwɔ hɔ nnɛ no nkyerɛ nsonsonoe a ɛda nneɛma kronkron ne wiase nneɛma, nneɛma a ɛho tew ne nea ɛho ntew ntam → wɔn nyinaa de "nneɛma a ɛho agu fĩ, mmɔkaw ne nea ɛho ntew sɛnea wɔn ankasa pɛ te, nsonsonoe biara nni apam dedaw no ne apam foforo no ntam, na ɛwɔ hɔ." nsonsonoe biara nni nea ɛwɔ mmara ase no ntam" Nsonsonoe biara nni adom ne adom ntam, mpaapaemu biara nni onipa dedaw ne onipa foforo ntam, mpaapaemu biara nni nea ɛyɛ Adam de ne nea ɛyɛ Kristo de no ntam, mpaapaemu biara nni hɔ honam ne honhom mu mpaapaemu biara nni nnebɔneyɛfo ne treneefo ntam, mpaapaemu biara nni hann ne esum ntam, mpaapaemu biara nni nea ɛho tew ne nea ɛho tew ntam Ntetewmu a enni hɔ → ɛnyɛ sɛ wɔde "nnebɔneyɛfo" a wɔatew wɔn ho no bɛbɔ afɔre ama Onyankopɔn → sɛnea Nadab ne Abihu de "ogya nwonwaso" bɔɔ Onyankopɔn, a Awurade anhyɛ wɔn sɛ wɔmfa "nteɛso" a wɔde maa Onyankopɔn, Nadab ne Abihu yɛ nhwɛsoɔ → ɔde suro twɛn atemmuo ne ogya a ɛbɛhyew atamfo nyinaa nko ara Hwɛ Hebrifoɔ 10:27, 2 Tesalonikafoɔ 2:8 ne Adiyisɛm 20. ti.

nti" paul "Ka sɛ → Ma meyɛ Kristo Yesu akoa mma Amanaman mufo, Onyankopɔn asɛmpa no sɔfo, na Honhom Kronkron no atew m'afɔrebɔ a mede ma Amanaman mufo no ho → "Kronkronyɛ yɛ obi a onni bɔne" na ebetumi agye atom." → Sɛ "Sɛ ". ɔdebɔneyɛfo "Sɛ wode bɛma → ne sɛ wode bɛma". Ogya a ɛyɛ daa "Wɔhyira wɔn ho so maa Onyankopɔn, asɛnkafo a wɔte saa ne "Nadab ne Abihu. " So wote ase yiye? Hwɛ Romafo 15:16

YOO! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ m’ayɔnkofa no Mfitiaseɛ Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Agya Nyankopɔn no dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ wɔ mo nyinaa nkyɛn daa! Amen

2021.09.26

articles.title: Nkatanim a ɛkata Mose anim no
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen

Momma yenbue Bible no mu na yɛnbom nkenkan 2 Korintofo 3:16: Nanso sɛ wɔn akoma dan kɔ Awurade nkyɛn pɛ a, wɔyi nkatanim no fi hɔ.

Ɛnnɛ yɛsua adeɛ, yɛbɔ fekuo, na yɛkyɛ "Nkatanim a Ɛwɔ Mose Anim". Bɔ mpae: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya Kronkron, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. anisɔ"" Ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa "Adwumayɛfo a wɔsoma wɔn denam nokware asɛm a wɔatwerɛ na wɔka wɔ wɔn nsam no so → wɔde Onyankopɔn ahintasɛm a wɔde asie tete no mu nyansa ma yɛn, asɛm a Onyankopɔn hyehyɛe ansa na mmere nyinaa reba ama yɛn nkwagye ne anuonyam! Yɛn nkyɛn." through the Holy Spirit It’s revealed. Amen Ma Awurade Yesu nkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu na mmue yɛn adwene na yɛate Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi ahu na yɛate honhom mu nokware→ Te Mose a ɔde nkatanim kataa n’anim ho mfonini no ase .

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Exodus 34:29-35 na ɛwɔ hɔ

Bere a Mose fi Sinai bepɔw so sian bae a okura mmara abopon abien no, na onnim sɛ n’anim hyerɛn efisɛ Awurade ne no kasae. Aaron ne Israelfoɔ nyinaa hunuu sɛ Mose anim hyerɛn, na wosuro sɛ wɔbɛbɛn no. Mose frɛɛ wɔn baa ne nkyɛn; Ɛnna Israel nyinaa bɛn hɔ, na ɔhyɛɛ wɔn AWURADE nsɛm a ɔka kyerɛɛ no wɔ Bepɔ Sinai so no nyinaa. Bere a Mose ne wɔn kasa wiei no, ɔde nkatanim kataa n’anim. Na Mose baa AWURADE anim sɛ ɔne no bɛkasa no, oyii nkatanim no, na ɔfirii adi no, ɔkaa deɛ AWURADE ahyɛ no kyerɛɛ Israelfoɔ no. Israelfo no huu Mose anim sɛ ɛrehyerɛn. Mose de nkatanim kataa n’anim bio, na bere a ɔkɔɔ mu sɛ ɔne Awurade bɛkasa no, oyii nkatanim no.

bisa: Adɛn nti na Mose de nkatanim kataa n’anim?
anoyie: Bere a Aaron ne Israelfo nyinaa huu Mose anim a ɛhyerɛn no, wosuroe sɛ wɔbɛbɛn no

bisa: Dɛn nti na Mose anim fɛfɛ no hyerɛn?
anoyie: Efisɛ Onyankopɔn yɛ hann, na AWURADE kasa kyerɛɛ no, na ɔmaa n’anim hyerɛn → Onyankopɔn yɛ hann, na esum biara nni ne mu. Yei ne nkrasɛm a yɛate afiri Awurade hɔ na yɛde asan aba mo nkyɛn. 1 Yohane 1:5

bisa: Mose a ɔde nkatanim kataa n’anim no gyina hɔ ma dɛn?
anoyie: “Mose de nkatanim kataa n’anim” kyerɛ sɛ na Mose yɛ mmara a wɔakyerɛw wɔ abopon no so no sohwɛfo, na ɛnyɛ mmara no honi ankasa. Ɛsan nso yɛ nhwɛsoɔ sɛ nnipa ntumi mfa wɔn ho nto Mose so na wonni Mose mmara so nhunu nokware suban na wɔhunu Onyankopɔn anuonyam → Mfitiaseɛ no, wɔnam Mose so kaa mmara no ho asɛm firii Yesu Kristo hɔ; Nkyekyɛm--Yohane 1:17. “Mmara” ne ntetee wura a ɔde yɛn kɔ “adom ne nokware” mu. Amen—hwɛ Gal. 3:24 .

bisa: Hena na mmara no te ankasa?
anoyie: Esiane sɛ mmara no yɛ nneɛma pa a ɛbɛba no sunsuma na ɛnyɛ ade no suban ankasa nti, entumi mma wɔn a wɔbɛn wɔn no nwie pɛyɛ denam afɔre koro a wɔbɔ afe biara no so. Hebrifo Ti 10 Nkyekyɛm 1 → “Mmara no kwan a ɛda adi pefee ne Kristo, na mmara no mu nsɛm tiawa ne Kristo, na obiara a ogye no di no benya trenee.” Reference - Romans Ti 10 Nkyem 4. Wote yei ase yie?

Na anuonyam wɔ owu som adwuma a wɔatwerɛ no ɔbo mu no mu, ma enti Israelfoɔ no antumi anhwɛ Mose anim yie ɛnam anuonyam a ɛwɔ n’anim a na ɛreyera nkakrankakra nti, 2 Korintofoɔ 3:7

(1) Mmara no som adwuma a wɔakyerɛw wɔ ɔbo so → yɛ owu som

bisa: Adɛn nti na mmara a wɔakyerɛw wɔ ɔbo so no yɛ owu som adwuma?
anoyie: Esiane sɛ Mose yii Israelfo no fii nkoasom fie a ɛwɔ Misraim no mu nti, Israelfo no hwee ase wɔ sare so. Ne som adwuma no yɛ owu som adwuma. Sɛ woantumi ankɔ Kanaan anaasɛ woankɔ Ɔsoro Ahenni no mu sɛnea Mose Mmara kyerɛ a, sɛ Kaleb ne Yosua de "gyidi" di wɔn anim nkutoo a, wubetumi akɔ mu.

(2) Mmara no som adwuma a wɔakyerɛw wɔ ɔbo so → ne afobu som

2 Korintofo 3:9 Sɛ afobu som adwuma no yɛ anuonyam a, trenee som adwuma no wɔ anuonyam kɛse mpo.

bisa: Dɛn nti na mmara som adwuma yɛ afobu som?
anoyie: Mmara no atirimpɔw ne sɛ ɛbɛma nkurɔfo ahu wɔn bɔne.Sɛ wunim sɛ wodi fɔ a, ɛsɛ sɛ wopata wo bɔne wɔka mmara no kyerɛ wɔn a wɔhyɛ mmara ase, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wobesiw obiara ano. Hwɛ Romafoɔ 3:19-20 sɛ wodi Mose mmara so nanso woantumi anyɛ saa a, Mose bɛbu wo fɔ, ɛfiri sɛ Mose ne mmara no sohwɛfoɔ. Enti, mmara som adwuma ne afobu som. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

(3) Ɔsom adwuma a wɔakyerɛw wɔ koma pon so no ne bemyɛ som adwuma

Asɛmmisa: Hena ne bemyɛ som adwuma no sohwɛfo?
Mmuae: Bemyɛ som adwuma, “Kristo”, ne ofiehwɛfo → Ɛsɛ sɛ nkurɔfo bu yɛn sɛ Kristo asomfo ne Onyankopɔn ahintasɛm so ahwɛfo. Nea wɔhwehwɛ fi ofiehwɛfo hɔ ne sɛ odi nokware. 1 Korintofo 4:1-2 Asɔre pii nnɛ “ . Daabi "Onyankopɔn ahintasɛm sohwɛfo, . Daabi Kristo asomfo→Wɔbɛyɛ Mose Mmara~ Afobu sohwɛfo, owu som adwuma →Momfa nkurɔfoɔ nkɔ bɔne mu na wɔnyɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ, a wɔrentumi nguan mfiri bɔne afiase, di nnipa anim wɔ mmara ase ne owuo mu, sɛdeɛ Mose dii Israelfoɔ anim firii Misraim na wɔn nyinaa hwehwee ase wɔ serɛ so wɔ mmara ase no akyiri yi wɔfrɛɛ wɔn trenee sohwɛfoɔ → "Obiara ntumi nsom awuranom mmienu Wɔnyɛ Onyankopɔn nkoa anokwafoɔ ɛfiri sɛ wɔnte Onyankopɔn ahintasɛm ase.

(4) Bere biara a koma no bɛsan aba Awurade nkyɛn no, wobeyi nkatanim no afi hɔ

2 Korintofo 3:12-16 Esiane sɛ yɛwɔ anidaso a ɛte saa nti, yɛde akokoduru kasa, na ɛnte sɛ Mose a ɔde nkatanim kataa n’anim sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a Israelfo no antumi anhwɛ Nea ɔbɛsɛe no no awiei no. Nanso wɔn akoma yɛɛ den, na ɛnnɛ mpo sɛ wɔkenkan Apam Dedaw no a, wɔannyi nkatanim no mfi hɔ. Saa nkatanim yi wɔ kristo mu Wɔatu ase dedaw . Nanso ɛde besi nnɛ, bere biara a wɔbɛkenkan Mose Nwoma no, nkatanim no da so ara wɔ wɔn koma so. Nanso sɛ wɔn akoma dan kɔ Awurade nkyɛn pɛ a, wɔyi nkatanim no fi hɔ.

Hyɛ nso: Dɛn nti na nnipa a wɔwɔ wiase nyinaa de nkatanim kata wɔn anim nnɛ? So ɛnsɛ sɛ woma w’ani da hɔ? Esiane sɛ wɔn akoma mu yɛ den na wɔmpɛ sɛ wɔbɛsan akɔ Onyankopɔn nkyɛn nti, Satan daadaa wɔn na wɔwɔ ɔpɛ sɛ wɔbɛtena Apam Dedaw no mu, wɔ mmara no ase, wɔ afobu som adwuma no ase, ne owuo som adwuma no ase nokware no na dan kɔ nsɛm a ɛnyɛ nokware so. Fa nkatanim kata w’anim → Ɛkyerɛ sɛ wontumi mma Wohu Onyankopɔn anuonyam wɔ Onyankopɔn anim , wonni honhom mu aduan a wobedi, na wonni nkwa nsu a wɔbɛnom → "Nna no reba," Awurade Nyankopɔn asɛm ni, "bere a mɛma ɔkɔm aba asase so. Ɔkɔm bɛde nkurɔfo, ɛnyɛ aduan a wonnya nti, na." sukɔm bɛde wɔn, ɛnyɛ nsuo a wonnya nti, na mmom ɛnam sɛ wɔrentie Awurade nne nti Wɔbɛkyinkyin afiri ɛpo so akɔ po so, afiri atifi fam akɔ apueeɛ, ahwehwɛ Awurade asɛm, nanso wɔrenhunu no Amos 8:11-12

(5) Sɛ wubue w’anim wɔ Kristo mu a, wubetumi ahu Awurade anuonyam

Awurade ne Honhom no, baabi a Awurade Honhom wɔ no, ahofadi wɔ hɔ. Yɛn nyinaa, a yɛn anim abue rehwɛ Awurade anuonyam te sɛ ahwehwɛ mu no, yɛresakra yɛn ho ayɛ yɛn ho mfonini korɔ no ara fi animuonyam mu akɔ anuonyam mu, sɛdeɛ ɛnam Awurade Honhom so no. 2 Korintofoɔ 3:17-18

YOO! Ɛno nyinaa yɛ nnɛyi nkitahodi ne kyɛfa a yɛne wo yɛ no nti, Yɛda wo ase Ɔsoro Agya sɛ woama yɛn anuonyam kwan no, Ma Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛso nka mo nyinaa ho! Amen

2021.10.15

articles.title: (5) Monhwɛ Kristo ma nkwagyeɛ;
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nkɔ Yesaia ti 45 nkyekyem 22 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Monhwɛ me, asase ano nyina ara, na mobɛgye mo nkwa;

Ɛnnɛ yɛsua adeɛ, yɛbɔ fekuo, na yɛkyɛ "Nkwagye ne Anuonyam". Daabi. 5. 5. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Yɛda “ɔbea pa” no ase sɛ ɔsomaa adwumayɛfo faa mu wɔn Nokware asɛm a wɔakyerɛw wɔ nsa mu na wɔaka → ma yɛn nyansa a ɛfa Onyankopɔn ahintasɛm a na wɔde asie bere a atwam no ho, asɛm a Onyankopɔn ahyɛ da ato hɔ ama yɛn sɛ yebegye yɛn nkwa na yɛahyɛ yɛn anuonyam ansa na daa nyinaa aba! Wɔnam Honhom Kronkron so ayi no adi akyerɛ yɛn. Amen! Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi ahu na yɛate honhom mu nokware → nte ase sɛ Onyankopɔn ahyɛ yɛn ato hɔ sɛ yebegye yɛn nkwa na yɛahyɛ yɛn anuonyam ansa na wɔrebɔ wiase! Ɛne sɛ yɛbɛhwɛ Kristo so ama nkwagyeɛ; ! Amen.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

【1】Hwɛ Kristo hɔ ma nkwagye

Yesaia Ti 45 Nkyekyɛm 22 Momhwɛ me, asase ano nyinaa, na mobɛgye mo nkwa, na mene Onyankopɔn, na ɔfoforo biara nni hɔ.

(1) Israelfoɔ a wɔwɔ Apam Dedaw no mu no hwɛɛ kɔbere ɔwɔ no so hwehwɛɛ nkwagyeɛ

AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: “Yɛ ɔwɔ a ɛyɛ ogya na fa to dua so, obiara a ɔbɛka no no bɛhwɛ ɔwɔ no na wanya nkwa.” nkwa. Numeri Ti 21 Nkyekyɛm 8-9

bisa: Dɛn na “ɔwɔ a wɔde kɔbere ayɛ” no gyina hɔ ma?
anoyie: Kɔbere ɔwɔ no yɛ Kristo a wɔdomee no wɔ yɛn bɔne ho na nnebɔneyɛfo de no sɛn dua so no ho mfonini → Wɔsɛn no dua no so na ɔsoaa yɛn ankasa bɔne, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a esiane sɛ yɛwuwui wɔ bɔne so nti, yebetumi awu wɔ trenee so. Wɔnam ne mpire so saa mo yareɛ. Nkyekyɛm--1 Petro Ti 2 Nkyekyɛm 24

(2) Kristo a yɛbɛhwɛ no ama nkwagye wɔ Apam Foforo no mu

Yoh. → Yohane 12 Ti 32: Sɛ wɔma me so fi asase so a, mɛtwe nnipa nyinaa aba me nkyɛn. ” → Yoh. Sɛ moannye anni sɛ mene Kristo no a, mobɛwu wɔ mo bɔne mu. ” Yohane 8:24 .

bisa: Dɛn na Kristo kyerɛ?
anoyie: Kristo ne Agyenkwa no kyerɛ sɛ → Yesu ne Kristo, Mesia, ne yɛn abrabɔ Agyenkwa! Yesu Kristo gye yɛn nkwa: 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa bɔne ho ahofadi, . 2. 2. Wɔade wɔn ho afi mmara ne ne nnome ho, . 3. 3. Oguan fii Satan tumi a ɛyɛ sum no mu wɔ Hades, . 4. 4. a wɔde wɔn ho fi atemmu ne owu ho; 5. 5. Kristo wusɔre a ofi awufo mu no asan awo yɛn, ama yɛanya Onyankopɔn mma ne daa nkwa gyinabea! Amen → Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛhwɛ Kristo na yɛgye di sɛ Yesu Kristo ne yɛn abrabɔ mu Agyenkwa ne Agyenkwa. Awurade Yesu ka kyerɛ yɛn → Enti mese mo sɛ, mobɛwu wɔ mo bɔne mu. Sɛ moannye anni sɛ mene Kristo no a, mobɛwu wɔ mo bɔne mu. Enti, so wote ase pefee? Nkyekyɛm--1 Petro Ti 1 Nkyekyɛm 3-5

【2】Mo ne Kristo nka bom na wɔhyɛ mo anuonyam

Sɛ yɛne no ayɛ biako wɔ ne wu suban mu a, yɛne no nso bɛyɛ biako wɔ ne wusɔre suban mu;

(1) Wɔbɔ asu kɔ Kristo mu

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na yɛne Kristo bɛyɛ biako wɔ ne wu sɛso mu?
anoyie: “Wɔbɔɔ yɛn asu kɔɔ Kristo mu” → Munnim sɛ yɛn a wɔbɔɔ yɛn asu kɔɔ Kristo Yesu mu no, wɔbɔɔ yɛn asu kɔɔ ne wu mu? Nhwehwɛmu--Romafo Ti 6 Nkyekyɛm 3

bisa: Dɛn ne asubɔ atirimpɔw?
anoyie: 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛnantew nkwa foforo mu → Enti wɔde asubɔ siee yɛn ne no kɔɔ owu mu, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛnantew nkwa foforo mu, sɛnea wɔde Agya no anuonyam nyanee Kristo fii awufo mu no. Nkyekyɛm--Romafo 6:4;
2. 2. Wɔbɔɔ yɛn asɛnnua mu ne Kristo, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛsɛe bɔne nipadua no, ama yɛade yɛn ho afi bɔne ho→ Sɛ yɛaka ne ho abom wɔ ne wu sɛso mu... a yenim sɛ wɔabɔ yɛn nipasu dedaw no asɛnnua mu ne no, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛsɛe bɔne nipadua no, na yɛanyɛ bɔne Nkoa bio; Hyɛ no nsow: “Wɔabɔ yɛn asu” kyerɛ sɛ wɔabɔ yɛn asɛnnua mu ne Kristo So wote eyi ase yiye? Nkyekyɛm--Romafo 6:5-7;
3. 3. Fa nipa foforo no hyɛ, hyɛ Kristo → Yɛ foforo wɔ w’adwene mu na hyɛ nipasu foforo no, a wɔabɔ no Onyankopɔn suban so wɔ nokware trenee ne kronkronyɛ mu. Efesofo 4:23-24 → Enti mo nyinaa yɛ Onyankopɔn mma denam Kristo Yesu mu gyidi so. Mo mu dodoɔ a wɔbɔɔ wɔn asu wɔ Kristo mu no, moahyɛ Kristo. Galatifo 3:26-27

(2) Ɛne Kristo yɛ biako wɔ owusɔre kwan so

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na yɛne No bɛyɛ biako wɔ owusɔre nsɛso mu?
anoyie: " Di Awurade Anwummeduan no ” → Yesu kaa sɛ, “Nokware, nokware, mise mo sɛ, sɛ monni Onipa Ba no nam na monom ne mogya a, monni nkwa wɔ mo mu. Obiara a ɔdi me honam na ɔnom me mogya no wɔ daa nkwa, na mɛnyane no da a ɛdi akyire no. Reference - John 6:53-54 → Deɛ mekaa kyerɛɛ mo saa da no, me nsa kaa firii Awurade hɔ anadwo a wɔyii no maeɛ no, na ɔdaa ase wieeɛ no, ɔbubuu mu na ɔkaa sɛ: " Yei ne me nipadua a wɔabubu ama mo. Monyɛ yei mfa nkae me." Adidi no akyi no, ɔfaa kuruwa no nso kaa sɛ, "Kuruwa yi yɛ ma me." Eyi ne nea mobɛyɛ de akae me. bere biara a mobɛnom apam foforo a wɔde asi hɔ wɔ Ne mogya mu no bi: “Bere biara a mobedi paanoo yi anaa monom kuruwa yi no, mopae mu ka sɛ Awurade awu kosi sɛ ɔbɛba.” Nhwehwɛmu--1 Korintofo 11 nkyekyem 23-26

(3) Fa w’asɛnnua na di Awurade akyi, . Ka ahenni no ho asɛmpa no wɔhyɛ wɔn anuonyam

Enti ɔfrɛɛ nnipakuo no ne n’asuafoɔ no baa wɔn nkyɛn ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Sɛ obi pɛ sɛ ɔdi m’akyi a, ɔmpa ne ho na ɔfa n’asɛnnua na ɔdi m’akyi. Marko 8:34.”

bisa: Dɛn ne “atirimpɔw” a obi bɛfa n’asɛnnua na wadi Yesu akyi?
anoyie: twam Ka Kristo asɛnnua no ho asɛm na ka ɔsoro ahennie asɛmpa no

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa "Gye di" Wɔbɔɔ me ne Kristo asɛnnua mu, na ɛnyɛ me na mete ase bio, na mmom Kristo "te ase" ma me → Wɔabɔ me ne Kristo asɛnnua mu, na ɛnyɛ me na mete ase bio, na mmom Kristo te me mu Na asetena seesei mete nipadua mu na mete ase denam gyidie a mewɔ wɔ Onyankopɔn Ba a ɔdɔɔ me na ɔde ne ho maeɛ maa me no mu. Nhwehwɛmu--Galatiafo Ti 2 Nkyekyɛm 20
2. 2. "Gyidi" Bɔne nipadua no asɛe, na yɛade yɛn ho afi bɔne ho → Efisɛ yenim sɛ wɔbɔɔ yɛn dedaw no asɛnnua mu kaa ne ho, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a bɔne nipadua no afi hɔ, na yɛanyɛ nkoa bio bɔne mu; Romafo 6:6-7
3. 3. "Gyidie" ma yɛde yɛn ho firi mmara ne ne nnome ho → Nanso ɛfiri sɛ yɛwu maa mmara a ɛkyekyere yɛn no, seesei yɛade yɛn ho afiri mmara no ho, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛtumi asom Awurade sɛdeɛ honhom (honhom: anaa wɔkyerɛ aseɛ sɛ Kronkron Honhom) Ɔkwan foforo, ɛnyɛ sɛnea ɔkwan dedaw no te. Romafo 7:6 → Kristo gyee yɛn fii mmara no nnome mu, na wɔyɛɛ no nnome maa yɛn;
4. 4. “Gyidie” to akwakoraa ne ne nneyɛeɛ to nkyɛn – hwɛ Kolosefoɔ 3:9
5. 5. "Gyidi" guan ɔbonsam ne Satan → Esiane sɛ mmofra no kyɛ honam ne mogya nipadua koro nti, ɔno ankasa nso faa honam ne mogya koro no ara sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ɛnam owu so bɛsɛe nea ɔwɔ owu tumi, kyerɛ sɛ , ɔbonsam, na wɔma wɔn a wɔasuro owuo wɔ wɔn nkwa nna nyinaa mu no ahofadie Onipa a ɔyɛ akoa. Hebrifo 2:14-15
6. 6. “Gyidi” guan fi esum ne Hades tumi mu → Ogye yɛn fi esum tumi mu na ɔde yɛn kɔ ne Dɔba no ahenni mu 1:13;
7. "Gyidie" aguan afiri wiase → mede w'asɛm ama wɔn. Na wiase tan wɔn efisɛ wɔnyɛ wiase de, sɛnea me nso menyɛ wiase no. ...sɛnea wosomaa me baa wiase no, saa ara na masoma wɔn aba wiase. Hwɛ Yohane 17:14,18
8. 8. Nsɛm a wɔka kyerɛ " lɛtɛ " Me ne Kristo wui na "mɛgye adi" sɛ wobenyan me, asan awo me, agye me nkwa, na me ne no anya daa nkwa, na manya ɔsoro ahenni no agyapade! Amen . Hwɛ Romafo 6:8 ne 1 Petro 1:3-5

Eyi ne nea Awurade Yesu kae → Kaa sɛ: "Bere no abam, na Onyankopɔn ahenni abɛn. Monsakra mo adwene na gye asɛmpa no nni" "Ɔsoro ahenni asɛmpa no" → Obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ogye ne nkwa ( anaa nkyerɛaseɛ: ɔkra ɔfa 2) Obiara a ɔbɛhwere ne kra me ne asɛmpa no nti ɔbɛhwere. Sɛ onipa nya wiase nyinaa nanso ɔhwere n’ankasa nkwa a, mfaso bɛn na ɛwɔ so? Dɛn bio na onipa betumi de ama de agye ne nkwa? Nhwehwɛmu--Mark Ti 8 Nkyekyɛm 35-37 ne Ti 1 Nkyekyɛm 15

Hymn: Wo ne Anuonyam Hene

YOO! Ɛno nyinaa yɛ nnɛyi nkitahodi ne kyɛfa a yɛne wo yɛ no nti, Yɛda wo ase Ɔsoro Agya sɛ woama yɛn anuonyam kwan no, Ma Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛso nka mo nyinaa ho! Amen

2021.05.05 na ɛwɔ hɔ

articles.title: (4) Te nokware kwan no ase na wogye wo nkwa;
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible mu nhwɛ 1 Timoteo Ti 2 ne nkyekyem 4 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Ɔpɛ sɛ wɔgye nnipa nyinaa nkwa na wɔte nokware no ase.

Ɛnnɛ yɛsua adeɛ, yɛbɔ fekuo, na yɛkyɛ "Nkwagye ne Anuonyam". Daabi. 4. 4. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Yɛda Awurade ase sɛ wasoma adwumayɛfoɔ ma wɔama yɛn Nyankopɔn ahintasɛm no nyansa a na wɔde asie wɔ mmerɛ a atwam no mu denam nokorɛ asɛm a wɔatwerɛɛ na wɔn nsa kaeɛ no so, a ɛyɛ asɛm a Onyankopɔn ahyɛ ato hɔ ama yɛn sɛ yɛbɛgye yɛn nkwa na yɛahyɛ yɛn anuonyam wɔ nnipa nyinaa anim daa nkwa! Wɔnam Honhom Kronkron so ayi no adi akyerɛ yɛn. Amen! Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi ahu na yɛate honhom mu nokware → nte ase sɛ Onyankopɔn ahyɛ yɛn ato hɔ sɛ yebegye yɛn nkwa na yɛahyɛ yɛn anuonyam ansa na wɔrebɔ wiase! Ɛne sɛ yɛbɛte nokware no ase na wɔagye yɛn nkwa; ! Amen.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

【1】Te nokware kwan no ase na nya nkwagye

1 Timoteo 2:4 Ɔpɛ sɛ nnipa nyinaa nya nkwa na wɔba nokware no ho nimdeɛ mu.

(1) Te nokware kwan no ase

bisa: Dɛn ne nokware kwan no?
anoyie: "Nokware" yɛ nokware, na "Tao" yɛ Onyankopɔn → Mfiase no na Tao wɔ hɔ, na Tao ka Onyankopɔn ho, na Tao nso yɛ Onyankopɔn. Na Asɛm yi ka Onyankopɔn ho mfiase no. Wɔnam ne so na wɔyɛɛ nneɛma nyinaa; Nkyekyɛm--Yohane Ti 1 Nkyekyɛm 1-3

(2) Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ ɔhonam

Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ honam na ɔtenaa yɛn mu, a adom ne nokorɛ ahyɛ no ma. Na yɛahu n’anuonyam, anuonyam a ɛte sɛ Agya no ba koro no. ... Obiara nhunuu Nyankopɔn da, Ɔba a ɔwoo no koro no nko ara, a ɔwɔ Agya no kokom no, na wayi No adi. Nkyekyɛm--Yohane 1:14,18. Hyɛ no nsow: Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ honam → kyerɛ sɛ, Onyankopɔn bɛyɛɛ honam → Ɔbaabun Maria na ɔnyinsɛnee no na wɔwoo no fii Honhom Kronkron mu → [wɔtoo din Yesu]! Yesu din → kyerɛ sɛ obegye ne nkurɔfo afi wɔn bɔne mu. Amen! Obiara nhuu Onyankopɔn da, Ɔba a ɔwoo no koro “Yesu” a ɔwɔ Agya no kokom no nkutoo na wayi no adi → kyerɛ sɛ, ɔbɛda Onyankopɔn ne Agya no adi! →Enti Awurade Yesu kaa sɛ: "Sɛ munim me a, mobɛhunu m'agya nso. Efi seesei rekɔ no, munim no na moahunu no."

(3) Asetra kwan

Ɛdefa mfitiaseɛ nkwa asɛm no ho firi mfitiaseɛ no, yei ne deɛ yɛate, ahunu, yɛde yɛn ankasa ani ahunu, na yɛde yɛn nsa aka. (Saa nkwa yi ada ne ho adi, na yɛahunu, na afei yɛdi adanseɛ sɛ yɛrebɔ mo daa nkwa a na ɛwɔ Agya no nkyɛn na ɔne yɛn yi ne ho adi no ho dawuro.) Yɛbɔ mo deɛ yɛahunu na yɛate, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a Wo wɔne yɛn wɔ fekubɔ mu. Ɛyɛ yɛne Agya no ne Ne Ba, Yesu Kristo fekubɔ. 1 Yohane 1:1-3

(4) Yesu yɛ Onyankopɔn teasefo no Ba

Ɔbɔfo no ka kyerɛɛ no se, "Nsuro, Maria! Woanya Onyankopɔn anim dom. Wobɛfa nyinsɛn na woawo ɔbabarima, na wobɛto no din Yesu. Ɔbɛyɛ kɛse na wɔbɛfrɛ no Ɔba." Ɔsorosoroni no dea; Onyankopɔn de n'agya Dawid ahengua bɛma no, na wadi Yakob fie so hene daa, na n'ahenni rennya awiei." Maria ka kyerɛɛ ɔbɔfo no sɛ, "Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na eyi ato me efisɛ menwaree? " Mmuae no ne sɛ: “Honhom Kronkron bɛba mo so, na Ɔsorosoroni no tumi bɛkata mo so, enti wɔbɛfrɛ kronkron a wɔbɛwo no no Onyankopɔn Ba. Luka 1:30-35
Mateo 16:16 Simon Petro buaa no se, “Wone Kristo, Onyankopɔn teasefo no ba.”

(5) Onyankopɔn somaa ne Ba a ɔdɔ no no sɛ ɔmmɛwo no wɔ mmara ase mfa nnye wɔn a wɔwɔ mmara ase no sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi anya ɔba.

Galatifoɔ 4:4-7 Na berɛ a ɛwie pɛyɛ duruiɛ no, Onyankopɔn somaa ne Ba a ɔbaa woo no, a wɔwoo no wɔ mmara ase, sɛ ɔnkɔgye wɔn a wɔhyɛ mmara ase no, na yɛanya mma din. Esiane sɛ moyɛ mma nti, Onyankopɔn asoma ne Ba no Honhom akɔ mo (mfitiase nkyerɛwee: yɛn) koma mu, asu sɛ, “Abba, Agya, mubetumi ahu sɛ efi seesei rekɔ no, monyɛ akoa bio, na mmom moyɛ ɔba!” na esiane sɛ woyɛ ɔba nti, wode wo ho to Onyankopɔn so sɛ ɔyɛ n’adedifo.

(6) Gye Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ no sɛ nsɔano ne adansedi krataa a wode bɛhyɛn ɔsoro ahenni mu

Efesofoɔ 1:13-14 Ne mu na wɔde bɔhyɛ Honhom Kronkron no sɔɔ mo ano, berɛ a mo nso mogyee Kristo dii berɛ a motee nokorɛ asɛm, mo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no. Saa Honhom Kronkron yi ne yɛn agyapadeɛ ho bɔhyɛ (mfitiaseɛ nkyerɛwee: agyapadeɛ) kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛgye Onyankopɔn nkurɔfoɔ (mfitiaseɛ nkyerɛwee: agyapadeɛ) de akamfo N’anuonyam.

(7) Te nokware kwan no ase na nya nkwagye

Yohane Ti 15 Nkyekyɛm 3 “Asɛm a maka akyerɛ mo no nti, mo ho atew” Awurade Yesu kae.

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Ɛho tew dedaw: Ahotew kyerɛ Kronkron, bɔne biara nni mu →Ne mu nso mogye dii, berɛ a motee nokorɛ asɛm, mo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no, na mogyee Ɔno a wɔde bɔhyɛ Honhom Kronkron nsɔano ano wɔ ne mu no dii →“Sɛnea Paulo ka no,” na mayɛ a Kristo Yesu akoa ma Amanaman mufo , sɛ wɔbɛyɛ Onyankopɔn asɛmpa no asɔfo, na wɔagye Amanaman mufo afɔrebɔ atom, na Honhom Kronkron atew wɔn ho. Nkyekyɛm--Romafo 15:16
2. 2. Wɔahohoro wɔn dedaw, wɔate wɔn ho na wɔabu wɔn bem: Saa ara na mo mu binom nso teɛ, nanso wɔhohoroo mo ho, wɔtew mo ho, na Awurade Yesu Kristo din ne yɛn Nyankopɔn Honhom so buu mo bem. Nkyekyɛm--1 Korintofoɔ 6:11

(8) Yesu ne ɔkwan, nokware, ne nkwa

Yohane Ti 14 Nkyekyɛm 6 Yesu kaa sɛ: “Mene kwan ne nokorɛ ne nkwa; Ɔkwan no faa nkatanim a ɛyɛ ne nipadua no mu.

【2】Ademude no da adi na wɔhyɛ no anuonyam bere a wɔde ahyɛ dɔte anwenne mu no

(1) . Wɔda ademude no adi wɔ dɔte anwenne mu

Yɛwɔ saa ademude yi wɔ dɔte nkuku mu de kyerɛ sɛ tumi kɛse yi fi Onyankopɔn na ɛnyɛ yɛn hɔ. Hyɛ nso:" abɔfra "ɛyɛ nokware honhom no , . abɔfra ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn Asɛm , . abɔfra ɛyɛ Yesu Kristo ! Amen. Enti, so wote ase pefee? 2 Korintofo 4:7

(2) . Yesu wu no ma yɛn nipasu dedaw no yɛ adwuma na ɛma Yesu asetra da adi wɔ yɛn nipasu foforo no mu

Atamfo atwa yɛn ho ahyia wɔ afanu nyinaa, nanso wɔankyere yɛn, nanso wɔn abam mmu, nanso wɔmmɔ yɛn, nanso wonkum yɛn; Yɛde Yesu wuo ka yɛn ho daa sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a Yesu nkwa nso bɛda adi wɔ yɛn mu. Efisɛ Yesu nti wɔde yɛn a yɛte ase no ma owu bere nyinaa, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛda Yesu nkwa adi wɔ yɛn nipadua a ewu no mu. Sɛ yɛhwɛ yi a, owu yɛ nnam wɔ yɛn mu, nanso nkwa yɛ nnam wɔ wo mu. 2 Korintofoɔ 4:8-12

(3) . Ademude a ɛda adi no ma yetumi nya daa anuonyam mu duru a ɛso bi nni

Enti, yɛn koma nnyae. Ɛwom sɛ wɔresɛe akyi nipadua no de, nanso emu nipadua no reyɛ foforo da biara da. Yɛn bere tiaa mu amanehunu ne hare mu amanehunu bɛyɛ adwuma ama yɛn anuonyam mu duru a enni awiei a wontumi mfa ntoto ho. 2 Korintofoɔ 4:16-17

Hymn: Foforo a ɛnam Honhom Kronkron so

YOO! Ɛno nyinaa yɛ nnɛyi nkitahodi ne kyɛfa a yɛne wo yɛ no nti, Yɛda wo ase Ɔsoro Agya sɛ woama yɛn anuonyam kwan no, Ma Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛso nka mo nyinaa ho! Amen

articles.title: (3) gye asɛmpa no di na wogye no nkwa;
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nkɔ 1 Korintofo 15, nkyekyem 3-4, na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Na nea mede maa mo nso, nea edi kan ne sɛ, Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne sɛnea Kyerɛwnsɛm no kyerɛ no, wosiee no, na wonyan no da a ɛto so abiɛsa sɛnea Kyerɛwnsɛm no kyerɛ no.

Ɛnnɛ yɛsua adeɛ, yɛbɔ fekuo, na yɛkyɛ "Nkwagye ne Anuonyam". Daabi. 3. 3. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Yɛda Awurade ase sɛ wasoma adwumayɛfoɔ ma wɔama yɛn Nyankopɔn ahintasɛm no nyansa a na wɔde asie wɔ mmerɛ a atwam no mu denam nokorɛ asɛm a wɔatwerɛɛ na wɔn nsa kaeɛ no so, a ɛyɛ asɛm a Onyankopɔn ahyɛ ato hɔ ama yɛn sɛ yɛbɛgye yɛn nkwa na yɛahyɛ yɛn anuonyam wɔ nnipa nyinaa anim daa nkwa! Wɔnam Honhom Kronkron so ayi no adi akyerɛ yɛn. Amen! Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu ani na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi ahu na yɛate honhom mu nokware→ Te aseɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn ahyɛ yɛn ato hɔ sɛ yɛbɛgye yɛn nkwa na yɛahyɛ yɛn anuonyam ansa na wɔrebɔ wiase! Amen.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

【1】Nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa

*Yesu somaa Paulo sɛ ɔnkɔka nkwagye asɛmpa no nkyerɛ Amanamanmufo*

bisa: Dɛn ne nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no?
anoyie: Onyankopɔn somaa ɔsomafo Paulo sɛ ɔmmɛka "nkwagye asɛmpa a ɛnam Yesu Kristo so" nkyerɛ Amanamanmufoɔ → Afei, anuanom, mereka asɛmpa a mekaa kyerɛɛ mo kane no akyerɛ mo, a mo nso monyaa mu na mogyina mu, na sɛ mo Monnye nni kwa, na mmom sɛ mokura nea meka kyerɛ mo no mu denneennen a, ɛnam asɛmpa yi so begye mo nkwa. Nea mede maa mo nso ne nea edidi so yi: Nea edi kan no, Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne sɛnea Kyerɛwnsɛm no kyerɛ no, wosiee no, na wonyan no da a ɛto so abiɛsa sɛnea Kyerɛwsɛm no kyerɛ no 1-4 na ɛwɔ hɔ

bisa: Dɛn na Kristo dii ho dwuma bere a owu maa yɛn bɔne no?
anoyie: 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Ɛma yɛde yɛn ho firi bɔne ho → Ɛbɛda adi sɛ Kristo dɔ na ɛkanyan yɛn ɛfiri sɛ ɛsiane sɛ "Kristo" wuiɛ maa obiara nti, wɔn nyinaa wuwuiɛ kyerɛ - 2 Korintofoɔ 5:14 → Efisɛ awufoɔ de wɔn ho Bɔne - Romafoɔ 6:7 → "Kristo" awu ama obiara, enti obiara awu → "Nea wawu no, wɔade ne ho afi bɔne ho, na wɔn nyinaa awu" → Wɔn nyinaa anya ahofadi afi bɔne mu. Amen! , wugye di? Wɔn a wɔgye di no, wɔnmmu wɔn fɔ, nanso wɔn a wɔnnye nni no, wɔabu wɔn fɔ dedaw ɛfiri sɛ wɔnnye Onyankopɔn Ba a ɔwoo no koro "Yesu" din nni sɛ ɔbɛgye ne nkurɔfoɔ afiri wɔn bɔne mu → "Kristo" wui maa obiara, na wɔn nyinaa wuwuiɛ .
2. 2. Wɔade wɔn ho afi mmara ne ne nnome ho--hwɛ Romafo 7:6 ne Gal. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

bisa: Na wosiee no, dɛn na wodii ho dwuma?
anoyie: 3. 3. Wode wɔn ho firii dedaw no ne n’akwan dedaw no ho--Kolosefo 3:9

bisa : Wonyanee Kristo da a ɛto so abiɛsa sɛnea Bible kyerɛ → Dɛn na wodii ho dwuma?
anoyie: 4. 4. "Onyanee Yesu Kristo fii awufo mu" → odii ɔhaw a ɛne sɛ "obu yɛn bem" no ho dwuma → Wɔde Yesu hyɛɛ nnipa nsa esiane yɛn bɔne nti wonyanee no maa yɛn bem (anaa nkyerɛase: Yesu yɛ yɛn ne mfomso a wogyee no nti, na ɔno nso wɔsɔre maa yɛn bem) Nkyerɛkyerɛmu---Romafo 4:25

Hyɛ nso: Eyi ne → Yesu Kristo somaa Paulo sɛ ɔnkɔka [nkwagye asɛmpa] no nkyerɛ Amanaman mufo → Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne → 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Wodii bɔne ho haw no ho dwuma, . 2. 2. Wɔasiesie Mmara ne Mmara Nnome Nsɛm; 3. 3. Akwakoraa ne ne suban ho haw no ano aduru a wɔnyanee no da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa → 4. 4. Ɛdi "ɔhaw a ɛfa bem, awo foforɔ, owusɔreɛ, nkwagyeɛ, ne daa nkwa ho haw ma yɛn." Enti, so wote ase pefee? Nkyekyɛm--1 Petro Ti 1 Nkyekyɛm 3-5

【2】Monhyɛ onipa foforo, yi onipa dedaw no ngu na nya anuonyam

(1) Sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom te yɛn koma mu a, yɛnyɛ honam mufo bio

Romafoɔ 8:9 Sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom te mo mu a, momfiri ɔhonam mu bio na mmom mofiri Honhom mu. Sɛ obi nni Kristo Honhom a, ɔnyɛ Kristo dea.

bisa: Adɛn nti na sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom te yɛn akoma mu a, yɛnyɛ honam mufoɔ?
anoyie: Efisɛ "Kristo" wu maa obiara, na ne nyinaa wui → efisɛ woawu na wo nkwa "nkwa a efi Onyankopɔn hɔ" ahintaw ne Kristo wɔ Onyankopɔn mu. Kolosefoɔ 3:3 → Ɛno nti, sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom te yɛn mu a, wɔawo yɛn foforɔ kɔ onipa foforɔ mu, na "onipa foforɔ" no mfiri "honam nipa dedaw" no mu → Na yɛnim sɛ yɛn nipa dedaw wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu ne No, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛsɛe bɔne nipadua no, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛrennyɛ bɔne nkoa bio twe adwene si Romafo 6:6, "Wɔsɛee bɔne nipadua no," na yɛnyɛ saa nipadua yi dea bio; owu, nipadua a ɛyɛ ɔporɔw (porɔw). Sɛnea Paulo kae no ara pɛ → Meyɛ mmɔbɔmmɔbɔ paa! Hena na obetumi agye me afi owu nipadua yi mu? Yɛda Onyankopɔn ase, yɛnam yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo so betumi aguan. Sɛ yɛhwɛ saa a, mede m’akoma di Onyankopɔn mmara so, nanso me honam di bɔne mmara so. Romafo 7:24-25, so wote eyi ase yiye?

(2) Bere a ɔde akwakoraa no ato nkyɛn, osuahu a ɔde ato akwakoraa no

Kolosefoɔ 3:9 Munnni atoro nkyerɛ mo ho mo ho, ɛfiri sɛ moagyae onipa dedaw ne ne nnwuma.

bisa: “Efisɛ moatwe akwakoraa ne ne nnwuma ato nkyɛn so na ɛnkyerɛ sɛ “woatwe” wɔ ha? Dɛn nti na ɛho da so ara hia sɛ yɛfa ɔkwan a wɔfa so de nneɛma dedaw ne nneyɛe dedaw to nkyɛn no mu?
anoyie: Onyankopɔn Honhom te yɛn koma mu, na yɛnte honam mu bio → Wei kyerɛ sɛ gyidi “ayi” dedaw no honam → Yɛn “nipa foforo” asetra ahintaw ne Kristo wɔ Onyankopɔn mu na mmom yɛn “nipa dedaw ” da so ara wɔ hɔ Di, nom na nantew! Bible ka sɛ "woawu"? onipa dedaw awu; Ɛsɛ sɛ yenya osuahu sɛ yɛde “onipa dedaw a aniwa hu” no bɛto nkyɛn → Sɛ “onipa dedaw ne foforo” nni hɔ, honhom mu nipa a Onyankopɔn woo no ne honam fam nipa dedaw a Adam woo no a, anka “honhom ne honam ntam ako” biara nni hɔ. sɛnea Paulo kae no. Adam mfitiase onipa honam nkutoo na ennyaa osuahu sɛ ɔde nipa dedaw no bɛto nkyɛn→ Sɛ woate ne kwan, wo nsa aka ne nkyerɛkyerɛ, na woasua ne nokware a, ɛsɛ sɛ wode wo nipasu dedaw no to nkyɛn wɔ wo kan abrabɔ mu, a ɛde nkakrankakra reyɛ kɛse esiane akɔnnɔ bɔne nti, saa kwan yi so no, wobɛte ase pefee Dedaw? Nkyekyɛm--Efesofoɔ Ti 4 Nkyekyɛmu 21-22

(3) Onipa foforo no a yɛbɛhyɛ na yɛanya atirimpɔw a ɛne sɛ yɛbɛtwe onipa dedaw no afi hɔ sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi ahyɛ yɛn anuonyam

Efesofoɔ 4:23-24 Monyɛ foforɔ wɔ mo adwene mu, na monhyɛ nipasu foforɔ a wɔbɔɔ no sɛ Onyankopɔn suban wɔ nokorɛ trenee ne kronkronyɛ mu. →Enti, yɛn koma nnyae. Ɛwom sɛ wɔresɛe akyi nipadua no de, nanso emu nipadua no reyɛ foforo da biara da. Yɛn bere tiaa mu amanehunu ne hare mu amanehunu bɛyɛ adwuma ama yɛn anuonyam mu duru a enni awiei a ɛboro ntotoho biara so. Ɛbɛdaa adi sɛ ɛnyɛ nea wohu no ho hia yɛn, na mmom nea wonhu no, efisɛ nea wohu no yɛ bere tiaa mu de, na nea wonhu no yɛ daa. 2 Korintofoɔ 4:16-18

Hymn: Awurade ne m'ahoɔden

YOO! Ɛno nyinaa yɛ nnɛyi nkitahodi ne kyɛfa a yɛne wo yɛ no nti, Yɛda wo ase Ɔsoro Agya sɛ woama yɛn anuonyam kwan no, Ma Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛso nka mo nyinaa ho! Amen

2021.05.03 na ɛwɔ hɔ

articles.title: (2) Gye di na wɔmmɔ wo asu wɔ Honhom Kronkron mu na wɔmmɔ wo asu kɔ Kristo mu na wohyɛ Kristo ma wɔhyɛ wo anuonyam
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no mu nkɔ Marko ti 16 nkyekyem 16 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Obiara a ogye di na wɔbɔɔ no asu no, wɔbɛgye no nkwa 6:3 Monnim sɛ yɛn a wɔbɔɔ yɛn asu kɔɔ Kristo Yesu mu no, wɔbɔɔ yɛn asu kɔɔ ne wuo mu?

Ɛnnɛ yɛsua adeɛ, yɛbɔ fekuo, na yɛkyɛ "Nkwagye ne Anuonyam". Daabi. 2. 2. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Yɛda Awurade ase sɛ wasoma adwumayɛfoɔ denam nokware asɛm a wɔatwerɛ na wɔaka wɔ wɔn nsam so → wama yɛn Nyankopɔn ahintasɛm a na wɔde asie tete no mu nyansa, asɛm a Onyankopɔn ahyɛ da ato hɔ ama yɛn sɛ yɛbɛgye yɛn nkwa na yɛahyɛ yɛn anuonyam ansa na mfeɛ nyinaa reba Ɛdenam Honhom Kronkron no so Ayi akyerɛ yɛn Te aseɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn ahyɛ yɛn ato hɔ sɛ yɛbɛgye yɛn nkwa na yɛahyɛ yɛn anuonyam ansa na wɔrebɔ wiase! Amen.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

【1】Deɛ ogye di na wɔbɔ no asu no, wɔbɛgye no nkwa

Marko 16:16 Obiara a ɔgye di na wɔbɔ no asu no, wɔbɛgye no nkwa;

bisa: Deɛ ɔgye di na ɔbɔ asu no wɔbɛgye no nkwa → Dɛn na wogye di sɛ wɔbɛgye no nkwa?
anoyie: Gye asɛmpa no di na nya nkwagye! → Kaa sɛ: "Bere no aba mu, na Onyankopɔn ahenni abɛn. Monsakra mo adwene na gye asɛmpa no nni!"

bisa: Dɛn ne asɛmpa no?
anoyie: Asɛmpa no ne sɛ Onyankopɔn somaa ɔsomafo Paulo sɛ ɔmmɛka "nkwagye asɛmpa" no nkyerɛ Amanaman mufo → Nea menyaa na meka kyerɛɛ mo: Nea edi kan, sɛ Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne na wosiee no sɛnea Bible kyerɛ no; wonyanee no da a ɛto so abiɛsa no. Nhwehwɛmu--1 Korintofo 15 nkyekyem 3-4.

Hyɛ nso: Mmere dodoɔ a mogye asɛmpa yi di no, wɔbɛgye mo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no! Amen. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

bisa: Fa gyidie nbɔ wo asu→yei” wɔbɔɔ wɔn asu "So ɛyɛ Honhom Kronkron asubɔ? Anaasɛ." Fa nsu hohoro ho
anoyie: Nea ogye di na wɔbɔ no asu no, wobegye no nkwa → Eyi " wɔbɔɔ wɔn asu "Aane honhom kronkron asubɔ , efisɛ " . Wɔbɔɔ wɔn asu wɔ Honhom Kronkron mu "Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛsan awo mo, anyan mo, na wɔagye mo nkwa! Amen. Sɛnea Yohane Suboni kae no → mede nsu na ɛbɔ mo asu, na ɔde Honhom Kronkron bɛbɔ mo asu Marko 1:8 → Asomafo no Nnwuma 11:16 nkyekyem no, mekaee Awurade nsɛm no: "Yohane de nsu bɔɔ asu, nanso wɔde Honhom Kronkron bɛbɔ mo asu." ’ na “sɛ wɔbɛbɔ asu wɔ nsu mu” no, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔde ka Kristo wu ho. Fa nsu hohoro ho "Ɛnnyɛ nea ɛfa honam mu efĩ a wobeyi afi hɔ ho - hwɛ 1 Petro 4:21." wɔbɔɔ wɔn asu wɔ nsu mu ” nyɛ tebea a ɛbɛma wɔagye nkwa, . Nko ara " Wɔbɔɔ wɔn asu wɔ Honhom Kronkron mu " Ɛno ansa na wobetumi asan awo wo na wɔagye wo nkwa .

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na wobetumi anya Honhom Kronkron asubɔ?
anoyie: Gye asɛmpa no di, te nokware no ase, na Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ no nsɔ wo ano → Ne mu nso mogye dii, berɛ a motee nokorɛ asɛm, mo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no, na mogyee no diiɛ no, wɔde bɔhyɛ Honhom Kronkron no sɔɔ mo ano. Saa Honhom Kronkron yi ne yɛn agyapadeɛ ho bɔhyɛ (mfitiaseɛ nkyerɛwee: agyapadeɛ) kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛgye Onyankopɔn nkurɔfoɔ (mfitiaseɛ nkyerɛwee: agyapadeɛ) de akamfo N’anuonyam. Nhwehwɛmu--Efesofo 1:13-14. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

【2】Wɔbɔ wo asu kɔ Kristo mu, hyɛ Kristo na nya anuonyam

Romafoɔ 6:5 Sɛ yɛne no ayɛ baako wɔ ne wuo nsɛsoɔ mu a, yɛne no nso bɛyɛ baako wɔ ne wusɔreɛ nsɛsoɔ mu;

(1) Sɛ yɛka ne ho bom wɔ ne wu sɛso mu a

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na yɛayɛ biako ne Kristo wɔ ne wu sɛso mu?
anoyie:" Fa nsuo bɔ asu kɔ Kristo mu!

bisa: Dɛn nti na “nsu mu asubɔ” yɛ owu ne Kristo biakoyɛ?
anoyie: Efisɛ wɔbɔɔ Kristo asɛnnua mu maa yɛn bɔne → Na ɔwɔ nsɛso ne nipadua na wɔde sɛn dua no so "Bɔne nipadua" a wɔde sɛn dua no so no yɛ yɛn "bɔne nipadua" → Efisɛ Kristo soaa yɛn bɔne na "ɔde sii" "Yɛn bɔnefo ananmu." wɔde nipadua sɛn dua no so, na Onyankopɔn yɛɛ wɔn a wonni bɔne no sɛ "wɔde" yɛn bɔne besi ananmu denam dua no so a wɔde sɛn wɔn so → Onyankopɔn yɛɛ wɔn a wonni bɔne no sɛ wɔbɛyɛɛ bɔne maa yɛn, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛyɛ Onyankopɔn trenee wɔ ne mu. Nkyekyɛm--2 Korintofoɔ 5:21
Enti “nsu a wɔde bɛbɔ yɛn asu” akɔ Kristo wu mu → yɛn nipadua a wɔayɛ no sɛ yɛbɛka abom denam asubɔ so akɔ Kristo nipadua a wɔayɛ no sɛn dua no so → eyi ne “yɛde abom ama no wɔ ne wu sɛso mu”. Sɛ "wɔbɔ wo asu wɔ nsuo mu" a, na worebɔ amanneɛ na woredi adanseɛ akyerɛ wiase sɛ wɔbɔɔ wo ne Kristo asɛnnua mu! "Kondua" a ɛne sɛ wɔbɛbɔ no asɛnnua mu no yɛ mmerɛw, na "adesoa" no yɛ hare → eyi ne Onyankopɔn adom! Amen. Enti, so wote ase pefee? Ɛno nti na Awurade Yesu kaa sɛ: “Na me kɔndua yɛ mmerɛw na m’adesoa yɛ hare Reference – Mateo 11:30

(2) Wo ne No nkabom wɔ Ne wusɔreɛ nsɛsoɔ mu

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na yɛne Kristo bɛyɛ biako wɔ ne wusɔre no sɛso mu?
anoyie: Sɛ “wobedi na woanom Awurade honam ne ne mogya” a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ wo ne Kristo bɛbom wɔ ne wusɔre nsɛso mu → Yesu kae sɛ, “Nokware, nokware, mise mo sɛ, gye sɛ mudi honam na monom mogya a Onipa ba, wunni nkwa wɔ wo mu me mu, na me nso mewɔ ne mu.

(3) Di Awurade Anwummeduan no

Nea meka kyerɛɛ mo no ne nea minya fii Awurade hɔ anadwo a woyii Awurade Yesu mae no, ɔfaa paanoo, na ɔdaa ase wiei no, obubui mu kae sɛ, “Eyi ne me nipadua a wɔde ama mo.”(Tete Nhoma Mmobɔwee: Woabubu), monyɛ eyi de kae me.” de nkae me." Bere biara a mobedi paanoo yi na monom kuruwa yi no, moka Awurade wu ho asɛm kosi sɛ ɔbɛba. 1 Korintofoɔ 11:23-26

【 . 3】Monhyɛ Kristo na gye anuonyam

Enti mo nyinaa nam Kristo Yesu mu gyidie so yɛ Onyankopɔn mma. Mo mu dodoɔ a wɔbɔɔ wɔn asu wɔ Kristo mu no, moahyɛ Kristo. Galatifo 3:26-27

bisa: Dɛn na Kristo a wɔbɛhyɛ no kyerɛ?
anoyie: "Fa Kristo" → "Fa" kyerɛ sɛ yɛbɛkyekyere anaa yɛbɛkata so, "hyɛ" kyerɛ sɛ yɛbɛhyɛ, hyɛ → Sɛ yɛhyɛ "onipa foforo" Kristo honhom, ɔkra ne nipadua a, yɛhyɛ Kristo atade ! Amen. Enti, so wote ase pefee? →Monhyɛ Awurade Yesu Kristo bere nyinaa na nnyɛ nhyehyɛe mma honam no mfa ne ho nhyɛ n’akɔnnɔ mu. Nkyekyɛm - Romafoɔ 13:14. Hyɛ no nsow: Onyankopɔn yɛ hann, na Ne mu na esum biara nni hɔ koraa - 1 Yohane 1:5 → Yesu ka kyerɛɛ obiara bio sɛ, "Mene wiase hann. Obiara a odi m'akyi no rennantew sum mu da, na mmom obenya nea." nkwa hann." ” Yohane 8:12 . Enti, sɛ yɛhyɛ onipa foforo no na yɛhyɛ Kristo nkutoo a yebetumi ahyerɛn, anya anuonyam, na yɛahyɛ Onyankopɔn anuonyam! Amen. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Hymn: Me ni

YOO! Ɛno nyinaa yɛ nnɛyi nkitahodi ne kyɛfa a yɛne wo yɛ no nti, Yɛda wo ase Ɔsoro Agya sɛ woama yɛn anuonyam kwan no, Ma Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛso nka mo nyinaa ho. Amen

articles.title: (1) Nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no nam gyidie so na ɛba;
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no nhwɛ Romafo Ti 1 ne nkyekyem 17 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Ɛfiri sɛ wɔda Onyankopɔn tenenee adi wɔ asɛmpa yi mu; Sɛnea wɔakyerɛw no: “Gyidi mu na treneefo bɛtra ase.”

Ɛnnɛ yɛsua adeɛ, yɛbɔ fekuo, na yɛkyɛ "Nkwagye ne Anuonyam". Daabi. 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Kasa na bɔ mpae: Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Yɛda Awurade ase sɛ wasoma adwumayɛfoɔ ma wɔama yɛn Nyankopɔn ahintasɛm no nyansa a na wɔde asie wɔ mmerɛ a atwam no mu denam nokorɛ asɛm a wɔatwerɛɛ na wɔn nsa kaeɛ no so, a ɛyɛ asɛm a Onyankopɔn ahyɛ ato hɔ ama yɛn sɛ yɛbɛgye yɛn nkwa na yɛahyɛ yɛn anuonyam wɔ nnipa nyinaa anim daa nkwa! Wɔnam Honhom Kronkron so ayi no adi akyerɛ yɛn. Amen! Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi ahu na yɛate honhom mu nokware → Te aseɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn ahyɛ yɛn ato hɔ sɛ yɛbɛgye yɛn nkwa na yɛahyɛ yɛn anuonyam ansa na wɔrebɔ wiase!

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mebisa yei wɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Nnianim asɛm: Nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no ne "". Egyina gyidi so ", anuonyam asɛmpa no da so ara " . lɛtɛ ” → sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a krataa no . Amen! Nkwagye ne fapem, na anuonyam gyina nkwagye so.

M’ani nwu asɛmpa no ho, ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn tumi a ɛde nkwagyeɛ ma obiara a ɔgye di, Yudani kane ne Helafoɔ nso. Ɛfiri sɛ wɔda Onyankopɔn tenenee adi wɔ asɛmpa yi mu; Sɛnea wɔakyerɛw no: “Gyidi mu na treneefo bɛtra ase.”

【1】Nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no nam gyidie so

bisa: Nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no gyina gyidie so.
anoyie: Nea Onyankopɔn asoma no no mu gyidi yɛ Onyankopɔn adwuma → Yohane 6:28-29 Wobisaa no sɛ, “Dɛn na ɛsɛ sɛ yɛyɛ na wɔabu yɛn sɛ yɛreyɛ Onyankopɔn adwuma?” Onyankopɔn nam so ne eyi.

bisa: Hena na wugye di sɛ Onyankopɔn asoma?
anoyie: "Agyenkwa Yesu Kristo" ɛfiri sɛ ɔbɛgye ne nkurɔfoɔ afiri wɔn bɔne mu → Mateo 1:20-21
Berɛ a ɔredwennwen yei ho no, Awurade bɔfoɔ bi yii ne ho adi kyerɛɛ no wɔ daeɛ mu kaa sɛ, "Yosef, Dawid ba, nsuro! Fa Maria sɛ wo yere, ɛfiri sɛ deɛ wɔanyinsɛn wɔ ne mu no firi Honhom Kronkron no mu." ." . Ɔbɛwo ɔbabarima, na woto ne din Yesu, ɛfiri sɛ ɔbɛgye ne nkurɔfoɔ afiri wɔn bɔne mu.”

bisa: Adwuma bɛn na Agyenkwa Yesu Kristo ayɛ ama yɛn?
anoyie: Yesu Kristo "ayɛ adwuma kɛseɛ" ama yɛn → "yɛn nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa", na yɛbɛgye yɛn nkwa denam asɛmpa yi a yɛbɛgye adi so →
Afei anuanom, mereka asɛmpa a meka kyerɛɛ mo a mo nso monyaa mu na mogyina mu no, asɛmpa yi so bɛgye mo nkwa. Nea mede maa mo nso ne sɛ: Nea edi kan no, Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne sɛnea Kyerɛwnsɛm no kyerɛ no, wosiee no, na wonyan no da a ɛto so abiɛsa sɛnea Kyerɛwnsɛm no kyerɛ no. Amen! Amen, enti, so wote ase pefee? Hwɛ 1 Korintofo ti 15 nkyekyem 1-3.

Hyɛ nso: Asɛmpa no yɛ Onyankopɔn tumi, na Onyankopɔn teneneeyɛ da adi wɔ asɛmpa yi mu→Nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no gyina gyidie so, mmerɛ dodoɔ a Onyankopɔn somaa ɔsomafoɔ Paulo sɛ ɔnkɔka asɛmpa no nkwagye ho ma abɔntenfo→ Nea edi kan no, Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne sɛnea Bible kyerɛ no. 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa gye yɛn fi bɔne mu, . 2. 2. wɔade wɔn ho afi mmara ne ne nnome ho" na wɔasie no " . 3. 3. "Ɔfirii akwakoraa ne n'akwan so" na sɛdeɛ Bible kyerɛ no, wɔnyanee no da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa "; 4. 4. Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wobebu yɛn bem, awo yɛn foforo, anyan yɛn, agye yɛn nkwa, na yɛanya daa nkwa.” Enti, so wote ase pefee?

【2】Anuonyam asɛmpa no de kɔ gyidi mu

bisa: Anuonyam asɛmpa no yɛ obi a ogye di → Asɛmpa bɛn na ogye di sɛ wɔahyɛ no anuonyam?
anoyie: 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Asɛmpa no yɛ Onyankopɔn tumi a ɔde gye obiara a ogye di no nkwa adesamma. Sɛ wogye di a, wobɛgye wo nkwa denam asɛmpa yi a wobɛgye adi no so;
2. 2. Anuonyam asɛmpa no da so ara yɛ "gyidi" → sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔhyɛ gyidi anuonyam . Enti asɛmpa bɛn na wubetumi agye adi na woanya anuonyam? → Yesu mu gyidi hwehwɛ wɔn a Agya no asoma wɔn firi" Ɔkyekyefo ",ɛyɛ" nokware honhom no ", reyɛ wɔ yɛn mu". yɛ foforo "adwuma, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛhyɛ yɛn anuonyam → "Sɛ modɔ me a, mubedi m'ahyɛdeɛ so. Na mɛsrɛ Agya no, na ɔbɛma mo Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ foforɔ (anaa Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ; ɔno ara wɔ aseɛ hɔ), na ɔne mo atena daa, a ɔyɛ Wiase ntumi nnye ntom." nokorɛ Honhom no, ɛfiri sɛ ɛnhunu no na ɛnnim no, na mmom monim no, ɛfiri sɛ ɔne mo tena na ɔbɛtena mo mu Yohane 14:15-17.

bisa: Foforo adwuma bɛn na “Honhom Kronkron” no yɛ wɔ yɛn mu?
anoyie: Onyankopɔn nam awoɔ foforɔ asubɔ ne Honhom Kronkron adwuma foforɔ so → Ma Yesu Kristo nkwagye ne Agya Nyankopɔn dɔ no nhwie ngu yɛn so ne yɛn koma mu pii →Ɔnam trenee nnwuma a yɛayɛ so na ogyee yɛn nkwa, na mmom sɛnea ne mmɔborohunu te, denam awo foforo a wɔhohoro ne Honhom Kronkron foforoyɛ so. Honhom Kronkron ne deɛ Onyankopɔn nam Yesu Kristo, yɛn Agyenkwa no so hwie guu yɛn so bebree, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛfa n’adom so abu yɛn bem na yɛabɛyɛ adedifoɔ wɔ daa nkwa anidasoɔ mu (anaa wɔakyerɛ aseɛ sɛ: yɛanya daa nkwa wɔ anidasoɔ mu). Tito 3:5-7 → Anidasoɔ nhyɛ yɛn aniwuo, ɛfiri sɛ, Honhom Kronkron a wɔde ama yɛn no na ahwie Onyankopɔn dɔ agu yɛn akoma mu. Nkyekyɛm – Romafoɔ 5:5.

Hyɛ nso: Honhom Kronkron a wɔde ama yɛn no hwie Onyankopɔn dɔ gu yɛn koma mu, na Onyankopɔn dɔ wɔ yɛn mu pefee Dedaw esiane Kristo nti". te sɛ "Yɛadi mmara no so a, "yegye di" sɛ Kristo ama mmara no abam, kyerɛ sɛ yɛadi mmara no so efisɛ Kristo wɔ yɛn mu." pefee , yɛtena Kristo mu, . Ɛno ansa na wobetumi ahyɛ yɛn anuonyam . Amen! Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Asɛmpa nkyerɛwee a wɔkyɛ, a Onyankopɔn Honhom, Onua Wang*Yun, Yesu Kristo adwumayɛfoɔ na ɛkanyan no , Onuabaa Liu, Onuabaa Zheng, Onua Cen - ne mfɛfoɔ adwumayɛfoɔ foforɔ, boa na wɔbom yɛ adwuma wɔ Yesu Kristo Asɔre no asɛmpa adwuma mu. Wɔka Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no, asɛmpa a ɛma kwan ma wɔgye nnipa nkwa, hyɛ wɔn anuonyam, na wɔgye wɔn nipadua! Amen

Hymn: Megye di, megye di!

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ mɛdi nkitaho na me ne mo nyinaa akyɛ Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Predestination 3 Onyankopɔn ahyɛ yɛn ato hɔ sɛ wɔbɛhyɛ yɛn anuonyam
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no mu nkɔ 1 Korintofo 2 Ti 7 Nea yɛreka ho asɛm ne Onyankopɔn nyansa a ahintaw, a Onyankopɔn hyehyɛe ansa na mmere reba de ahyɛ yɛn anuonyam.

Ɛnnɛ yɛsua adeɛ, yɛbɔ fekuo, na yɛkyɛ "Te to hɔ" Daabi. 3. 3. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Yɛda Awurade ase sɛ wasoma adwumayɛfo ma wɔama yɛn Nyankopɔn ahintasɛm a na wɔde asie bere a atwam no mu nyansa, asɛm a Onyankopɔn ahyɛ ato hɔ ama yɛn sɛ yɛnhyɛ yɛn ho anuonyam ansa na mfe no reba, denam nokware asɛm a wɔakyerɛw wɔ wɔn nsam na “wɔaka” →
Wɔnam Honhom Kronkron so ayi no adi akyerɛ yɛn. Amen! Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi ahu na yɛate honhom mu nokware → Te ase sɛ Onyankopɔn ma yɛn kwan ma yehu n’apɛde ahintasɛm sɛnea n’ankasa atirimpɔw pa te → Onyankopɔn ahyɛ yɛn ato hɔ sɛ wɔbɛhyɛ yɛn anuonyam ansa na daa nyinaa aba!

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mebisa yei wɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

[1] Mo ne No nkabom wɔ owuo nsɛsoɔ mu, na mo nso mo ne no bɛbom wɔ Ne wusɔreɛ nsɛsoɔ mu

Romafoɔ 6:5 Sɛ yɛne no ayɛ baako wɔ ne wuo nsɛsoɔ mu a, yɛne no nso bɛyɛ baako wɔ ne wusɔreɛ nsɛsoɔ mu;

(1) Sɛ yɛka ne ho bom wɔ ne wu sɛso mu a

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na yɛne Kristo bɛyɛ biako wɔ Ne wu sɛso mu?
anoyie: “Wɔbɔɔ yɛn asu kɔɔ ne wu mu” → Wunnim sɛ yɛn a wɔbɔɔ yɛn asu kɔɔ Kristo Yesu mu no, wɔbɔɔ yɛn asu kɔɔ ne wu mu? Nhwehwɛmu--Romafo Ti 6 Nkyekyɛm 3

bisa: Dɛn ne asubɔ atirimpɔw?

anoyie: "Kristo a yɛhyɛ" ma yɛnantew asetena foforo mu → Enti, mo nyinaa yɛ Onyankopɔn mma denam Kristo Yesu mu gyidi so. Mo mu dodoɔ a wɔbɔɔ wɔn asu wɔ Kristo mu no, moahyɛ Kristo. Reference - Galatians 3:26-27 → Enti wɔde asubɔ siee yɛn ne no kɔɔ owuo mu, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛnantew nkwa foforɔ mu, sɛdeɛ wɔwoo Kristo firii awufoɔ mu denam Agya no anuonyam so saa ara sɛ owusɔreɛ no. Romafo 3:4

(2) Wo ne No nkabom wɔ Ne wusɔreɛ nsɛsoɔ mu

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na wɔaka abom wɔ Kristo wusɔre no sɛso mu?
anoyie: "Di na nom Awurade Anwummeduan" → Yesu kaa sɛ: "Nokware, nokware, mise mo sɛ, sɛ monni Onipa Ba no nam na monom Onipa Ba no mogya a, monni nkwa wɔ mo mu. Obiara di me honam na ɔnom me mogya Onipa wɔ daa nkwa, na mɛnyane no da a ɛdi akyire no Me honam yɛ aduane ampa, na me mogya yɛ anonneɛ Nea ɔdi me honam na ɔnom me mogya no tena me mu wɔ ne mu

【2】Fa w’asɛnnua na di Yesu akyi

Marko 8:34-35 Afei ɔfrɛɛ nnipakuo no ne n’asuafoɔ no baa wɔn nkyɛn ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Sɛ obi pɛ sɛ ɔdi m’akyi a, ɔmpa ne ho na ɔfa n’asɛnnua na ɔdi m’akyi. Na obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔgye ne kra.” (anaa Nkyerɛaseɛ: ɔkra; saa ara wɔ aseɛ ha yi) bɛhwere ne nkwa;

(1) Obiara a ɔbɛhwere ne kra ama me ne asɛmpa no, ɔbɛgye no nkwa.

bisa: Dɛn ne “atirimpɔw” a obi bɛfa n’asɛnnua na wadi Yesu akyi?
anoyie: "Botae" no ne sɛ ɔbɛhwere nkwa "dedaw" no → Nea ɔhwɛ ne nkwa so no bɛhwere ne nkwa "dedaw" wɔ wiase yi mu; onipa" te ase kɔ daa nkwa mu. Nkyekyɛm--Yohane 12:25

(2) Hyɛ onipa foforo no na nya osuahu sɛ wode onipa dedaw no bɛto nkyɛn

bisa: Fa wo ho foforo no to hɔ osuahu a wode to nkyɛn; Botaeɛ "Ɛyɛ dɛn?"
anoyie: " Botaeɛ "ɛyɛ" Ɔba foforo "Nkakrankakra yɛ foforo na nyin;" akwakoraa "Nantew kɔ, de ɔsɛe to nkyɛn → wɔreyɛ onipa foforo no foforo wɔ nimdeɛ mu, ayɛ ne Bɔfo suban. Reference - Kolosefo 3:10 → Fa akwakoraa no to nkyɛn wɔ ɔkwan a bere bi na wobɔ bra no so, akwakoraa yi Nnipa de nkakrankakra bɛyɛ bɔne." esiane pɛsɛmenkominya akɔnnɔ nnaadaa nti, twe adwene si - Efesofo 4:22

bisa: So yɛmfaa akwakoraa no nkɔ akyiri “dedaw”? Adɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ woda so ara to akwakoraa no akyi? → Kolosefoɔ 3:9 Munnni atoro nkyerɛ mo ho mo ho, ɛfiri sɛ moagyae onipa dedaw ne ne nneyɛeɛ.
anoyie: Yɛgye di sɛ wɔabɔ yɛn asɛnnua mu, yɛawuwu, yɛasie yɛn na yɛne Kristo anyan yɛn→" Gyidi ama akwakoraa no ato nkyɛn ", yɛn dedaw no da so ara wɔ hɔ na wɔda so ara tumi hu →." Yi fi hɔ kɛkɛ na “nya osuahu a ɛfa yiyi ho” . →Ademude a wɔde ato dɔteɛ anwenneɛ no mu no bɛda adi, na "onipa foforɔ" no bɛda adi kɔ, yɛ porɔwee (porɔw), san kɔ mfutuma mu, na san kɔ ahuhude mu→ Enti , yɛn abam mmu. Ɛwom sɛ "onipa dedaw" no reyera wɔ akyi de, nanso wɔreyɛ "onipa foforo a ɔwɔ Kristo mu" no foforo da biara da wɔ ne mu. Yɛn bere tiaa mu amanehunu ne hare mu amanehunu bɛyɛ adwuma ama yɛn anuonyam mu duru a enni awiei a wontumi mfa ntoto ho. Amen! Enti, so wote ase pefee? Nhwehwɛmu--2 Korintofo 4 nkyekyem 16-17

【3】Ka ɔsoro ahennie asɛmpa no wɔ w’akyi

(1) Sɛ yɛne no hu amane a, . na wɔne no bɛhyɛ anuonyam

Romafo 8:17 Na sɛ wɔyɛ mma a, ɛnde adedifo, Onyankopɔn adedifo ne Kristo yɔnko adedifo. Sɛ yɛne No hunu amane a, yɛne No nso bɛhyɛ yɛn animuonyam.
Filipifo 1:29 Na wɔama mo kwan sɛ monnye Kristo nni nko, na mmom sɛ mobɛhunu amane ama no nso.

(2) Ɔpɛ a ɔwɔ sɛ obehu amane

1 Petro Ti 4:1-2 Esiane sɛ Kristo huu amane wɔ honam mu nti, . Ɛsɛ sɛ wode saa apɛde a ɛte sɛɛ nso di dwuma sɛ akode , efisɛ nea wahu amane wɔ honam mu no agyae bɔne. Sɛ wowɔ koma a ɛte saa a, efi seesei rekɔ no, wubetumi de wo bere a aka no atra wiase yi mu a ɛnyɛ sɛnea nnipa akɔnnɔ te na mmom sɛnea Onyankopɔn pɛ nkutoo.
1 Petro Ti 5:10 Sɛ mohunu amane kakra a, ɔdom nyinaa Nyankopɔn a wafrɛ mo aba ne daa anuonyam mu wɔ Kristo mu no, ɔno ara bɛma mo ayɛ pɛ, ahyɛ mo den, na wahyɛ mo den.

(3) . Onyankopɔn ahyɛ yɛn ato hɔ sɛ wɔbɛhyɛ yɛn anuonyam

Yenim sɛ nneɛma nyinaa bom yɛ papa ma wɔn a wɔdɔ Onyankopɔn, wɔn a wɔafrɛ wɔn sɛnea n’atirimpɔw te. wɔn a na odi kan nim wɔn Wadi kan asi ne bo sɛ ne Ba no besuasua no~ " Fa w’asɛnnua, di Yesu akyi, na ka ɔsoro ahennie asɛmpa no ” na ɔmaa ne ba no bɛyɛɛ abakan wɔ anuanom bebree mu. wɔahyɛ ato hɔ na wɔn a wɔwɔ ase hɔ no frɛɛ wɔn na ɔmaa wɔn nso buu wɔn bem; Wɔn a ɔbuu wɔn bem no, ɔhyɛɛ wɔn anuonyam nso . Nhwehwɛmu--Romafo 8:28-30

Saa adom yi na Onyankopɔn de nyansa ne ntease nyinaa ama yɛn; sɛnea n’ankasa pɛ te , na yɛahu n’apɛde ho ahintasɛm, na bere a ɛyɛ pɛ mu no, nneɛma a ɛwɔ soro ne asase so nyinaa ayɛ biako wɔ Kristo mu. Ɔno mu na yɛwɔ agyapadeɛ nso, ɔno na ɔyɛ nneɛma nyinaa sɛdeɛ n’apɛdeɛ teɛ, . wɔahyɛ no sɛnea n’apɛde te . Nhwehwɛmu-Efesofo 1:8-11→ Nea yɛreka ho asɛm no ne nea na wɔde asie bere bi a atwam no , Onyankopɔn ahintasɛm nyansa, a Onyankopɔn ahyɛ da ahyɛ da ama yɛn anuonyam ansa na daa. . Amen! Nkyekyɛm - 1 Korintofoɔ 2:7

articles.title: Predestination 2 Onyankopɔn ahyɛ yɛn ato hɔ sɛ yɛnam Yesu Kristo so nnye yɛn nkwa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no mu nkɔ 1 Tesalonikafo ti 5 nkyekyem 9 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Efisɛ Onyankopɔn nhyɛɛ yɛn sɛ yɛnam abufuw so, na mmom sɛ yɛnam yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo so begye yɛn nkwa.

Ɛnnɛ yɛsua adeɛ, yɛbɔ fekuo, na yɛkyɛ "Te to hɔ" Daabi. 2. 2. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Yɛda Awurade ase sɛ wasoma adwumayɛfo denam nokware asɛm a wɔde wɔn nsa akyerɛw na wɔaka so → sɛ wɔmma yɛn Onyankopɔn ahintasɛm a wɔde asie bere a atwam no mu nyansa, asɛm a Onyankopɔn ahyɛ da ahyɛ da ama yɛn sɛ yɛmfa yɛn ho nhyɛ mu ansa na mfe no nyinaa reba!

Wɔnam Honhom Kronkron so ayi no adi akyerɛ yɛn. Amen! Bɔ mpae sɛ Awurade Yesu bɛkɔ so ahyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na wabue yɛn adwene mu ama yɛate Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi ahu na yɛate honhom mu nokware → Te ase sɛ Onyankopɔn ma yɛn kwan ma yehu n’apɛde ho ahintasɛm sɛnea N’adwene pa a wahyɛ ato hɔ no te → Onyankopɔn ahyɛ yɛn ato hɔ sɛ yɛnam yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo so begye yɛn nkwa!

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mebisa yei wɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

【1】Obiara a na wɔahyɛ no sɛ onnya daa nkwa no gye dii

Ndwu.
Asemmisa: Obiara a wɔahyɛ no sɛ obenya daa nkwa no agye adi sɛ ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na wagye nea obenya daa nkwa adi.
Mmuae: Gye di sɛ Yesu ne Kristo no! Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

(1) Gye di sɛ Yesu yɛ Onyankopɔn teasefo no Ba

Ɔbɔfo no ka kyerɛɛ no se, "Nsuro, Maria! Woanya Onyankopɔn anim dom. Wobɛnyinsɛn na woawo ɔbabarima, na wobɛtumi ato ne din Yesu. Ɔbɛyɛ kɛseɛ na wɔbɛfrɛ no Ba." Ɔsorosoroni no, Awurade Nyankopɔn bɛma wayɛ kɛse na wadi hene wɔ Yakob fie daa, na Maria ka kyerɛɛ ɔbɔfo no sɛ, “Sɛ manware a, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na eyi abam?” Ɔsorosoroni no tumi bɛkata wo so, na deɛ wɔbɛwo no no bɛyɛ kronkron, na wɔbɛfrɛ no Onyankopɔn Ba Luka 1:30- Nkyekyɛmu 35 → Yesu kaa sɛ, “Hwan na wose mene? Simon Petro buaa no se, “Wone Kristo, Onyankopɔn teasefo no Ba.” ” Mateo 16:15-16

(2) Gye di sɛ Yesu ne Asɛm a ɔbaa honam mu no

Mfitiaseɛ no na Tao wɔ hɔ, na Tao ka Onyankopɔn ho, na Tao nso yɛ Onyankopɔn. ...Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ honam (kyerɛ sɛ, Onyankopɔn bɛyɛɛ honam, Ɔbaabun Maria nyinsɛn no na Honhom Kronkron woo no, na wɔtoo no din Yesu! - Hwɛ Mateo 1:21), na ɔtenaa yɛn mu, a adom ne nokware ahyɛ no ma . Na yɛahu n’anuonyam, anuonyam a ɛte sɛ Agya no ba koro no. ... Obiara nhunuu Nyankopɔn da, Ɔba a ɔwoo no koro no nko ara, a ɔwɔ Agya no kokom no, na wayi No adi. Yohane 1:1,14,18

(3) Gye di sɛ Onyankopɔn de Yesu sii hɔ sɛ mpata afɔrebɔ

Romafoɔ 3:25 Onyankopɔn nam Yesu mogya ne gyidie so de Yesu sii hɔ sɛ mpata, sɛ ɔbɛda Onyankopɔn tenenee adi ɛfiri sɛ n’abodwokyɛreɛ mu no ɔde nnipa bɔne a wɔadi kan ayɛ no kyɛɛ wɔn, 1 Yohane Ti 4 Nkyekyɛmu 10 Ɛnyɛ sɛ yɛdɔ Onyankopɔn, na mmom Onyankopɔn dɔ yɛn na ɔsomaa ne Ba sɛ ɔmmɛyɛ yɛn bɔne mpata , eyi ne ɔdɔ → “Efisɛ Onyankopɔn dɔ wiase araa ma ɔde ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro no mae, na obiara a ogye no di no nsɛe na mmom obenya daa nkwa ... Nea ogye Ɔba no di no wɔ daa nkwa Ɔba no rennya daa nkwa ( (mfitiase nkyerɛwee: ɔrenhu daa nkwa), na Onyankopɔn abufuw tena ne so” Yohane 3:16,36.

【2】Onyankopɔn ahyɛ yɛn ato hɔ sɛ yebenya ɔba

(1) Sɛ yɛbɛgye wɔn a wɔwɔ mmara ase no sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛnya ɔba

Nanso berɛ a ɛwie pɛyɛ duruiɛ no, Onyankopɔn somaa ne Ba a ɔbaa a ɔwoo no wɔ mmara ase no sɛ ɔmmɛgye wɔn a wɔhyɛ mmara ase no, na yɛagye yɛn ayɛ mma. Esiane sɛ moyɛ mma nti, Onyankopɔn asoma ne Ba no Honhom akɔ mo (mfitiase nkyerɛwee: yɛn) koma mu, asu sɛ, “Abba, Agya, mubetumi ahu sɛ efi seesei rekɔ no, monyɛ akoa bio, na mmom moyɛ ɔba!” na esiane sɛ woyɛ ɔba nti, wode wo ho to Onyankopɔn so sɛ ɔyɛ n’adedifo. Galatifo 4:4-7 .

bisa: So biribi wɔ mmara no ase? nyame Ɔbayɛ?
anoyie: Daabi. Adɛn? →Efisɛ bɔne tumi ne mmara, na wɔn a wɔwɔ mmara ase no yɛ nkoa, bɔne nkoa. Enti, so wote ase pefee? Hwɛ 1 Korintofo 15:56

(2) Onyankopɔn ahyɛ yɛn ato hɔ sɛ yɛnam Yesu Kristo so benya ɔba

Nhyira nka yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo Nyankopɔn ne n’Agya! Ɔde honhom mu nhyira biara ahyira yɛn wɔ ɔsoro mmeaeɛ wɔ Kristo mu: sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn paw yɛn wɔ ne mu ansa na wɔrehyɛ wiase sɛ yɛnyɛ kronkron na yɛn ho nni asɛm biara wɔ n’anim ɛnam ne dɔ a ɔwɔ ma yɛn nti ɔyii yɛn wɔ ne mu no, ɔhyɛɛ yɛn ho daeɛ sɛ wɔbɛfa Yesu Kristo so ayɛ wɔn mma sɛnea n’apɛde te, Efesofo 1:3-5

【3】Onyankopɔn ahyɛ yɛn ato hɔ sɛ yɛnam Awurade Yesu Kristo so nnye yɛn nkwa

(1) Gye nkwagye asɛmpa no di

Ɔsomafo Paulo kaa → “Asɛmpa” a meka kyerɛɛ mo nso: Nea edi kan no, sɛ Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne sɛnea Kyerɛwnsɛm no kyerɛ → (1 sɛ ɔbɛma yɛade yɛn ho afi bɔne ho; 2 sɛ ɔbɛma yɛade yɛn ho afi mmara ne mmara Nnome ho ) - twe adwene si Romafo 6:7, 7:6 ne Gal 3:13, na wosiee no (3 tetew mu firi akwakoraa ne n’akwan dedaw no ho) - twe adwene si Kolosefo 3:9 nso sedee Bible kyer[ no Okaa se, Na ]y[ wɔnyanee yɛn da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa (4 sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛbu yɛn bem, awo yɛn foforɔ, agye yɛn nkwa, na yɛanya daa nkwa! Amen) - hwɛ Romafoɔ ti 4 nkyekyɛmu 25, 1 Petro ti 1 nkyekyɛmu 3-4 ne 1 Korintofoɔ 15 ti 3- . 4 Afahyɛ

(2) Onyankopɔn ahyɛ yɛn ato hɔ sɛ yɛnam Awurade Yesu Kristo so begye yɛn nkwa

1 Tesalonikafoɔ 5:9 Na Onyankopɔn amfa yɛn anhyɛ abufuo mu, na mmom nkwagyeɛ a ɛnam yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo so.
Efesofoɔ 2:8 Ɔdom na ɛnam gyidie so na wɔagye mo nkwa na ɛnyɛ mo ankasa mu, ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn akyɛdeɛ;
Hebrifo 5:9 Bere a wɔayɛ no pɛ no, ɔbɛyɛɛ daa nkwagye fibea maa wɔn a wotie no.

articles.title: Predestination 1 Onyankopɔn Nkrabea
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible mu nhwɛ Efesofo 1:8-10 na yɛnbom nkenkan: Saa adom yi na Onyankopɔn de ama yɛn bebree wɔ nyansa ne ntease nyinaa mu; ɔsoro nneɛma sɛnea Ne nhyehyɛe te , biribiara a ɛwɔ asase so ayɛ biako wɔ Kristo mu. Amen

Ɛnnɛ yɛsua adeɛ, yɛbɔ fekuo, na yɛkyɛ "Te to hɔ" Daabi. 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Yɛda Awurade ase sɛ wasoma adwumayɛfoɔ denam nokware asɛm a ne nsa akyerɛw na ɔkaa no so → sɛ ɔmma yɛn Nyankopɔn ahintasɛm a wɔde asie tete no nyansa, asɛm a Onyankopɔn ahyɛ ato hɔ ama yɛn ansa na mfeɛ reba sɛ wɔbɛhyɛ yɛn animuonyam .
Wɔnam Honhom Kronkron so ayi no adi akyerɛ yɛn. Amen! Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi ahu na yɛate honhom mu nokware → Te ase sɛ Onyankopɔn ma yɛn kwan ma yehu N’apɛde ho ahintasɛm sɛnea N’atirimpɔw pa a wɔahyɛ ato hɔ no te.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mebisa yei wɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

【1】Nsɛm a wɔakyerɛw

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa bisa: Dɛn ne reservation?
anoyie: Di kan hu, di kan si gyinae!

2. 2. bisa: Dɛn ne nimdeɛ a wodi kan nya?
anoyie: Nneɛma ansi, di kan hu! →Mateo 24:25 Hwɛ, madi kan aka akyerɛ mo.

3. 3. bisa: Dɛn ne nkɔmhyɛ?
anoyie: Di kan hu ansa na aba, di kan kasa!

4. 4. bisa: Dɛn ne nkɔmhyɛ?
anoyie: Di kan hu na bɔ amanneɛ! "Te sɛ wim tebea ho nkɔmhyɛ".

5. 5. bisa: Dɛn ne type?
anoyie: Sɛ́ wobɛdi kan ahu, sɛ wobɛma nneɛma ada adi, wobɛda no adi!

6. 6. bisa: Dɛn ne siw ano?
anoyie: Di kan hu, di kan yɛ ahwɛyiye

7. bisa: Dɛn ne agyiraehyɛde?
anoyie: Premonition, omen, omen, sɛnkyerɛnne a epue ansa na biribi asi! →Mateo Ti 24 Nkyekyɛm 3 Bere a Yesu te Ngo Bepɔw no so no, n'asuafo no kaa kokoam sɛ, "Ka kyerɛ yɛn, bere bɛn na eyinom bɛba? Dɛn na ɛbɛyɛ wo mmae ne bere awiei ho sɛnkyerɛnne?"

【2】Onyankopɔn Nkrabea

(1) . Onyankopɔn hyehyɛɛ Adam sɛ wonnya nkwa

Awurade Nyankopɔn yɛɛ nwoma ntoma maa Adam ne ne yere na ɔhyɛɛ wɔn ntadeɛ. Genesis 3:21 →---Adam yɛ onipa a ɔbɛba no ho nhwɛsoɔ. Romafo Ti 5 Nkyekyɛm 14 → Wɔakyerɛw nso wɔ Bible mu sɛ: "Onipa a odi kan, Adam, bɛyɛɛ ɔteasefo a ɔwɔ honhom (honhom: anaa wɔkyerɛɛ ase sɛ honam)"; 1 Korintofo 15:45

bisa: Dɛn na “ntade a wɔde nwoma ayɛ” a ɛsɛ sɛ wɔhyɛ no gyina hɔ ma?
anoyie: Wɔde ntade a wɔde aboa a wɔakum no "guammaa" were yɛɛ no → yɛɛ Kristo ho mfonini sɛ oguammaa a wokum no maa "Adam", kyerɛ sɛ, owui wɔ asɛnnua no so, wosiee no, na wonyan no wɔ da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa → wɔnyanee Kristo firii awufoɔ mu na wɔsan woo no sɛ ɔmfa ne ho nhyɛ ne ho foforɔ, sɛ ɔmfa ne ho nhyɛ Kristo. Ɛne sɛ, na Adam a odii kan no yɛ " . Preimage, sunsuma a ɛwɔ hɔ ", ɔsɔre fi awufo mu". Kristo "Ɛno ne." Adam nsɛso ankasa → "" Kristo "Ɛno ne." adam ankasa , enti wɔfrɛ no " . adam a otwa to "Onyankopɔn Ba - twe adwene si Yesu abusua anato a ewo Luka 3:38, 39 no so." Yɛn nso yɛyɛ Adam a odi akyiri , efisɛ yɛyɛ Kristo nipadua no akwaa! Amen. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

(2) . Onyankopɔn na ɔhyehyɛɛ Isak ne Rebeka aware

Sɛ ɔka sɛ, “Nom kɛkɛ, na mɛtwe nsu ama wo yoma a, ɛnneɛ ma ɔnyɛ ɔyere a AWURADE ahyɛ me wura ba.” ’ Ansa na mereka nea ɛwɔ me komam awie no, Rebeka fii adi de nsu toa bi si ne mmati so sian kɔɔ abura no ho sɛ ɔrekɔtwe nsu. Meka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: ‘Mesrɛ wo, ma me nsuo bi. ’ Ɔyɛɛ ntɛm yii toa no fii ne mmati so kae sɛ, ‘Mesrɛ wo nom! Mɛma wo yoma nso biribi anom. ’ Enti menom nsa; Genesis 24:44-46 na ɛwɔ hɔ

(3) . Onyankopɔn na ɔhyɛɛ Dawid ahenni sɛ ɔhene

AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Samuel sɛ: “Ɛfiri sɛ mapo no sɛ ɔnyɛ Israel hene no, wobɛdi awerɛhoɔ akosi da bɛn? Fa ngo a wɔde sra wo bɛhyɛ w’abɛn no ma, na meresoma wo akɔ Betlehemni Yise nkyɛn, ɛfiri sɛ meka ne nkurɔfoɔ ho. Ɔno.” apaw ɔhene wɔ ne mma mu.”

(4) . Onyankopɔn na ɔhyehyɛɛ Kristo awo

Awurade nso bɛsoma Kristo (Yesu) a na wɔahyɛ sɛ ɔmmra no. Ɔsoro bɛkora no so kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛsan de nneɛma nyina ara aba, a Onyankopɔn nam n’adiyifoɔ kronkron no ano aka firi berɛ a wɔhyehyɛɛ wiase no. Asomafo no Nnwuma 3:20-21

(5) . Onyankopɔn na ɔhyɛɛ yɛn bɔne ho amanehunu a Kristo behu no

Ɛwom sɛ Onipa Ba no bewu sɛnea wɔahyɛ no de, nanso wɔn a woyi Onipa Ba no ma no nnue! "Luka 22:22 → Ɔsoaa yɛn bɔne wɔ ne nipadua mu wɔ dua no so, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛn a yɛawuwu ama bɔne no, yɛatena ase ama trenee. Ɛnam ne mpire so saa mo yare. Wo Bere bi na wote sɛ oguan a wayera, nanso seesei." moasan aba mo kra Oguanhwɛfoɔ ne Ɔhwɛfoɔ nkyɛn 1 Petro 2:24-25.
