articles.title: Daa Nkwa 3 ma obiara a ogye di no tumi nya daa nkwa wɔ Kristo mu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Nnamfo adɔfo* Asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue Bible no nkyerɛ Yohane Ti 3 Nkyekyem 15-16 “ . Onyankopɔn dɔ wiase no araa ma ɔde ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro no mae, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a obiara a ogye no di no rensɛe na mmom obenya daa nkwa. Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a obiara a ogye no di no benya daa nkwa (anaa wɔakyerɛ ase sɛ: sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a obiara a ogye no di no benya daa nkwa wɔ Ne mu) Amen

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "daa nkwa". Daabi. 3. 3. Momma yɛmmɔ mpaeɛ: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa [Asɔre no] soma adwumayɛfoɔ nam nokorɛ asɛm no so, a wɔatwerɛ na wɔka wɔ wɔn nsam, mo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn kra ani na mmue yɛn adwene mu nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware → Te ase sɛ obiara a ogye di no betumi anya daa nkwa wɔ Yesu Kristo mu . Amen!

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) . Na obiara a ogye di no anya daa nkwa wɔ Kristo mu

Momma yɛnsua Yohane 3 Ti 15-18 wɔ Bible mu na yɛnkenkan no abom: Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a obiara a ogye no di no benya daa nkwa (anaasɛ wɔakyerɛ ase: sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a obiara a ogye no di no benya daa nkwa). "Efisɛ Onyankopɔn dɔ wiase araa ma ɔde ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro no mae, na obiara a ogye no di no ansɛe na wanya daa nkwa. Na Onyankopɔn ansoma ne Ba no aba wiase sɛ ɔmmɛbu wiase fɔ (anaa ɔkyerɛ ase sɛ: ɔmmɛbu wiase atɛn." ; Onyankopɔn dea.

"Nea ofi soro no di ade nyinaa so; nea ofi asase so no fi asase so, na nea ɔka no fi asase so. Nea ofi soro no di ade nyinaa so. Ɔdi nea ohu ne nea ɔte ho adanse. Nanso obiara annye n’adansedie no antom na deɛ ɔgyee n’adanseɛ no de nsɔano too hɔ de kyerɛe sɛ Onyankopɔn yɛ nokorɛ, ɛfiri sɛ deɛ Onyankopɔn asoma no no ka Onyankopɔn asɛm. Onyankopɔn de Honhom Kronkron ama no a enni ano nkyerɛwee nyɛ daa nkwa), na Onyankopɔn abufuw da so ara wɔ Ne so.

( 2. 2. ) . Onyankopɔn Ba no nkwa no, daa nkwa wɔ hɔ

Oyi ne Yesu Kristo a ɔnam nsuo ne mogya nko ara so baeɛ, na mmom ɔnam nsuo ne mogya so na ɔdii Honhom Kronkron no adanseɛ, ɛfiri sɛ Honhom Kronkron yɛ nokorɛ. Baasa na wodi adanse: Honhom Kronkron, nsuo, ne mogya, na saa baasa yi abom ayɛ baako. Esiane sɛ yenya nnipa adansedi nti, ɛsɛ sɛ yenya Onyankopɔn adansedi kɛse mpo (ɛsɛ sɛ yenya: mfitiase nkyerɛwee no yɛ kɛse), efisɛ Onyankopɔn adanse yɛ Ne Ba no dea. Obiara a ogye Nyankopɔn Ba no di no wɔ saa adanseɛ yi wɔ ne mu; Saa adanseɛ yi ne sɛ Onyankopɔn ama yɛn daa nkwa; Sɛ obi wɔ Onyankopɔn Ba a, ɔwɔ nkwa; --1 Yohane 5:6-12

( 3. 3. ) . na moahunu sɛ mowɔ daa nkwa

Mekyerɛw yeinom de kɔma mo a mogye Onyankopɔn Ba no din di, na moahu sɛ mowɔ daa nkwa. ...Yɛnim nso sɛ Onyankopɔn Ba no aba na wama yɛn nyansa sɛ yɛbɛhunu deɛ ɔyɛ nokorɛ, na yɛwɔ deɛ ɔyɛ nokorɛ, ne Ba Yesu Kristo mu. Oyi ne nokware Nyankopɔn ne daa nkwa. --1 Yohane 5:13,20

[Hyɛ nso]: Yɛsua atifi hɔ kyerɛwsɛm no → "Na Onyankopɔn dɔ wiase araa ma ɔde ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro no mae, na obiara a ogye no di no ansɛe na wanya daa nkwa. Na Onyankopɔn ansoma ne Ba no amma wiase sɛ ɔmmɛbu wiase fɔ. ( Anaasɛ wɔakyerɛ ase sɛ: Bu wiase atɛn wɔ ase hɔ), sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a obiara a ogye di no betumi anya daa nkwa wɔ Yesu Kristo mu Wɔn a wogye Ɔba no di no benya daa nkwa; Mo a mogye Onyankopɔn Ba no din di, na moahunu sɛ mowɔ daa nkwa ! Amen.

articles.title: Daa Nkwa 2 Sɛ yɛbɛhunu wo, nokware Nyankopɔn koro no, na yɛahunu Yesu Kristo a wosomaa no no, yei ne daa nkwa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Nnamfonom adɔfo, asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue Bible no nkyerɛ Yohane ti 17 nkyekyem 3 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Yei ne daa nkwa: sɛ mɛhunu wo, nokware Nyankopɔn koro no, ne Yesu Kristo a wosomaa no no. Amen

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "daa nkwa". Daabi. 2. 2. Momma yɛmmɔ mpaeɛ: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa [Asɔre no] soma adwumayɛfoɔ nam nokorɛ asɛm no so, a wɔatwerɛ na wɔka wɔ wɔn nsam, mo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn kra ani na ɔmmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware→ Yei ne daa nkwa: sɛ mɛhunu wo, nokware Nyankopɔn koro no, ne Yesu Kristo a wosomaa no no .

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

( baako ) . Hu wo, nokware Nyankopɔn koro pɛ

bisa: Yɛbɛyɛ dɛn ahu nokware Nyankopɔn koro no? Dɛn nti na nyame pii som pue wɔ wiase?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha →

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Nokware Nyankopɔn koro pɛ ne nea ɔte hɔ ankasa
Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: "Mene nea meyɛ";'Awurade ne me din daa, na eyi ne me nkae ma awo ntoatoaso nyinaa.' --Exodus 3:14-15 na ɛwɔ hɔ
2. 2. Efi daa, efi mfiase, ansa na wiase no reba no, wɔde me sii hɔ
"Na mewɔ Awurade adebɔ mfiase, mfiase, ansa na wɔrebɔ nneɛma nyinaa. Wɔde me sii hɔ fi daa, fi mfiase, ansa na wiase reba. -- Mmebusɛm 8:22-23."
3. 3. Me ne Alfa ne Omega, me ne nea odi kan ne nea otwa to;
Awurade Nyankopɔn se: "Mene Alfa ne Omega (Alfa, Omega: Hela nkyerɛwde abien a edi kan ne nea etwa to), Ade Nyinaa so Tumfoɔ, a na ɔwɔ hɔ, nea ɔwɔ hɔ, na ɔreba."
Me ne Alfa ne Omega, me ne nea odi kan ne nea otwa to; ”--Adiyisɛm 22:13

[Nokware Nyankopɔn Koro no Nnipa Baasa].

Akyɛdeɛ ahodoɔ wɔ hɔ, nanso Honhom korɔ no ara.
Ɔsom ahorow ahorow wɔ hɔ, nanso Awurade yɛ ade koro.
Dwumadi ahorow gu ahorow, nanso ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn koro no ara na ɔyɛ nneɛma nyinaa adwuma wɔ ne nyinaa mu. --1 Korintofoɔ 12:4-6
Enti, monkɔ nkɔyɛ aman nyinaa asuafoɔ, monbɔ wɔn asu wɔ Agya, Ɔba, ne Honhom Kronkron no din mu (anaa wɔakyerɛ aseɛ sɛ: monbɔ wɔn asu wɔ Agya, Ɔba, ne Honhom Kronkron din mu) - Mateo Ti 28 Nkyem 19

【Onyame foforo biara nni hɔ gye AWURADE a ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn】

Yesaia 45:22 Monhwɛ me, asase ano nyinaa, na mobɛgye mo nkwa, na mene Onyankopɔn, na ɔfoforo biara nni hɔ.
Nkwagyeɛ nni obi foforɔ mu; ”--Asomafoɔ Nnwuma Ti 4 Nkyekyɛmu 12

( mmienu ) . na yei ne daa nkwa, na wɔahu Yesu Kristo a wosomaa no no

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Ɔbaabun Maria na ɔnyinsɛn Yesu Kristo na Honhom Kronkron woo no

...efisɛ nea wonyinsɛnee wɔ ne mu no fi Honhom Kronkron no mu. Ɔbɛwo ɔbabarima, na woto ne din Yesu, ɛfiri sɛ ɔbɛgye ne nkurɔfoɔ afiri wɔn bɔne mu. Eyinom nyinaa sii de maa nea Awurade nam odiyifo no so kae no baa mu, na ɔkae sɛ, “Hwɛ, ɔbaabun benyinsɛn na wawo ɔbabarima; ” (Emmanuel kyerɛ ase sɛ “Onyankopɔn ka yɛn ho.”) --Mateo 1:20-23

2. 2. yesu yɛ onyame ba

Maria ka kyerɛɛ ɔbɔfo no se, “Minwaree, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na eyi atumi aba?” wɔbɛfrɛ no Onyankopɔn Ba (anaasɛ Nkyerɛaseɛ: Wɔbɛfrɛ deɛ wɔbɛwo no kronkron, na wɔbɛfrɛ no Onyankopɔn Ba) - Luka 1:34-35

3. 3. Yesu ne Asɛm a ɔbaa honam mu

Mfitiaseɛ no na Tao wɔ hɔ, na Tao ka Onyankopɔn ho, na Tao nso yɛ Onyankopɔn. →Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ honam na ɔtenaa yɛn mu, adom ne nokorɛ ahyɛ no ma. Na yɛahu n’anuonyam, anuonyam a ɛte sɛ Agya no ba koro no de. ... Obiara nhunuu Nyankopɔn da, Ɔba a ɔwoo no koro no nko ara, a ɔwɔ Agya no kokom no, na wayi No adi. --Yohane 1:1,14,18

[Hyɛ nso]: Ɛdenam atifi hɔ kyerɛw nsɛm a yebesua so → yenim sɛ wo ne nokware Nyankopɔn koro → yɛn Nyankopɔn wɔ nnipa baasa: 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Honhom Kronkron - Ɔwerɛkyekyefo, . 2. 2. Ɔba-Yesu Kristo, . 3. 3. Agya Kronkron - Yehowa! Amen. Hu Yesu Kristo a wosomaa no→" yesu din "Ɛkyerɛ sɛ". Sɛ ɔbɛgye ne nkurɔfoɔ afiri wɔn bɔne mu "→Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebegye agye yɛn sɛ Onyankopɔn mma na yɛanya daa nkwa! Amen. Wote eyi ase yiye?

articles.title: Daa Nkwa 1 Nya nkwagye na nya daa nkwa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Nnamfonom adɔfo, asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa! Amen

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nkɔ Yesaia Ti 45 Nkyekyɛm 21-22 Mobɛka na momfa mo nsusuiɛ akyerɛ, na momma wɔne wɔn ho wɔn ho nsusu ho. Hena na ɔtwee adwene sii so fi tete? Hena na ɔkaa ho asɛm fi tete? Ɛnyɛ me AWURADE? Onyame biara nni hɔ gye me; Monhwɛ me, asase ano nyina ara, na mobɛgye mo nkwa;

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "daa nkwa". Daabi. 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa [Asɔre no] nam nokorɛ asɛm no so soma adwumayɛfoɔ, a wɔde wɔn nsa akyerɛw na wɔaka, yɛn nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn kra ani na mmue yɛn adwene mu nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware → Ɛsɛ sɛ obiara a ɔwɔ asase ano no hwɛ Kristo, na wɔbɛgye wɔn nkwa na wɔanya daa nkwa ! Amen.

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) . Hwɛ Kristo na wobɛgye wo nkwa

Ɔhene ntumi nni nkonim esiane n’asraafo pii nti; Ɛyɛ ɔkwa sɛ yɛde yɛn ho bɛto apɔnkɔ so de agye nkwagyeɛ nti, apɔnkɔ ntumi nnye nnipa nkwa ɛnam wɔn ahoɔden kɛseɛ nti. --Nnwom 33:16-17
Dwom 32:7 Wone me hintabea; (Sela) .
Dwom 37:39 Na ateneneefoɔ nkwagyeɛ firi Awurade hɔ;
Dwom 108:6 Bua yɛn na fa wo nsa nifa gye yɛn nkwa, na wɔn a wodɔ wɔn no anya nkwa.
Yesaia Ti 30 Nkyekyɛm 15 Yei ne nea Awurade Nyankopɔn, Israel Kronkronni no aka: “Mo sanba ne mo home mu na mo nkwagye wɔ;
Yesaia 45:22 Monhwɛ me, asase ano nyinaa, na mobɛgye mo nkwa, na mene Onyankopɔn, na ɔfoforo biara nni hɔ.
Romafoɔ 10:9 Sɛ wode w’ano ka sɛ Yesu yɛ Awurade na wogye di wɔ w’akoma mu sɛ Onyankopɔn nyanee no firii awufoɔ mu a, wobɛgye wo nkwa.
Romafoɔ 10:10 Na obi de akoma gye di na wɔbu no bem, na ɔde n’ano ka ne bɔne na ɔgye no nkwa.
Romafo 10:13 Efisɛ “obiara a ɔbɛbɔ Awurade din no, wobegye no nkwa.”
Filipifo 1:19 Na menim sɛ yei nam mo mpaebɔ ne Yesu Kristo Honhom mmoa so bɛma me nkwagyeɛ ayɛ yie.

[Hyɛ nso]: Ɛdenam atifi hɔ kyerɛw nsɛm a osuae so no, Onyankopɔn kae sɛ: "Monhwɛ me, asase ano nyinaa, na wobegye mo nkwa; na mene Onyankopɔn, na obi foforo biara nni hɔ. Amen! → "Wo sanba ne home mu na wobɛyɛ wo." nkwagyeɛ mu bɛyɛ w'ahoɔden "Stable". Wopow sɛ "wobɛhome, woanya asomdwoe" → wobɛhyɛn ne bɔhyɛ a ɛfa ahomegye ho no mu → wɔbɛbɔ wo asɛndua mu, asie wo na woanyane wo ne Kristo akɔhyɛn ahomegye no mu wɔ Yesu Kristo mu, so wote ase pefee?

Sɛ wode w’ano ka sɛ Yesu yɛ Awurade na wogye di wɔ w’akoma mu sɛ Onyankopɔn nyanee no firii awufoɔ mu a, wobɛgye wo nkwa → ɛfiri sɛ obi bɛtumi abu no bem denam ne koma a ɔde gye di so na ɔgye no nkwa denam n’ano a ɔbɛka no so. "Obiara a ɔbɛbɔ Awurade din no, wobegye no nkwa." → Ɛfiri sɛ menim sɛ ɛnam mo mpaebɔ ne Yesu Kristo Honhom mmoa so no, awieeɛ koraa no yei bɛkɔ me nkwagyeɛ mu. Amen

( 2. 2. ) . Deɛ Awurade hyɛ yɛn bɔ no yɛ daa nkwa

“Onyankopɔn dɔ wiase araa ma ɔde ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro no mae, . Na obiara a ogye no di no renyera na mmom obenya daa nkwa . Efisɛ Onyankopɔn somaa Ne Ba no baa wiase, ɛnyɛ sɛ ɔmmɛbu wiase fɔ (anaasɛ wɔakyerɛ ase sɛ: sɛ ɔmmu wiase atɛn; saa ara wɔ ase hɔ), na mmom sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔnam Ne so begye wiase nkwa. --Yohane 3:16-17

Obiara a ogye Ɔba no di no wɔ daa nkwa Nea onnye Ɔba no nni no renhu daa nkwa, na Onyankopɔn abufuw da so ara wɔ ne so. ”--Yohane 3:36
Yohane 6:40 Na m’Agya pɛ sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a obiara a obehu Ɔba no na wagye no adi no anya daa nkwa , na mɛnyane no da a ɛdi akyire no. "
Yohane 6:47 Meka nokware kyerɛ mo, . Nea ogye di no wɔ daa nkwa .
Yohane 6:54 Obiara a odi me honam na ɔnom me mogya no wɔ daa nkwa , mɛnyane no da a ɛdi akyire no.
Yohane 10:28 na mema wɔn daa nkwa ;Wɔnsɛe da, na obiara ntumi nnye wɔn mfi me nsam.
Yohane 12:25 Nea ɔdɔ ne nkwa no bɛhwere no;
Yohane 17:3 Hu wo, nokware Nyankopɔn koro no, na Yei ne daa nkwa, nim Yesu Kristo a wosomaa no no .

[Hyɛ nso] : Ɛdenam atifi hɔ kyerɛwsɛm a yɛhwehwɛ mu so no, yɛkyerɛw sɛ → Awurade hyɛ yɛn bɔ sɛ yɛbɛtena daa nkwa! Sɛnea wobenya daa nkwa→ 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Eyi ne daa nkwa: sɛ mɛhu wo, nokware Nyankopɔn koro no, ne Yesu Kristo a wosomaa no → 2. 2. Nea ogye Ɔba no di no wɔ daa nkwa; 3. 3. Wɔn a wodi "Yesu" honam na wɔnom "Yesu" mogya no benya daa nkwa Yesu benyan yɛn wɔ da a edi akyiri no mu→ 4. 4. Obiara a ɔbɛhwere ne kra ama Yesu ne asɛmpa no bɛgye ne kra na wanya Yesu Kristo nkwa→ Kora nkwa so kɔ daa nkwa mu ! Amen. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

articles.title: Sɛ wonya nkwa wie a, ɛnsɛe da, na mmom nya daa nkwa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe, nnamfo adɔfo, anuanom mmarima ne mmea! Amen

Momma yenbue Bible no nkyerɛ Yohane Ti 10 Nkyekyɛm 27-28 Me nguan te me nne, na menim wɔn, na wɔdi m’akyi. Na mema wɔn nkwa a enni awiei sɛ wɔrensɛe da, na obiara ntumi nnye wɔn mfi me nsam.

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "Wɔgye no pɛnkoro, daa nkwa". Bɔ mpae: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya Kronkron, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa [Asɔre no] nam nokware asɛm a wɔde ne nsa akyerɛw na wɔaka, a ɛyɛ mo nkwagye asɛmpa no so soma adwumayɛfo. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware→ Wɔn a wɔte aseɛ sɛ Yesu bɔɔ bɔne afɔrebɔ no pɛnkoro no, wɔbɛtumi ate wɔn ho daa, wɔagye wɔn nkwa daa, na wɔanya daa nkwa.

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) . Bɔne ho mpata a Kristo yɛ prɛko pɛ no ma wɔn a wɔate wɔn ho no yɛ pɛ daa

Hebrifoɔ 7:27 Na ɔnte sɛ asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ a na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔbɔ afɔdeɛ da biara da wɔ wɔn ankasa bɔne ho na afei ɔman no bɔne ho.
Hebrifo 10:11-12, 14 Ɔsɔfo biara a ogyina hɔ da biara da som Onyankopɔn, na ɔbɔ afɔre koro no ara mpɛn pii no, rentumi nyi bɔne mfi hɔ da. Nanso Kristo de daa afɔrebɔ baako bɔɔ bɔne maa bɔne na ɔtenaa Onyankopɔn nifa. ...Efisɛ ɔnam afɔrebɔ biako so ma wɔn a wɔatew wɔn ho no yɛ pɛ daa.

[Hyɛ no nsow]: Sɛ yɛhwehwɛ atifi hɔ kyerɛwsɛm no mu a, yebetumi ahu sɛ Kristo de daa bɔne afɔre “baako” mae, na ɔnam saayɛ so wiee “bɔne afɔre” →

bisa: Dɛn ne pɛyɛ?
anoyie: Efisɛ Kristo de daa mpata mae maa bɔne → mpata ne afɔrebɔ ho asɛm → "ogyaee".
"Wɔahyɛ adapɛn aduɔson ama wo man ne wo kuro kronkron. Sɛ wode bɔne no bɛba awiei, wobɛtew, wobɛtew ho, na woapata bɔne no. "Sɛ wobɛpata", sɛ wode bɛba (anaasɛ wobɛkyerɛ ase: ada no adi) daa trenee → "sɛ wɔde Kristo daa trenee ne nkwa a bɔne nnim bɛba", sɛ wɔbɛsɔ anisoadehu ne nkɔmhyɛ no ano, na wɔasra Kronkronni no (anaasɛ: anaa nkyerɛase) te sɛ eyi , so wote ase pefee Reference - Daniel Ti 9 Nkyekyɛm 24
→ Ɛnam "Kristo" nti, N'afɔrebɔ baako no ma wɔn a wɔate wɔn ho no yɛ pɛ daa →

bisa: Henanom na wobetumi atew wɔn ho daa?
anoyie: Gye a yegye di sɛ Kristo de bɔne afɔrebɔ ma yɛn bɔne no bɛma wɔn a "wɔatew wɔn ho" no ayɛ pɛ daa → "Daa a ɛyɛ pɛ" kyerɛ sɛ wɔyɛ kronkron daa, wonni bɔne, wontumi nyɛ bɔne, wonni nkekae biara, wɔn ho ntew, na wɔate wɔn ho daa no adi bem! →Dɛn ntia? →Efisɛ yɛn nipa foforo a "wɔawo no foforo" no yɛ Kristo "nnompe dompe ne honam honam", ne nipadua akwaa, Yesu Kristo nipadua ne ne nkwa! Yɛn nkwa a Onyankopɔn awo yɛn no, wɔde asie Kristo wɔ Onyankopɔn mu. Amen. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

( 2. 2. ) . Onipa foforo a Onyankopɔn awo no → nyɛ dedaw no dea

Momma yensua Bible Romafo 8:9 Sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom te mo mu a, monyɛ honam mufo bio na mmom moyɛ Honhom no mufo. Sɛ obi nni Kristo Honhom a, ɔnyɛ Kristo dea.

[Hyɛ nso]: Sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom "te" wo mu, kyerɛ sɛ, Onyankopɔn awo "onipa foforo" a, wo nni honam mu bio, a ɛkyerɛ sɛ "ɔhonam mu nipa dedaw." → "Onipa foforo" a Onyankopɔn awo wo no nyɛ honam "nipa foforo" a Onyankopɔn awo no no yɛ →Honhom Kronkron no dea! Sɛ obi nni Kristo Honhom a, ɔnyɛ Kristo dea. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

→Oyi ne Onyankopɔn a ɔwɔ Kristo mu a ɔrepata wiase ne ne ho, "ɔmfa" →wɔn "onipa dedaw honam" mfomso ahorow no to wɔn "onipa foforo" a Onyankopɔn awo wɔn so, na ɔde mpata asɛm no hyɛ wɔn nsa Amen! 5:19

( 3. 3. ) . Sɛ wonya nkwa wie a, nsɛe da, na mmom nya daa nkwa

Hebrifo 5:9 Afei a wayɛ pɛ no, ɔbɛyɛ "daa nkwagye" fibea ama obiara a otie no.
Yohane 10:27-28 Me nguan te me nne, na menim wɔn, na wɔdi m’akyi. Na mema wɔn nkwa a enni awiei → "Wɔnsɛe da", na obiara ntumi nnye wɔn mfi me nsam. “Onyankopɔn dɔ wiase araa ma ɔde ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro no mae, na obiara a ogye no di no nsɛe na mmom obenya daa nkwa

[Hyɛ nso]: Efi bere a wɔayɛ Kristo pɛ no, wabɛyɛ daa nkwagye fibea ama wɔn a wotie "wɔbɔɔ no asɛndua mu, owui, wosiee no, na wɔne Kristo nyan no prɛko pɛ" nyinaa. Amen! →Yesu nso ma yɛn daa nkwa →Wɔn a wogye no di no "rensɛe da". Amen! → Sɛ obi wɔ Onyankopɔn Ba a, ɔwɔ nkwa; Mekyerɛw yeinom de kɔma mo a mogye Onyankopɔn Ba no din di, na moahu sɛ mowɔ daa nkwa. Amen! Nkyekyɛm-1 Yohane 5:12-13

Adamfo dɔfo! Yɛda mo ase wɔ Yesu Honhom no ho → Wo klik saa asɛm yi so na kenkan na tie asɛmpa asɛnka no Sɛ wowɔ ɔpɛ sɛ wobɛgye na "woagye" Yesu Kristo sɛ Agyenkwa ne Ne dɔ kɛseɛ no a, yɛbɛtumi abom abɔ mpaeɛ?

Abba Agya Kronkron dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Yɛda wo ase Ɔsoro Agya sɛ wosomaa wo Ba a wowoo no koro, Yesu, sɛ ɔmmɛwu wɔ asɛnnua no so "yɛn bɔne nti" → 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa gye yɛn fi bɔne mu, . 2. 2. Gye yɛn fi mmara ne ne nnome ho, . 3. 3. Wɔde wɔn ho afi Satan tumi ne Hades sum no ho. Amen! Na wɔasie no → 4. 4. Ɔde akwakoraa no ne ne nneyɛe too nkyɛn no, wonyanee no da a ɛto so abiɛsa → 5. 5. Bu yɛn bem! Gye Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ no bɔ no sɛ nsɔano, wɔsan wo bio, nyane wo, nya nkwagye, nya Onyankopɔn bayɛ, na nya daa nkwa! Daakye, yɛbɛnya hɛn Ɔsor Egya n’agyapadze. Mommɔ mpae wɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Hymn: Wo ne Anuonyam Hene

YOO! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Nkwagyeɛ 3 Gye di na fa Honhom Kronkron no bɔ wo asu, wobɛgye wo nkwa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Nnamfonom adɔfo, asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue Bible no nkyerɛ Marko Ti 16 Nkyekyɛm 16 Deɛ ɔgye di na wɔbɔ no asu no, wɔbɛgye no nkwa;

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "Wɔakora so". Daabi. 3. 3. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa [Asɔre no] soma adwumayɛfoɔ nam nokorɛ asɛm no so, a wɔatwerɛ na wɔka wɔ wɔn nsam, mo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware→ Wɔn a wɔte aseɛ sɛ wɔgye "nokware kwan ne asɛmpa" di na wɔde "Honhom Kronkron" abɔ wɔn asu no, akyinnyeɛ biara nni ho sɛ wɔbɛgye wɔn nkwa; Deɛ ɔnnye nni no, wɔbɛbu no fɔ .

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) . Gye di na fa Honhom Kronkron no bɔ wo asu, na wɔbɛgye wo nkwa

Momma yɛmmɔ mu nsua Bible na yɛnkenkan Marko 16:16: Obiara a ogye di na wɔbɔ asu no, wobebu no fɔ.

[Hyɛ no nsow]: Gye di na bɔ asu → wobɛgye wo nkwa

bisa:" Dɛn na "gyidi" kyerɛ?
anoyie: "Gye di" kyerɛ sɛ "gye asɛmpa no di, te nokware kwan no ase → gye nokware kwan no di"! Me ne mo adi nkitaho na maka deɛ asɛmpa no yɛ ne deɛ nokware kwan no yɛ dedaw.

bisa: Ɛha na "gye di na wɔbɔ asu" kyerɛ nsu mu asubɔ? Anaasɛ Honhom Kronkron asubɔ?
anoyie: Ɛyɛ "Honhom Kronkron" no asubɔ! Amen

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na wobetumi anya "Honhom Kronkron" asubɔ? Anaasɛ "Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ no"?
anoyie: 1 Te nokore kwan no ase - gye nokore kwan no di, 2 Gye asempa no di - asempa a egye wo nkwa no!
Berɛ a motee nokorɛ asɛm, mo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no, na mogyee Kristo diiɛ no, wɔde bɔhyɛ Honhom Kronkron no sɔɔ mo ano. Saa Honhom Kronkron yi ne yɛn agyapadeɛ ho bɔhyɛ (mfitiaseɛ nkyerɛwee: agyapadeɛ) kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛgye Onyankopɔn nkurɔfoɔ (mfitiaseɛ nkyerɛwee: agyapadeɛ) de akamfo N’anuonyam. Nkyekyɛm - Efesofoɔ 1:13-14. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

( 2. 2. ) . Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ no bɔ no, Awurade Yesu ankasa na ɔbɔ no asu

Marko 1:4 Sɛnea saa nsɛm yi kyerɛ no, Yohane bae bɛbɔɔ asu wɔ ɛserɛ so, na ɔkaa adwensakyera asubɔ a ɛfa bɔne fafiri ho.
Mateo 3:11 Mede nsuo na ɛbɔ mo asu ma asakyera. Na deɛ ɔdi m’akyi reba no wɔ tumi kɛseɛ sene me, na memfata sɛ mesoa ne mpaboa mpo. Ɔde → "Honhom Kronkron ne ogya" bɛbɔ wo asu.
Yoh Honhom Kronkron a ɔsiane na ɔhome wɔ so no ne nea ɔde Honhom Kronkron bɔ asu."

[Hyɛ no nsow]: Ɛdenam atifi hɔ kyerɛw nsɛm a yesuae so no, yɛde "Honhom Kronkron" a wɔahyɛ no bɔ no → Yesu Kristo ankasa bɔɔ yɛn asu → wogyee nokware no dii, wotee nokware no ase, na wogyee asɛmpa a egyee wo nkwa no dii → wo nsa kaa "hyɛ bɔ Honhom Kronkron" "Ma agyiraehyɛde! Amen. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Te awo foforo ase - "adwumayɛfo" a Onyankopɔn agye wɔn nkwa na wasoma wɔn no nkutoo na wobetumi ama wo → "nsu asubɔ" akɔ Kristo mu - twe adwene si Romafo 6:3-4; ne Awurade Yesu Kristo Nea ɔno ankasa bɔɔ yɛn asu na ɔmaa yɛn pɛɛ! Amen. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

YOO! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

( 3. 3. ) . bom bɔ mpae

Wɔde wɔn ho afi Satan tumi ne Hades sum no ho. Amen! Na wɔasie no → 4. 4. Ɔde akwakoraa no ne ne nneyɛe too nkyɛn no, wonyanee no da a ɛto so abiɛsa → 5. 5. Bu yɛn bem! Gye Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ no bɔ no sɛ nsɔano, wɔsan wo bio, nyane wo, nya nkwagye, nya Onyankopɔn bayɛ, na nya daa nkwa! Daakye, yɛbɛnya hɛn Ɔsor Egya n’agyapadze. Mommɔ mpae wɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Hymn: Megye di, megye di

articles.title: Nkwagyeɛ 2 Gye asɛmpa no di na nya nkwagyeɛ
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe, nnamfo adɔfo, anuanom mmarima ne mmea! Amen.

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nkɔ 1 Korintofo 15, nkyekyem 3-4, na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Nea mede maa mo nso ne sɛ: Nea edi kan no, Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne sɛnea Twerɛ Kronkron no kyerɛ no, na wosiee no, na da a ɛto so abiɛsa no, ɔsɔree bio sɛnea Twerɛ Kronkron no kyerɛ no, ɛsɛ sɛ wonya nkwagye wɔ asɛmpa yi mu . Amen

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "Wɔakora so". Daabi. 2. 2. Momma yɛmmɔ mpaeɛ: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa [Asɔre no] soma adwumayɛfoɔ nam nokorɛ asɛm no so, a wɔatwerɛ na wɔka wɔ wɔn nsam, mo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware→ Sɛ wote asɛmpa no ase a, wobɛgye wo nkwa denam asɛmpa no a wobɛgye adi no so! Amen .

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

【 . baako 】 . Dɛn ne asɛmpa no?

Momma yensua Bible no na yɛnbom nkenkan Luka 4:18-19: “Awurade Honhom wɔ me so, efisɛ wasra me sɛ menka asɛmpa nkyerɛ ahiafo, na wasoma me sɛ menkɔka ahofadi nkyerɛ nnommum , ma momma anifuraefo nhu ade, na nyi wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn so no, na wɔnka Onyankopɔn anisɔ afe no ho dawuru.”

Luka 24:44-48 Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Deɛ meka kyerɛɛ mo berɛ a na me ne mo wɔ hɔ nie: Biribiara a wɔatwerɛ wɔ Mose Mmara, Adiyifoɔ ne Nnwom mu no, ɛfa Me nsɛm ho. Afei Yesu buee wɔn adwene mu sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛte Kyerɛwnsɛm no ase, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Wɔakyerɛw sɛ, Kristo behu amane na wasɔre afi awufo mu da a ɛto so abiɛsa no, na nnipa bɛsom no. a ne din ka adwensakra ne adwensakra ho asɛm bɔne fafiri a wɔde bɛma amanaman nyinaa, efi ase wɔ Yerusalem.

[Hyɛ nso]: Eyi ne Onyankopɔn Ba→Yesu Kristo "reka" ahenni no ho asɛmpa→ 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Wɔma "nnommum" no ahofadi, . 2. 2. Ɛsɛ sɛ "anifuraefo" hu, . 3. 3. Sɛ yɛbɛma wɔn a "wɔhyɛ wɔn so" no ade ne ho na wɔabɔ Onyankopɔn ahosɛpɛ afe a ɛsɔ n'ani no ho dawuru. Amen! Enti, so wote ase?

【 . mmienu 】 . Asɛmpa no mu nsɛm titiriw

Momma yɛnsua Bible no na yɛnbom nkenkan 1 Korintofo 15:3-4: Na nea mede maa mo nso ne sɛ: Nea edi kan no, Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne na wosiee no sɛnea Kyerɛwnsɛm no kyerɛ no; Bible no mu.
[Hyɛ nso] : Ɔsomafo "Paulo" kaa sɛ: ""Asɛmpa" a afei menyaa na meka kyerɛɛ mo no: Nea edi kan no, sɛ Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne sɛnea Bible kyerɛ no;

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) . a wɔde wɔn ho afi bɔne ho

Ɛbɛdaa adi sɛ Kristo dɔ na ɛkanyan yɛn efisɛ esiane sɛ "Kristo" wu maa obiara nti, ne nyinaa wui → efisɛ nea owui no "ade ne ho" afi bɔne ho → "nyinaa" wui, "ne nyinaa" na wɔade wɔn ho afi ho bɔne. Amen! →Wɔn a "wogye di" no, wɔabu wɔn fɔ dedaw; Enti, so wote ase pefee? Hwɛ 2 Korintofo 5:14, Romafo 6:7, ne Yohane 3:18.

( 2. 2. ) . Wɔde wɔn ho fi mmara ne ne nnome ho

Romafo 7:4, 6 Me nuanom, mo nso moam Kristo nipadua so wuwu maa mmara no, na moayɛ afoforɔ dea... Nanso ɛfiri sɛ yɛwuwu maa mmara a wɔde kyekyere yɛn no Seesei yɛade yɛn ho afiri mmara no ho. sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi asom Awurade sɛnea honhom foforo (honhom: anaasɛ wɔkyerɛ ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron) te na ɛnyɛ sɛnea amanne dedaw no te.
Galatifoɔ 3:13 Kristo agye yɛn afiri mmara nnome mu, na wɔayɛ no nnome ama yɛn, ɛfiri sɛ wɔatwerɛ sɛ: “Obiara a ɔsɛn dua so no wɔ nnome ase.”
Na wɔasie no →

( 3. 3. ) . Fa akwakoraa no ne ne nneyɛe dedaw no to nkyɛn

Kolosefoɔ 3:9 Munnni atoro nkyerɛ mo ho mo ho, ɛfiri sɛ moagyae onipa dedaw ne ne nneyɛeɛ.
Wɔn a wɔyɛ Kristo Yesu dea no abɔ honam ne n’akɔnnɔ ne n’akɔnnɔ asɛndua mu. -Galatiafoɔ 5:24
Na wɔnyanee no da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa sɛdeɛ Bible kyerɛ no.

( 4. 4. ) . Ma yɛnyɛ treneefo, yɛyɛ bemfo, kronkronfo

Romafoɔ 4:25 Yɛn mmarato nti, wɔde Yesu hyɛɛ ne nsa; owusɔre , yɛ ma→" Bu yɛn bem "(Anaa nkyerɛaseɛ: Wɔgyee Yesu maa yɛn mmarato na wɔnyanee no maa yɛn bem).
Romafoɔ 5:19 Sɛdeɛ onipa baako asoɔden nti nnipa bebree yɛɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ no, saa ara na onipa baako setie Obiara →" Ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔtreneeni ". Hwɛ Romafo 6:16."
1 Korintofoɔ 6:11 Na mo mu binom te sɛ yei na seesei moyɛ saa wɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu ne yɛn Nyankopɔn Honhom so→" Wɔahohoro dedaw, wɔatew wɔn ho, wɔabu wɔn bem ".".

[Hyɛ nso]: Nea ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no yɛ asɛmpa a ɔsomafo "Paulo" ka kyerɛɛ Amanaman mufo no mu nsɛm titiriw → Enti "Paulo" kae sɛ: "Anuanom, afei mereka asɛmpa a meka kyerɛɛ mo kan no akyerɛ mo, a mo nso monyaa mu na emu wogyina Sɛ woannye nni kwa na wokura nea meka kyerɛ wo no mu a, wobɛgye wo nkwa "ɛnam asɛmpa yi so Amen!

YOO! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Nkwagye 1 Gye nokware kwan no di, te nokware kwan no ase na nya nkwagye
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe, nnamfo adɔfo, anuanom mmarima ne mmea! Amen.

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nkɔ 2 Tesalonikafo Ti 2 Nkyekyɛm 13 Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛda Onyankopɔn ase daa wɔ mo ho, anuanom a Awurade dɔ mo, ɛfiri sɛ ɔpaw mo firii mfitiaseɛ sɛ ɛnam Honhom Kronkron kronkronyɛ so nnya nkwagyeɛ denam gyidie mu gyidie so. 1 Timoteo Ti 2:4 Ɔpɛ sɛ wɔgye nnipa nyinaa nkwa na wɔba nokware no nimdeɛ mu.

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ ". wɔgye wɔn nkwa "Daabi. 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa [Asɔre no] soma adwumayɛfoɔ nam nokorɛ asɛm no so, a wɔatwerɛ na wɔka wɔ wɔn nsam, mo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware→ Te nokware kwan no ase, gye nokware kwan no di na gye nkwa! Amen .

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) . Yɛrehwɛ Ɔwɔ a Ɔwɔ Kɔberem no so ama Nkwagyeɛ wɔ Apam Dedaw no mu

Momma yɛnsua Bible no wɔ Numeri 21:8-9, Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ, “Yɛ ɔwɔ a ɛyɛ ogya na fa to dua so. Momfa sɛn dua so, obiara a ɔwɔ bɛka no no, ɔbɛtena ase bere a ɔhwɛ kɔbere ɔwɔ no.

[Hyɛ nso]: Ɛha na yɛma yɛn soro hwɛ "kɔbere ɔwɔ" → Kɔbere: kɔbere a ɛhyerɛn - hwɛ Adiyisɛm 1:15 → Obiara a "ɔwɔ ɔwɔ ogya" aka no na awuduru ahyɛ no mu no bɛtena ase bere a ɔhwɛ saa "ɔwɔ kɔbere" yi ara pɛ. . Ɛyɛ Kristo nkwagye ho nhwɛso → Kristo "wu maa yɛn na ɔbɛyɛɛ nnome na wɔde no sɛn dua so. → Obiara a ɔma n'ani so hwɛ "ɔwɔ a wɔde kɔbere ayɛ" no hwɛ Agyenkwa no, na wɔkyerɛ sɛ "ɔwɔ awuduru" a ɛwɔ wɔn nipadua so no "ɔwɔ kɔbere" nnome Saa kwan yi so no, sɛ wɔhwɛ kɔbere ɔwɔ yi a, wɔbɛtena ase.

( 2. 2. ) . Ahyɛmu Foforɔ Hwɛ Kristo ma Nkwagyeɛ

Momma yɛnsua Bible Yesaia Ti 45 Nkyekyɛm 22 Momma wɔnhwɛ me, asase ano nyinaa, na wɔbɛgye wɔn nkwa, ɛfiri sɛ mene Onyankopɔn, na ɔfoforo biara nni hɔ. 1 Timoteo Ti 2:4 Ɔpɛ sɛ wɔgye nnipa nyinaa nkwa na wɔba nokware no nimdeɛ mu.

[Hyɛ nso]: Ɛsɛ sɛ obiara a ɔwɔ asase ano no hwɛ Agyenkwa no na "ohu nokorɛ no" na wɔbɛgye wɔn nkwa. Amen

bisa: Dɛn ne Tao?
anoyie: Mfitiaseɛ no na Tao wɔ hɔ, na Tao no ka Onyankopɔn ho, na "Tao" nso yɛ Onyankopɔn. Na Asɛm yi ka Onyankopɔn ho mfiase no.

bisa: Yɛbɛyɛ dɛn atumi ate nokware kwan no ase?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha
"Asɛm no" bɛyɛɛ honam, kyerɛ sɛ, "Onyankopɔn" bɛyɛɛ honam → wɔtoo din Yesu! Edin "Yesu" no kyerε sε obegye ne nkurɔfoɔ afiri wɔn b]ne mu. Amen! →Ɔbaabun Maria na ɔnyinsɛnee na ɔwoo no fii "Honhom Kronkron" mu, na ɔyɛ Ɔsorosoroni Nyankopɔn no ba. Hwɛ Yohane 1:1-2, 14 ne Mateo 1:21-23

Na esiane sɛ mmofra no di honam ne mogya nti, ɔno nso de ne ho hyɛɛ saa ara mu, na ɔnam owu so asɛe nea ɔwɔ owu tumi, kyerɛ sɛ, ɔbonsam, na wade wɔn a wɔde wɔn ayɛ nkoa nkwa nna nyinaa denam owu ho suro so. →Ɛyɛ "Kristo" a wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu na owui maa yɛn bɔne →ɔgyee yɛn na ogyaa yɛn: 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa bɔne ho ahofadi, . 2. 2. Wɔade wɔn ho afi mmara ne ne nnome ho, . 3. 3. Ɔde akwakoraa ne n’akwan dedaw no too nkyɛn; Nya Onyankopɔn bayɛ. Amen! →Saa kwan yi so no, Kristo de owu di dwuma pɔtee de "sɛe" ɔbonsam a ɔwɔ owu tumi no, na ɔde ahofadi yɛn a yɛayɛ nkoa no ama bɔne yɛn nkwa nna nyinaa esiane owu ho suro nti. Amen! Enti, so wote ase pefee? Hwɛ Hebrifo 2:14-15 ne 1 Korintofo 15:3-4

( 3. 3. ) . Gye nokware kwan no di, te nokware kwan no ase na nya nkwagye

Eyi ne → nokware asɛm "Yesu Kristo" a ɛyɛ "nkwagye" → wohwɛ Yesu a owui wɔ asɛnnua so maa yɛn bɔne → te ase sɛ Kristo sɛn dua no so na wɔdomee no: "sɛ ɔbɛma yɛade yɛn ho afi bɔne ho, afi." mmara ne mmara" "Mmara nnome, de onipa dedaw ne n'akwan dedaw no gu" → Yesu Kristo "san awo" yɛn denam owusɔre a efi awufo mu so → Wɔn a wɔte "nokware asɛm" yi ase no begye wɔn nkwa. Amen! Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Bere a wotee "nokware asɛm," "nkwagye asɛmpa" no, na wogyee Kristo dii akyi no, wɔde "Honhom Kronkron" a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ no sɔɔ wo ano. Saa Honhom Kronkron yi ne yɛn agyapadeɛ ho bɔhyɛ (mfitiaseɛ nkyerɛwee: agyapadeɛ) kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛgye Onyankopɔn nkurɔfoɔ (mfitiaseɛ nkyerɛwee: agyapadeɛ) de akamfo N’anuonyam. Nhwehwɛmu-Efesofo 1:13-14

Abba Agya Kronkron dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Yɛda wo ase Ɔsoro Agya sɛ wosomaa wo Ba a wowoo no koro, Yesu, sɛ ɔmmɛwu wɔ asɛnnua no so "yɛn bɔne nti" → 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa gye yɛn fi bɔne mu, . 2. 2. Gye yɛn fi mmara ne ne nnome ho, . 3. 3. Wɔde wɔn ho afi Satan tumi ne Hades sum no ho. Amen! Na wɔasie no → 4. 4. Ɔde akwakoraa no ne ne nneyɛe too nkyɛn no, wonyanee no da a ɛto so abiɛsa → 5. 5. Bu yɛn bem! Gye Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ no bɔ no sɛ nsɔano, wɔsan wo bio, nyane wo, nya nkwagye, nya agyede sɛ Onyankopɔn ba, na nya daa nkwa! Daakye, yɛbɛnya hɛn Ɔsor Egya n’agyapadze. articles.title: Circumcision Dɛn ne twetiatwa ne nokware twetiatwa?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Nnamfo adɔfo* Asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no nkyerɛ Romafo ti 2 nkyekyem 28-29 na yɛnbom nkenkan: Na obiara a ɔyɛ Yudani wɔ akyi no nyɛ Yudani nokorɛ, na twetiatwa nso nyɛ honam fam. Wɔn a wɔyɛ wɔn mu nkutoo na wɔyɛ Yudafo ankasa; Onipa yi ayeyi mfi onipa hɔ, na mmom efi Onyankopɔn hɔ

Ɛnnɛ yɛbom sua ade, yɛ fekubɔ, na yɛka Onyankopɔn nsɛm "Dɛn ne twetiatwa ne nokware twetiatwa?" 》Mpaebɔ: “Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa Amen!” Yɛda wo ase “ɔbea pa” sɛ woasoma adwumayɛfoɔ a wɔnam wɔn nsa so akyerɛw na wɔaka nokware asɛm, wo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no. Wɔde paanoo fi soro de ma yɛn sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛn honhom fam asetra bɛyɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene na yɛnte Bible no ase na yɛnhunu na yɛnte honhom mu nokware → Nea twetiatwa yɛ ne nokware twetiatwa a yɛbɛte ase no gyina honhom no so .

Wɔbɔ mpaebɔ, adesrɛ, ntamgyinafo, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din kronkron no mu! Amen

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) . nea ɛyɛ twetiatwa

Genesis 17:9-10 Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ Abraham nso sɛ: "Wo ne w'asefoɔ munni m'apam so w'awo ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa mu. Wɔbɛtwa wo mmarima nyinaa twetia, yei ne m'apam a ɛda wo ne w'asefoɔ ntam. Apam no yɛ wo dea sɛ wobɛdi so."

bisa: Dɛn ne twetiatwa?
anoyie: "Twetiatwa" kyerɛ twetiatwa → Ɛsɛ sɛ mo "mmarima" twetia (mfitiase nkyerɛwee no yɛ twetiatwa) Eyi ne apam a ɛda me ne mo ntam no ho adanse - hwɛ Genesis 17:11.

bisa: Bere bɛn na wotwa mmarima twetia?

anoyie: Awo akyi da a ɛtɔ so awotwe → Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔtwa mmarima a wɔwɔ mo awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ mu nyinaa twetia wɔ mo awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa mu, sɛ wɔawo wɔn wɔ mo abusua mu anaa wɔde sika tɔɔ wɔn firii abɔntenfoɔ a wɔnyɛ mo asefoɔ hɔ no, wɔn awoɔ akyi da a ɛtɔ so nwɔtwe. Ɛsɛ sɛ wotwa wɔn a wɔwoo wɔn wɔ wo fie ne wɔn a wode wo sika tɔ no nyinaa twetia. Afei m'apam no besi mo honam mu se daa apam - Hwɛ Genesis 17:12-13

( 2. 2. ) . Dɛn ne nokware twetiatwa?

bisa: Dɛn ne nokware twetiatwa?
anoyie: Na obiara a ɔyɛ Yudani wɔ akyi no nyɛ Yudani nokorɛ, na twetiatwa nso nyɛ honam fam. Wɔn a wɔyɛ wɔn mu nkutoo na wɔyɛ Yudafo ankasa; Saa ɔbarima yi ayeyi no amfi onipa hɔ, na mmom efi Onyankopɔn hɔ. Romafo 2:28-29.

Hyɛ nso: Abɔnten honam fam twetiatwa nyɛ nokware twetiatwa "Dɛn ntia?" ɛnyɛ twetiatwa ankasa-- Hwɛ Efesofo 4:22

( 3. 3. ) . Nokware twetiatwa ne Kristo

bisa: Enti dɛn ne nokware twetiatwa?

anoyie: "Nokware twetiatwa" kyerɛ sɛ bere a Yesu dii nnawɔtwe no, ɔtwaa abofra no twetia na ɔtoo no din Yesu; Nhwehwɛmu-Luka 2:21

bisa: Dɛn nti na “Yesu” twetiatwa yɛ twetiatwa ankasa?

anoyie: Efisɛ Yesu ne Asɛm a ɔda ne honam mu na Honhom no yɛ honam → Ɔno “ . Lingcheng na ɔkyerɛwee “Sɛ yedidi na yɛnom ne twetiatwa a Nam ne Mogya , yɛyɛ n’akwaa, . Bere a wotwaa No twetia no, na yɛtwaa yɛn twetia! Efisɛ yɛyɛ ne nipadua no akwaa . Enti, so wote ase pefee? Hwɛ Yohane 6:53-57

Yudafoɔ twa twetia". Botaeɛ "Ɛkyerɛ sɛ wobɛdan akɔ Onyankopɔn nkyɛn, nanso wɔatwa wo twetia wɔ honam mu - Adam honam sɛe esiane akɔnnɔ nti na entumi nnya Onyankopɔn ahenni no, enti twetiatwa honam mu nyɛ twetiatwa ankasa → efisɛ wɔn a wɔyɛ Yudafo wɔ akyi no nyɛ Yudafo ankasa; saa ara nso na twetiatwa nso nyɛ honam fam nokware twetiatwa Hwɛ Romafo 2:28 → Mmara no yɛ sunsuma. wɔatwa twetia Ɛyɛ sunsuma ara kwa, sunsuma di yɛn anim kɔ " Kristo honhom bɛyɛɛ nipadua na wotwaa no twetia ”→ Yɛde honhom no kɔ Kristo nipadua a wɔatwa no twetia no mu kɔ yɛn koma mu →Yesu Kristo nyanee yɛn fii awufo mu. Saa kwan yi so no, yɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma, na wɔatwa yɛn twetia ampa! Ɛno ansa na yɛbɛtumi asan akɔ Onyankopɔn nkyɛn → Wɔn a wɔgye no nyinaa, wɔn a wɔgye ne din di no, ɔma hokwan sɛ wɔbɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma. Eyinom ne wɔn a wɔmfa mogya nwo wɔn, ɛnyɛ akɔnnɔ anaa onipa apɛde, na mmom Onyankopɔn awo wɔn. Yohane 1:12-13

→Enti" nokware twetiatwa "Ɛwɔ akoma mu ne honhom mu! Sɛ yedi na yɛnom Awurade honam ne ne mogya a, yɛyɛ ne nipadua akwaa, kyerɛ sɛ, Onyankopɔn mma awo yɛn, na wɔatwa yɛn twetia ampa. Amen! → Sɛnea Awurade Yesu kae no: "Wɔwo wɔn fi ɔhonam mu Nea wɔwo no yɛ honam; nea Honhom awo no yɛ honhom - hwɛ Yohane 3 nkyekyem 6 →." 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa wɔn a wɔde nsuo ne Honhom awo wɔn nko ara, . 2. 2. wɔde asɛmpa no nokware asɛm awo wɔn, . 3. 3. wɔwoo no fi onyame Ɛno ne twetiatwa a ɛyɛ nokware ! Amen

"Nokware twetiatwa" a ɔsan kɔ Onyankopɔn nkyɛn no renhu ɔporɔw na obetumi anya Onyankopɔn ahenni → agyina daa na watra ase daa! Amen. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Enti ɔsomafo Paulo kaa sɛ → Na obiara a ɔyɛ Yudani wɔ akyi no nyɛ Yudani nokorɛ, na twetiatwa nso mfi ɔhonam mu. Wɔn a wɔyɛ wɔn mu nkutoo na wɔyɛ Yudafo ankasa; Saa ɔbarima yi ayeyi no amfi onipa hɔ, na mmom efi Onyankopɔn hɔ. Romafo 2:28-29

Abba Agya Kronkron dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Yɛda wo ase Ɔsoro Agya sɛ wosomaa wo Ba a wowoo no koro, Yesu, sɛ ɔmmɛwu wɔ asɛnnua no so "yɛn bɔne nti" → 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa gye yɛn fi bɔne mu, . 2. 2. Gye yɛn fi mmara ne ne nnome ho, . 3. 3. articles.title: Owusɔre Ɛnyɛ me na mete ase bio, na mmom Kristo te ase ma me
articles.author: admin
articles.content:

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no nkyerɛ Galatifo ti 2 nkyekyem 20 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Wɔabɔ me ne Kristo asɛnnua mu, na ɛnyɛ me na mete ase bio, na mmom Kristo te me mu, na nkwa a seesei mete mu wɔ nipadua mu no, mede gyidie tena mu wɔ Onyankopɔn Ba a ɔdɔɔ me na ɔde ne ho maeɛ maa me no mu. .

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ ". Kristo te ase ma me 》Mpaebɔ: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! " ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa "Monam nokware asɛm a wɔde wɔn nsa akyerɛw na wɔaka no so soma adwumayɛfo, a ɛyɛ mo nkwagye asɛmpa no. Wɔde abodoo fi soro akyirikyiri ba, na wɔde ma yɛn bere a ɛsɛ mu, na yɛn honhom mu nkwa adɔɔso! Amen .Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware → ate ase. "Me te ase" sɛ mɛtra ase Adam, ɔdebɔneyɛfo, ne bɔne akoa Kristo "wui" maa me, "wɔasie" maa me → Kristo traa ase wɔ Kristo suban so, traa ase wɔ suban no mu Kristo deɛ ɛyɛ onyame agya anuonyam ! Amen.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen.

Afei ɛnyɛ me na mete ase bio, na mmom Kristo na ɔte ase ma me

Hymn: Wɔbɔɔ me ne Kristo asɛnnua mu

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) . Wɔabɔ me ne Kristo asɛnnua mu

Romafoɔ 6:5-6 Na sɛ yɛne no ayɛ baako wɔ ne wuo sɛso mu a, yɛne no nso bɛka abom wɔ ne wusɔreɛ nsɛsoɔ mu, ɛfiri sɛ yɛnim sɛ wɔbɔɔ yɛn dedaw no asɛnnua mu ne no, sɛ bɔne nipadua anka wɔbɛsɛe no, ama wɔasɛe bɔne nipadua no, yɛnyɛ bɔne nkoa bio;
Galatifo 5:24 Wɔn a wɔyɛ Kristo Yesu dea no abɔ honam ne n’akɔnnɔ ne n’akɔnnɔ asɛndua mu.

Hyɛ nso: Me ne Kristo ayɛ biako, wɔabɔ me asɛnnua mu, mawu, asie na matra ase ama atirimpɔw koro no ara→ 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa gye yɛn fi bɔne mu, . 2. 2. Wɔade wɔn ho afi mmara ne ne nnome ho, . 3. 3. Munnyi akwakoraa ne n’akwan dedaw no ngu; 4. 4. Na wɔabu yɛn bem na wɔagye yɛn ayɛ Onyankopɔn mma. Amen

( 2. 2. ) . Hyɛn Ne Ahomegye Bɔhyɛ no mu

Na nea ɔhyɛn ahomegye mu no agye n’ahome afi n’ankasa nnwuma mu, sɛnea Onyankopɔn home fii ne nnwuma mu no. Hebrifo 4 nkyekyem 10→

Hyɛ nso: Wɔbɔɔ me ne Kristo asɛnnua mu sɛ "mɛsɛe" nipadua ne nkwa a efi Adam hɔ baa bɔne mu → Eyi ne sɛ mɛhome afi m'adwuma mu ama "bɔne", sɛnea Onyankopɔn gyee n'ahome fii Ne "adebɔ adwuma" → sɛ mɛhyɛn ahomegye mu!
Efisɛ wɔbɔɔ yɛn nipa dedaw no asɛnnua mu, owui, na wɔsiee no ne Kristo → "onipa dedaw" bɔne nipadua no hyɛnee ahomegye mu → wonyanee yɛn ne Kristo → "onipa foforo" no hyɛnee Kristo mu na onyaa ahomegye mu anigye → "Honhom Kronkron" no yɛɛ foforo na ɔkyekyee wɔ me mu → yiw Kristo "traa ase" maa me → saa kwan yi so no, ɛsɛ sɛ "Homeda home foforo" → a wɔde asie ama Onyankopɔn nkurɔfo wɔ hɔ. Enti, so wote ase pefee? Hwɛ Hebrifo 4:9

Esiane sɛ wɔagyaw yɛn bɔhyɛ sɛ yɛbɛhyɛn N’ahomegye mu nti, momma yensuro sɛ yɛn mu biara (mfitiase no, mo) bɛyɛ te sɛ nea ɔbɛtɔ akyi. Na wɔaka asɛmpa no akyerɛ yɛn sɛnea wɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn no, na asɛm a wɔte no, mfaso biara nni wɔn so, efisɛ wonnyaa bi". gyidie "ne nea wɔte". kwan "Afrafra. Nanso yɛn a yɛagye adi no wɔ kwan kɔ saa ahomegye no mu, sɛnea Onyankopɔn ka no: "Maka ntam wɔ m'abufuw mu sɛ, 'Wɔrenkɔ m'ahomegye mu!' ’” Nokwarem no, wɔawie adebɔ adwuma no fi bere a wɔbɔɔ wiase no

( 3. 3. ) . Kristo te ase ma me, me te ase sɛ Kristo

Wɔabɔ me ne Kristo asɛnnua mu, na ɛnyɛ me na mete ase bio, na mmom Kristo te me mu, na nkwa a seesei mete mu wɔ honam mu no, mede gyidie na ɛbɔ wɔ Onyankopɔn Ba a ɔdɔɔ me na ɔde ne ho maeɛ maa me no mu. --Galatiafoɔ ti 2 nkyekyɛmu 20
Na me fam no, nkwa a mɛtena no yɛ Kristo, na owu yɛ mfaso. --Filipifo 1:21

[Hyɛ nso]: Sɛnea ɔsomafo Paulo kae no → Wɔabɔ me ne Kristo asɛnnua mu, na afei ɛnyɛ me na mete ase bio, na mmom Kristo na ɔte me mu.

bisa: Wɔbɔɔ me nipasu dedaw no asɛnnua mu, wui, na wosiee no ne Kristo;
anoyie: Efisɛ woawu → "nkwa nipa dedaw no awu" na wo nkwa → "wɔawo no foforo fi nkwa nipa foforo no mu" ne Kristo ahintaw Onyankopɔn mu. Sɛ Kristo a ɔyɛ yɛn nkwa no yi ne ho adi a, mo nso mo ne no bɛda adi anuonyam mu. Enti, so wote ase pefee? Nhwehwɛmu-Kolosefoɔ Ti 3 Nkyekyɛmu 3-4

→Ɛyɛ Awurade Yesu Kristo". ma "Owuo ma yɛn nyinaa," ma "Wɔsiee yɛn nyinaa; Kristo de ne wusɔre fii awufo mu "san woo" yɛn → na afei Ɔbɛyɛ". ma "Yɛn nyinaa te ase → Kristo". ma "Obiara tra ase ma Kristo ne Agya Nyankopɔn anuonyam! Ɛnyɛ sɛ yɛ "tena ase" Kristo → "wote ase" → na mmom yɛtra ase ma Adam, tra ase ma abɔnefo, tra ase yɛ bɔne nkoa, na yɛsow bɔne aba." .

Enti, sɛ yɛayɛ biako ne No wɔ Ne wu sɛso mu a, yɛn nso yɛbɛka ne ho abom wɔ ne wusɔre nsɛso mu → Seesei “metena” na megye m’ahome wɔ Kristo mu → Wɔnam “Honhom Kronkron no so ayɛ me foforo wɔ Kristo mu ” a ɔte me mu Si→Kristo". ma "Me te ase→." 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Kristo a ɔte ase fi Onyankopɔn Agya no "nya" anuonyam + Me "nya" anuonyam, . 2. 2. Kristo teasefo "nya" akatua + kyerɛ sɛ "menya" akatua, . 3. 3. Kristo a ɔtraa ase “nya” abotiri + no kyerɛ sɛ “menya” abotiri no, . 4. 4. Kristo "traa ase" owusɔre a ɛyɛ fɛ sen biara maa me, kyerɛ sɛ, nipadua no agyede + sɛ Kristo yi ne ho adi ne mprenu so a, wobenyan yɛn nipadua wɔ ɔkwan a ɛyɛ fɛ sen saa so! 5. 5. Kristo di hene + Me ne Kristo di hene! Amen! Haleluia! Wɔ saa kwan yi so no, so wowɔ ɔpɛ? Ate aseɛ?

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa. Amen

articles.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛyɛ den: Obiara a ɔbɛhwere ne kra ama me ne asɛmpa no bɛgye no nkwa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Nnamfo adɔfo* Asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no mu nkɔ Marko ti 8 nkyekyem 35 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Na obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔgye ne kra no bɛhwere, na obiara a ɔbɛhwere ne kra ama me ne asɛmpa no bɛgye no. Amen

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛabom akyɛ - nsɛmmisa a ɛyɛ den ho nkyerɛkyerɛmu ". Wobɛhwere wo nkwa; 》Mpaebɔ: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! " ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa "Momfa nokware asɛm a wɔatwerɛ na wɔaka wɔ wɔn nsam no soma adwumayɛfoɔ, a ɛyɛ wo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no! Wɔde paanoo fi soro akyirikyiri ba, na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ berɛ mu, na yɛn honhom mu nkwa adɔɔso! Amen Te aseɛ sɛ wɔbɔɔ me ne Kristo asɛnnua mu → hwere bɔne nkwa "ɔkra" a ɛyɛ Adam no; Amen .

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen.

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) . nya nkwa

Mat ase hɔ) bɛhwere ne nkwa;

( 2. 2. ) . gyee nnipa nkwa

Marko 8:35 Na obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔgye ne kra no bɛhwere, na obiara a ɔbɛhwere ne kra ama me ne asɛmpa no, ɔbɛgye no. --Hwɛ Luka 9:24

( 3. 3. ) . Kora nkwa so kɔ daa nkwa mu

Yohane Ti 12 Nkyem 25 Obiara a ɔdɔ ne kra no bɛhwere no;
1 Petro Ti 1:9 Na nya nea efi mo gyidi mu ba, a ɛyɛ → "mo kra nkwagye." Dwom 86:13 Na wo dɔ a ɛyɛ pintinn a wowɔ ma me no sõ → "Wogyee me kra" fii Hades bun mu.

[Hyɛ nso]: Awurade Yesu kaa sɛ → Obiara a ɔhwere ne nkwa (nkwa: anaa wɔkyerɛ ase sɛ "ɔkra") ma "me" ne "asɛmpa" → 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Wobɛnya nkwa, . 2. 2. gyee nkwa, . 3. 3. Kora nkwa so kɔ daa nkwa mu. Amen!

bisa: Nkwa a wɔhwere → "nkwa" anaasɛ wɔkyerɛ ase sɛ "ɔkra" → "ɔkra" a wɔhwere? So wanka sɛ ɔpɛ sɛ "ogye" akra nkwa? Ɔkwan bɛn so na → "ahwere wo kra"?
anoyie: Sɛnea Bible ka no → "nkwa a yebenya" kyerɛ "ɔkra a yebenya", na "nkwa a yebegye" kyerɛ "ɔkra a yebegye" → Nea edi kan no ɛsɛ sɛ yesua Bible no ne Adam "kra" no asase so mfutuma bɔɔ onipa na ɔhome nkwa guu ne hwene mu, na ɔno

Ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔteasefo a wɔfrɛ no Adam. →Onipa teasefo a ɔwɔ "honhom" (honhom: anaa wɔkyerɛ ase sɛ honam)"; Adam yɛ onipa teasefo a ɔwɔ honam ne mogya. Nkyerɛkyerɛmu - 1 Korintofo 15:45 → Awurade adiyisɛm a ɛfa Israel ho. Trɛw ɔsoro mu na si asase nnyinaso Eden. Ɔwɔ "wɔa ne ho agu fĩ → wɔatɔn no ama bɔne - So wote eyi ase pefee? Nkyerɛkyerɛmu - Romafo 7:14.

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na Awurade Yesu gye yɛn kra nkwa?
anoyie: "Yesu" → Afei ɔfrɛɛ nkurɔfo no ne n'asuafo no baa wɔn nkyɛn na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, "Sɛ obi pɛ sɛ odi m'akyi a, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔpo ne ho na ɔfa n'asɛnnua na odi m'akyi → Me ne Kristo ayɛ biako na wɔabɔ me asɛnnua mu "Botae." ":"Nkwa a Ayera" → kyerɛ sɛ, nkwa a ɔhwere akwakoraa Adam "kra ne ne nipadua" na ɔyɛ bɔne → efisɛ obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ogye ne nkwa (anaa wɔkyerɛ ase sɛ: ɔkra; saa ara wɔ ase hɔ) no bɛhwere ne nkwa; obiara a ɔhwere ne nkwa ma "me" ne "asɛmpa" Lost life →

1 Wobɛnya nkwa→

bisa: Henanom nkwa na wobenya?

anoyie: Yesu Kristo nkwa a wobenya→nkwa (anaasɛ wɔkyerɛ ase sɛ: ɔkra)→"Yesu Kristo kra" a wobenya. Amen! ;" Ɛnyɛ bio "San nya" Adam honam fam kra, adebɔ no. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

2 Sɛ wogye wo nkwa a, wobɛgye wo kra→ Sɛ obi wɔ Onyankopɔn Ba a, ɔwɔ nkwa; Reference - 1 Yohane 5:12 → Ɛne sɛ, sɛ wobɛnya "Yesu nkwa" a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ wobɛnya → Yesu "kra" → wowɔ "Yesu Kristo kra" → sɛ wobɛgye w'ankasa wo kra nkwa! Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Nkaebɔ: Nnipa pii mpɛ "Kristo kra" wɔrehwɛ baabiara na wɔrebisa baabiara → Me kra wɔ he? , me kra wɔ he? dɛn na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔyɛ? Wosusu sɛ saa nnipa yi yɛ mmaabun nkwaseafoɔ?So ɛnyɛ papa sɛ wowɔ "Yesu Kristo kra"? So Adam na ɔbɔɔ ɔkra no ye?

bisa: Dɛn na mɛyɛ wɔ me kra ho?

anoyie: Awurade Yesu kaa sɛ → "Yera, wɔagyaw, ayera"; honhom foforo "→Kristo deɛ". ɔkra ", nipadua foforo → kristo nipadua ! Amen. →Efisɛ "Kristo kra" nam owu so wɔ asɛnnua so →yɛ "treneefo kra" → Bere a Yesu kaa (gyee) vinegar no hwɛe no, ɔkae sɛ: " Ɛyɛ nea wɔayɛ ! "Ɔbrɛɛ ne ti ase na ɔkaa sɛ," ɔkra "Fa ma Onyankopɔn. Nhwehwɛmu - Yohane 19:30."

Yesu Kristo bɛyɛ saa ɔkra Delivery Agya ne → Ɔtreneeni kra yɛ pɛ "! Wompɛ? Ka kyerɛ me sɛ woyɛ "ɔkwasea anaasɛ wonyɛ ɔkwasea". Saa kwan yi so no, so wote ase pefee? Hwɛ Hebrifo 12:23

Enti, Awurade Yesu kaa sɛ: "Obiara a ɔdɔ ne kra no bɛhwere ne nkwa "dedaw" no; na obiara a ɔtan ne nkwa wɔ wiase yi mu no, ɔbɛkora so." foforɔ "Nkwa a ɛkɔ daa nkwa mu. Amen."

→ Asomdwoe Nyankopɔn no ntew wo ho koraa! Na wo "honhom, kra ne nipadua" sɛ onipa a wɔawo no foforo no, wɔbɛkora so a asɛm biara nni ho wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo mmae mu! Nhwehwɛmu-1 Tesalonikafoɔ Ti 5 Nkyekyɛmu 23

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa. Amen

articles.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛyɛ den: So na ɛyɛ Adam nipadua a ewu no wusɔre anaa Kristo nipadua a enwu da no wusɔre?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Nnamfonom adɔfo, asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no nhwɛ Romafo ti 8 nkyekyem 11 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Na sɛ deɛ ɔnyanee Yesu firii awufoɔ mu no Honhom te mo mu a, deɛ ɔnyanee Kristo Yesu firii awufoɔ mu no, ɔnam ne Honhom a ɔnyanee Kristo Yesu firii awufoɔ mu no so bɛma mo nipadua a ɛwuo no nso nkwa. .

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ nsɛmmisa ne mmuaeɛ sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a mo nipadua a ewu no bɛsan anya nkwa 》Mpaebɔ: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! " ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa "Soma adwumayɛfo nam nokware asɛm a wɔde wɔn nsa akyerɛw na wɔaka, a ɛyɛ wo nkwagye asɛmpa no so! Wɔde abodoo fi soro akyirikyiri ba, na wɔde ma yɛn bere a ɛsɛ mu, na yɛn honhom mu nkwa adɔɔso." Amen Te aseɛ sɛ "nipadua a ɛwuo no baa nkwa mu" yɛ Kristo nipadua;

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen.

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) . sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a mo nipadua a ewu no bɛsan anya nkwa

bisa: Dɛn ne nipadua a ewu?
anoyie: Nipadua a ewu → sɛnea ɔsomafo "Paulo" frɛ no → "honam ne mogya nipadua, bɔne nipadua, owu nipadua, abofono nipadua, efĩ nipadua, nipadua a ɛporɔw, ɔsɛe, . ne dɛmdi" → wɔfrɛ no nipadua a ewu. Hwɛ Romafo 7:24 ne Filipifo 3:21+ ne nea ɛkeka ho!

bisa: "Honam nipadua" no yɛ bɔne, ewu, na ɛhyɛ owu ase... So "honam nipadua, nipadua a ewu" no reba nkwa mu bio?
anoyie: Kristo "faa" Adam nipadua a ewu no na ɔsesaa no yɛɛ no sɛ bɔne nipadua sɛ bɔne afɔre - hwɛ Romafo 8:3 → Onyankopɔn yɛɛ "Kristo" nipadua a bɔne nnim no yɛɛ "Adam" bɔne nipadua - hwɛ 2 Korintofo 5:21 ne Yesaia 53:6, bɔne akatua ne owu → "wɔfrɛ no nipadua a ewu", Kristo "bɛyɛɛ bɔne nipadua maa yɛn". Ɛsɛ sɛ owu pɛnkoro →Saa kwan yi so no, sɛ Kristo ba a, . Wɔawie "Mmara, bɔne akatua ne owu, na da a wubedi bi no, wubewu. Hwɛ Romafo 6:10 ne Genesis 2:17. So wote eyi ase yiye? → Adam ne Hawa "Monnwe nea wodi" Papa ne bɔne ho nimdeɛ dua no aba. Ɔbea Hawa yɛ Adam dompe ne ne honam. Ɔbea Hawa yɛ asɔre no ho nhwɛso. “Asɔre” no wui wɔ honam a wɔantwa twetia mu. Yehowa So wote ase pefee sɛ Onyankopɔn homee "nkwa home" guu Adam nipadua a wɔantwa no twetia no mu? - Hwɛ Kolosefo 2:13 ne Genesis 2:7.

( 2. 2. ) . Ɛyɛ honhom nipadua a wonyan no

Na "Adam" nso. woduae Ɛyɛ honam ne mogya nipadua,” . wɔanyan no "Yiw→" honhom nipadua ". Sɛ honam nipadua bi wɔ hɔ a, ɛsɛ sɛ honhom nipadua nso wɔ hɔ. Nkyerɛkyerɛmu - 1 Korintofo 15:44 → "Yesu nipadua" ne Asɛm a ɔbaabun Maria de ne honam, nyinsɛnee na ɔwoo no fii "Honhom Kronkron" mu → Enti Yesu Kristo wui fii owu mu Nipadua a wɔanyan no wɔ Kristo mu no yɛ "honhom nipadua"!

Bere biara a yebedi Awurade Anwummeduan no, yedi Awurade paanoo.” Nipadua ", nom fi Awurade nkyɛn". Mogya "Asetra→Saa kwan yi so na yɛwɔ Kristo nipadua ne ne nkwa, me Wonom ne ne nipadua akwaa→ Ɛsan nso yɛ nipadua ne nkwa a ɛyɛ kronkron, bɔne nni mu, nkekae biara nni ho, ɛho ntew, na ɛnporɔw → eyi ne "m'asetra a wɔanyan me ne Kristo"! ɔbaa eve". asɔre "Wɔawu wɔ mfomso ne honam momonoto mu; na mmom Kristo mu". asɔre "Te ase bio. Amen! Adam mu na nnipa nyinaa wuwui; Kristo mu na wɔmaa wɔn nyinaa nya nkwa. So wote eyi ase pefee?

Enti → Nea onyanee Kristo Yesu fii awufo mu no nso bɛyɛ te ase "Wɔ mo akoma mu". Honhom Kronkron ", sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a mo nipadua a ewu no bɛsan anya nkwa → Ɛyɛ Kristo Nipadua a ɔte ase bio! Amen ;

Sɛ "nipadua a wɔde mfutuma abɔ no ba nkwa mu" → ɛbɛkɔ so aporɔw na wawu → nea Onyankopɔn nyanee no nko ara na onhuu sɛ ɛreporɔw → so eyi nyɛ "nea ɛne ne ho bɔ abira"? So wususuw saa? Hwɛ Asomafo 13:37

( 3. 3. ) . nkyerɛase a ɛnteɛ →Na momma mo nipadua a ewuo no nnya nkwa bio

---Sɛ wo ne Kristo wusɔreɛ fapem no yɛ mfomsoɔ~"wobɛdi mfomsoɔ anammɔn biara a wobɛtu"---

Honam mu a woadi mũ → "Kristo nkwagye, Onyankopɔn asɛm, nokware, ne nkwa" a wobɛtow agu na woahwe ase afi adom mu. Saa kwan yi so no, so wote ase pefee → sɛnea "Paulo" kae no? →Esiane sɛ wode Honhom Kronkron na efi ase nti, so woda so ara de wo ho to honam so de hwehwɛ pɛyɛ?

Wɔ asɔre pii mu nnɛ no, wɔdi nsiyɛ nso akyi ma → "Onyankopɔn asɛm" ne "nkwa", nanso ɛnyɛ sɛnea nokware nimdeɛ te → efisɛ "wɔn" nnim Onyankopɔn trenee na wɔpɛ sɛ wɔde wɔn ankasa trenee si hɔ, na mmom wɔmfa wɔn ho nhyɛ Onyankopɔn trenee ase . articles.title: Asɛnnua Sɛ yɛne Kristo wu a, yɛgye di sɛ yɛne no bɛtena
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Adamfo dɔfo! Asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no mu nkɔ Romafo ti 6 ne nkyekyem 8 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Sɛ yɛne Kristo wuiɛ a, ɛsɛ sɛ yɛgye di sɛ yɛne no bɛtena. Efesofo 2:6-7 Ɔnyanee yɛn na ɔne yɛn tenaa ɔsoro mmeaeɛ wɔ Kristo Yesu mu, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a ɔbɛda n’adom ahonyadeɛ a ɛboro soɔ adi akyerɛ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛbɛba no, n’adɔeɛ a ɔda no adi kyerɛ yɛn wɔ Kristo Yesu mu.

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "twam" Daabi. 8. 8. Nsɛm a wɔka kyerɛ Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea pa [asɔre] no soma adwumayɛfo ma wɔsoa aduan fi soro akyirikyiri denam nokware asɛm a wɔakyerɛw na wɔaka wɔ wɔn nsam * no so, na ɔkyekyɛ aduan ma yɛn wɔ bere mu na ama yɛn honhom mu asetra ayɛ adefo! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu ani na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware → Te aseɛ sɛ, sɛ yɛne Kristo wuwuiɛ a, yɛbɛgye adi sɛ yɛne no bɛtena na yɛne No atena ɔsoro mmeaeɛ! Amen.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen.

Sɛ yɛne Kristo wuwu a, yɛn Xinbi na ɔkyerɛwee wo ne no tena

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) . Yɛgye owuo, asie ne owusɔreɛ a yɛne Kristo bɛba no di

bisa: Yɛbɛyɛ dɛn awuwu, wɔasie yɛn, na yɛne Kristo asɔre bio?
anoyie: Ɛbɛdaa adi sɛ Kristo dɔ na ɛkanyan yɛn sɛ esiane sɛ obiako wu maa obiara nti, ne nyinaa wui → "Kristo" wui - "nyinaa" wui → wɔfrɛ eyi gyidi "wui boom" na Kristo "wɔasie" - " Wɔsiee wɔn nyinaa" → wɔfrɛ yei sɛ gyidie "wɔasie wɔn abom"; Yesu Kristo "wɔnyanee wɔn firii awufoɔ mu" → "wɔnyanee wɔn nyinaa" nso → wɔfrɛ yei gyidie "wɔtenaa ase boom"! Amen. Enti, so wote ase pefee? Reference - 2 Korintofoɔ 5:14 → Owusɔreɛ ne Kristo yɛ "owusɔreɛ wɔ Kristo mu"; → Adam mu na obiara wuwu saa ara na Kristo mu na wɔbɛma obiara anya nkwa. Nkyekyɛm - 1 Korintofoɔ 15:22

( 2. 2. ) . Yɛn nipadua ne yɛn abrabɔ a wɔanyan no ahintaw ne Kristo wɔ Onyankopɔn mu

bisa: Ɛhe na yɛn nipadua ne yɛn nkwa a wɔanyan no no wɔ mprempren?
anoyie: Yɛne Kristo te ase wɔ "nipadua ne nkwa" mu → yɛne Kristo "ahintaw" Onyankopɔn mu, na yɛbom tena soro wɔ Agya Nyankopɔn nifa so! Amen. Enti, so wote ase pefee? → Bere a yewuwui wɔ yɛn mfomso mu no, ɔne Kristo boom maa yɛn nkwa ( ɛnam adom so na wɔagye mo nkwa). Ɔsan nso nyanee yɛn na ɔmaa yɛn ne Kristo Yesu tenaa ɔsoro mmeaeɛ - hwɛ Efesofoɔ 2:5-6

Efisɛ moawu na mo nkwa ahintaw Kristo nkyɛn wɔ Onyankopɔn mu. Sɛ Kristo a ɔyɛ yɛn nkwa no yi ne ho adi a, mo nso mo ne no bɛda adi anuonyam mu. --Hwɛ Kolosefoɔ 3:3-4

( 3. 3. ) . Wɔnyanee Adam nipadua, atoro nkyerɛkyerɛ
Romafoɔ 8:11 Na sɛ deɛ ɔnyanee Yesu firii awufoɔ mu no Honhom te mo mu a, deɛ ɔnyanee Kristo Yesu firii awufoɔ mu no nso de ne Honhom a ɔnyanee Kristo Yesu firii awufoɔ mu no bɛma mo nipadua a ɛwuo no nkwa te ase.

[Hyɛ nso]: Sɛ "Onyankopɔn Honhom" te yɛn mu a, monyɛ honam no mufo, na mmom Honhom no mufo → kyerɛ sɛ, "ɛnyɛ" honam a efi Adam mu bae, a bɔne nti ne nipadua wui na ɛsan kɔɔ dɔte mu - Reference - . Genesis 3:19 Romafoɔ 8:9-10 → "Honhom" no "te aseɛ" ma me ɛfiri sɛ Kristo Honhom no te yɛn mu! Amen. →Esiane sɛ "yɛnnyɛ" Adam bɔne nipadua no de nti, yɛnyɛ Adam nipadua a aba nkwa mu bio.

bisa: So na ɛnkyerɛ sɛ wobenyan mo nipadua a ewu no?

anoyie: Ɔsomafoɔ "Paulo" kaa sɛ → 1 Hena na ɔbɛtumi agye me afiri owuo nipadua yi mu - Reference - Romafoɔ 7:24, 2 Fa "porɔw ne owuo" to nkyɛn → Afei Twerɛsɛm a ɛka sɛ, "Wɔmene owu wɔ nkonimdi mu" bɛba mu → sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a saa "owufo" yi bɛmene Kristo asetra a "enwu da" no

bisa: Dɛn na enwu da?
anoyie: Ɛyɛ Kristo nipadua → bere a odii kan huu eyi, bere a ɔreka Kristo wusɔre ho asɛm no, ɔkae sɛ: “Wannya ne kra wɔ Hades, na ne honam nso anhu porɔwee.” Nhwehwɛmu-Asomafo no Nnwuma 2:31
Esiane sɛ Onyankopɔn de "nnipa nyinaa" bɔne too Kristo so, na ɔmaa Yesu a onni bɔne no "bɛyɛɛ" "bɔne" maa yɛn nti, bere a wuhu sɛ "Yesu nipadua" no sɛn dua no so → ɛyɛ w'ankasa "bɔne nipadua" → wɔfrɛ no To wo ne Kristo wu ma "owu, owu, ɔporɔw" na wɔasie wo wɔ ɔdamoa ne mfutuma mu. → Enti, wɔma wo nipadua a ewu no ba nkwa mu bio → Ɛyɛ Kristo na "ɔfaa" Adam nipadua → Wɔfrɛ no nipadua a ewu, kyerɛ sɛ, owui pɛnkoro pɛ maa "yɛn bɔne", na ɛyɛ Kristo nipadua no ne sɛ wɔanyan no na wɔanyan no, ɛnyɛ Adam mfutuma na ɛba nkwa mu bio; Enti, so wote ase?

→Sɛ yedi na yɛnom "Awurade honam ne ne mogya" a, yɛwɔ Kristo nipadua ne ne nkwa wɔ yɛn mu → Yesu kaa sɛ, "Nokware, nokware, mise mo sɛ, gye sɛ mowe honam na monom ne mogya." Onipa Ba, Nkwa nni wo mu.

Nkaebɔ: Asɔre bebree nkyerɛkyerɛ nnɛ → Gye di sɛ "Adam yɛ owufo ne ɔdebɔneyɛfo na wonyanee no" - sɛ mɛkyerɛkyerɛ wo, eyi yɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ a ɛnteɛ koraa → Wɔpɛ sɛ wɔde "honam yɛ Tao" anaasɛ wɔde wɔn ho to mmara so de dua wiase wiase a "honam no bɛyɛ Tao" Neo-Confucianism ne nnyinasosɛm ahorow kyerɛkyerɛ wo, enti wɔn nkyerɛkyerɛ no te sɛ nea Taosom de di dwuma de bɛyɛ obi a onwu da ne Buddhasom, te sɛ Sakyamuni a ɔyɛe sɛ ɔbɛyɛɛ Buddha Enti, yɛ wote ase?Enti ɛsɛ sɛ woma w’ani da hɔ na wunim sɛnea wohu nsonsonoe, na mma wɔn adwene tu fra te sɛ mmofra.

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa. Amen

articles.title: Asɛnnua Wɔbɔɔ yɛn akwakoraa no asɛnnua mu ne No
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoeɛ nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmaa adɔfoɔ wɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen.

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no mu nkɔ Romafo ti 6 ne nkyekyem 6 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Efisɛ yenim sɛ wɔbɔɔ yɛn dedaw no asɛnnua mu kaa ne ho, na wɔasɛe bɔne nipadua no, na yɛansom bɔne bio. Amen

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ ". twam "Daabi. 6. 6. Momma yɛmmɔ mpaeɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea pa no [Asɔre no] somaa adwumayɛfo denam nokware asɛm a wɔakyerɛw wɔ ne nsam ne "nkwagye asɛmpa a ɔkae no so." no dɔɔso kɛse Amen.Awurade Yesu nkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene na yɛnte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware→ Te aseɛ sɛ yɛn nipa dedaw no ne Kristo yɛɛ baako na wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu wɔ asɛnnua so sɛ ɔrebɛsɛe bɔne nipadua no sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛrennyɛ bɔne nkoa bio, ɛfiri sɛ wɔn a wɔawuwu no anya ahofadie afiri bɔne mu. Amen !

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Wɔbɔɔ yɛn akwakoraa no asɛnnua mu kaa No ho

Momma yɛnsua Romafoɔ 6:5-7 wɔ Bible mu na yɛnkenkan no: Sɛ yɛne no ayɛ baako wɔ ne wuo nsɛsoɔ mu a, yɛne no nso bɛyɛ baako wɔ ne wusɔreɛ nsɛsoɔ mu, a yɛnim sɛ yɛn dedaw no anya wɔabɔ no asɛnnua mu.

[Hyɛ no nsow]: Sɛ yɛka ne ho bom wɔ ne wu sɛso mu a

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na yɛbɛyɛ biako wɔ Kristo wu nsɛso mu?
anoyie: Yesu ne Asɛm a wayɛ honam → Ɔyɛ "nea wotumi hu" te sɛ yɛn, honam ne mogya nipadua! Ɔsoaa yɛn bɔne wɔ dua no so → Onyankopɔn de yɛn nyinaa bɔne guu ne so. Nhwehwɛmu-Yesaia Ti 53 Nkyekyɛm 6

Wɔyɛɛ Kristo "honam" bere a wɔsɛn no dua no so → yɛne no nkabom yɛ → "wɔbɔɔ yɛn asu kɔɔ ne wu mu" → efisɛ bere a "wɔbɔɔ yɛn asu wɔ nsu mu" na wɔbɔɔ yɛn asu wɔ "honam nipadua mu" → eyi ne "yɛwɔ mu." Kristo" kaa ne ho bom wɔ owu nsɛso mu → Munnim sɛ yɛn a wɔbɔɔ yɛn asu kɔɔ Kristo Yesu mu no, wɔbɔɔ yɛn asu kɔɔ ne wu mu? Enti Awurade Yesu kaa sɛ: "Efisɛ me kɔndua yɛ mmerɛw na m'adesoa yɛ hare." → Eyi ne Onyankopɔn dɔ kɛse ne n'adom, a ɛma yɛn "nea ɛyɛ mmerɛw na emu yɛ hare sen biara" → Momma "yɛne No nka" Yɛne No nkabom wɔ owuo kwan so" → "Wɔbɔ wo asu wɔ nsuo mu" ne sɛ wo ne No bɛka abom wɔ owuo su mu! Enti, so wote ase pefee? Nhwehwɛmu-Mateo 11:30 ne Romafo 6:3

bisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na wɔbɔ yɛn dedaw no asɛnnua mu ne No?
anoyie: fa di dwuma" Gye Awurade di "Ɔkwan → ne sɛ wɔde bedi dwuma". gyidie "Mo ne No nkabom na wɔabɔ mo asɛnnua mu."

bisa: Wɔbɔɔ Kristo asɛnnua mu na owui wɔ afeha a edi kan Y.B.
anoyie: Awurade Yesu kaa sɛ: "Nea ogye di no nyinaa betumi ayɛ yiye" → Ɔde ɔkwan a wɔfa so "gye Awurade di", efisɛ Onyankopɔn ani so no, ɔkwan a wɔfa so "gye Awurade di" no nni bere anaa ahunmu anohyeto biara , na yɛn Awurade Nyankopɔn wɔ hɔ daa! Amen. Enti, so wote ase?

Enti yɛde " " . gyidie "Mo ne no nyɛ biako, efisɛ Onyankopɔn de yɛn nyinaa bɔne ato ne so → "bɔne nipadua" a wɔbɔɔ Yesu asɛndua mu → ne yɛn "bɔne nipadua" → ne nti". ma "Yɛbɛyɛ→". amumuyɔ "-bɛyɛ" bɔne nipadua "Nsusuwii → Onyankopɔn maa nea onnim bɔne (a onnim bɔne) no yɛɛ bɔne maa yɛn, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛabɛyɛ Onyankopɔn trenee wɔ ne mu. Nhwehwɛmu - 2 Korintofo 5:21 ne Romafo 8 Ti 3."
→Sɛ wohwɛ "Yesu nipadua" a wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu no →Wogye di →Eyi yɛ "m'ankasa me nipadua, me bɔne nipadua" →Me nipadua dedaw no ne Kristo "ayɛ biako" ama ayɛ "nipadua biako" →Wo use Hwɛ "gyidi a aniwa hu" na gye "me a aniwa nhu" di Wohu Yesu sɛ ɔsensɛn dua no so → "gye di" sɛ eyi ne "me dedaw bɔne nipadua". Sɛ wogye di wɔ saa kwan yi so a, wo ne Kristo bɛka abom na wɔabɔ wo asɛnnua mu yie! Haleluia! Meda wo ase Awurade! Onyankopɔn adwumayɛfo di wo anim kɔ nokware nyinaa mu na wɔnam "Honhom Kronkron" so te Onyankopɔn apɛde ase. Amen! →

Yɛn nipasu dedaw no ne No yɛ biako wɔ atirimpɔw nti:

Efisɛ sɛ yɛne no ayɛ biako wɔ ne wu suban mu a, yɛne no nso bɛyɛ biako wɔ ne wusɔre nsɛso mu, efisɛ yenim sɛ wɔbɔɔ yɛn dedaw no asɛnnua mu ne no→ 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa "na wɔasɛe bɔne nipadua no," . 2. 2. "Sɛ yɛnyɛ bɔne nkoa bio; 3. 3. Efisɛ "awufo" yɛ → "wɔde wɔn ho afi bɔne ho". Sɛ yɛne Kristo wuwu a, . 4. 4. Gye di kɛkɛ na wo ne No bɛtena. So wote eyi ase yiye?

Anuanom mmarima ne mmea! Onyankopɔn Asɛm no, "Honhom Kronkron" na ɛka, ɛnyɛ me sɛ nhwɛso no, "Paulo" kae sɛ mawu! Ɛyɛ me na mete ase nanso menna ne ho adi sɛ Kristo te me mu. Ɛsɛ sɛ m’ankasa mitie pɛnkoro anaa mprenu, so ɛnsɛ sɛ wutie no mpɛn kakraa bi bio bere a wonte ase? Nkrataa yɛ nsɛmfua a ɛde owu ba → nnipa pii wɔ hɔ a wɔhwɛ "nkrataa" nko ara na wɔkata wɔn aso so a wɔnbrɛ wɔn ho ase → "tie nokware" na "wobisa nsɛm abiɛsa ne nsɛm anan of God betumi ate ase denam "atie", ɛnyɛ "bisa" so "Te ase, wompɛ sɛ wobɛte nea "Honhom Kronkron" ka kyerɛ nkurɔfo denam Bible so → Wote Onyankopɔn apɛde ase dɛn? Nifa!

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa. Amen

articles.title: Kristo Mmeamudua 5: Ɛde yɛn ho fi Satan sum a ɛwɔ Hades no tumi mu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe, nnamfo adɔfo, anuanom mmarima ne mmea! Amen, .

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no nkyerɛ Kolosefo ti 1 nkyekyem 13-14 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Wagye yɛn afiri esum tumi mu na ɔde yɛn akɔ ne dɔba ahennie mu, ɔno mu na yɛanya ogye ne bɔne fafiri .

Ɛnnɛ yɛsua adeɛ, yɛbɔ fekuo, na yɛkyɛ ". Kristo mmeamudua "Daabi. 5. 5. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen, meda wo ase Awurade! "Ɔbea pa" soma adwumayɛfo nam nokware asɛm a wɔkyerɛw na wɔde wɔn nsa ka, yɛn nkwagye asɛmpa no so! Ma yɛn ɔsoro honhom fam aduan wɔ bere mu, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛn honhom fam asetra bɛyɛ nea ahonyade wom. Amen! Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu ani na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi ahu na yɛate honhom mu nokware→ Sɛ yɛte Kristo ne N’asɛnnua mu a wɔbɔɔ no ase a, ɛma yɛde yɛn ho fi Satan tumi a ɛyɛ sum a ɛne Hades no ho . Amen.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Kristo asɛnnua no ma yɛde yɛn ho fi Satan Hades tumi a ɛyɛ sum no mu

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) . Wiase nyinaa wɔ ɔbɔnefoɔ no nsam

Yenim sɛ yɛyɛ Onyankopɔn dea na wiase nyinaa da ɔbɔnefoɔ no tumi mu. 1 Yohane 5:19
Asɛmmisa: Adɛn nti na wiase nyinaa ahyɛ bɔne nsa?
Mmuae: W]n a w]y] b]ne no firi ]bonsam mu, efiri s[ ]bonsam ay[ b]ne firi mfitiase[. Onyankopɔn Ba no yii ne ho adi sɛ ɔrebɛsɛe ɔbonsam nnwuma. 1 Yohane 3:8 → Efisɛ wɔn nyinaa ayɛ bɔne na wɔadi Onyankopɔn anuonyam
→Wɔn a wɔyɛ bɔne no yɛ ɔbonsam dea, na obiara a ɔwɔ wiase no yɛ ɔbonsam dea, na ɔhyɛ ɔbɔnefoɔ, ɔbonsam tumi ase.

( 2. 2. ) . Owuo nwene yɛ bɔne

Wu! Ɛhe na wo tumi a wode bedi nkonim no wɔ? Wu! Wo sting no wɔ he? Owuo nwene yɛ bɔne, na bɔne tumi ne mmara. 1 Korintofoɔ 15:55-56 → Sɛdeɛ ɛnam onipa baako so na bɔne baa wiase, na owuo nam bɔne so baa wiase no, saa ara na owuo trɛw kaa nnipa nyinaa, ɛfiri sɛ wɔn nyinaa ayɛ bɔne. Ansa na mmara no reba no, na bɔne wɔ wiase dedaw nanso sɛ mmara nni hɔ a, bɔne nyɛ bɔne. Nanso efi Adam so besi Mose so no, owu dii hene, na wɔn a wɔanyɛ bɔne a na Adam yɛe no mpo. Ná Adam yɛ onipa a na ɔbɛba no ho nhwɛso. Romafo 5:12-14

3. 3. ) . Owu ne Hades

Dwom 18:5 Hades hama atwa me ho ahyia, na owu afiri wɔ me so.
Dwom 116:3 Owu nhama akyekye me;
Dwom 89:48 Hena na obetumi atra ase daa na wakwati owu, na wagye ne kra afi Hades apon ano? (Sela) .
Adiyisɛm 20:13-14 Na ɛpo no de awufoɔ a wɔwɔ wɔn mu no maeɛ, na owuo ne Hades gyee awufoɔ a wɔwɔ mu no maeɛ, na wɔbuu wɔn mu biara atɛn sɛdeɛ wɔn nnwuma teɛ. Wɔtow Owu ne Hades nso guu ogya tare no mu;

( 4. 4. ) . Kristo nam owu so sɛe ɔbonsam a ɔwɔ owu tumi no

Na ɔkaa sɛ, "Ne mu na mede me ho bɛto no so." owu Sɛ ɔbɛsɛe nea ɔwɔ owu tumi, kyerɛ sɛ, ɔbonsam, na wade wɔn a wɔde owu suro ayɛ nkoa wɔ wɔn nkwa nna nyinaa mu no adehye. Hebrifo 2:13-15 → Bere a mihuu no no, mehwee ne nan ase te sɛ nea mawu. Ɔde ne nsa nifa too me so na ɔkaa sɛ, "Nsuro! Mene deɛ ɔdi kan ne deɛ ɔdi akyire, deɛ ɔte aseɛ; na mawu, na hwɛ, mete ase daa daa, na mekura owuo wɔ me abasa mu." . ne Hades Adiyisɛm 1:17-18 nsafe.

( 5. 5. ) . Yesu Kristo, Onyankopɔn Ba no nyanee yɛn fii awufo mu na oyii yɛn kɔɔ ne Dɔba no ahenni mu.

Wagye yɛn afiri esum tumi mu na wayi yɛn akɔ ne dɔba no ahennie mu, ɔno mu na yɛanya ogye ne bɔne fafiri. Kolosefo 1:13-14
Te sɛ ɔsomafo "Paulo" a Onyankopɔn somaa no → meresoma wo aba wɔn nkyɛn, na wɔn ani abue, na wɔadan afi esum mu akɔ hann mu, na wɔadan afi Satan tumi so akɔ Onyankopɔn nkyɛn; wobetumi anya bɔne fafiri, na wɔn a wɔate wɔn ho nyinaa kyɛ agyapade no. ’” Asomafo no Nnwuma 26:18

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Agya Nyankopɔn no dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen!

Adamfo dɔfo! Yɛda mo ase wɔ Yesu Honhom no ho → Wo klik saa asɛm yi so na kenkan na tie asɛmpa asɛnka no Sɛ wowɔ ɔpɛ sɛ wobɛgye na "woagye" Yesu Kristo sɛ Agyenkwa ne Ne dɔ kɛseɛ no a, yɛbɛtumi abom abɔ mpaeɛ?

Abba Agya Kronkron dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Yɛda wo ase Ɔsoro Agya sɛ wosomaa wo Ba a wowoo no koro, Yesu, sɛ ɔmmɛwu wɔ asɛnnua no so "yɛn bɔne nti" → 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa gye yɛn fi bɔne mu, . 2. 2. Gye yɛn fi mmara ne ne nnome ho, . 3. 3. Wɔde wɔn ho afi Satan tumi ne Hades sum no ho. Amen! Na wɔasie no → 4. 4. Ɔde akwakoraa no ne ne nneyɛe too nkyɛn no, wonyanee no da a ɛto so abiɛsa→ 5. 5. Bu yɛn bem! Gye Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ no sɛ nsɔano, wɔsan wo bio, nyane wo, nya nkwagye, nya Onyankopɔn bayɛ, na nya daa nkwa! Daakye, yɛbɛnya hɛn Ɔsor Egya n’agyapadze. Mommɔ mpae wɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

YOO! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Kristo Asɛnnua 4: Adam akwakoraa no a wɔayi afi hɔ
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe, nnamfo adɔfo, anuanom mmarima ne mmea! Amen, .

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no nkyerɛ Kolosefo ti 3 nkyekyem 9 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Monnni atoro nkyerɛ mo ho mo ho, ɛfiri sɛ moayi akwakoraa ne ne nnwuma ato hɔ.

Ɛnnɛ yɛbom sua ade, yɛ fekubɔ, na yɛkyɛ "Kristo Mmeamudua". Daabi. 4. 4. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen, meda wo ase Awurade! " ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa "Soma adwumayɛfo nam nokware asɛm a wɔde wɔn nsa akyerɛw na wɔaka, a ɛyɛ yɛn nkwagye asɛmpa no so! Ma yɛn ɔsoro honhom mu aduan wɔ bere a ɛsɛ mu na yɛn nkwa adɔɔso. Amen! Mesrɛ wo! Awurade Yesu kɔ so hyerɛn." yɛn honhom fam aniwa, bue yɛn adwene ma yɛte Bible no ase, na ɛma yetumi hu honhom mu nokware ahorow na yɛte. Sɛ yɛte Kristo ne ne wuo wɔ asɛnnua so ne n’asie ase a, ɛma yɛde yɛn ho firi nipa dedaw no ne n’akwan dedaw no ho ! Amen.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

1: Kristo asɛnnua → ma yetumi to akwakoraa ne ne nneyɛe to nkyɛn

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) . Wɔbɔɔ yɛn nipasu dedaw no asɛnnua mu ne No, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛsɛe bɔne nipadua no

Efisɛ yenim sɛ wɔbɔɔ yɛn dedaw no asɛnnua mu kaa ne ho, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛsɛe bɔne nipadua no, na yɛansom bɔne bio efisɛ nea wawu no, wade ne ho afi bɔne ho. Romafo 6:6-7 . Hyɛ no nsow: Wɔbɔɔ yɛn dedaw no asɛnnua mu ne No → "atirimpɔw" no ne sɛ ɔbɛsɛe bɔne nipadua no sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛrennyɛ bɔne nkoa bio, efisɛ awufo de wɔn ho afi bɔne ho → "na wɔasie wɔn" → wɔayi Adam dedaw no ato hɔ . Amen! Enti, so wote ase pefee?

(2) . Wɔbɔɔ honam no asɛnnua mu ne n’akɔnnɔ bɔne ne n’akɔnnɔ bɔne

Honam nnwuma da adi pefee: awaresɛe, efĩ, ahohwibra, abosonsom, nkonyaayi, nitan, ntawntawdi, ahoɔyaw, abufuw a ɛpae, akuw, mpaapaemu, atoro, ne ahoɔyaw , asabow, apontow, ne nea ɛkeka ho. Meka kyerɛɛ mo kane na mereka akyerɛ mo seesei sɛ wɔn a wɔyɛ saa nneɛma no rennya Onyankopɔn ahennie. ...Wɔn a wɔyɛ Kristo Yesu dea no abɔ honam ne n’akɔnnɔ ne n’akɔnnɔ asɛndua mu. Galatifo 5:19-21,24

(3) . Sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom te mo akoma mu a , wonyɛ honam mu nipa dedaw no ho

Sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom te mo mu a, monyɛ ɔhonam mufo bio na mmom Honhom no mufo. Sɛ obi nni Kristo Honhom a, ɔnyɛ Kristo dea. Sɛ Kristo wɔ mo mu a, bɔne nti nipadua no awu, na trenee nti ɔkra no te ase. Romafo 8:9-10

(4) . Efisɛ wo "akwakoraa" no awu , . Wo "onipa foforo" asetra ne Kristo ahintaw Onyankopɔn mu

Efisɛ moawu na mo nkwa ahintaw Kristo nkyɛn wɔ Onyankopɔn mu. Sɛ Kristo a ɔyɛ yɛn nkwa no yi ne ho adi a, mo nso mo ne no bɛda adi anuonyam mu. Kolosefo 3:3-4
Monnni atoro nkyerɛ mo ho mo ho; Kolosefo 3:9

YOO! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen
