articles.title: Kristo Asɛnnua 3: Ɛde yɛn ho fi mmara ne ne nnome ho
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe, nnamfo adɔfo, anuanom mmarima ne mmea! Amen, .

Momma yenbue Bible [Romafo 7:5-6] na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Efisɛ bere a yɛwɔ honam mu no, na akɔnnɔ bɔne a wɔde mmara awo no reyɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn akwaa mu, na ɛsow owu aba. Nanso ɛfiri sɛ yɛwuwu maa mmara a ɛkyekyere yɛn no, seesei yɛade yɛn ho afiri mmara no ho, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛsom Awurade sɛdeɛ honhom foforɔ (honhom: anaa wɔkyerɛ aseɛ sɛ Honhom Kronkron) na ɛnyɛ sɛdeɛ tete kwan no teɛ amanne kwan so.

Ɛnnɛ yɛbom sua ade, yɛ fekubɔ, na yɛkyɛ "Kristo Mmeamudua". Daabi. 3. 3. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen, meda wo ase Awurade! "Ɔbea pa" soma adwumayɛfo nam nokware asɛm a wɔkyerɛw na wɔde wɔn nsa ka, yɛn nkwagye asɛmpa no so! Ma yɛn ɔsoro honhom fam aduan wɔ bere mu, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛn asetra bɛyɛ ahonyade. Amen! Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu ani na ɔmmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛtumi ahunu na yɛate honhom mu nokorɛ na yɛate Kristo ne ne wuo wɔ asɛnnua so no ase Kristo deɛ Awufoɔ, seesei Sɛ yɛde yɛn ho fi mmara ne mmara nnome ho a, ɛma yetumi nya Onyankopɔn mma ne daa nkwa dibea! Amen.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Bible mu Apam a Edi Kan Mmara

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) . Eden Turo no mu no, Onyankopɔn ne Adam yɛɛ apam sɛ ɔrenni papa ne bɔne ho nimdeɛ dua no aba.

Momma yɛnsua Bible [Genesis 2:15-17] na yɛnbom nkenkan: Awurade Nyankopɔn faa onipa no de no too Eden turo mu sɛ ɔnyɛ ho adwuma na ɔnkora so. Awurade Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ no sɛ: "Wobɛtumi adi turo no mu dua biara aba kwa, nanso ɛnsɛ sɛ wodi papa ne bɔne ho nimdeɛ dua no bi, ɛfiri sɛ da a wobɛdi bi no wobɛwuo!" (Hyɛ no nsow : Ɔwɔ no sɔɔ Hawa hwɛe, na ɔyɛɛ bɔne denam papa ne bɔne ho nimdeɛ dua a odii no so, na bɔne nam Adam nkutoo so baa wiase, na afei owu baa obiara so bɔne a mmara no nni mu. , na bɔne wɔ wiase dedaw; tumidi, bɔne tumidi ase, owu tumidi ase." Adam yɛ onipa a na ɔbɛba, a ɔne Yesu Kristo no ho nhwɛso.)

( 2. 2. ) . Mose Mmara

Momma yɛnsua Bible [Deuteronomium 5:1-3] na yɛnkenkan no: Afei Mose frɛɛ Israelfoɔ no nyinaa ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Israel mma, muntie mmara ne nhyehyɛɛ a mereka akyerɛ mo nnɛ no; sie Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn ne yɛn yɛɛ apam wɔ Horeb.

( Hyɛ nso: Apam a ɛda Yehowa Nyankopɔn ne Israelfo ntam no bi ne: Mmara Nsɛm Du a wɔkyerɛw wɔ abopon so, ne mmara ne nhyehyɛe ahorow 613 a ne nyinaa yɛ 613 Ɛyɛ apam a ɛkyerɛ mmara no pefee. Sɛ wodi mmara no mmaransɛm nyinaa so na wodi so a, wɔbɛhyira wo sɛ "wobɛhyira wo bere a worepue no, na wɔahyira wo bere a woaba mu no." -Hwɛ Deuteronomium 28, nkyekyem 1-6 ne 15-68) .
Momma yensua Bible [Galatiafo 3:10-11] na yɛne no nkenkan: Obiara a ogyina mmara nnwuma so no wɔ nnome ase efisɛ wɔakyerɛw sɛ: “Obiara a ɔnkɔ so sɛnea Mmara nhoma no te no "; Nnome ne obiara a ɔyɛ deɛ wɔatwerɛ wɔ mu nyinaa." Ɛda adi sɛ wɔmfa mmara no mmu obiara bem wɔ Onyankopɔn anim; ɛfiri sɛ Kyerɛwnsɛm no ka sɛ, "Gyidie mu na ɔtreneeni bɛtena ase."
San san kɔ [Romafoɔ 5-6] na mommom nkenkan sɛ: Ɛfiri sɛ berɛ a yɛwɔ honam mu no, na akɔnnɔ bɔne a wɔde mmara woo yɛn no reyɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn akwaa mu, na ɛsow owuo aba. Nanso ɛfiri sɛ yɛwuwu maa mmara a ɛkyekyere yɛn no, seesei yɛade yɛn ho afiri mmara no ho, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛsom Awurade sɛdeɛ honhom foforɔ (honhom: anaa wɔkyerɛ aseɛ sɛ Honhom Kronkron) na ɛnyɛ sɛdeɛ tete kwan no teɛ amanne kwan so.

( Hyɛ nso: Ɛdenam atifi hɔ kyerɛwsɛm no mu nhwehwɛmu so no, yebetumi ahu sɛ ɛnam ɔsomafo [Paulo] a na ne ho akokwaw kɛse wɔ Yudafo mmara mu no so no, Onyankopɔn daa mmara no trenee, mmara, nhyehyɛe ne ɔdɔ kɛse no "honhom" adi: Obiara a ogyina ne nneyɛe so mmara no, ne nyinaa wɔ nnome ase efisɛ wɔatwerɛ sɛ: “Wɔadome obiara a ɔmfa ne ho nhyɛ mmara nhoma no mu nyinaa bem.” Efisɛ bere a na yɛwɔ honam mu no, akɔnnɔ bɔne a wɔde mmara woo no, "akɔnnɔ bɔne" yɛ akɔnnɔ bɔne Sɛ akɔnnɔ nyinsɛn a, ɛwo bɔne; de kɔ Yakobo 1 ti 15 Afahyɛ.

Wubetumi ahu pefee sɛnea wɔwo [bɔne]: "Bɔne" fi honam akɔnnɔ, na honam akɔnnɔ "akɔnnɔ bɔne a mmara awo no" fi ase wɔ akwaa no mu, na akɔnnɔ no fi ase wɔ akwaa no, sɛ akɔnnɔ nyinsɛn a, ɛwo bɔne a, ɛwo owuo. Sɛ yɛhwɛ saa a, [bɔne] wɔ hɔ esiane [mmara] nti. So wote eyi ase yiye?

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ - Hwɛ Romafo 4:15
2. 2. Sɛ mmara nni hɔ a, wɔmmu bɔne sɛ bɔne - Hwɛ Romafoɔ 5:13
3. 3. Sɛ mmara nni hɔ a, bɔne awu. Efisɛ sɛ nnipa a wɔde dɔte abɔ wɔn no di mmara no so a, wɔbɛwo bɔne esiane mmara no nti, dodow no ara na wobɛwo bɔne no mmara. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) Te sɛ "Adam" a ɔwɔ Eden Turo mu esiane ahyɛde bi a "ɛnyɛ papa ne bɔne ho nimdeɛ dua no aba" nti, ɔwɔ no sɔɔ Hawa hwɛe wɔ Eden, ne Hawa honam akɔnnɔ ". bɔne a mmara woo no" Ɔpɛ sɛ ɔyɛ adwuma wɔ wɔn akwaa mu, ɔpɛ aduaba a eye ma aduan, aniwa a ɛhyerɛn na ɛsɔ aniwa, papa ne bɔne ho nimdeɛ, nneɛma a ɛsɔ aniwa, a ɛma nkurɔfo nya nyansa. Saa kwan yi so no, wobuu mmara no so na wɔyɛɛ bɔne na mmara no domee wɔn. Enti, so wote ase?

( 2. 2. ) Mose Mmara no yɛ apam a ɛda Yehowa Nyankopɔn ne Israelfo ntam wɔ Bepɔw Horeb so, a ne nyinaa yɛ 613 ahyɛde, mmara, ne nhyehyɛe du a Israel anni mmara so, na wɔn nyinaa buu mmara so na wɔyɛɛ bɔne, na wɔyɛɛ saa ɛhyɛ nea wɔatwerɛ wɔ Mose Mmara mu no ase, na wɔhwiee atoyerɛnkyɛm nyinaa guu Israelfoɔ so - hwɛ Daniel 9:9-13 ne Hebrifoɔ 10:28.

( 3. 3. ) ɛnam Kristo nipadua a owui sɛ ɔbɛkyekyere yɛn wɔ mmara no ho no so no, seesei yɛade yɛn ho afi mmara ne ne nnome ho. Momma yɛnsua Bible Romafoɔ 7:1-7 Anuanom, seesei meka kyerɛ wɔn a wɔte mmara no ase sɛ, munnim sɛ mmara “di” onipa so berɛ a ɔte ase? Efisɛ "bɔne tumi ne mmara. Bere tenten a wote Adam nipadua mu no, woyɛ ɔdebɔneyɛfo. Mmara no ase no, mmara no di wo so na esiw wo kwan. So wote ase?"

Ɔsomafo "Paulo" de [ . Abusuabɔ a ɛda bɔne ne mmara ntam ]nsɛsoɔ[. ɔbea ne okunu ntam abusuabɔ ] Te sɛ ɔbea a ɔwɔ kunu no, mmara kyekyere no bere a okunu no te ase no, nanso sɛ okunu no wu a, ɔde ne ho fi okunu mmara no ho. Enti sɛ ne kunu te ase na ɔware obi foforo a, wɔfrɛ no ɔwaresɛefo; Hyɛ nso: "Mmea", kyerɛ sɛ, yɛn nnebɔneyɛfo no, "okunu" no kyekyere yɛn, kyerɛ sɛ, awareɛ mmara no, berɛ a yɛn kunu da so te aseɛ Sɛ woannya ahofadie amfiri wo kunu awareɛ mmara mu a, sɛ woware obi foforɔ a , wɔfrɛ wo ɔwaresɛefo; yɛn nipasu dedaw no ne " Ɔbea no "wui" maa mmara no denam Kristo nipadua so wɔ asɛnnua no so, na wonyan no fii awufo mu sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi adan akɔ afoforo [Yesu] nkyɛn na yɛasow honhom mu aba ama Onyankopɔn;sɛ woanwu" amma mmara no a, Sɛ mpo woannya ahofadi amfi mmara no "kunu" no ho na wo ne Yesu aware a, woasɛe aware na wɔfrɛ wo ɔwaresɛefo [honhom mu awaresɛefo]. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Enti "Paulo" kaa sɛ: Mmara no nti mewu maa mmara no, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a mɛtena ase ama Onyankopɔn - hwɛ Gal. Nanso esiane sɛ yɛwui maa mmara a ɛkyekyeree yɛn nti, seesei yɛade yɛn ho afi "okunu a odi kan apam" mmara no ho, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi asom Awurade sɛnea honhom foforo (honhom: anaasɛ wɔkyerɛ ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron) te. "kyerɛ sɛ, Onyankopɔn awo no. Onipa foforo a ɔsom Awurade "ɛnyɛ sɛnea amanne kwan dedaw no te" kyerɛ sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛnea nnebɔneyɛfo a wɔwɔ Adam honam mu no kwan dedaw no te. So mo nyinaa te eyi ase pefee?

Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɛnnɛ wɔahyira w'ani na w'aso nso ayɛ nhyira Onyankopɔn asoma adwumayɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnkɔte Bible no mu nokorɛ ne mmara a ɛfa ahofadie firi "kununom" ho no ase, sɛdeɛ "Paulo" kaa no → Ɛnam Asɛm a ɛwɔ Kristo mu a Asɛmpa no ka ho " awoɔ "Sɛ ɔde mo bɛma okunu biako, na ɔde mo bɛma Kristo sɛ mmaabun a wɔn ho tew. Amen!--Hwɛ 2 Korintofo 11:2."

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ me ne mo nyinaa bɛdi nkitaho na makyɛ mo nyinaa wɔ ha. Amen

2021.01.27 na ɛwɔ hɔ

articles.title: Kristo Mmeamudua 2: Ɛma Yɛde yɛn ho firi Bɔne mu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Nnamfonom adɔfo, asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa! Amen, .

Momma yenbue Bible [Romafo 6:6-11] na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Efisɛ yenim sɛ wɔbɔɔ yɛn dedaw no asɛnnua mu kaa ne ho, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛsɛe bɔne nipadua no, na yɛnsom bɔne bio efisɛ nea wawu no anya ahofadi afi bɔne mu.

Ɛnnɛ yɛbom sua ade, yɛ fekubɔ, na yɛkyɛ "Kristo Mmeamudua". Daabi. 2. 2. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen, meda wo ase Awurade! Wosomaa adwumayɛfoɔ, na wɔnam wɔn nsa so kyerɛw na wɔkaa nokorɛ asɛm, yɛn nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no! Ma yɛn ɔsoro honhom fam aduan wɔ bere mu, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛn asetra bɛyɛ ahonyade. Amen! Awurade Yesu nkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene ma yɛnte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi ahu na yɛate honhom mu nokware ahorow. Te yɛn Agyenkwa Yesu Kristo dɔ kɛseɛ no ase, ɔno a ɔwuiɛ wɔ asɛnnua no so maa yɛn bɔne, na ɔde yɛn ho firi yɛn bɔne mu . Amen.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mebisa yei wɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu. Amen

Kristo asɛnnua no ma yɛde yɛn ho fi bɔne ho

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) . yesu kristo asɛmpa

Momma yɛnsua Bible [Marko 1:1] na yɛnbom mmue na yɛnkenkan sɛ: Yesu Kristo, Onyankopɔn Ba no asɛmpa no mfiase. Mateo 1:21 Ɔbɛwo ɔbabarima, na woto ne din Yesu, ɛfiri sɛ ɔbɛgye ne nkurɔfoɔ afiri wɔn bɔne mu. ” Yohane Ti 3 Nkyekyɛm 16-17 “Na Onyankopɔn dɔ wiase araa ma ɔde ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro no mae, na obiara a ogye no di no ansɛe na wanya daa nkwa.” Efisɛ Onyankopɔn somaa Ne Ba no baa wiase, na ɛnyɛ sɛ ɔmmɛbu wiase fɔ (anaasɛ wɔakyerɛ ase sɛ: sɛ ommu wiase atɛn; saa ara na ɛwɔ ase hɔ), na mmom sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔnam Ne so begye wiase nkwa.

Hyɛ nso: Onyankopɔn Ba, Yesu Kristo, ne asɛmpa no mfiase → Yesu Kristo ne asɛmpa no mfiase! [Yesu] din kyerɛ sɛ obegye ne nkurɔfo afi wɔn bɔne mu. Ɔno ne Agyenkwa, Mesia, ne Kristo! Enti, so wote ase pefee? Sɛ nhwɛso no, edin "UK" kyerɛ United Kingdom of Great Britain ne Northern Ireland, a ɛyɛ England, Wales, Scotland ne Northern Ireland, a wɔfrɛ no "UK" no kyerɛ United States of Amerika edin "Russia" no kyerɛ Russia aban. Edin "Yesu" kyerɛ sɛ ɔbɛgye ne nkurɔfoɔ afiri wɔn bɔne mu → yei ne deɛ edin "Yesu" kyerɛ. So wote ase?

Meda wo ase Awurade! Onyankopɔn somaa ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro [Yesu], a ɔbaabun Maria nam Honhom Kronkron nyinsɛn no so, bɛyɛɛ ɔhonam, na wɔwoo no wɔ mmara ase sɛ ɔmmɛgye wɔn a na wɔwɔ mmara no ase, kyerɛ sɛ, ɔmmɛgye ne nkurɔfoɔ mfiri wɔn bɔne mu .Momfi adi sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebegye yɛn sɛ Onyankopɔn mma! Amen, enti edin [Yesu] ne Agyenkwa, Mesia, ne Kristo, de gye Ne nkurɔfoɔ fi wɔn bɔne mu. Enti, so wote ase?

( 2. 2. ) . Kristo asɛnnua no ma yɛde yɛn ho fi bɔne ho

Momma yɛnsua Romafoɔ 6:7 wɔ Bible mu na yɛnkenkan no: Na wɔn a wɔawuwu no anya ahofadie afiri bɔne mu → "Kristo" wui maa "baako" maa obiara, na saa ara na wɔn nyinaa wuwui → Na ɛnam nnipa nyinaa wuo so, wɔn nyinaa wɔde "wɔde wɔn ho" di fɔ". Amen! Twe 2 Korintofo 5:14 → Wɔbɔɔ Yesu asɛnnua mu na owui maa yɛn bɔne, na ɔde yɛn ho fii yɛn bɔne mu → "So mugye di anaasɛ munnye nni" → Wɔn a wogye no di no, wɔnmmu wɔn fɔ, bere a wɔabu wɔn a wonnye nni no fɔ dedaw . Efisɛ wunnye Onyankopɔn Ba a ɔwoo no koro no nni". yesu din "→." Gye wo firi wo bɔne mu , "Wo nnye nni"→wo". amumuyɔ "Fa wo ho asodie, na wɔde ɔsɛeɛ atemmuo bɛbu wo atɛn." Nnye nni "Kristo". dada "Gye wo firi wo bɔne mu → bu wo fɔ". bɔne a ɛyɛ gyidi a wonni "→ Nanso wɔn a wɔfɛre ade ne wɔn a wonnye nni... So wote eyi ase yiye? Hwɛ Adiyisɛm Ti 21 Nkyekyem 8 ne Yohane Ti 3 Nkyekyem 17-18

→Esiane sɛ" Adam "Obiako asoɔden ma nnebɔneyɛfo bebree; na saa ara nso nam obiako asoɔden so". Kristo "Obiako osetie ma nnipa nyinaa yɛ treneefo. Sɛnea bɔne dii hene wɔ owu mu no, saa ara na adom nam trenee so di hene kɔ daa nkwa mu denam yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo so. So wote eyi ase yiye? Twe adwene si Romafo 5:19, 21 so

Dan kɔ [1 Petro Ti 2-24] Ɔno ankasa soaa yɛn bɔne wɔ dua no so, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛwu ama bɔne na yɛatena ase ama trenee. Ɛnam ne mpire so saa mo yareɛ. Hyɛ nso: Kristo soaa yɛn bɔne na ɔmaa yewuwui maa bɔne → na "wɔde yɛn ho fi bɔne ho" → Wɔn a wɔawuwu no anya ahofadi afi bɔne mu, na wɔn a wɔade wɔn ho afi bɔne mu → betumi atra ase trenee mu! Sɛ yɛamfa yɛn ho mfi bɔne ho a, yɛrentumi ntena ase trenee mu. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ me ne mo nyinaa bɛdi nkitaho na makyɛ mo nyinaa wɔ ha. Amen

2021.01.26

articles.title: Kristo Asɛnnua 1: Yesu Kristo ne nea wɔabɔ no asɛnnua mu no ho asɛm a wɔka
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Nnamfonom adɔfo, asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa! Amen, .

Momma yenbue Bible [1 Korintofo 1:17] na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Kristo ansoma me sɛ memmɛbɔ asu na mmom sɛ menka asɛmpa no, ɛnyɛ nyansa nsɛm, na Kristo asɛnnua no anyɛ kwa . 1 Korintofoɔ 2:2 Na mebɔɔ me tirim sɛ merenhu biribiara wɔ mo mu gye Yesu Kristo ne nea wɔabɔ no asɛnnua mu .

Ɛnnɛ yɛbom sua ade, yɛ fekubɔ, na yɛkyɛ "Yesu Kristo ne Nea Wɔabɔ no Asɛnnua mu no ho asɛmpa". Bɔ mpae: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya Kronkron, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen, meda wo ase Awurade! "Ɔbea pa" soma adwumayɛfo a wɔnam wɔn nsa so kyerɛw na wɔka nokware asɛm, a ɛyɛ yɛn nkwagye asɛmpa no! Ma yɛn ɔsoro honhom fam aduan wɔ bere mu, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛn asetra bɛyɛ ahonyade. Amen! Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi ahu na yɛate honhom mu nokware → Kristo ne ne nkwagye a wɔabɔ no asɛnnua mu no ho asɛmpa no ne sɛ yɛbɛda ɔkwan a ɛkɔ nkwagyeɛ, nokorɛ, ne nkwa mu adi denam Kristo dɔ kɛseɛ ne owusɔreɛ tumi so Sɛ wɔma Kristo so firi asase so a, ɔbɛtwetwe nnipa nyinaa aba wo nkyɛn. .

Wɔbɔ mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, nhyira, ne aseda a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din kronkron no mu! Amen

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) . Kɔbere ɔwɔ a ɔsensɛn dua no so wɔ Apam Dedaw no mu no yɛ Kristo asɛnnua no nkwagye ho nhwɛso

Momma yɛnhwɛ Bible [Numeri Ti 21:4-9] na yɛnbom nkenkan: Wɔn (kyerɛ sɛ, Israelfo no) fii Bepɔw Hor so kɔɔ Po Kɔkɔɔ no so sɛ wɔrekɔtwa Edom asase no ho ahyia. Nkurɔfo no yɛɛ basaa kɛse esiane sɛ ɔkwan no mu yɛ den nti, na wonwiinwii kyerɛɛ Onyankopɔn ne Mose sɛ, “Adɛn nti na moyii yɛn fii Misraim (nkoasom asase so) na momaa yewuwui (kyerɛ sɛ, ɔkɔm dee yɛn) wɔ.” sare so?(Efisɛ Sinai Po no so sare no fã kɛse no ara yɛ sare), aduan ne nsu nni ha, na yɛn koma tan saa aduan a ɛyɛ mmerɛw yi (ɛnde Awurade Onyankopɔn somaa "mana" fi soro kɔɔ Israelfo no nkyɛn sɛ aduan, nanso na wɔda so ara tan saa aduan a ɛyɛ mmerɛw yi.)" Enti Awurade somaa awɔ a wɔn ho yɛ hyew baa nkurɔfo no mu, na awɔ no kekaa wɔn. Nnipa pii wuwui wɔ Israelfo no mu. (Enti Onyankopɔn "anbɔ wɔn ho ban bio", na awɔ a wɔhyew hyɛn nkurɔfo no mu, na wɔkekaa wɔn na awuduru no de awuduru guu wɔn mu. Nnipa bebree wuwui wɔ Israelfo no mu.) Nnipa no baa Mose nkyɛn bɛkaa sɛ, "Yɛanya." yɛɛ bɔne tiaa Awurade ne mo. AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ, "Yɛ ɔwɔ a ɛyɛ ogya na fa to dua so. Obiara a wɔaka no no bɛhwɛ ɔwɔ no na wanya nkwa." bɛtena ase.Baako hwɛ kɔbere ɔwɔ no na ɔbaa nkwa mu.

( Hyɛ nso: "Ogya ɔwɔ" kyerɛ ɔwɔ a awuduru wom" kyerɛ ɔwɔ a ɔnyɛ awuduru a ɔte sɛ ɔwɔ nanso ɔnyɛ ɔwɔ. "Kɔbere" kyerɛ hann ne bɔne a enni mu - twe adwene si Adiyisɛm 2:18 ne Romafo 8:3. Onyankopɔn yɛɛ "ɔwɔ a wɔde kɔbere ayɛ" a ɛkyerɛ "awuduru nnim" na ɛkyerɛ sɛ "bɔne nnim" no nsusuwii de sii "awuduru a wogu kyerɛ bɔne" a Israelfo sɛn dua no so sɛ ɛbɛyɛ aniwu, nnome ne ɔwɔ awuduru wu no ananmu ." Eyi yɛ Kristo a ɔbɛyɛ yɛn bɔne ho nhwɛso. nipadua "te sɛ" sɛ bɔne afɔre. Israelfo no Bere a wɔhwɛɛ "ɔwɔ a wɔde kɔbere ayɛ" a ɔsensɛn dua no so ara pɛ na wɔde "ɔwɔ awuduru" a ɛwɔ wɔn mu no kɔɔ "ɔwɔ a wɔde kɔbere ayɛ" no mu na wɔsɛee no Obiara a ɔwɔ no aka no no baa nkwa mu bere a ɔhwɛɛ kɔbere ɔwɔ no .Amen, wote ase?

( 2. 2. ) . Ka Yesu Kristo ne nea wɔabɔ no asɛnnua mu no ho asɛm

Yohane Ti 3 Nkyem 14 Na sedee Mose maa ɔwɔ so wɔ sare so no, saa ara na wɔbɛma Onipa Ba no so Yohane Ti 12 Nkyekyɛm 32 Sɛ wɔma me so fi asase so a, mɛtwe nnipa nyinaa aba me ho. " Na Yesu nsɛm no reka sɛnea obewu ho. Yohane 8:28 Enti Yesu kae sɛ: "Sɛ woma Onipa Ba no so a, mubehu sɛ mene Kristo no."

Yesaia 45:21-22 Kasa na fa mo nsusuwii kyerɛ, na momma wɔne wɔn ho wɔn ho nsusuw ho. Hena na ɔtwee adwene sii so fi tete? Hena na ɔkaa ho asɛm fi tete? Ɛnyɛ me AWURADE? Onyame biara nni hɔ gye me; Monhwɛ me, asase ano nyinaa, na mobɛgye mo nkwa;

Hyɛ no nsow: Awurade Yesu kaa sɛ: "Sɛnea Mose maa ɔwɔ no so wɔ sare so no, saa ara na wɔmaa Onipa Ba no so na "wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu. " Sɛ woma Onipa Ba no so wie a, wobɛhunu sɛ Yesu ne Kristo no na Agyenkwa, a ogye yɛn firi bɔne mu Nyankopɔn a ɔde ne ho firi mmara nnome ho na ɔde ne ho firi owuo mu → Onyankopɔn nam odiyifoɔ so kaa sɛ: "Nnipa a wɔwɔ asase ano no, wɔbɛgye wɔn nkwa sɛ wɔhwɛ "Kristo" so a. ." Amen! So eyi mu da hɔ?

( 3. 3. ) . Onyankopɔn yɛɛ nea onni bɔne no sɛ ɔbɛyɛɛ bɔne maa yɛn sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛyɛ Onyankopɔn trenee wɔ ne mu

Momma yensua Bible [2 Korintofo 5:21] Nyankopɔn yɛɛ nea onnim bɔne (a onni bɔne: mfitiase nkyerɛwee no kyerɛ sɛ onnim bɔne biara) yɛɛ bɔne maa yɛn, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛyɛ Onyankopɔn trenee wɔ ne mu. 1 Petro 2:22-25 Wanyɛ bɔne biara, na nnaadaa biara nni n’anom. Bere a wɔbɔɔ no ahohora no, wantua so ka bere a wɔpiraa no no, wanhunahuna no, na mmom ɔde ne ho hyɛɛ Nea obu atɛn trenee nsa no nsa. Ɔsɛn dua no so na ɔsoaa yɛn bɔne ankasa sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a, esiane sɛ yɛawu ama bɔne nti, yɛbɛtra ase ama trenee. Ɛnam ne mpire so saa mo yareɛ. Na mote sɛ nguan a wɔyerae, nanso seesei moasan aba mo kra Oguanhwɛfoɔ ne Ɔhwɛfoɔ no nkyɛn. 1 Yohane 3:5 Monim sɛ Awurade yii ne ho adi sɛ ɔrebɛyi bɔne afiri nnipa a bɔne nni wɔn mu. 1 Yohane 2:2 Ɔno ne yɛn bɔne mpata, na ɛnyɛ yɛn bɔne nko na mmom wiase nyinaa bɔne nso.

( Hyɛ nso: Onyankopɔn yɛɛ Yesu a onni bɔne no sɛ ɔbɛyɛɛ bɔne maa yɛn. Ɔno ne yɛn bɔne mpata, ɛnyɛ yɛn bɔne nko na mmom wiase nyinaa bɔne. Kristo de Ne nipadua bɔɔ afɔre pɛnkoro sɛ bɔne afɔre, na ɔnam saayɛ so maa wɔn a wɔate wɔn ho no yɛɛ pɛ daa. Amen! Bere bi na yɛte sɛ nguan a wɔayera, nanso seesei yɛasan aba mo kra Oguanhwɛfo ne Ɔhwɛfo no nkyɛn. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Enti Paulo kaa sɛ: "Kristo ansoma me sɛ memmɛbɔ asu na mmom sɛ menka asɛmpa no, ɛnyɛ nyansa nsɛm, na Kristo asɛnnua no anyɛ hwee. Na asɛnnua ho asɛm no yɛ nkwaseasɛm ma wɔn a wɔyera; sɛ." yɛn na wɔregye yɛn nkwa nanso Onyankopɔn tumi nti, sɛnea wɔakyerɛw no: “Mɛsɛe anyansafo nyansa, na masɛe anyansafo nhumu. "Yudafoɔ pɛ anwonwadeɛ, na Helafoɔ hwehwɛ nyansa, nanso yɛka Kristo a wɔabɔ no asɛnnua mu ho asɛm, a ɛyɛ hintidua ma Yudafoɔ ne nkwaseasɛm ma Amanamanmufoɔ. Onyankopɔn dan nkwasea "asɛnnua" nkyerɛkyerɛ no yɛ nhyira, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛtumi agye yɛn nkwa." .

Esiane sɛ na minim Yesu Kristo ne nea wɔabɔ no asɛnnua mu nti, nsɛm a mekae ne asɛnka a mekae no nyɛ nyansa nsɛm a ɛnteɛ mu, na mmom na ɛyɛ Honhom Kronkron ne tumi a wɔda no adi, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a mo gyidi rentra nnipa nyansa so na mmom Onyankopɔn tumi. Hwɛ 1 Korintofo 1:17-2:1-5.

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ me ne mo nyinaa bɛdi nkitaho na makyɛ mo nyinaa wɔ ha. Amen

2021.01.25 na ɛwɔ hɔ

articles.title: Mmeamudua|Asɛnnua no mfiase
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe, nnamfo adɔfo, anuanom mmarima ne mmea! Amen. Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ asɛnnua no mfitiaseɛ

tete Romafo mmeamudua

asɛndua mu a wɔbɔɔ no , wɔka sɛ ɛnam Foinikefo Nneɛma a wɔyɛe, Foinike Ahemman no yɛ din titiriw a wɔde frɛ nkurow nketewa a ɛtoatoa so wɔ tete Mediterranea Po no apuei fam mpoano atifi fam mantam no mu no, wobetumi ahu n’abakɔsɛm fi afeha a ɛto so 30 A.Y.B. Mpɛn pii no, na ayayade adwinnade no mmeamudua no yɛ nnua abien anaa abiɛsa---anaasɛ anan mpo sɛ ɛyɛ mmeamudua a ɛwɔ afã anan a, ɛsono ne nsusuwii. Ebi yɛ T, ebi nso yɛ X, na ebi nso yɛ Y. Nneɛma akɛse a Foinikefo no yɛe no mu biako ne nnipa a wɔbɔɔ wɔn asɛndua mu no. Akyire, Wɔde saa kwan yi fii Foinikefo hɔ kɔɔ Helafo, Asiriafo, Misrifo, Persiafo ne Romafo nkyɛn. Nea nkurɔfo ani gye ho titiriw wɔ Persia Ahemman, Damasko Ahemman, . yuda Ahenni, Israel Ahenni, Carthage, ne tete Roma, a na wɔtaa de kum atuatewfo, atorofo, nkoa, ne nnipa a wonni ɔman mma .

Saa asotwe a ɛyɛ atirimɔdensɛm yi fi dua dua bi mu. Mfiase no, wɔkyekyeree ɔdeduani no wɔ dua dua ho na wɔmene no ma owui, na na ɛyɛ mmerɛw na ɛyɛ atirimɔdensɛm. Akyiri yi wɔde nnua a wɔde yɛ nneɛma bae, a mmeamudua, nnua a ɛte sɛ T ne nnua a ɛte sɛ X ka ho. Wɔsan frɛ X-shaped frame no "Saint Andrew's frame" efisɛ ɔhotefo no wui wɔ X-shaped frame no so.

Ɛwom sɛ ɛsono sɛnea wokum deduani no ho nsɛm kakra wɔ mmeae biara de, nanso tebea no nyinaa te sɛ: wodi kan bɔ ɔdeduani no mpire na afei wɔhyɛ no ma ɔsoa nnua a wɔde ayɛ adum kɔ baabi a wokum no. Ɛtɔ mmere bi a, nnua a wɔde ayɛ no mu yɛ duru araa ma ɛyɛ den ma obiako sɛ obetu. Ansa na wɔrekum deduani no, woyii ne ntade fii ne ho, na ɛkaa asen mu ntama nkutoo. Nnua bi a ɛte sɛ wedge wɔ ɔdeduani no nsateaa ne ne nan ase na amma nipadua no anhwe ase esiane tumi a ɛtwe ade ba fam nti. Afei fa mmeamudua no hyɛ ɔkwan a wɔasiesie a ɛyɛ pintinn a wɔabue wɔ fam no mu. Nea ɛbɛyɛ na owu atu ntɛmntɛm no, ɛtɔ mmere bi a na ɔdeduani bi akwaa bubu. Dodow no abodwokyɛre mu yɛ den no, dodow no ara na ayayade no kyɛ. Owia a ɛhyew a mmɔborohunu nnim no hyew wɔn were a ɛda hɔ kwa, nwansena kekaa wɔn na wɔnom wɔn fifiri, na mfutuma a ɛwɔ wim no memenee wɔn.

Ná wɔtaa bɔ mmeamudua akuwakuw, enti na wɔtaa si mmeamudua pii wɔ beae koro. Bere a wokum ɔsɛmmɔnedifo no akyi no, ɔkɔɔ so sɛn asɛndua no so de kyerɛe wɔ baguam akyi no, na ɛyɛ amanne sɛ wobesie mmeamudua no ne ɔsɛmmɔnedifo no abom. Akyiri yi, wonyaa nkɔso bi wɔ asɛnnua mu a wɔbɔɔ no no mu, te sɛ ɔdeduani no ti a wɔde besi fam wɔ nnua a wɔde asisi so, na ebetumi ama ɔdeduani no adwene atu afra ntɛm na atew ɔdeduani no yaw so ankasa.

Ɛyɛ den ma nnɛyifo sɛ wobesusuw ɛyaw a ɛwɔ asɛndua mu no ho, efisɛ sɛ yɛhwɛ no a, ɛte sɛ nea obi a wɔbɛkyekyere obi wɔ dua so kɛkɛ no nyɛ asotwe a ɛyɛ atirimɔdensɛm titiriw. Ɔkɔm anaa sukɔm ankum ɔdeduani a ɔte asɛnnua no so no, na mogya nso anwu no—wɔde nnadewa no guu asɛnnua no mu, awiei koraa no, ɔdeduani no wui esiane ne menewa nti. Ná onipa a wɔabɔ no asɛnnua mu no tumi home denam ne nsa a ɔtene so nkutoo so. Nanso, wɔ gyinabea a ɛte saa mu, ne ɛyaw a emu yɛ den a ɛnam nnadewa no a wɔde kɔ mu no ka ho no, ɛrenkyɛ ntini no nyinaa bɛma akyi twetwe tumi a ano yɛ den aba, enti mframa a ahyɛ koko no mu ma no rentumi mfi mu. Nea ɛbɛyɛ na obi ahome ntɛmntɛm no, wɔtaa de nneɛma a emu yɛ duru sɛn nnipa a wɔn ho yɛ den sen biara no nan so, ma enti wontumi ntrɛw wɔn nsa bio mfa nhome. Nea nyansahufo adwene hyia ne sɛ na asɛndua mu a wɔbɔ no atirimɔden kwan a ɛyɛ soronko a wɔfa so kum obi efisɛ na ɛde nkakrankakra yɛɛ obi ayayade ma owu wɔ nna pii mu.

Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔbɔɔ asɛnnua a edi kan wɔ Roma no yɛ Targan ahenni bere a na Ahene Bason no baa awiei no. Awiei koraa no, Roma siw nkoa atuatew abiɛsa ano. Na nkonimdie biara, mogyahwieguo na ɛka ho, na wɔbɔɔ nnipa mpempem pii asɛnnua mu. Na abien a edi kan no wɔ Sicily, biako wɔ afeha a edi kan A.Y.B. Nea ɛto so abiɛsa na agye din sen biara, wɔ afe 73 A.Y.B., Spartacus na odii anim na wɔbɔɔ nnipa mpem nsia asɛnnua mu. Wosisii mmeamudua fii Cabo kosi Roma nyinaa. Na asɛnnua anaa adum so kum no yɛ nea nkurɔfo ani gye ho kɛse wɔ Romafo bere so, nanso efii ase yerae nkakrankakra wɔ mfehaha pii akyi a wɔbɔɔ Kristo asɛndua mu, sɔre fii awufo mu na ɔforo kɔɔ soro no. Wɔn a wɔwɔ tumi no amfa ɔkwan a wɔfa so kum "Onyankopɔn mma" no ankum nsɛmmɔnedifo bio, na wofii ase de sɛn ne asotwe afoforo dii dwuma kɛse.

Roma ɔhempɔn Constantine na ɔkyerɛwee te ase afeha a ɛto so 4 Y.B "Nteɛso a wɔde too gua". Milan ahyɛde a wɔde mae " yi fi hɔ Asɛnnua mu a wɔbɔɔ no. twam Ɛyɛ nnɛyi Kristosom ho sɛnkyerɛnne, na egyina hɔ ma Onyankopɔn dɔ kɛse ne ogye a ɔwɔ ma wiase no. 431 na ɛwɔ hɔ Wofii ase puei wɔ Kristofo asɔre mu wɔ A.D. mu 586 na ɛwɔ hɔ Wosii asɔredan no atifi fi afe no mu.

YOO! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

2021.01.24 na ɛwɔ hɔ

articles.title: Kyerɛ nsonsonoe a ɛda awo foforo a ɛyɛ nokware ne atoro ntam
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe, nnamfo adɔfo, anuanom mmarima ne mmea! Amen.

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible mu nhwɛ Efesofo ti 1 nkyekyem 13 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Berɛ a wotee nokorɛ asɛm no, wo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no, na mugyee Kristo diiɛ no, wɔde bɔhyɛ Honhom Kronkron no sɔɔ mo ano wɔ Ne mu. .

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ ". Sɛnea wobehu nsonsonoe: nokware ne atoro awo foforo 》Mpaebɔ: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! [Ɔbea pa no] nam nokware asɛm a ɛyɛ mo nkwagye asɛmpa no so somaa adwumayɛfo faa wɔn nsa so, a wɔakyerɛw ne asɛnka. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu ani na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware → Kyerɛkyerɛ Onyankopɔn mma sɛnea wɔbɛkyerɛ nsonsonoe a ɛda nokware awo foforo ne atoro awo foforo ntam bere a wɔwɔ Honhom Kronkron sɛ wɔn nsɔano no. ! Amen.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen.

【1】Kristofo a wɔawo wɔn foforo no te Kristo mu

---Fa Honhom Kronkron tra ase, nantew Honhom Kronkron---

- . --Ahotoso suban su--- .

Galatifo 5:25 Sɛ yɛfa Honhom so na yɛte ase a, momma yɛn nso yɛnante Honhom no mu.

bisa: Dɛn ne asetra a ɛnam "Honhom Kronkron" so?
anoyie: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Nsu ne Honhom mu awo ~ twe adwene si Yohane 3 nkyekyem 5-7;
2. 2. Wɔwoo wo fi asɛmpa no nokware mu ~ twe adwene si 1 Korintofo 4:15 ne Yakobo 1:18;
3. 3. Onyankopɔn awo no ~ hwɛ Yohane 1:12-13

bisa: "Ɔkwan bɛn so" na Kristofo de Honhom Kronkron tra ase? Na "sɛnea" wobɛfa Honhom Kronkron no so anantew?
anoyie: Gye Nea Onyankopɔn asoma no no di, eyi ne Onyankopɔn adwuma → Wobisaa no sɛ, “Dɛn na ɛsɛ sɛ yɛyɛ na wɔabu yɛn sɛ yɛreyɛ Onyankopɔn adwuma no di?” Onyankopɔn 6:28-29

【mmienu】 Gye adwuma kɛse a Onyankopɔn somaa ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro, Yesu, sɛ ɔmmɛyɛ mma yɛn no di

"Paul" Mede nea me nso menyaa no ma wo: Nea edi kan no, Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne sɛnea Twerɛ Kronkron no kyerɛ no, wosiee no, na ɔsɔree da a ɛto so abiɛsa sɛnea Twerɛ Kronkron no kyerɛ no! 1 Korintofoɔ 15:3-4

(1) . a wɔde wɔn ho afi bɔne ho ~Hwɛ Romafoɔ 6:6-7 ne Romafoɔ 8:1-2
(2) . Wɔde wɔn ho fi mmara ne ne nnome ho ~Hwɛ Romafoɔ 7:4-6 ne Gal 3:12
(3) . Yi akwakoraa no ne ne suban dedaw no fi hɔ~ Hwɛ Kol. 3:9 ne Gal
(4) . Guan fii Satan esum asase ase tumi mu~ Hwɛ Kolosefoɔ 1:13 a wagye yɛn afiri esum tumi mu na wakyerɛ yɛn ase akɔ ne dɔba no ahennie mu ne Asomafoɔ Nnwuma 28:18
(5) . Fi wiase~ Hwɛ Yohane 17:14-16
(6) . ɔtwe ne ho fi obi ho ~Hwɛ Romafoɔ 6:6 ne 7:24-25
(7) . Bu yɛn bem ~Hwɛ Romafoɔ 4:25

【mmiɛnsa】 Gye Yesu di na bɔ mpae hwehwɛ Honhom Kronkron a Agya no somaa no sɛ ɔnyɛ foforoyɛ adwuma kɛse no

Tito 3:5 Ɛnyɛ trenee nnwuma a yɛayɛ so na ogyee yɛn nkwa, na mmom ne mmɔborohunu so, ɔnam awo foforo a wɔhohoro ne Honhom Kronkron foforoyɛ so.

Kolosefo 3:10 Monhyɛ onipa foforo no. Wɔma onipa foforo no yɛ foforo wɔ nimdeɛ mu ma ɔyɛ ne Bɔfo no suban.

(1) . Efisɛ nkwa Honhom mmara , ogyee me fii bɔne ne owu mmara mu wɔ Kristo Yesu mu ~ Hwɛ Romafo 8:1-2
(2) . Nya agyede sɛ Onyankopɔn ba na hyɛ Kristo ~Hwɛ Gal. 4:4-7, Romafo 8:16, ne Gal
(3) . Bem, bem, ahotew, ahotew: "Atemmuo" kyerɛ Romafoɔ 5:18-19... Esiane sɛ "Kristo" trenee adeyɛ baako nti, wɔbuu nnipa nyinaa bem na wɔnyaa nkwa ɛnam onipa baako asoɔden nti, nnipa nyinaa bɛyɛɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ; onipa baako asoɔden, wɔmaa nnipa nyinaa yɛɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ Daa pɛyɛ —hwɛ Hebrifo 10:14
(4) . Obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no nyɛ bɔne da. Hwɛ Yohane 1 ti 3 nkyekyem 9 ne 5 nkyekyem 18
(5) . Twetiatwa a wɔde beyi ɔhonam ne ɔhonam afi hɔ. Sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom te mo mu a, monyɛ ɔhonam mufo bio na mmom Honhom no mufo. Sɛ obi nni Kristo Honhom a, ɔnyɛ Kristo dea - Hwɛ Romafoɔ 8:9 → Ɔno mu na wɔtwaa mo twetia a nsa nnim, wɔ Kristo twetiatwa mu denam honam bɔne su a moayi afi hɔ no so. Kolosefo 2:11
(6) . Wɔda ademude no adi wɔ dɔte anwenne mu : Yɛwɔ saa ademude yi wɔ dɔte nkuku mu de kyerɛ sɛ tumi kɛse yi fi Onyankopɔn hɔ na ɛnyɛ yɛn hɔ. Atamfo atwa yɛn ho ahyia wɔ afanu nyinaa, nanso wɔankyere yɛn, nanso wɔn abam mmu, nanso wɔmmɔ yɛn, nanso wonkum yɛn; Yɛde Yesu wuo ka yɛn ho daa sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a Yesu nkwa nso bɛda adi wɔ yɛn mu. 2 Korintofoɔ 4:7-10
(7) . Owu reyɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn mu, nkwa reyɛ adwuma wɔ wo mu : Efisɛ Yesu nti wɔde yɛn a yɛte ase no ma owu bere nyinaa, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a Yesu nkwa bɛda adi wɔ yɛn nipadua a ewu no mu. Saa kwan yi so no, owuo reyɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn mu, nanso nkwa reyɛ adwuma wɔ mo mu--Hwɛ 2 Korintofoɔ 4:11-12
(8) Yɛ Kristo nipadua no na nyin bɛyɛ mpanyimfo ~Hwɛ Efesofo 4:12-13→ Enti, yɛn koma nntu. Ɛwom sɛ wɔresɛe akyi nipadua no de, nanso emu nipadua no reyɛ foforo da biara da. Yɛn bere tiaa mu amanehunu ne hare mu amanehunu bɛyɛ adwuma ama yɛn anuonyam mu duru a enni awiei a ɛboro ntotoho biara so. Hwɛ 2 Korintofo 4:16-17

【Nnan】 . "Kristofo" a wɔawo wɔn foforo wɔ atoro so.

---Gyidie suban ne su--- .

(1) . Wɔ mmara no ase no: Efisɛ bɔne tumi ne mmara - twe adwene si 1 Korintofo 15:56 → Wɔn a wɔhyɛ mmara ase no yɛ bɔne nkoa, sɛ wɔannye wɔn ho afi "bɔne" ho a, ɔkwan biara nni hɔ a wɔbɛfa so aguan afi "owu" mu Onyankopɔn bayɛ wɔ mmara ase Honhom Kronkron ne awo foforo biara nni hɔ → gye wo". Sɛ "Honhom Kronkron di anim" a. , nni mmara no ase. Hwɛ Galatifo ti 5 nkyekyem 18 ne ti 4 nkyekyem 4-7
(2) . Egyina mmara no sodi so: Obiara a ɔyɛ adwuma sɛnea mmara no te no wɔ nnome ase;
(3) . Wɔ Adam mu no "ɔdebɔneyɛfo": Bɔne akatua yɛ owuo wɔ Adam mu no, obiara wuiɛ, enti na Honhom Kronkron biara nni hɔ na awoɔ foforɔ biara nni hɔ. --Hwɛ 1 Korintofoɔ 15:22
(4) . Wɔ honam "asase" honam mu no: Awurade se, "Esiane sɛ onipa yɛ honam nti, me Honhom rentra ne mu daa; na ne nna bɛyɛ mfe ɔha aduonu Genesis 6:3 → Sɛnea Yesu kae no → "Nsã foforo" Wontumi nsiw ano." wɔ "nsã kotoku dedaw" mu → kyerɛ sɛ, "Honhom Kronkron" no rentra honam mu daa.
(5) . Wɔn a wɔpae mu ka, tew ho, na wɔpopa honam bɔne da biara da →Saa nkurɔfo yi buu "Apam Foforo" so →Hebrifo 10:16-18... Ɛno akyi no, wɔkae sɛ: "Merenkae wɔn bɔne ne wɔn mmarato bio esiane sɛ wɔde saa bɔne yi akyɛ nti, ɛho nhia sɛ wɔyɛ saa." bɔne ho afɔrebɔ bio.Wɔn "annye nni" sɛ wɔabɔ wɔn nipasu dedaw no asɛnnua mu ne Kristo na wɔasɛe "bɔne nipadua" no, nanso "wɔkae" no da biara → wɔkaa wɔn bɔne, hohoroo wɔn ho, na wɔpopaa wɔn bɔne maa owu nipadua yi, bɔne nipadua a ewu. Ɛbu Apam Foforo no so kɛkɛ
(6) . Bɔ Onyankopɔn Ba no asɛnnua mu bio →Sɛ wɔte nokware kwan no ase na "wogye asɛmpa no di" a, ɛsɛ sɛ wogyae Kristo nkyerɛkyerɛ no mfiase no, wɔmpɛ sɛ wobefi "mfiase" no mu na wɔasan akɔ mmara no so mpo na wɔwɔ ɔpɛ sɛ wɔbɛyɛ bɔne nkoa wɔdaadaa wɔn na Satan de "bɔne" akyere wɔn na wontumi mfi adi →Wɔhohoro mprako no na afei wɔsan kɔ atɛkyɛ mu a wɔbɛhuruhuruw mu; 2 Petro 2:22
(6) . Fa Kristo "mogya a ɛsom bo" no di dwuma sɛnea ɛte daa : Kaka na monsakyera wo ho da biara, popa bɔne, hohoro bɔne, na fa Awurade " mogya a ɛsom bo "Sɛnea ɛte daa no, ɛnyɛ papa mpo sɛ anantwi ne nguan mogya."
(7) . Sɛ yɛbɛdi adom Honhom Kronkron no ho fɛw: Esiane "Kristo" nti, N'afɔrebɔ biako no ma wɔn a wɔatew wɔn ho no yɛ pɛ daa. Hebrifo 10:14→ Esiane wɔn "gyidi a wonni" a wɔn kɔn mu yɛ den nti. → Na sɛ yɛhyɛ da yɛ bɔne wɔ nokware nimdeɛ a yɛanya akyi a, bɔne ho afɔrebɔ biara nni hɔ bio, na mmom yɛtwɛn atemmu ne ogya a ɛhyew a ɛbɛhye yɛn atamfo nyinaa. Sɛ wɔanhu onipa a wabu Mose mmara so mmɔbɔ na owu esiane adansefo baanu anaa baasa nti a, ɛnde na ɛsɛ sɛ otiatia Onyankopɔn Ba no so kɛse na obu apam a ɛtew no ho no mogya sɛ ɛyɛ ade a ɛtaa ba, na obu no animtiaa Adom Honhom Kronkron? Hebrifo 10:26-29

Hyɛ nso: Anuanom mmarima ne mmea! Sɛ wowɔ atifi hɔ gyidi a ɛyɛ mfomso no a, yɛsrɛ wo sɔre ntɛm ara na gyae Satan nnaadaa a wɔde bɛdaadaa wo na wode "bɔne" adi dwuma de wo ato afiase. bɔne , ntumi mfi mu. Ɛsɛ sɛ wusua biribi fi wɔn hɔ Mfomso Liao Fi wo gyidi mu → hyɛn "Yesu Kristo Asɔre" mu na tie nokware asɛmpa no → ɛyɛ Yesu Kristo Asɔre no na ɛma wo kwan ma wogye wo nkwa, wɔhyɛ wo anuonyam, na wogye wo nipadua → nokware no! Amen

YOO! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

2021.03.04 na ɛwɔ hɔ

articles.title: Ɔhaw no ho nkyerɛkyerɛmu: So abɔde mu nnipa wɔ Honhom Kronkron?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe, nnamfo adɔfo, anuanom mmarima ne mmea! Amen.

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nkɔ Genesis ti 6 nkyekyem 3 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: "Sɛ onipa yɛ honam a, me Honhom rentra ne mu daa," AWURADE asɛm ni, "na mmom ne nna bɛyɛ mfeɛ ɔha aduonu."

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "Abɔde mu nipa nni Honhom Kronkron". Bɔ mpae: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya Kronkron, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! "Ɔbea pa no "somaa adwumayɛfo nam wɔn nsa so, a wɔakyerɛw ne nea wɔaka, denam nokware asɛm, wo nkwagye asɛmpa no so. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu ani na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware → Te ase sɛ "Honhom Kronkron" no ntra abɔde mu nnipa so .

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) . Onyankopɔn Honhom rentra honam fam nnipa nkyɛn daa


bisa: So Honhom Kronkron ne onipa a ɔwɔ "asase" honam te daa?
anoyie: AWURADE asɛm nie: “Sɛ onipa yɛ ɔhonam a, me Honhom rentena ne mu daa;

Hyɛ nso: Wɔde dɔte na ɛbɔɔ nana "Adam" - Yehowa Nyankopɔn bɔɔ onipa fii asase so dɔte mu na ɔhome nkwa guu ne hwene mu, na ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔteasefo, honhom mu nipa a wɔtoo no din Adam. Genesis Ti 2 Nkyekyɛm 7 → "Onipa teasefo a ɔwɔ honhom" → Adam yɛ "ɔhonam ne mogya teasefo" → Saa ara na wɔakyerɛw wɔ Bible mu sɛ: "Adam, onipa a odi kan no, bɛyɛɛ honhom (honhom: anaa wɔkyerɛ ase sɛ." honam ne mogya). "onipa teasefo"; 1 Korintofo 15:45

“Sɛ onipa yɛ honam a, me Honhom rentra ne mu daa,” AWURADE asɛm nie

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Te sɛ "Ɔhene Saul" wɔ Apam Dedaw mu no, odiyifo Samuel de ngo sraa no, na na ɔwɔ Onyankopɔn Honhom! Honam mu hene Saul buu Onyankopɔn ahyɛde so→Awurade Honhom” ahomegyeɛ "Saul, honhom bɔne bi a efi Awurade hɔ bae sɛ ɔrebɛhaw no. 1 Samuel 16:14."

2. 2. "Ɔhene Dawid" nso wɔ hɔ a na osuro paa sɛ Onyankopɔn bɛtwe Honhom Kronkron no afiri ne honam mmaratoɔ nti Ɔde n'ani hunuu sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom gyaw Ɔhene Saul hɔ Ɔbɔɔ Onyankopɔn mpaeɛ wɔ Dwom no mu → Ntow me mfi w’anim; Dwom 51:11

Enti Apam Dedaw no mu no yehu "adiyifo ne wɔn a wosuro Onyankopɔn".Onyankopɔn Honhom no kanyan wɔn, nanso ɛrentena wɔn so daa, efisɛ nnipa a wɔyɛ "asase" honam no wɔ pɛsɛmenkominya akɔnnɔ, na honam a ɛyɛ akɔnnɔ de nkakrankakra bɛyɛ bɔne. , "Onyankopɔn Honhom" ntumi ntra nipadua a ɛporɔw mu. Nnipa a wɔyɛ "asase" honam ntumi nkura Honhom Kronkron no mu, sɛnea wontumi mfa bobesa foforo nhyɛ nsa nkotoku dedaw mu no. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

( 2. 2. ) . Wɔrentumi mfa bobesa foforo nhyɛ nkotoku dedaw mu

Momma yensua Mateo 9:17: Obiara mfa bobesa foforo nhyɛ nkotoku dedaw mu; Ɛdenam nsa foforo a wɔde bɛhyɛ nkotoku foforo mu nkutoo so na wɔbɛkora abien no nyinaa so. "

bisa: Dɛn na kasakoa a ɛfa "nsã foforo" ho no kyerɛ wɔ ha?
anoyie: " bobesa foforo "kyerɛ sɛ" Onyankopɔn Honhom, Kristo Honhom, Honhom Kronkron "Ɛte saa!

bisa: Dɛn ne kasakoa a ɛfa "nsã kotoku dedaw" no ho?
anoyie: "Nsã nwoma dedaw" kyerɛ akwakoraa no fi Adam - onipa teasefo a wɔwoo no fi "asase" honam mu Nkakrankakra sɛe na awiei koraa no san kɔ mfutuma mu→saa na Yesu kae! Nsã nkotoku dedaw "ntumi" nkura bobesa foforo, kyerɛ sɛ, "onipa dedaw" no ntumi nkura "Honhom Kronkron", efisɛ onipa dedaw no porɔw na ɛtwetwe, na ontumi nkura Honhom Kronkron no mu. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

bisa: Dɛn na kasakoa a ɛne "nsã nhoma foforo" no kyerɛ?
anoyie: "Nsã nwoma foforo" ho kasakoa no kyerɛ Kristo nipadua, Asɛm no nipadua a ayɛ honam, honhom nipadua a ɛyɛ honam, nipadua a ɛnporɔw, ne nipadua a owu nkyekyere no→" bag foforo a wɔde aboa nhoma ayɛ "Aane Ɛreka Kristo nipadua ho asɛm , "nsã foforo" no ahyɛ "nsã nkotoku foforo mu", kyerɛ sɛ, "Honhom Kronkron" no "ahyɛ mu" kyerɛ sɛ, ɔte "Kristo nipadua" mu → Eyi ne nea yɛka bere a yɛredi Awurade Anwummeduan no: Eyi ne me nipadua "abodoo a mmɔkaw nnim" ",yɛn di Ɛno ne no nya Kristo nipadua, eyi ne "bobe nsu" a ɛwɔ me mogya kuruwa mu, nom na wubenya Kristo nkwa! Amen.

Yɛn nipa foforo a wɔasan awo no no yɛ Kristo nipadua ne ne nkwa Honhom Kronkron no te Kristo mu na yɛyɛ N’akwaa mufo Ɛne sɛ, Honhom Kronkron no te yɛn nipa foforo a wɔasan awo no mu. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

( 3. 3. ) . Sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom te yɛn mu a, yɛnyɛ honam mufo

Romafoɔ 8:9-10 Sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom te mo mu a, momfiri ɔhonam mu bio na mmom mofiri Honhom mu. Sɛ obi nni Kristo Honhom a, ɔnyɛ Kristo dea. Romafo 8:9 .

Hyɛ nso: Onyankopɔn Honhom, Yesu Honhom, Honhom Kronkron → Sɛ ɛtena wo mu a, wo "nipa foforo a wɔasan awo no" no renyɛ honam mu de bio na mmom Honhom Kronkron no de. Honam no nnyɛ Honhom Kronkron no dea.Sɛ woyɛ honam mufo a, wunni Honhom Kronkron no mu Kristo dea, ɔnyɛ Kristo dea → Sɛ woyɛ "asase" honam mu nipa, honam nipa, Adam nipa dedaw, ɔdebɔneyɛfo wɔ mmara ase, bɔne akoa, wo mma wonyɛ Kristo dea, wɔanwo wo foforo, na wunni Honhom Kronkron. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Adamfo dɔfo! Yɛda mo ase wɔ Yesu Honhom no ho → Wo klik saa asɛm yi so na kenkan na tie asɛmpa asɛnka no Sɛ wowɔ ɔpɛ sɛ wobɛgye na "woagye" Yesu Kristo sɛ Agyenkwa ne Ne dɔ kɛseɛ no a, yɛbɛtumi abom abɔ mpaeɛ?

Abba Agya Kronkron dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Yɛda wo ase Ɔsoro Agya sɛ wosomaa wo Ba a wowoo no koro, Yesu, sɛ ɔmmɛwu wɔ asɛnnua no so "yɛn bɔne nti" → 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa gye yɛn fi bɔne mu, . 2. 2. Gye yɛn fi mmara ne ne nnome ho, . 3. 3. Wɔde wɔn ho afi Satan tumi ne Hades sum no ho. Amen! Na wɔasie no → 4. 4. Ɔde akwakoraa no ne ne nneyɛe too nkyɛn no, wonyanee no da a ɛto so abiɛsa → 5. 5. Bu yɛn bem! Gye Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ no bɔ no sɛ nsɔano, wɔsan wo bio, nyane wo, nya nkwagye, nya Onyankopɔn bayɛ, na nya daa nkwa! Daakye, yɛbɛnya hɛn Ɔsor Egya n’agyapadze. Mommɔ mpae wɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

YOO! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

2021.03.05 na ɛwɔ hɔ

articles.title: Ɔhaw no ho nkyerɛkyerɛmu: Obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no renyɛ bɔne da
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea adɔfo a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen.

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nkɔ 1 Yohane ti 3 nkyekyem 9 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no nyɛ bɔne, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn asɛm te ne mu na ɔrentumi nyɛ bɔne, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔwoo no.

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ nsɛmmisa a ɛyɛ den ho nkyerɛkyerɛmu "Obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no renyɛ bɔne da". Bɔ mpae: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya Kronkron, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! "Ɔbea pa" somaa adwumayɛfo nam nokware asɛm a wɔde ne nsa akyerɛw na wɔka, wo nkwagye asɛmpa no so. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu ani na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware → Yenim sɛ obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no , . 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa renyɛ bɔne , . 2. 2. Nsɛmmɔnedi biara nni hɔ , . 3. 3. Ntumi nyɛ nsɛmmɔnedi → Efisɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔwoo no → nsɛmmɔnedifo Wonhuu no da na wonnim Yesu Kristo nkwagye . Amen!

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen.

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) . Obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no renyɛ bɔne da

Momma yɛnsua 1 Yohane 3:9 na yɛnbom nkenkan: Obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no nyɛ bɔne, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn asɛm te ne mu na ɔrentumi nyɛ bɔne, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔwoo no. Sɛ yɛdane kɔ Ti 5, nkyekyem 18 a, yenim sɛ obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no renyɛ bɔne da, obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no bɛkora ne ho so (tete nhoma mmobɔwee wɔ hɔ: Nea Onyankopɔn awo no no bɛbɔ ne ho ban), na ɔbɔnefo nso bɛyɛ ntumi mpira no .

[Hyɛ nso]: Ɛdenam atifi hɔ kyerɛwsɛm a yɛhwehwɛ mu so no, yɛkyerɛw → Obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Worenyɛ bɔne da, . 2. 2. nsɛmmɔnedi biara nni hɔ, . 3. 3. Worentumi nyɛ bɔne → Ɔha biara mu ɔha, koraa, na akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ worenyɛ bɔne → Eyi ne Onyankopɔn 【 nokorɛ 】 . Ɛnyɛ "onipa" nnyinasosɛm . →Dɛn ne bɔne? Obiara a ɔyɛ bɔne no bu mmara so no yɛ bɔne - hwɛ Yohane 1 Ti 3 Nkyekyɛm 4 → Obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no remmu mmara so, na sɛ wanto mmara so → "ɔrenyɛ bɔne". Amen? Saa kwan yi so no, so wote ase pefee?

Asɔre ahorow pii a ɛwɔ hɔ nnɛ no te saa nkyerɛase a ɛnteɛ Nkyekyem abien yi adaadaa anuanom mmarima ne mmea. Te sɛ Nkyerɛase Foforo ne nkyerɛase afoforo → wɔte ase sɛ agyidifo renyɛ bɔne "sɛ wɔtaa anaasɛ ɛkɔ so". Te Onyankopɔn “nokware” a edi mũ no ase kɛkɛ sɛ nokware a ɛfa ho. Esiane sɛ [nokware] ne "onipa" → nsusuwii a ntease wom nhyia nti, wɔsesa Onyankopɔn "nokware a edi mũ" no ma ɛbɛyɛ onipa "nokware a ɛfa ho" → te sɛ "ɔwɔ" no "sɔɔ" Hawa hwɛe sɛ onni "nea wontumi nni" wɔ Turo a Eden.Aba a ɛwɔ papa ne bɔne dua no so no yɛ ade koro → "Da a wubedi bi no, akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ wubewu" → Eyi yɛ 100%, awerɛhyem ne nea edi mũ → "Ɔwɔ" a ɔyɛ anifere no sesaa Onyankopɔn mmara "a edi mũ" no yɛɛ no a "relative" one → "Wodidi Sɛ wuwu a, ebia worenwu." Woahu, "ɔwɔ" no nso sɔ nkurɔfo hwɛ wɔ saa kwan yi so, ɔsesa Onyankopɔn "nokware" a ɛwɔ Bible mu no ma ɛyɛ "onipa nkyerɛkyerɛ" de kyerɛkyerɛ wo na ɔdaadaa wo fi asɛmpa no kwan ankasa so. So wote ase?

( 2. 2. ) . Adɛn nti na obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no nyɛ bɔne?

Mmuae a ɛkɔ akyiri ni:

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Yesu wui wɔ asɛnnua no so maa yɛn bɔne → sɛ ɔbɛma yɛade yɛn ho afi yɛn bɔne ho - hwɛ Romafo 6:6-7
2. 2. Wɔade wɔn ho afi mmara ne ne nnome ho→Hwɛ Romafo 7:6 ne Gal 3:13
3. 3. Ɛnyɛ mmara ase, na baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ → Hwɛ Romafo 6:14 ne Romafo 4:15
na wɔasie no
4. 4. Fa dedaw no ne ne nneyɛe to nkyɛn→Hwɛ Kolosefo 3:9 ne Efesofo 4:22
5. 5. "Onipa foforo" a Onyankopɔn awo no no nyɛ onipa dedaw no dea → twe adwene si Romafo 8:9-10 so. Hyɛ no nsow: "Onipa foforo" a Onyankopɔn awo no no, ɔde ne ho ahintaw Onyankopɔn mu ne Kristo na "ɔnnyɛ" dedaw a ɔyɛɛ bɔne wɔ Adam mu no dea → Mesrɛ wo san kɔ akyi na hwehwɛ → "Onipa foforo a Onyankopɔn awo no" a me ne wo kyɛɛ no kɔ akyiri wɔ nsɛmma nhoma a atwam no mu no nyɛ akwakoraa no dea".
6. 6. Onyankopɔn de yɛn abrabɔ akɔ ne dɔba no ahenni mu → Hwɛ Kolosefo 1:13 → Wɔnnyɛ wiasefo, sɛnea me nso menyɛ wiasefo no – Hwɛ Yohane 17:16.
Hyɛ no nsow: Yɛn "asetra foforo" no wɔ ne Ba a ɔdɔ no no ahenni mu dedaw, na ɛnka honam mu ayɛyɛde ho mmara ho, na saa ara nso na ɛnto mmara so. So wote ase?
7. Yɛwɔ Kristo mu dedaw → Seesei afobu biara nni hɔ mma wɔn a wɔwɔ Kristo Yesu mu. Efisɛ nkwa Honhom mmara a ɛwɔ Kristo Yesu mu no ama made me ho afi bɔne ne owu mmara ho - Hwɛ Romafo 8:1-2 → Hena na obetumi de sobo biara aba Onyankopɔn apaw wɔn so? So Onyankopɔn abu wɔn bem (anaasɛ ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn na obu wɔn bem) - Romafo 8:33

[Hyɛ nso]: Yɛnam atifi hɔ kyerɛwsɛm 7 no so kyerɛw sɛ obiara a wɔwoo no fii Onyankopɔn hɔ→ 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Worenyɛ bɔne da, . 2. 2. nsɛmmɔnedi biara nni hɔ, . 3. 3. Ɔntumi nyɛ bɔne ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn asɛm te ne mu, na ɔrentumi nyɛ bɔne ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn awo no. Amen! Meda wo ase Awurade! Haleluia! Enti, so wote ase pefee?

( 3. 3. ) . Obiara a ɔyɛ bɔne no nhunuu no anaa onnim Yesu

So wunim "Yesu din"? →"Yesu din" kyerɛ sɛ ɔbɛgye ne nkurɔfoɔ afiri wɔn bɔne mu! Amen.

→ “Onyankopɔn dɔ wiase araa ma ɔde ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro no mae, na obiara a ogye no di no ansɛe na mmom wanya daa nkwa Efisɛ Onyankopɔn ansoma ne Ba no aba wiase sɛ ɔmmɛbu wiase fɔ (anaasɛ ɔmmɛbu wiase atɛn) ; saa ara na ɛwɔ ase hɔ), sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔnam ne so begye wiase nkwa : 1 . Yesu wuo wɔ asɛnnua so no agye wo afiri bɔne mu → Wogye di? Sɛ woannye nni a, ɛnde wobebu wo fɔ sɛnea wo gyidi a wunnye nni no bɔne te. So wote ase?

Enti woka no ase ha → Obiara a 3tena Ne mu no nnye bone; Me mma nkumaa, monnsɔ mo nhwɛ. Nea ɔyɛ tenenee no yɛ ɔtreneeni, sɛdeɛ Awurade tenenee no. Nea ɔyɛ bɔne no fi ɔbonsam mu, efisɛ ɔbonsam ayɛ bɔne fi mfiase. Onyankopɔn Ba no yii ne ho adi sɛ ɔrebɛsɛe ɔbonsam nnwuma. Obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no nyɛ bɔne, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn asɛm te ne mu na ɔrentumi nyɛ bɔne, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔwoo no. Yei mu na wɔda wɔn a wɔyɛ Onyankopɔn mma ne wɔn a wɔyɛ ɔbonsam mma adi. Obiara a ɔnyɛ trenee no mfi Nyankopɔn mu, na obiara a ɔnnɔ ne nua nso mfi Nyankopɔn mu. Hwɛ Yohane 1 Ti 3 Nkyekyɛm 6-10 ne Yohane Ti 3 Nkyekyɛm 16-18

YOO! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

2021.03.06 na ɛwɔ hɔ

articles.title: Honhom Kronkron de yɛn akoma di adanseɛ sɛ yɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe, nnamfo adɔfo, anuanom mmarima ne mmea! Amen.

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no nhwɛ Romafo ti 8 nkyekyem 16-17 na yɛnbom nkenkan: Honhom Kronkron ne yɛn honhom di adanse sɛ yɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma na sɛ yɛyɛ mma a, yɛyɛ adedifo, Onyankopɔn adedifo ne Kristo mfɛfo adedifo. Sɛ yɛne No hunu amane a, yɛne No nso bɛhyɛ yɛn animuonyam.

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "Honhom Kronkron ne yɛn honhom di adanse sɛ yɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma". Bɔ mpae: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya Kronkron, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! " ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa "Soma adwumayɛfo nam nokware asɛm a wɔakyerɛw na wɔaka wɔ wɔn nsam, wo nkwagye asɛmpa no so. Wɔde abodoo fi akyirikyiri fi soro ba, na wɔde ma yɛn bere mu, na yɛn honhom mu nkwa adɔɔso! Amen .Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware→ Honhom Kronkron ne yɛn honhom di adanseɛ sɛ yɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma Amen!

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Honhom Kronkron de yɛn akoma di adanseɛ sɛ yɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) . Tie nokware asɛm no

Momma yɛnsua Bible no na yɛnbom nkenkan Efesofo 1:13-14: Bere a motee nokware asɛm, mo nkwagye asɛmpa no, na mogyee Kristo dii no, mo nsa kaa Honhom Kronkron no bɔhyɛ nso. Saa Honhom Kronkron yi ne yɛn agyapadeɛ ho bɔhyɛ (mfitiaseɛ nkyerɛwee: agyapadeɛ) kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛgye Onyankopɔn nkurɔfoɔ (mfitiaseɛ nkyerɛwee: agyapadeɛ) de akamfo N’anuonyam.

Hyɛ no nsow]: Makyerɛw denam atifi hɔ kyerɛwsɛm no mu nhwehwɛmu so → Esiane sɛ woate nokware asɛm no → Mfitiase no na Asɛm no wɔ hɔ, na Asɛm no ka Onyankopɔn ho, na Asɛm no nso yɛ Onyankopɔn. Na Asɛm yi ka Onyankopɔn ho mfiase no. ..."Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ honam" kyerɛ sɛ "Onyankopɔn" bɛyɛɛ honam → wɔwoo no fii ɔbaabun Maria hɔ → na wɔtoo no din [Yesu] na ɔtraa yɛn mu, adom ne nokware ahyɛ no ma. Na yɛahu n’anuonyam, anuonyam a ɛte sɛ Agya no ba koro no. ... Obiara nhunuu Nyankopɔn da, Ɔba a ɔwoo no koro no nko ara, a ɔwɔ Agya no kokom no, na wayi No adi. Nkyekyɛm--Yohane 1 Ti 1-2, 14, 18. → Ɛfa mfitiaseɛ nkwa asɛm a ɛfiri mfitiaseɛ, a yɛate, yɛahunu, yɛde yɛn ankasa ani ahunu, na yɛde yɛn nsa aka ho → "Awurade Yesu Kristo" twe adwene si 1 Yohane 1: Ti 1. →

【 . Yesu ne Onyankopɔn nipasu ankasa suban 】 .

Onyankopɔn a tete no ɔnam adiyifo so kasa kyerɛɛ yɛn nananom mpɛn pii ne akwan pii so no, seesei wakasa akyerɛ yɛn wɔ nna a edi akyiri yi mu denam ne Ba a ɔpaw no sɛ ade nyinaa difo na ɔnam ne so bɔɔ wiase nyinaa no so. Ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn anuonyam hyerɛn → "Onyankopɔn nipasu pɛpɛɛpɛ", na ɔnam ne tumi ahyɛde so gyina nneɛma nyinaa akyi. Bere a ɔtew nnipa ho fii wɔn bɔne ho wiei no, ɔtenaa Anuonyam no nifa wɔ soro. Esiane sɛ edin a ɔde da no so no yɛ anuonyam sen abɔfo din nti, ɔsen wɔn koraa. Nkyekyɛm--Hebrifo 1:1-4.

【 . Yesu ne kwan, nokware, ne nkwa 】 .

Toma ka kyerɛɛ no se, "Awurade, yɛnnim baabi a worekɔ, enti yɛbɛyɛ dɛn ahu kwan no?" Agya gye sɛ ɛnam me so Kɔ

( 2. 2. ) . wo nkwagye ho asɛmpa no

1 Korintofo nkyekyem 153-4 "Asɛmpa" a mekaa kyerɛɛ mo nso: nea edi kan no, Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne na wosiee no sɛnea Kyerɛwnsɛm no kyerɛ no, nea ɛto so abien no, wonyanee no wɔ nnansa mu! Hyɛ no nsow: Yesu Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne → 1 wɔde ne ho fii bɔne ho, 2 wɔde ne ho fii mmara ne mmara nnome ho, na wosiee no → 3 oyii akwakoraa no ne ne nneyɛe fii hɔ → ɔsɔree da a ɛto so abiɛsa → 4 wɔfrɛ no Yɛabu yɛn bem na yɛanya agyede sɛ Onyankopɔn mma! Amen. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

( 3. 3. ) . Nya Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ no sɛ nsɔano

Berɛ a motee nokorɛ asɛm, mo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no, na mogyee Kristo diiɛ no, wɔde bɔhyɛ Honhom Kronkron no sɔɔ mo ano. Saa Honhom Kronkron yi ne yɛn agyapadeɛ ho bɔhyɛ (mfitiaseɛ nkyerɛwee: agyapadeɛ) kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛgye Onyankopɔn nkurɔfoɔ (mfitiaseɛ nkyerɛwee: agyapadeɛ) de akamfo N’anuonyam. Nhwehwɛmu--Efesofo 1:13-14.

( 4. 4. ) . Honhom Kronkron de yɛn akoma di adanseɛ sɛ yɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma

Efisɛ moannya nkoasom honhom sɛ mobɛtena suro mu, na yɛteɛm sɛ, “Abba, Agya!” yɛ adedifo, Onyankopɔn adedifo ne Kristo yɔnko adedifo. Sɛ yɛne No hunu amane a, yɛne No nso bɛhyɛ yɛn animuonyam. --Romafoɔ 8:15-17

YOO! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

2021.03.07 na ɛwɔ hɔ

articles.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛyɛ den: Onipa foforo a wɔsan wo no no nyɛ dedaw no dea
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoeɛ nka m’abusua adɔfoɔ, nuanom mmarima ne mmaa! Amen

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no mu nkɔ Romafo ti 8 ne nkyekyem 9 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom te mo mu a, monyɛ ɔhonam mufo bio na mmom Honhom no mufo. Sɛ obi nni Kristo Honhom a, ɔnyɛ Kristo dea.

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ→Ɔhaw a emu yɛ den a yɛbɛkyerɛkyerɛ mu "Onipa foforo a wɔawo no foforo no nyɛ dedaw no dea". Bɔ mpae: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya Kronkron, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! "Ɔbea pa no" somaa adwumayɛfo nam wɔn nsa so, a wɔakyerɛw ne asɛnka nyinaa, denam nokware asɛm a ɛyɛ wo nkwagye asɛmpa no so. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi ate na yɛahu honhom mu nokware → nte ase sɛ "onipa foforo" a Onyankopɔn awo no no nyɛ Adam "nipa dedaw" no dea. Amen.

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen.

"Onipa foforo" a Onyankopɔn awo no no nyɛ Adam nipa dedaw no dea

Momma yensua Bible Romafo 8:9 Sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom te mo mu a, monyɛ honam mufo bio na mmom moyɛ Honhom no mufo. Sɛ obi nni Kristo Honhom a, ɔnyɛ Kristo dea.

[Hyɛ nso]: Onyankopɔn Honhom yɛ Onyankopɔn Agya Honhom → Honhom Kronkron, Kristo Honhom → Honhom Kronkron, Onyankopɔn Ba Honhom → nso Honhom Kronkron, wɔn nyinaa yɛ honhom biako → "Honhom Kronkron"! Amen. Enti, so wote ase? → Sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom te wo mu → "wosan wo wo bio", na "wo" kyerɛ "onipa foforo" a wɔwoo no fi Onyankopɔn hɔ → ɛnyɛ honam mu → kyerɛ sɛ, "ɛnyɛ dedaw Adam honam mu →." na mmom Honhom Kronkron no dea." Amen! Enti, so wote ase pefee?
Nnipa foforo a wɔbɛtetew wɔn afi dedaw mu:

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) a ɛda nsow wɔ awo foforo ho

Wɔn a wɔaba foforo: 1 Wɔn a wɔde nsuo ne Honhom awo wɔn, 2 Wɔn a wɔde asɛmpa, nokware a ɛwɔ Kristo Yesu mu awo wɔn, 3 Wɔn a Onyankopɔn awo wɔn → yɛ Onyankopɔn mma! Amen. Hwɛ Yohane 3:5, 1 Korintofo 4:15, ne Yakobo 1:18.
Akwakoraa: 1 Wɔbɔɔ wɔn fi mfutuma mu, Adam ne Hawa mma, 2 wɔde wɔn awofo honam woo wɔn, 3 abɔde, bɔne, asase so, na awiei koraa no wɔbɛsan akɔ dɔte mu → wɔyɛ onipa mma. Hwɛ Genesis 2:7 ne 1 Korintofo 15:45

( 2. 2. ) fi honhom mu nsonsonoe mu

Wɔn a wɔaba foforo: Wɔn a wɔyɛ Honhom Kronkron, Yesu, Kristo, Agya, Nyankopɔn → wɔde Kristo nipadua ne nkwa atade → wɔyɛ kronkron, wɔnni bɔne, na wontumi nyɛ bɔne, a nkekae nni wɔn ho, wɔn ho ntew, na wontumi nsiesie Wɔn a wɔporɔw, wontumi nsiesie a ɛporɔw, nea entumi yare, nea entumi owu. Ɛyɛ daa nkwa! Amen – hwɛ Yohane 11:26
Akwakoraa: Asase so, Adam de, awofo honam na wɔwoo no, abɔde → bɔne, wɔatɔn ama bɔne, efĩ ne nea ɛho ntew, nea ɛporɔw, nea ɛnam akɔnnɔ so sɛe, owu, na awiei koraa no ɔbɛsan ayɛ mfutuma. Hwɛ Genesis 3:19

( 3. 3. ) Kyerɛ nsonsonoe a ɛda "ahu" ne "a wonhu" ntam.

Wɔn a wɔaba foforo: "Onipa foforo" ne Kristo Tibet kasa Onyankopɔn mu → Hwɛ Kolosefo 3:3 Na moawu na mo nkwa ahintaw Kristo nkyɛn wɔ Onyankopɔn mu. →Afei Awurade Yesu a wɔanyan no no wɔ soro dedaw, ɔte Agya Nyankopɔn nifa so, na yɛn "nipa foforo a wɔasan awo no" nso ahintaw wɔ hɔ, Agya Nyankopɔn nifa so! Amen! Enti, so wote ase pefee? →Hwɛ Efesofoɔ 2:6 Ɔnyanee yɛn na ɔne Kristo Yesu tenaa ɔsoro mmeaeɛ. →Sɛ Kristo a ɔyɛ yɛn nkwa no yi ne ho adi a, mo nso mo ne no bɛda adi anuonyam mu. Hwɛ Kolosefo ti 3 nkyekyem 4.

Hyɛ nso: Kristo ne" te ase "Wɔ wo "koma" mu," Ɛnyɛ sɛ wobɛtra ase "Wɔ Adam nipa dedaw no honam mu, "onipa foforo" a Onyankopɔn awo no no." ɔkra nipadua → Wɔn nyinaa ahintaw, wɔne Kristo ahintaw Onyankopɔn mu → Saa da no a Yesu Kristo bɛba bio no, Onyankopɔn bɛwo no." Ɔba foforo " ɔkra nipadua Bɛ pue Fi adi na mo ne Kristo nkɔ anuonyam mu. Amen! Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Akwakoraa: "Akwakoraa" ne bɔne nipadua a efi Adam hɔ bae no, ohu ne ho, na afoforo nso tumi hu ne ho. Wɔnam owuo nipadua yi so bɛda honam adwene, mmarato ne akɔnnɔ bɔne nyinaa adi. Nanso na akwakoraa yi "kra ne ne nipadua" ne Kristo wɔ asɛnnua no so hwere . Enti, so wote ase?

Enti "ɔkra nipadua" a ɛwɔ saa akwakoraa yi mu ɛnyɛ ne dea →"onipa foforo" ɔkra nipadua a Onyankopɔn awo no! → wɔwoo no fi onyame →" honhom "Ɛyɛ Honhom Kronkron no," . ɔkra "Ɛyɛ Kristo kra," . nipadua "Ɛyɛ Kristo nipadua! Sɛ yedi Awurade Anwummeduan a, yedi na yɛnom Awurade de". nipadua ne mogya "! Yɛwɔ bi." kristo nipadua ne nkwa kra . Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Asɔre ahorow pii nnɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ Mfomso no da eyi mu → Sɛ yɛmfa Adam kra nipadua no ntoto Kristo kra nipadua no ho kyɛ mu , wɔn nkyerɛkyerɛ ne sɛ →"gye"→Adam kra→sɛ wɔbɛdɔ honam nipadua na wabɛyɛ Taoist; Wɔtow Kristo →"ɔkra nipadua" no gui .

Momma yɛnhwɛ → nea Awurade Yesu kae: “Obiara a ɔbɛhwere ne nkwa (nkwa anaa ne kra) ama me ne asɛmpa no → ɔbɛhwere Adam “kra” → na “ɔbɛgye” ne nkwa → → “ogye ne kra” Efisɛ Adam kra yɛ "abɔde mu" - twe adwene si 1 Korintofo 15:45 → Enti, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔne Kristo yɛ biako na wɔbɔ no asɛnnua mu de sɛe bɔne nipadua no na ɔhwere ne nkwa → Owusɔre ne awo foforo a wɔne Kristo bɛba! Wɔanya yɛ → Kristo "kra" → wei yɛ →" Gye ɔkra no nkwa " ! Amen. Enti, so wote ase pefee? Hwɛ Marko 8:34-35 .

Anuanom mmarima ne mmea! Wɔ Eden Turo mu no Onyankopɔn bɔɔ Adam "honhom" sɛ abɔde mu honhom. Afei Onyankopɔn de wo rekɔ nokware no nyinaa mu denam adwumayɛfo a ɔbɛsoma so → Te ase sɛ sɛ "wohwere" Adam kra → wubenya "Kristo" kra, kyerɛ sɛ, gye wo kra nkwa! Wo ankasa wopaw → Wopɛ Adam kra? Na Kristo kra nso ɛ? Te sɛ → ara pɛ 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Wɔtew papa ne bɔne dua, "dua bɔne" no fii nkwa dua, "dua pa" no ho; 2. 2. Apam Dedaw ne Apam Foforo no yɛ soronko", te sɛ apam abien ara pɛ"; 3. 3. Mmara apam no yɛ soronko wɔ adom apam no ho;4. 4. Wɔtetew mpapo no fi nguan no ho; 5. 5. Asase sofo ne ɔsorofo ntam atetew; 6. 6. Wɔatew Adam afi Adam a odi akyiri no ho; 7. Ɔpanyin no atew ne ho afi onipa foforo no ho → [Akwakoraa]. Akyi nipadua no sɛe nkakrankakra esiane pɛsɛmenkominya akɔnnɔ nti na ɛsan kɔ mfutuma mu; [Obi a ɔba foforo]. Ɛnam Honhom Kronkron no foforɔyɛ so no, yɛnyin bɛyɛ mpaninfoɔ da biara da, a Kristo ahyɛnsodeɛ no kɛseɛ ahyɛ yɛn ma, na yɛne Kristo bom kyekye yɛn ho wɔ ɔdɔ mu. Amen! Hwɛ Efesofo 4:13-16

Enti, ɛsɛ sɛ "onipa foforo" a wɔawo no fi Onyankopɔn → twe ne ho fi, to ne ho, na ogyae Adam "nipa dedaw" no, efisɛ "onipa dedaw" no nyɛ "onipa foforo" → bɔne a wɔremfa onipa dedaw no honam nto "onipa foforo" no so → Twe adwene si 2 Korintofo 5:19 so. → Bere a wɔde apam foforo no asi hɔ akyi no, ɛka sɛ: “Merenkae wɔn bɔne ne wɔn mmarato bio. "Hwɛ Hebrifo 10:17 → Ɛsɛ sɛ wudi "Apam Foforo" no so." "Onipa foforo" no te Kristo mu → ɔyɛ kronkron, onni bɔne, na ontumi nyɛ bɔne .

Saa kwan yi so no, ɛsɛ sɛ "onipa foforo" a Onyankopɔn awo no na ɔnam Honhom Kronkron so te ase no nam Honhom Kronkron so yɛ ade → okum dedaw no nipadua mu nneyɛe bɔne nyinaa. Saa kwan yi so no, "worenka wo bɔne bio" da biara da wɔ akwakoraa no honam bɔne ho, na wobɔ mpae srɛ Yesu mogya a ɛsom bo no mfa ntew wo bɔne ho na ɛpopa. Esiane sɛ maka nsɛm pii nti, misusuw sɛ ebia wote ase pefee anaa? Awurade Yesu Honhom nhyɛ mo nkuran → bue mo adwene mu na monte Bible no ase, . Te ase sɛ "onipa foforo" a Onyankopɔn awo no no nyɛ "onipa dedaw" no dea. . Amen

YOO! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

2021.03.08 na ɛwɔ hɔ

articles.title: Awo Foforo (Ɔkasa 3)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe, nnamfo adɔfo, anuanom mmarima ne mmea! Amen.

Momma yenbue Bible no nkyerɛ Yohane ti 1 nkyekyem 12-13 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Nnipa dodoɔ a wɔgyee No no, Ɔmaa wɔn tumi sɛ wɔbɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma, wɔn a wɔgye Ne din die. Eyinom ne wɔn a wɔmfa mogya nwo wɔn, ɛnyɛ akɔnnɔ anaa onipa apɛde, na mmom Onyankopɔn awo wɔn.

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "Awo foforo". Daabi. 3. 3. Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa". asɔre "Monam nokware asɛm a wɔatwerɛ na wɔaka wɔ wɔn nsam soma adwumayɛfoɔ, a ɛyɛ mo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no. Wɔde paanoo fi soro akyirikyiri ba, na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ berɛ mu, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛn honhom mu nkwa bɛdɔɔso! Amen." .Sa Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn akra no ani na yɛnbue yɛn adwene mu na yɛate Bible no ase na yɛahu honhom mu nokware ahorow → 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa wɔde nsu ne Honhom awo wɔn, . 2. 2. wɔde nokware asɛmpa no awo wɔn, . 3. 3. Wɔn a Onyankopɔn awo wɔn→wɔn nyinaa firi baako mu, na wɔn nyinaa yɛ Onyankopɔn mma ! Amen.

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen.

1. Wɔwoo no fii Onyankopɔn hɔ

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn ne mogya awo, akɔnnɔ awo, ne onipa apɛde awo?
Mmuaeɛ: Onipa a ɔdi kan, Adam, bɛyɛɛ onipa teasefoɔ a ɔwɔ honhom ("honhom" anaa "honam") - 1 Korintofoɔ 15:45.

AWURADE Nyankopɔn de asase so dɔte kyekyeree onipa na ɔhome nkwa home guu ne hwene mu, na ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔkra teasefoɔ, na ne din de Adam. Genesis 2:7

[Hyɛ no nsow:] Adam a wɔde mfutuma bɔɔ no no bɛyɛɛ obi a ɔte ase a ɔwɔ honhom, "kyerɛ sɛ, onipa teasefo a ɔwɔ honam ne mogya → ɔwɔ honam ne mogya nipadua, ɔwɔ bɔne akɔnnɔ ne akɔnnɔ, na Onyankopɔn frɛ Adam "onipa" enti, nnipa nyinaa fi Adam mu Biribiara a efi ntini mu ba → mogya, akɔnnɔ, ne onipa apɛde na ɛwo! So wote eyi ase?

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn na Onyankopɔn na ɔwo?
Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

Mfitiaseɛ no na Asɛm no wɔ hɔ, na Asɛm no ka Onyankopɔn ho, na Asɛm no nso yɛ Onyankopɔn - Yohane 1:1
"Asɛm no" bɛyɛɛ honam → kyerɛ sɛ, "Onyankopɔn" bɛyɛɛ honam, na "Onyankopɔn" yɛ honhom → kyerɛ sɛ, "Honhom" bɛyɛɛ honam na ɔbaabun bi nyinsɛnee fii Honhom Kronkron mu na wɔwoo no, wɔtoo no din Yesu! Hwɛ Mateo 1:21, Yohane 1:14, 4:24

Ɔsoro Agya no na ɔwoo Yesu → Abɔfo nyinaa mu, hena na Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ no pɛn sɛ: Wo ne me Ba, na mewoo wo nnɛ? Wɔn mu hena na ɔkaa sɛ: Mɛyɛ n’Agya, na ɔno nso ayɛ me ba? Hebrifo 1:5

Asɛmmisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na yegye Yesu?
Mmuaeɛ: Yɛgye di sɛ Yesu yɛ Onyankopɔn Ba.Sɛ yɛdi ne nipadua na yɛnom Awurade mogya a, yɛbɛnya "Yesu Kristo nkwa" wɔ yɛn mu! Hwɛ Yohane 6:53-56

Agya Yehowa yɛ Onyankopɔn, Ɔba Yesu yɛ Onyankopɔn, na Honhom Kronkron Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no nso yɛ Onyankopɔn! Sɛ yɛgye Yesu a, yɛgye Onyankopɔn akwaaba Sɛ yɛgye deɛ Onyankopɔn asoma no a, yɛgye Agya Kronkron no akwaaba! Sɛ wo nsa bɛka Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ no bɔ no a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ wowɔ Ɔba "Yesu" a, wowɔ Agya no. Amen! Hwɛ 1 Yohane 2:23

Enti, obiara a onya Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ no bɔ no, ogye Yesu, na ogye Agya Kronkron no! Wɔsan wo "onipa foforo" wɔ wo mu → Ɛnyɛ "Adam" mogya na wɔwoo onipa yi, ɛnyɛ akɔnnɔ, anaasɛ onipa pɛ, na mmom Onyankopɔn.
Enti, so wote ase pefee?

2. Wɔwoo no fii Onyankopɔn (ɛnyɛ ne dea) Adam nipadua mu

Momma yɛnsua Bible Romafoɔ 8:9 Sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom te mo mu a, momfiri ɔhonam mu na mmom mofiri Honhom mu. Sɛ obi nni Kristo Honhom a, ɔnyɛ Kristo dea.

Hyɛ no nsow: "Onyankopɔn Honhom" → yɛ Yehowa Honhom, Agya Honhom, Kristo Honhom, Yesu Honhom, Honhom Kronkron, ne nokware Honhom Kronkron! Wɔsan frɛ no Ɔwerɛkyekyefo ne Ɔsrafo.

Sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom, Kristo Honhom a, Honhom Kronkron no te mo mu! Wɔwo "onipa" bio wɔ wo mu - hwɛ Romafoɔ 7:22. Saa "onipa" yi yɛ Yesu nipadua, Yesu mogya, Kristo nkwa, honhom mu nipa yi. Amen

Wo "onipa foforo" nnyɛ "onipa dedaw" Adam honam nipadua no dea, "onipa foforo" no honhom nipadua a enwu da no muni; Wo "onipa foforo" a woasan awo no no yɛ Honhom Kronkron, Kristo, ne Agya Nyankopɔn dea! Amen

Sɛ Kristo wɔ wo mu a, bɔne nti "onipa dedaw" a ɔwɔ nipadua mu no wu → ɔne Kristo wui nanso ɔkra no bem na ɛnam "gyidi" so na ɔte ase → "onipa foforo" no ne Kristo te! Enti, so wote ase? Hwɛ Romafo 8:9-10

3. Obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no renyɛ bɔne da

Momma yɛnsan nkɔ 1 Yohane 3:9 Obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no nyɛ bɔne, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn asɛm te ne mu na ɔrentumi nyɛ bɔne, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔwoo no.

Asɛmmisa: Adɛn nti na wɔn a Onyankopɔn awo wɔn no nyɛ bɔne da?
Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

1 Na Onyankopɔn asɛm te akoma mu - Yohane 3:9
2 Nanso Onyankopɔn Honhom te mo mu, na monyɛ honam de - Romafoɔ 8:9
3 Onipa foforo a Onyankopɔn awo no no tena Yesu Kristo mu - 1 Yohane 3:6
4 Nkwa Honhom mmara no ama made me ho afiri bɔne ne owuo mmara ho - Romafoɔ 8:2
5 Baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ - Romafoɔ 4:15
6 Wɔahohoro wɔn, wɔate wɔn ho, wɔabu wɔn bem denam Onyankopɔn Honhom so - 1 Korintofoɔ 6:11
7 Nneɛma dedaw atwam;

Wɔbɔɔ "ɔpanyin" no ne Kristo asɛnnua mu → nneɛma dedaw atwam;

"Onipa foforo" no ne Kristo te, seesei ɔte Kristo mu, wɔatew ne ho, atete ne ho, na wɔnam Honhom Kronkron so abu no bem → biribiara abɛyɛ foforo (wɔfrɛ no onipa foforo)!

Asɛmmisa: So Kristofo (wɔn a wɔyɛ foforo) betumi ayɛ bɔne?
Mmuae: Obiara nni hɔ a Onyankopɔn awo no no renyɛ bɔne; Hwɛ 1 Yohane 3:8-10, 5:18

Asɛmmisa: Asɛnkafo binom ka sɛ Kristofo da so ara yɛ bɔne?
Mmuae: Nkurɔfo a wɔka sɛ (Onyankopɔn awo wɔn) betumi ayɛ bɔne no nte Kristo nkwagye ase. Efisɛ wɔn a wɔyɛ bɔne no, wɔanwo wɔn foforo no nni Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ no! Obiara a onni Kristo Honhom no nyɛ Kristo dea.

(Sɛ Kristo wɔ mo mu a:)

1 "Onipa dedaw" nipadua no awu esiane bɔne → Nea "ogye di" sɛ akwakoraa no awu no de ne ho afi bɔne ho - Romafo 6:6-7
2 Wɔade wɔn ho afiri mmara no ho → Baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ - Romafoɔ 4:15
3 Monyi onipa dedaw ne ne nneyɛe ngu → Sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom te mo mu a, monni honam mu bio (nnwuma dedaw no) - Romafo 8:9, Kol 3:9
4 Sɛ mmara no nni hɔ a, wɔnkan bɔne → "Apam Foforo" Onyankopɔn renkae wo bɔne ne wo mmarato bio Onyankopɔn nkae! - Romafoɔ 5:13, Hebrifoɔ 10:16-18
5 Na mmara nni hɔ a bɔne awu (Romafo 7:8) → Wɔnam Kristo nipadua so ayi mo afi bɔne, mmara, ne dedaw ne ne nnwuma ho. Woawu - Kol. Mommu mo ho sɛ mowuwu ama bɔne na mote ase ma Onyankopɔn wɔ Kristo Yesu mu - Romafo 6:11
6 Bɔne nti nipadua awu, na trenee nti na honhom no te ase (Romafo 8:10) .

Asɛmmisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na bɔne nipadua no wu?
Mmuaeɛ: Gye di sɛ wo ne Kristo wuo → nya onipa dedaw no wuo mu suahunu na fa nkakrankakra to hɔ → fa nipadua a awuo, nipadua a ɛwuo, nipadua a ɛporɔw, na akyi nipadua no bɛsɛe nkakrankakra na asɛe (Efesofoɔ 4:21 -22) Adam bɔne nipadua Ɛfiri mfutuma mu na ɛkɔ dɔteɛ mu na ɛbɛsan aba. --Hwɛ Genesis 3:19

Asɛmmisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na wɔn a wɔaba foforo no tra ase?
Mmuae: Wo ne Kristo tra → Onipa foforo (honhom mu nipa a wɔawo no foforo) tena Kristo Yesu mu, na wo mu (onipa foforo no) renyin da biara da abɛyɛ onipa, na ɔrenyin akɔyɛ Kristo kɛse. Sɛ wɔde "ademude" bi gu dɔte anwenne mu a, ɛbɛkyerɛ sɛ saa tumi kɛse yi fi Onyankopɔn hɔ na ɛma Yesu wu no yɛ adwuma na ɛsan nso kyerɛ Yesu asetra → asɛmpa no a ɔka, nokware no ka, na ɛde nnipa bebree kɔ trenee! Nya owusɔreɛ ne Kristo ne nipadua no agyedeɛ mu suahunu. "Onipa foforo" no honhom mu asetra benya daa anuonyam mu duru a ɛso bi nni Sɛ Kristo yi ne ho adi a, wo nipadua nso bɛda adi (kyerɛ sɛ, wɔagye nipadua no), na wobenyan wo fɛfɛɛfɛ mpo! Amen. Hwɛ 2 Korintofo 4:7-18

7 Obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no nyɛ bɔne, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn asɛm te ne mu na ɔrentumi nyɛ bɔne, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔwoo no. 1 Yohane 3:9 , 5:18

Enti, so wote ase?

YOO! Ɛnnɛ yɛrekyɛ "Rebirth" wɔ ha.
Momma yɛnbom mmɔ Onyankopɔn mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Bere nyinaa hyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na bue yɛn adwene sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi ahu na yɛate honhom mu nokware ahorow, ate Bible ase, na yɛate awo foforo ase, 1 wɔde nsu ne Honhom awo yɛn, 2 asɛmpa no nokware asɛm awo yɛn, 3 Onyankopɔn awo yɛn! Nea ɔtena Yesu Kristo mu no yɛ kronkron, onni bɔne, na ɔnyɛ bɔne. Obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no renyɛ bɔne, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn awo yɛn nyinaa. Amen
Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Asɛmpa Wɔahyira so ama me maame dɔfo!

Asɛmpa Nkyerɛwee:

Yesu Kristo adwumayɛfoɔ Onua Wang*Yun, Onuabaa Liu, Onuabaa Zheng, Onua Cen... ne adwumayɛfoɔ foforɔ boa na wɔboa Kristo asɛmpa no adwuma na wɔne wɔn a wɔgye asɛmpa yi di no bom yɛ adwuma! Wɔakyerɛw ahotefo a wɔka saa gyidi yi din wɔ nkwa nwoma no mu!

Anuanom mmarima ne mmaa monkae sɛ mobɛboaboa ano

Mfonini a ɛwɔ ase ha: Adam na ɔwoo no ne Adam a otwa to ( a wɔwoo no fii Onyankopɔn hɔ ) .

Adamfo dɔfo! Yɛda mo ase wɔ Yesu Honhom no ho → Wo klik saa asɛm yi so na kenkan na tie asɛmpa asɛnka no Sɛ wowɔ ɔpɛ sɛ wobɛgye atom na". gye di "Yesu Kristo ne Agyenkwa ne Ne dɔ kɛse no, yɛbɛbom abɔ mpae?"

Abba Agya Kronkron dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Yɛda wo ase Ɔsoro Agya sɛ wosomaa wo Ba a wowoo no koro, Yesu Owui wɔ asɛnnua so "yɛn bɔne nti". → 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa gye yɛn fi bɔne mu, . 2. 2. Gye yɛn fi mmara ne ne nnome ho, . 3. 3. Wɔde wɔn ho afi Satan tumi ne Hades sum no ho. Amen! na wɔasie no → 4. 4. Momfa akwakoraa ne ne nneyɛe nto nkyɛn; Wɔnyanee no da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa → 5. 5. Bu yɛn bem! Gye Honhom Kronkron a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ no sɛ nsɔano, wɔsan wo bio, nyane wo, nya nkwagye, nya Onyankopɔn bayɛ, na nya daa nkwa! Daakye, yɛbɛnya hɛn Ɔsor Egya n’agyapadze. Mommɔ mpae wɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Hymn: Adom a Ɛyɛ Nwonwa

Ma anuanom pii akwaaba sɛ wɔmfa browser no nhwehwɛ - Awurade asafo a ɛwɔ yesu kristo mu no - ka ho na mom bom ka Yesu Kristo asempa no.

Wo ne QQ 2029296379 anaa 869026782 nni nkitaho

YOO! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Awo Foforo (Ɔkasa 2)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa!

Ɛnnɛ yɛkɔ so hwehwɛ traffic sharing "Rebirth" 2

Ɔkasa 2: Asɛmpa no mu Nokware Asɛm

Momma yɛnsan nkɔ 1 Korintofoɔ 4:15 wɔ yɛn Bible mu na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Mo a mosua Kristo ho adeɛ no, ebia mowɔ akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ mpem du nanso agyanom sua, ɛfiri sɛ menam asɛmpa no so awo mo wɔ Kristo Yesu mu.

San san kɔ Yakobo 1:18 Sɛnea n’ankasa pɛ te no, ɔwoo yɛn nokware asɛm mu, na yɛayɛ sɛ n’abɔde nyinaa abakan.

Nkyekyem abien yi ka ho asɛm

1 Paulo kae sɛ! Na menam Asɛmpa no so awo mo wɔ Kristo Yesu mu

2 Yakob kaa sɛ! Onyankopɔn de nokware awo yɛn

1. Wɔde nokware kwan na ɛwoo yɛn

Asɛmmisa: Ɔkwan bɛn na ɛyɛ nokware?
Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

Bible nkyerɛase: "Nokware" ne nokware, na "Tao" yɛ Onyankopɔn!

1 Nokware no ne Yesu! Amen
Yesu kaa sɛ, “Mene kwan, nokware ne nkwa;

2 "Asɛm no" yɛ Onyankopɔn - Yohane 1:1-2

"Asɛm no" bɛyɛɛ honam - Yohane 1:14
"Onyankopɔn" bɛyɛɛ honam - Yohane 1:18
Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ honam, ɔbaabun nyinsɛn no na Honhom Kronkron woo no, na wɔtoo no din Yesu! Amen. Hwɛ Mateo 1:18,21
Enti, Yesu ne Onyankopɔn, Asɛm, ne nokware Asɛm!
Yesu ne nokware no! Nokware no na ɔwoo yɛn, ɛyɛ Yesu na ɔwoo yɛn! Amen.

Yɛn (onipa dedaw) honam nipadua no, Adam na ɔwoo yɛn (onipa foforo) honhom nipadua no, Adam "Yesu" a otwa to no na ɔwoo yɛn. Enti, so wote ase?
Ne mu na wɔde bɔhyɛ Honhom Kronkron no sɔɔ mo ano, berɛ a mo nso mogyee Kristo dii berɛ a motee nokorɛ asɛm, mo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no. Efesofo 1:13

2. Wɔnam asɛmpa no mu woo wo wɔ Kristo Yesu mu

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn ne asɛmpa no?
Mmuae: Yɛrekyerɛkyerɛ mu kɔ akyiri

1 Yesu kaa sɛ, “Awurade Honhom wɔ me so, ɛfiri sɛ wasra me, .
Frɛ me sɛ menka asɛmpa no nkyerɛ ahiafoɔ;
Wɔma wɔn a wɔafa wɔn nnommum no ade wɔn ho, .
Ɛsɛ sɛ anifuraefo hu, .
Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wobegye wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn so no, .
Ahosɛpɛw afe a Onyankopɔn ani gye ho ho dawurubɔ. Luka 4:18-19

2 Petro kae sɛ! Wɔnam Onyankopɔn asɛm a ɛte ase na ɛtra hɔ daa so na wɔawo wo foforo, ɛnyɛ aba a ɛporɔw mu, na mmom aba a ɛnporɔw mu. ...Awurade Asɛm nko ara na ɛwɔ hɔ daa. Eyi ne asɛmpa a wɔka kyerɛɛ mo no. 1 Petro 1:23,25

3 Paulo kaa (wobegye mo nkwa denam asɛmpa yi a mobɛgye adi so) deɛ mede maa mo nso: deɛ ɛdi kan, Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne na wɔsiee no sɛdeɛ Twerɛ Kronkron no kyerɛ no, Ɔsoro nyaneɛ. 1 Korintofoɔ 15:3-4

Asemmisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na asɛmpa no woo yɛn?
Mmuae: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri wɔ ase ha

Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne sɛnea Bible kyerɛ no

(1) Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛsɛe yɛn nipadua a ɛyɛ bɔne no - Romafo 6:6
(2) Efisɛ wɔn a wɔawuwu no, wɔade wɔn ho afi bɔne ho - Romafo 6:7
(3) Sɛ wɔbɛgye wɔn a wɔwɔ mmara no ase - Gal
(4) Wɔade wɔn ho afiri mmara ne ne nnome ho - Romafoɔ 7:6, Gal 3:13

Na wɔasie no

(1) Fa akwakoraa no ne ne nneyɛe to nkyɛn - Kolosefo 3-9
(2) Oguan fii Satan tumi mu wɔ Hades sum mu - Kolosefo 1:13, Asomafo no Nnwuma 26:18
(3) Wofi wiase - Yohane 17:16

Na wɔnyanee no da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa sɛdeɛ Bible kyerɛ no

(1) Wɔnyanee Kristo maa yɛn bem - Romafoɔ 4:25
(2) Wɔnam Yesu Kristo wusɔreɛ so na ɛwo yɛn foforɔ - 1 Petro 1:3
(3) Asɛmpa no a yɛgye di no ma yɛne Kristo nyan yɛn - Romafoɔ 6:8, Efesofoɔ 3:5-6
(4) Asɛmpa no a yegye di no ma yɛyɛ ɔbabarima - Gal. 4:4-7, Efesofo 1:5
(5) Asɛmpa no mu gyidie gye yɛn nipadua - 1 Tesalonikafoɔ 5:23-24, Romafoɔ 8:23, 24 .
1 Korintofoɔ 15:51-54, Adiyisɛm 19:6-9

nti,
1 Petro kaa sɛ, “Wɔnam Yesu Kristo wusɔreɛ so awo yɛn foforɔ ama anidasoɔ a ɛte aseɛ, 1 Petro 1:3

2 Yakob kaa sɛ! Sɛnea n’ankasa pɛ te no, ɔwoo yɛn wɔ nokware asɛm mu, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛyɛ sɛ n’abɔde nyinaa mu abakan. Yakobo 1:18

3 Paulo kae sɛ! Mo a mosua Kristo ho ade no betumi anya akyerɛkyerɛfo mpem du, nanso agyanom sua, efisɛ menam asɛmpa no so awo mo wɔ Kristo Yesu mu. 1 Korintofo 4:15

Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "adwensakra". Daabi. Anan Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea pa [asɔre no] nam nokware asɛm a wɔde ne nsa akyerɛw na ɔka, yɛn nkwagye asɛmpa no so soma adwumayɛfo. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Awurade Yesu nkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mu nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware ahorow. Te aseɛ sɛ "akoma a ɛsakyera" kyerɛ sɛ wɔbɔɔ me ne Kristo asɛnnua mu, ɛfiri sɛ deɛ yɛhunu amane no fata deɛ yɛyɛ! Amen .

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu ne Kristo, a ɔfata adwensakra

(1) Wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu ne Yesu, ɔsɛmmɔnedifo no ahonu

Momma yɛnsua Luka ti 23 nkyekyem 39-41 na yɛnkenkan no: Nsɛmmɔnedifo baanu a wɔboom bɔɔ wɔn asɛndua mu no mu biako serewee na ɔkae sɛ, “Ɛnyɛ wo Kristo no gye wo ho ne yɛn nkwa!” . Esiane sɛ mo nso mowɔ asotwe koro no ara ase nti, wunsuro Onyankopɔn? Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛyɛ, . Efisɛ nea yenya no fata nea yɛyɛ , nanso onipa yi nyɛɛ ade bɔne da. "

Hyɛ nso: Nsɛmmɔnedifoɔ mmienu a wɔne Yesu bɔɔ asɛnnua mu no kyerɛ nnipa a wɔtumi yɛ bɔne. Ka no kɛkɛ → ɛsɛ sɛ yɛyɛ, efisɛ nea yɛ mu ne nea yɛde Yɛ firi" a ɛne no hyia "→Eyi ne nea ɛkyerɛ sɛ wɔbɛbɔ wo ne Yesu asɛnnua mu→". Koma a ɛfata adwensakra ".Wei yɛ" nokware ahonu ".→." "Gye Asɛmpa no di" na nya nkwagye →Deduani no kaa sɛ: "Yesu, sɛ w'ahenni ba a, mesrɛ wo kae me!" Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Nokware mise wo sɛ, ɛnnɛ wobɛka me ho wɔ Paradise.” . "Nkyerɛkyerɛmu-Luka 23 nkyekyem 42-43."

Deduani foforo serewee Yesu kaa sɛ, "Ɛnyɛ wo na woyɛ Kristo no? Gye wo ho ne yɛn nkwa!". Enti, wɔn a wɔnnye nni sɛ Yesu ne agyenkwa no ntumi nnya Onyankopɔn nkwagye → Onyankopɔn daa ahenni ne “Paradise” na → wɔn a wonnye nni sɛ Yesu ne Kristo ne agyenkwa no rennya kyɛfa biara wɔ soro.

Nkaebɔ:

Esiane sɛ wogye Yesu di sɛ Kristo ne Agyenkwa nti, ɔwui wɔ asɛnnua no so maa yɛn bɔne → 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Gye wo firi bɔne mu, wogye di? 2. 2. So wugye di sɛ woade wo ho afi mmara ne mmara nnome ho? na wosiee no, . 3. 3. Wogye di sɛ woayi akwakoraa ne akwakoraa bɔne suban ato hɔ? →Esiane sɛ wɔbɔɔ akwakoraa no ne Kristo asɛnnua mu nti, wɔasɛe bɔne nipadua no. 4. 4. Owusɔreɛ da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa ~ san wo yɛn bio! Amen! Wugye di anaasɛ wunnye nni? Sɛ wunnye nea yɛaka ho asɛm wɔ atifi hɔ no mu biara nni a? Mesrɛ wo bisa w’ahonim sɛ, adɛn nti na wugye Yesu di? →Nsonsonoe bɛn na ɛda eyi ne ɔbɔnefo a odii Yesu ho fɛw sɛ Kristo no ntam? Woka no! Nifa?

Enti, akoma a ɛkyerɛ adwensakra no yɛ nea ɛfata, na saa ara na gyidi nso te. → Ɛsɛ sɛ wosow aba ma ɛne adwensakra hyia. Mma nnka sɛ ɛhia sɛ megye Yesu di kɛkɛ, nanso nnye no nni sɛ ɔbɛgye wo nkwa. -- . 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa bɔne ho ahofadi, . 2. 2. Wɔade wɔn ho afi mmara ne ne nnome ho, . 3. 3. Fa akwakoraa no ne n’akwan dedaw no to nkyɛn. Anyɛ saa a ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na wo ne Kristo anyan wo [ . awo foforo ]Ntama a wɔde aboa nhoma ayɛ? So woahu ɔsram no de besi nnɛ? Nhwehwɛmu-Mateo 3 nkyekyem 8

Sɛnea ɔsomafo Paulo ka wɔ ne krataa no mu no: Sɛ yɛne no ayɛ biako wɔ ne wu nsɛso mu a, yɛne no nso bɛyɛ biako wɔ ne wusɔre nsɛso mu, efisɛ yenim sɛ wɔbɔɔ yɛn dedaw no asɛnnua mu ne no, sɛ nipadua no bɔne ho betumi ayɛ Ɔsɛe, ama yɛanyɛ bɔne nkoa bio; Sɛ yɛne Kristo wuwu a, yɛgye di sɛ yɛne no bɛtena. → Wɔabɔ me ne Kristo asɛnnua mu, . Ɛnyɛ me na mete ase bio, na mmom Kristo na ɔte me mu Na asetena a seesei mete honam mu no, menam gyidie a ewo Nyankopon Ba no mu, a odo me na ode ne ho mae maa me no. Nhwehwɛmu-Galatiafo 2:20 ne Romafo 6:5-8.

YOO! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Adwensakyera 3<Yesu Asuafoɔ no adwensakyera
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoeɛ nka m’abusua adɔfoɔ, nuanom mmarima ne mmaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no mu nkɔ Luka ti 5 nkyekyem 8-11 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Bere a Simon Petro huu eyi no, ɔkotow Yesu nkotodwe so kae sɛ, "Awurade, fi me nkyɛn, na meyɛ ɔdebɔneyɛfo!"...Saa ara na na ɛte wɔ ne mfɛfo Yakobo ne Yohane a wɔyɛ Sebedeo mma no ho. Yesu ka kyerɛɛ Simon se, "Nsuro! Efi seesei rekɔ no, wobɛdi nnipa so nkonim .

Ɛnnɛ mɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na me ne mo akyɛ "adwensakra". Daabi. mmiɛnsa Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbaa pa [asɔre no] soma adwumayɛfoɔ nam wɔn nsa so a wɔtwerɛ na wɔka nokorɛ asɛm, a ɛyɛ yɛn nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu ani na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware → Te aseɛ sɛ asuafoɔ no "adwensakyera" kyerɛ "gyidie" wɔ Yesu mu: sɛ obi bɛgya biribiara wɔ akyi, ɔbɛpo ne ho, ɔbɛfa n’asɛnnua, ɔbɛdi Yesu akyi, ɔbɛtan bɔne nkwa, ɔbɛhwere nkwa dedaw no, na wanya Kristo nkwa foforɔ! Amen .

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

(1) Gyae biribiara

Momma yensua Bible no na yɛnbom nkenkan Luka 5:8: Bere a Simon Petro huu eyi no, ɔkotow Yesu nkotodwe kae sɛ, “ . Awurade, gyae me, meyɛ ɔdebɔneyɛfo ! ”...nkyekyɛm 10 Yesu ka kyerɛɛ Simon sɛ, “Nsuro! Efi saa bere yi rekɔ no, wubedi nkurɔfo so nkonim. "Nkyekyem 11 Wɔde akorow abien no baa mpoano, na afei". gyaw akyi "Ne nyinaa, dii Yesu akyi."

(2) Wɔn ho a wɔpow

Mateo 4:18-22 Bere a Yesu nam Galilea Po no ho no, ohuu anuanom baanu, Simon a wɔfrɛ no Petro ne ne nua Andrea sɛ wɔreto asau agu po mu. Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, "Mommra mmɛdi m'akyi, na mɛma moayɛ nnipa mpataayifoɔ." Ɔfirii hɔ no, ɔhunuu anuanom mmienu, Sebedeo ba Yakobo ne ne nua Yohane, wɔ ɔkorow mu ne wɔn agya Sebedeo resiesie wɔn asau, na amonom hɔ ara na wɔfrɛɛ wɔn. Gya si hɔ "Fi hyɛmma no mu", "farewell" ma n'agya na di Yesu akyi.

(3) Fa w’ankasa wo mmeamudua

Luka 14:27 "Biribiara nni hɔ". akyire Obi ankasa mmeamudua a wɔsoa". di akyire saa ara nso na wontumi nyɛ m’asuafo.

(4) Di Yesu akyi

Marko 8 34 Afei ɔfrɛɛ nnipakuo no ne n’asuafoɔ no baa wɔn nkyɛn ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Sɛ obi pɛ sɛ ɔdi m’akyi a, ɔmpa ne ho na ɔfa n’asɛnnua.” di akyire ME. Mat.

(5) Kyi bɔne nkwa

Yohane 12:25 Nea ɔdɔ ne nkwa no hwere no; tan Sɛ wogyae wo "bɔne nkwa dedaw" a, ɛsɛ sɛ wokora wo nkwa "foforo" no so ma daa nkwa wɔ saa kwan yi so no, so wote ase?

(6) Nsɛmmɔnedi nkwa a wɔbɛhwere

Marko 8:35 Na obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔgye ne kra no bɛhwere no; hwere Nea ogye nkwa no, obegye nkwa.

(7) Nya Kristo nkwa

Mateo 16:25 Na obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔgye ne kra no bɛhwere no; nya nkwa. Amen!

[Hyɛ nso]: Ɛdenam atifi hɔ kyerɛw nsɛm a yɛhwehwɛ mu so no, yɛkyerɛw → Yesu asuafo” . adwensakra "Aane lɛtɛ Asɛmpa! Di Yesu akyi~ nkwa Sesa foforɔ : 1 . 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Gyae biribiara, . 2. 2. ne ho a wɔpow, . 3. 3. Fa w’asɛnnua, . 4. 4. Di Yesu akyi, . 5. 5. Tan bɔne nkwa, . 6. 6. Bɔ wo nkwa a ɛyɛ nsɛmmɔnedi, . 7. Nya nkwa foforo wɔ Kristo mu ! Amen. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Ɛyɛ! Eyi ne me fekubɔ ne me kyɛfa a me ne mo nnɛ no awiei. Saa honhom mu akwantuo yi ne sɛ wɔbɛnyane mo ne Kristo, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛsan awo mo, agye mo nkwa, ahyɛ mo animuonyam, akatua, abɔ abotiri, na woanya owusɔreɛ a ɛyɛ papa daakye. ! Amen. Haleluia! Meda wo ase Awurade!

Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛso nka mo nyinaa! Amen

articles.title: Monsakyera mo adwene | Mamma sɛ merebɛfrɛ ateneneefoɔ, na mmom nnebɔneyɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnsakyera
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea adɔfo nyinaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no mu nkɔ Luka 5 ti 32 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: "Yesu" kaa sɛ, "Mamma sɛ merebɛfrɛ ateneneefoɔ, na mmom nnebɔneyɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnsakyera."

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "adwensakra". Daabi. baako Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Yesu Kristo asafo no soma adwumayɛfo a wɔnam wɔn nsa so kyerɛw na wɔka nokware asɛm, yɛn nkwagye asɛmpa no. Ma yɛn aduan wɔ bere mu na ka honhom mu nsɛm kyerɛ honhom mu nnipa ma wotie, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛn asetra bɛyɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ. Amen! Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu ani na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware → Te aseɛ sɛ Yesu baa sɛ ɔrebɛfrɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnsakyera → Gye asɛmpa no nni na nya Onyankopɔn ba! Amen .

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen.
