Momma yensua Bible no na yɛnkenkan Luka 5:31-32: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Wɔn a wɔnyare no nhia oduruyɛfo; nnebɔneyɛfo ma wɔnsakyera.”

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn ne bɔne?

Mmuaeɛ: Obiara a ɔyɛ bɔne no bu mmara so; . Nkyekyɛm - 1 Yohane 3:4

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn ne ɔdebɔneyɛfo?

Mmuaeɛ: Wɔn a wɔbu mmara so na wɔyɛ bɔne no, wɔfrɛ wɔn "nnebɔneyɛfoɔ".

Asemmisa: Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na mebɛyɛɛ "ɔdebɔneyɛfo".

Mmuaeɛ: Esiane onipa baako mmarato nti, Adam → Sɛdeɛ bɔne nam onipa baako so baa wiase, na owuo nam bɔne so baeɛ no, saa ara na owuo baa nnipa nyinaa so ɛfiri sɛ nnipa nyinaa yɛɛ bɔne. Nhwehwɛmu-Romafo 5:12

Asemmisa: Wɔn nyinaa ayɛ bɔne → So wɔyɛ bɔne nkoa?

Mmuaeɛ: Yesu buaa na ɔkaa sɛ, "Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mise mo sɛ, obiara a ɔyɛ bɔne yɛ bɔne akoa. Nkyerɛkyerɛmu - Yohane 8:34

Asemmisa: Yɛn nyinaa yɛ "nnebɔneyɛfo" ne bɔne nkoa.

Mmuae: Efisɛ bɔne akatua ne owuo "bɔne" di hene na ɛde owuo ba - Nkyekyɛmu - Romafoɔ 6:23 ne 5:21

Enti, Awurade Yesu kaa sɛ: "Meka kyerɛ mo sɛ, dabi! Gye sɛ moansakra a, mo nyinaa nso mobɛyera!"

Asemmisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na "nnebɔneyɛfo" betumi akwati "wu" wɔ wɔn bɔne mu?

Mmuae: "Monsakra mo adwene" → "Munnye nni" sɛ Yesu ne Kristo ne Agyenkwa → Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: "Mo fi ase, na me nso mifi soro; moyɛ wiase yi mufo, nanso menyɛ wiase yi mufo." .

Asemmisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na "ɔdebɔneyɛfo" "nu ne ho"?

Mmuaeɛ: "Gye asɛmpa no di". →Gye di sɛ Yesu yɛ Onyankopɔn Ba, Kristo, ne Agyenkwa! Onyankopɔn nam ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro, Yesu so wui maa yɛn "bɔne" → 1 Ɔde yɛn ho fi bɔne mu - twe adwene si Romafo 6:7, 2 Ɔde yɛn ho fi mmara ne mmara nnome ho - Gal 3 ti 13 nkyekyem, na wosiee no → 3 Ɔpanyin ne ne nnwuma a yɛde bɛto nkyɛn - hwɛ Kolosefoɔ 3:9, Wɔnyanee no da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa → 4 Yɛbɛbu yɛn bem - hwɛ Romafoɔ 4:25 ne 1 Korintofoɔ 15 Ti 3-4

[Hyɛ nso]: "Nsakra wo ho"→"Gyidi"→"Asɛmpa". →Asɛmpa no yɛ Onyankopɔn tumi ma nkwagyeɛ ma obiara a ɔgye di, ɛfiri sɛ ɛno mu na wɔda Onyankopɔn tenenee adi fi gyidie mu kɔ gyidie mu. Sɛnea wɔakyerɛw no: “Atreneefo nam gyidi so bɛtra ase.”

Saa "trenee" yi gyina gyidi so, enti gyidi → "adwensakra" → "gyidi" wɔ asɛmpa no mu! Onyankopɔn bɛma wo". ɔdebɔneyɛfo "Asetra - nam Kristo wu a owui wo asennua no so (deboneyfo, bone honam a woasɛe no) →." Sesa kɔ →Kristo wusɔre no asan awo yɛn sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi abu yɛn bem na yɛanya " onipa trenee " asetena. Eyi yɛ nokware adwensakra, enti awiei koraa no Awurade Yesu kae wɔ asɛnnua no so sɛ, "Awie! "→Yesu baa sɛ ɔrebɛfrɛ "nnebɔneyɛfoɔ" sɛ wɔnsakyera na nkwagyeɛ no dii yie. Ɛbɛdaa adi sɛ woyɛ". ɔdebɔneyɛfo "→." ɛnam asɛmpa no mu gyidie so →Onyankopɔn yii wo dedaw no bɔne asetra fii hɔ→ Sesa kɔ → so " onipa trenee "Ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn ba kronkron a onni bɔne nkwa! Amen! Enti, wote ase yiye?

Anuanom mmarima ne mmea! Monnyinii wɔ Kristo mu, na monnyɛ mmofra bio wɔ akyi, a moahwe ase wɔ nnipa nnaadaa ne nnaadaa nkonyaayi mu, a abosonsom mframa biara atow agu ha ne ha, na moadi atoro nkyerɛkyerɛ biara akyi; mfiase kosi awiei → Tie yiye mprenu na wobɛte Yesu Kristo nkwagye ase → Dɛn ne nkwagye Gye abotiri no, Kristo san ba → Owusɔre a ɔde nipadua a ɛyɛ fɛ sen biara, na ɔne Kristo bedi hene daakye → Ka ho Awurade daa wɔ ɔsoro foforo ne asase foforo no mu Amen!

YOO! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, ɛsɛ sɛ mutie nokware asɛm no pii, kyɛ pii, ne mo honhom to dwom, de mo honhom kamfo, na mobɔ afɔre a ɛyɛ huam ma Onyankopɔn! Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Agya Nyankopɔn no dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Nsɛnnennen a wɔakyerɛkyerɛ mu: Ahonhom a wɔda nsow
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoeɛ nka m’abusua adɔfoɔ, nuanom mmarima ne mmaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible ahorow no nhwɛ 1 Yohane ti 4 nkyekyem 1 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Anuanom adɔfo, munnye honhom biara nni, na mmom monsɔ ahonhom no nhwɛ sɛ efi Onyankopɔn hɔ anaa, efisɛ atoro adiyifo pii akɔ wiase . Honhom biara a ɔka sɛ Yesu Kristo aba honam mu no fi Onyankopɔn hɔ; 1 Korintofoɔ 12:10 Na ɔmaa obi tumi yɛɛ anwonwadeɛ, na ɔsom sɛ odiyifoɔ. Ɛsan nso ma obi tumi hu ahonhom no , na ɔsan nso maa obiako tumi kaa kasa horow, na ɔsan nso maa obiako tumi kyerɛɛ kasa horow ase.

Ɛnnɛ mɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na me ne mo nyinaa akyɛ "Ahonhom a Ɛma Nsonsonoe". Bɔ mpae: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya Kronkron, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea pa [asɔre] no soma adwumayɛfo ma wɔkɔfa aduan fi mmeae a ɛwɔ akyirikyiri wɔ wim, na ɔkyekyɛ aduan ma yɛn wɔ bere mu na ama yɛn honhom mu asetra ayɛ adefo! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa, mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase, na ɔmma yentumi nte na yɛnhunu honhom mu nokware → kyerɛkyerɛ yɛn sɛ yɛmfa nokware Honhom Kronkron nni dwuma → mfa nhu ahonhom.

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Hu ahonhom

(1) Nokware Honhom Kronkron

Momma yensua Bible Yohane 14:15-17 “Sɛ modɔ me a, mubedi m’ahyɛde so, mɛsrɛ Agya no, na ɔbɛma mo Ɔwerɛkyekyefo foforo (anaa Nkyerɛase: Ɔwerɛkyekyefo; ɔno ara wɔ ase hɔ) , na wayɛ mo ne mo daa, nokware Honhom a wiase ntumi nnye no ntom, ɛfiri sɛ ɛnhunu no na ɛnnim no, na mmom monim no, ɛfiri sɛ ɔne mo tena na ɔbɛtena mo mu.

[Hyɛ nso]: Awurade Yesu kaa sɛ: "Sɛ wodɔ me a, mubedi me mmaransɛm so. Na mɛsrɛ Agya no, na ɔbɛma mo Ɔboafoɔ foforɔ a ɔne mo atena daa, ɔno ne nokorɛ Honhom → Nokware Honhom aba." , Ɔbɛdi wo anim akɔ "nokware nyinaa mu" Hwɛ Yohane 16:13.

Ɔkwan bɛn so na yebetumi anya Honhom Kronkron no? → Ne mu nso mogye dii, berɛ a motee nokorɛ asɛm, mo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no, na mogyee no diiɛ no, wɔde bɔhyɛ Honhom Kronkron no sɔɔ mo ano. --Efesofoɔ 1:13. Hyɛ no nsow: Bere a "wotee" nokware asɛm no → wotee nokware no ase, wo nkwagye asɛmpa no akyi → wogyee Kristo dii na wo nsa kaa bɔhyɛ no【 Honhom Kronkron ]! Amen. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

→ Me ne mo adi nkitaho na makyɛ sɛ nokware Honhom Kronkron → Honhom Kronkron ne nokware! → Onyankopɔn yɛ honhom: "Onyankopɔn Honhom, Yehowa Honhom, Yesu Honhom, Kristo Honhom, Onyankopɔn Ba Honhom, Awurade Honhom, ne nokware Honhom yɛ "honhom biako". → kyerɛ sɛ, nokware Honhom Kronkron! Amen. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

(2) Onipa honhom

Genesis Ti 2 Nkyekyɛm 7 AWURADE Nyankopɔn de asase so dɔte hyehyɛɛ onipa na ɔhome nkwa home guu ne hwene mu, na ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔkra teasefoɔ, na ne din de Adam. → "Honhom" kyerɛ honam ne mogya , . "Honhom" a ɛwɔ Adam, adesamma nana mu → abɔde mu honhom . Hwɛ 1 Korintofo 15:45 . →[Onipa honhom] wui wɔ ne mmarato ne ne honam a wɔantwa twetia mu, kyerɛ sɛ, nana Adam a odi kan no buu mmara so na ɔyɛɛ bɔne, na "onipa honhom" wui wɔ ne honam a wɔantwa twetia mu. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Ɔsɛnkafoɔ 3 Ti 21 Hwan na ɔnim sɛ "onipa honhom" foro kɔ soro → Onipa "honhom" sɔre sɛ honhom a ɛgye asɛmpa no di na wɔgye no nkwagyeɛ na mmom wɔn a "wɔnnye" asɛmpa no nni, wɔ wɔn nipadua akyi san kɔ mfutuma mu, wɔn "honhom" wɔ afiase, kyerɛ sɛ, Hades→ Kristo nam so honhom ] Ka asɛmpa no kyerɛ ahonhom a wɔwɔ afiase no, ɛwom sɛ wɔrebu honam atɛn de, nanso wɔnam Kristo mu gyidi so. honhom "Onyankopɔn so tena ase, ɛfiri sɛ "asɛmpa" nkwagyeɛ no nnya nyii adi wɔ tete mmere mu. So wote yei ase pefee? Nhwehwɛmu - 1 Petro Ti 3 Nkyekyɛm 19 ne 4 Ti 5-6.

(3) Ɔbɔfo a wahwe ase no honhom

Yesaia 14:12 "O nsoromma a ɛhyerɛn, adekyee ba, adɛn nti na woahwe ase afi soro? Adɛn nti na wɔatwa wo, amanaman so nkonimdifo no agu asase so? Adiyisɛm 12:4 Ne dua twe ɔsoro nsoromma. A emu nkyem abiɛsa mu biako hwee fam.

Hyɛ nso: "Nsoromma a ɛhyerɛn, adekyee ba" a ɛwɔ wim na ɔtwee abɔfo no mu nkyem abiɛsa mu biako → hwee fam → bɛyɛɛ "ɔtweaseɛ, ɔwɔ, ɔbonsam, Satan" ne abɔfo nkyem abiɛsa mu biako a wɔahwe ase → bɛyɛ " Mfomso honhom , . antikristo honhom "--Hwɛ Yohane 1 Ti 4 Nkyekyɛm 3-6," ɔbonsam honhom , . Atoro odiyifo honhom a ɛho ntew "--Hwɛ Adiyisɛm 16, nkyekyem 13-14," Ahonhommɔne a wɔsɔ wɔn hwɛ "--Hwɛ 1 Timoteo ti 4 nkyekyem 1," atoro honhom "Hwɛ 1 Ahene 22:23," Mfomso honhom "Hwɛ Yesaia 19:14. Enti, wote ase pefee?

→ Ɛhe na[. honhom ] Ka sɛ Yesu Kristo bae wɔ honam mu, kyerɛ sɛ, efi Onyankopɔn hɔ; Papa" honhom "Sɛ wopo Yesu a, wonyɛ Onyankopɔn. Eyi ne." honhom a ɛyɛ antikristo . Hwɛ 1 Yohane 4:2-3 .

Adeɛ a ɛda adi paa ne sɛ, wɔ asɔre bebree mu ɛnnɛ → atoro adiyifoɔ "honhom" kyerɛkyerɛ wo sɛ, sɛ wo "gye" Yesu di akyi a, ɛsɛ sɛ "woka wo bɔne da biara na wosrɛ ne mogya a ɛsom boɔ no de hohoro wo bɔne →." Bu apam a ɛtew No ho no mogya sɛ ɛyɛ ade a ɛtaa ba →Eyi ne Mfomso honhom . "Gyidifoɔ" a wɔte saa no nnya nte asɛmpa no kwan ankasa ase na wɔn mfomsoɔ no adaadaa wɔn. Sɛ wɔwɔ "Honhom Kronkron" wɔ wɔn mu ampa a, wɔremmu "Onyankopɔn Ba no mogya" sɛ ɛyɛ ade a ɛyɛ mpapahwekwa da, woka! Nifa? →Sɛ "wɔawo wo bio" → enhia sɛ afoforo bɛkyerɛkyerɛ wo, efisɛ "srade" no bɛkyerɛ wo nea ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ! Enti, ɛsɛ sɛ wufi wɔn mu ba → "hyɛn" "Awurade Yesu Kristo asɔre" a ɛka asɛmpa no na ɛka nokware no → sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wubetumi: wɔanyan wo, wɔsan wo wo bio, wogye wo nkwa, nya nkwa, nya anuonyam, nya akatua , nya abotiri, na daakye Owusɔre a ɛyɛ fɛ sen saa! Amen. So wote ase? Nkyekyɛm - Hebrifoɔ 10:29 ne Yohane 1:26-27.

(4) Abɔfo som honhom

Hebrifo 1:14 Bɔfoɔ So ɛnyɛ wɔn nyinaa na ɛte saa Ɔsom honhom , a wɔsomaa wɔn sɛ wɔnkɔsom wɔn a wobenya nkwagye no?

Hyɛ no nsow: Wɔwoo Yesu Kristo → Abɔfo de asɛmpa brɛɛ Maria ne nguanhwɛfo no, abɔfo bɔɔ Maria ne n’abusua ho ban ma woguan, na abɔfo baa sɛ wɔrebɛsom no sɛ wɔrebɛgye no; yɛn, na abɔfoɔ de N’ahoɔden kaa ho → ɛfiri sɛ yɛgye asɛmpa no di na yɛte nokorɛ no ase → awoɔ foforɔ ne nkwagyeɛ akyi → yɛyɛ ne nipadua akwaa, “ne nnompe dompe ne ne honam honam”! Amen. Yɛwɔ Kristo nipadua ne ne nkwa → "obiara" yɛ abɔfo a wɔsom. Amen! Haleluia! Sɛ obi nni Kristo nipadua ne ne nkwa a, abɔfo hwɛfo biara nni hɔ. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Ɛsɛ sɛ anuanom "tie yiye na wɔde ntease tie" - sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛte Onyankopɔn nsɛm ase! Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Nsɛmmisa a ɛyɛ den ho nkyerɛkyerɛmu: Onyankopɔn Honhom, Yesu Honhom, ne Honhom Kronkron
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoeɛ nka m’abusua adɔfoɔ, nuanom mmarima ne mmaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no mu nkɔ Mateo Ti 3 ne nkyekyem 16 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Wɔbɔɔ Yesu asu na ntɛm ara na ofii nsu no mu foro bae. Mpofirim ara na ɔsoro bue maa no, na ɔhunuu sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom resiane sɛ aborɔnoma na ɔde ne ho ato ne so. na Luka 3:22 Na Honhom Kronkron baa ne so a ɔte sɛ aborɔnoma, na ɛnne bi fi soro bae sɛ, “Woyɛ me dɔfo, m’ani agye wo. . "

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "Onyankopɔn Honhom, Yesu Honhom, Honhom Kronkron". Bɔ mpae: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya Kronkron, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea pa [asɔre] no soma adwumayɛfo ma wɔkɔfa aduan fi mmeae a ɛwɔ akyirikyiri wɔ wim, na ɔkyekyɛ aduan ma yɛn wɔ bere mu na ama yɛn honhom mu asetra ayɛ adefo! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu ani na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware → Onyankopɔn Honhom, Yesu Honhom, ne Honhom Kronkron nyinaa yɛ Honhom biako! Honhom baako na abɔ yɛn nyinaa asu, yɛabɛyɛ nipadua baako, na yɛnom Honhom baako! Amen .

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Onyankopɔn Honhom, Yesu Honhom, Honhom Kronkron

(1) Onyankopɔn Honhom

Dan kɔ Yohane 4:24 na mobom kenkan → Onyankopɔn yɛ honhom (anaasɛ asɛm biara nni hɔ), enti ɛsɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔsom no no som no honhom ne nokware mu. Genesis 1:2 ...na Onyankopɔn Honhom rehuruhuruw wɔ nsuo no so. Yesaia 11:2 Awurade Honhom bɛtena ne so, nyansa ne nhumu Honhom, afotu ne ahoɔden Honhom, nimdeɛ ne Awurade suro Honhom. Luka 4:18 "Awurade Honhom wɔ me so, ɛfiri sɛ wasra me sɛ menka asɛmpa nkyerɛ ahiafoɔ; 2 Korintofoɔ 3:17 Awurade ne Honhom; na baabi a Awurade Honhom wɔ no, ɛhɔ na ahofadie wɔ." .

[Hyɛ nso]: Ɛdenam atifi hɔ kyerɛwsɛm a yɛhwehwɛ mu so no, yɛkyerɛw sɛ → [Onyankopɔn] yɛ honhom (anaasɛ onni asɛm biara), kyerɛ sɛ, → Onyankopɔn yɛ honhom → Onyankopɔn Honhom tu fa nsu no so → adebɔ adwuma. Hwehwɛ atifi hɔ Bible no mu na ɛka sɛ "Honhom" → "Onyankopɔn Honhom, Yehowa Honhom, Awurade Honhom → Awurade ne Honhom" → Honhom bɛn na [Onyankopɔn Honhom] yɛ? → Momma yɛnsua Bible no bio, Mateo 3:16, wɔbɔɔ Yesu asu na ntɛm ara na ɔforo fii nsuo no mu. Mpofirim ara wɔbuee wim maa no, na ɔhunuu onyame honhom Na ɛte sɛ nea aborɔnoma bi sian bɛtena ne so. Luka 2:22 Honhom Kronkron siane baa ne so wɔ aborɔnoma su mu; nsuo no, na ɔmaa Yohane Suboni hunuu →" onyame honhom "Te sɛ aborɔnoma a ɔresiane no, ɛsianee Yesu so; Luka kyerɛw →." "Honhom Kronkron." "Ɔhwee ne so te sɛ aborɔnoma → te sɛ eyi, [ onyame honhom ]→Ɛno ara ne no "Honhom Kronkron". ! Enti, so wote ase pefee?

(2) Yesu Honhom

Momma yensua Asomafo no Nnwuma 16:7 Bere a woduu Misia hye so no, na wɔpɛ sɛ wɔkɔ Bitinia, →" yesu honhom "Nanso wɔamma wɔn kwan sɛ wɔnyɛ saa. 1 Petro 1:11 hwehwɛ "Kristo Honhom" a edi kan di bere ne ɔkwan a Kristo huu amane ne anuonyam a edii akyi bae no mu nhwehwɛmu wɔ wɔn mu. Gal 4:6 Esiane sɛ wo Sɛ ɔba, Onyankopɔn nti somaa "no", Yesu →". ɔba honhom "Mommra mo (mfitiaseɛ no yɛn) akoma mu na monsu, "Abba! agya! "; Romafo 8:9 sɛ " . Nyame Honhom". Sɛ ɛtena mo mu a, worennyɛ honam mufo bio na mmom "Honhom" no mufo. Obiara a onni "Kristo deɛ" no nyɛ Kristo dea.

[Hyɛ nso]: Mekyeree no denam kyerɛwsɛm a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no a mehwehwɛe → 1 " . Yesu Honhom, Kristo Honhom, Onyankopɔn Ba Honhom → Bra yɛn koma mu , 2 Romafo 8:9 Sɛ" onyame honhom "→ ntena mo akoma mu, 3 1 Korintofoɔ 3:16 Munnim sɛ moyɛ Onyankopɔn asɔredan, " onyame honhom "→Mote mo mu? 1 Korintofo 6:19 Munnim sɛ mo nipadua yɛ Honhom Kronkron asɔredan? Eyi [ Honhom Kronkron ] fi Onyankopɔn → na ɔte mo mu; "Onyankopɔn Honhom, Yesu Honhom, Kristo Honhom, Onyankopɔn Ba Honhom," → kyerɛ sɛ Honhom Kronkron ! Amen. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

(3) Honhom Kronkron Baako

Momma yɛnsua Bible Yohane 15:26 Nanso sɛ Ɔboafoɔ no ba a, mɛsoma no afiri Agya no hɔ, "nokware Honhom," a ɔfiri Agya no hɔ ba a, ɔbɛdi me ho adanseɛ. Ti 16 Nkyekyɛm 13 Sɛ "nokware Honhom" no ba a, ɔbɛkyerɛ mo kwan akɔ (mfitiaseɛ no, hyɛn mu) nokorɛ nyina ara mu 1 Korintofoɔ 12 Nkyekyɛmu 4 Akyɛdeɛ ahodoɔ wɔ hɔ, nanso "Honhom korɔ no ara." Efesofoɔ 4:4 Nipadua baako ne "Honhom baako" na ɛwɔ hɔ, sɛdeɛ wɔfrɛɛ mo kɔɔ anidasoɔ baako mu no. 1 Korintofoɔ 11:13 nyinaa abɔ asu afiri "Honhom Kronkron baako" mu na wɔabɛyɛ nipadua baako, anom afiri "Honhom Kronkron baako" → Awurade baako, gyidie baako, asubɔ baako, Onyankopɔn baako, obiara Agya, a ɔboro ne nyinaa so , ɔhyɛ mu ma obiara na ɔte obiara mu. → 1 Korintofoɔ 6:17 Nanso obiara a ɔne Awurade bɛka abom no, ɔne Awurade bɛyɛ honhom baako .

[Hyɛ no nsow]: Sɛ yɛhwehwɛ atifi hɔ kyerɛw nsɛm no mu a, yɛkyerɛw sɛ → Onyankopɔn yɛ honhom → "Onyankopɔn Honhom, Yehowa Honhom, Awurade Honhom, Yesu Honhom, Kristo Honhom, Onyankopɔn Ba Honhom, nokware Honhom". →Ɛno ne” Honhom Kronkron ".". honhom kronkron no yɛ biako , wɔsan woo yɛn nyinaa na wɔbɔɔ yɛn asu fii "Honhom Kronkron biako mu", bɛyɛɛ nipadua biako, Kristo nipadua, na yɛnom fii Honhom Kronkron biako mu → yedii na yɛnom honhom mu aduan ne honhom mu nsu koro no ara! → Awurade baako, gyidie baako, asubɔ baako, Onyankopɔn ne Agya baako a ɔhwɛ ne nyinaa so, wɔ ne nyinaa so, ɛnam ne nyinaa so, ne ne nyinaa mu. Nea ɛka yɛn ne Awurade bom ne sɛ yɛne Awurade bɛyɛ honhom biako → "Honhom Kronkron". ! Amen. → nti" 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Onyankopɔn Honhom ne Honhom Kronkron, . 2. 2. Yesu honhom ne Honhom Kronkron, . 3. 3. Honhom a ɛwɔ yɛn akoma mu no nso yɛ Honhom Kronkron". . Amen!

Hu sɛ [ɛnyɛ] sɛ Adam "honam honhom" ne Honhom Kronkron yɛ biako, ɛnyɛ sɛ onipa honhom ne Honhom Kronkron yɛ biako So wote ase?

Ɛsɛ sɛ anuanom "tie yiye na wɔde ntease tie" - sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛte Onyankopɔn nsɛm ase! Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Nsɛmmisa a emu yɛ den ho nkyerɛkyerɛmu: Mfiase no, na Tao ne Dɛn?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoeɛ nka m’abusua adɔfoɔ, nuanom mmarima ne mmaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue Bible no nkyerɛ Yohane ti 1 nkyekyem 1-2 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Mfitiaseɛ no na Tao wɔ hɔ, na Tao ka Onyankopɔn ho, na Tao nso yɛ Onyankopɔn. Na Asɛm yi ka Onyankopɔn ho mfiase no. Amen

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ ". Dɛn ne Tao 》Mpaebɔ: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Mmea a wɔwɔ suban pa [asɔre ahorow] soma adwumayɛfo - . Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu ani na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware → Mfitiaseɛ no na Tao wɔ hɔ, na Tao no ka Onyankopɔn ho, na Tao no nso yɛ →Onyankopɔn. Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ honam → wɔtoo din Yesu, a asomafoɔ no tee, hunuu, wɔde wɔn ani hunuu, na wɔde wɔn ankasa nsa kaa → mfitiaseɛ no na nkwa asɛm no wɔ hɔ, na ɛnam "Yesu" so daa nkwa yi adi! Amen .

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Mfiase no na Tao wɔ hɔ.

(1) Tao yɛ Onyankopɔn

Momma yɛnhwehwɛ Yohane 1:1-2 mu na yɛnkenkan no: Mfitiaseɛ no na Asɛm no wɔ hɔ, na Asɛm no ka Onyankopɔn ho, na Asɛm no nso yɛ Onyankopɔn. Na Asɛm yi ka Onyankopɔn ho mfiase no. Hyɛ no nsow: "Taichu" → tete, tete, mfiase, nea ɛwɔ hɔ ankasa Sɛ asɛmfua biara nni hɔ a wode bɛkyerɛ "kɔ akyiri" a, fa "Taichu" di dwuma Mfiase no, na Tao wɔ hɔ, na na Tao ka "Tao" ho " yɛ →【 Onyankopɔn]! Ɔkwan foforo so no, na Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ wɔ "mfiase" no mu! Amen. Na saa "Asɛm" yi ne Onyankopɔn wɔ mfiase→ "Abɔde mfiase, ansa na wɔrebɔ ade nyinaa no, na me wɔ hɔ." . Efi daa, efi mfiase, ansa na wiase no reba no, wɔde me asi hɔ. Nkyekyɛm - Mmebusɛm 8:22-23. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

(2) Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ ɔhonam

Yohane 1:14 Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ honam na ɔtenaa yɛn mu, na adom ne nokware ahyɛ no ma. Na yɛahu n’anuonyam, anuonyam a ɛte sɛ Agya no ba koro no.

(3) Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ honam na wɔtoo no din Yesu, Ɔbaabun Maria na ɔnyinsɛnee no na wɔwoo no fii Honhom Kronkron mu.

Mateo 1:20-21...efisɛ nea wonyinsɛnee wɔ ne mu no fi "Honhom Kronkron" no mu. Ɔbɛwo ɔbabarima, na ɛsɛ sɛ woto ne din Yesu, ɛfiri sɛ ɔbɛgye ne nkurɔfoɔ afiri wɔn bɔne mu. "

(4) Obiara nhuu Onyankopɔn da.

Yoh.

(5) Ɛmmra sɛ asetra kwan bi bɛba

1 Yoh ] puei, asomafoɔ no nso hunuu, na afei wɔdi adanseɛ, de daa nkwa a na ɛwɔ Agya no nkyɛn na ɔne yɛn yii ne ho adi no rema mo! Enti, so wote ase pefee?

(6) Nkwa wɔ ne mu, na saa nkwa yi yɛ onipa hann

Yohane 1 4 Ɔno mu na nkwa wɔ, na nkwa yɛ nnipa hann. Nkyemu 9 Hann no ne nokware hann, a ɛma hann ma obiara a ɔte asase so → Yesu ka kyerɛɛ obiara sɛ, "Mene wiase hann. Obiara a odi m'akyi no rennante sum mu da, na mmom obenya nkwa hann." " Nkyekyɛm - Yohane Ti 8 nkyekyem 12."

(7) Yesu ne Onyankopɔn su ankasa suban

Ɔno ne Onyankopɔn anuonyam hyerɛn, "Onyankopɔn nipasu nokware suban," na ɔnam n'ahyɛde a tumi wom no so gyina nneɛma nyinaa akyi. Bere a ɔtew nnipa ho fii wɔn bɔne mu wiei no, ɔtenaa Anuonyam no nifa wɔ soro. Nkyekyɛm - Hebrifo 1 nkyekyem 3.

[Hyɛ nso]: Ɛdenam atifi hɔ kyerɛwsɛm kyerɛwtohɔ ahorow a yɛhwehwɛ mu so → 1 Mfiase no na Tao wɔ hɔ, na na Tao no ka Onyankopɔn ho, na Tao no nso wɔ [ . nyame ] → 2 "Asɛm" bɛyɛɛ honam, kyerɛ sɛ, "Onyankopɔn" bɛyɛɛ honam → 3 Ɔbaabun Maria nyinsɛnee fii Honhom Kronkron mu na wɔwoo no: wɔtoo no din Yesu! 【 . Yesu 】 . Ne din kyerɛ sɛ obegye ne nkurɔfo afi wɔn bɔne mu. . Amen! → Dodow a onyaa no, ɔmaa tumi sɛ wɔbɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma, wɔn a wogyee ne din di no. "Agyede" → "Asɛm" Yesu bɛyɛɛ honam! Awurade Yesu kaa sɛ: "Sɛ monni na monom Onipa Ba no honam ne ne mogya a, monni nkwa wɔ mo mu. Obiara a ɔbɛdi me honam na ɔnom me mogya no wɔ daa nkwa, na mɛnyane no da a ɛdi akyire no." . → Sɛ yedi na yɛnom" Awurade "honam" ne "Awurade mogya" a, yɛwɔ Yesu "asɛm" na yɛbɛyɛɛ honam nipadua ne nkwa → Yɛhyɛ Kristo nipadua ne ne nkwa → Saa nnipa yi wɔmfa mogya nwo wɔn, ɛnyɛ akɔnnɔ mu na wɔawo no, na mmom "wɔawo no foforo" fi Onyankopɔn hɔ →Saa nipadua a enwu da yi betumi anya daa nkwa ne Ɔsoro Agya no agyapade Amen ?Ti 1 nkyekyem 12-13 ne ti 6 nkyekyem 53-56.

Nkaebɔ: " Nimdeɛ a wonya wɔ honam mu "→." atoro nkyerɛkyerɛ , asɔre nkyerɛkyerɛ pii a ɛwɔ hɔ nnɛ no gyina nokwasɛm a ɛyɛ sɛ wɔde dɔte na ɛbɔɔ Adam nipadua no so, . Fa wo ho to mmara so na woayɛ honam, ma honam nyɛ Tao na ɛnyɛ honhom . Eyi ne nea "honhom mu abran" awo ntoatoaso a atwam no kyerɛkyerɛɛ wo. →Sɛ eyi te saa a, nsonsonoe bɛn na ɛda eyi ne Sakyamuni a ohuu amane na ɔyɛɛ ne nipadua ma ɔbɛyɛɛ Buddha no ntam? Woka no! Nifa? Ɛda adi sɛ eyi yɛ atoro nkyerɛkyerɛ. → Enti tie "nokware asem - na te nokore asem, wo nkwagye asempa no ase! Gye bohye [ Honhom Kronkron ]. Amen! Bere a yɛasan awo yɛn akyi no, yɛde yɛn ho to "Honhom Kronkron" so sɛ yebehu → nsɛmfua a efi "Onyankopɔn" mu no; Momfi wɔn atoro nkyerɛkyerɛ mu → na yɛanyɛ mmofra bio, a nnipa anifere ne nnaadaa akyere yɛn, a abosonsom mframa biara abɔ yɛn akɔneaba, na yɛadi atoro nkyerɛkyerɛ biara akyi;

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Yesu dɔ: dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoeɛ nka m’abusua adɔfoɔ, nuanom mmarima ne mmaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue Bible no nkyerɛ Marko 12:29-31 Yesu buae sɛ: “Ade a edi kan ne sɛ wobɛka sɛ: ‘Israel, tie; Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn yɛ Awurade baako. Fa w’akoma, wo kra, w’adwene ne w’ahoɔden nyinaa dɔ Awurade wo Nyankopɔn. ’ Ade a ɛto so abien ne sɛ: ‘Dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho. ’ Ahyɛdeɛ biara nni hɔ a ɛkyɛn saa mmienu yi. . "

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ ". yesu dɔ "Daabi. nwɔtwe Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea pa [asɔre] no soma adwumayɛfo ma wɔde aduan fi mmeae a ɛwɔ akyirikyiri wɔ wim kɔ, na ɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛn honhom mu asetra bɛyɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ kɛse! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu ani na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware → Yesu dɔ! Ɛyɛ ɔdɔ a ɔdɔ ne yɔnko sɛ ne ho → efisɛ odi ne soro Agya mmara nsɛm so → na ɔma yɛn ne nipadua ne ne nkwa a ɛnporɔw sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛyɛ ne nipadua no akwaa → “ne nnompe dompe ne ne honam honam” → ohu "onipa foforo" a Onyankopɔn awo yɛn → yɛ N'ankasa nipadua! Enti Yesu dɔ → ne sɛ "dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho". . Amen!

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Yesu dɔ ne sɛ wobɛdɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho

"Dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho" kyerɛ sɛ wobɛdɔ afoforo sɛnea wodɔ wo ho no. Ansa na wobɛdɔ afoforo no, ɛsɛ sɛ wusua sɛ wubedi kan adɔ wo ho. Anaasɛ di afoforo sɛnea wo ne wo ho di no, na dɔ afoforo sɛnea wodɔ wo ho no. Nnyinasosɛm a ɛne sɛ "dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho" kyerɛ sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ wotan afoforo, na mmom ɛsɛ sɛ wohwɛ afoforo bere nyinaa. Konfusio kae bere bi sɛ: "Nyɛ afoforo nea wompɛ sɛ afoforo bɛyɛ wo." Wɔ adwene a ɛnteɛ mu no, na Konfusio gye di sɛ akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ nea w’ani nnye ho no, afoforo mpɛ, enti womfa nhyɛ afoforo so. Eyi hwehwɛ sɛ nkurɔfo di kan ne afoforo di, wodwen afoforo ho, na wɔdɔ afoforo ɛmfa ho nea wɔyɛ Eyi ne nnyinasosɛm a ɛne sɛ "dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho".

Yesu kaa sɛ". Dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho "Nokware → Yesu dii Agya no ahyɛde apɛde so na ɔmaa "n'ankasa" "nipadua" ne "nkwa" kronkron, bɔne nni mu, mfomso biara nni ho, nkekae biara nni ho, ɛnsɛe na ɛnyera maa yɛn → saa kwan yi so no, yɛn Ne nipadua ne nkwa a Yesu, ɛyɛ Honhom Kronkron tenabea, Honhom Kronkron asɔredan → Agya no wɔ Yesu mu, na Agya no wɔ me mu → Agya no wɔ nnipa nyinaa mu na ɔte nnipa nyinaa mu → Yesu “hu” yɛn Nipadua na nkwa yɛ “hu” obi ankasa nipadua ne nkwa Efisɛ yɛyɛ ne nipadua akwaa → ne nnompe dompe ne ne honam honam Amen → Eyi ne nea Yesu kae no ase! "?

(1) Agya dɔ me, medɔ Agya

Momma yɛnsua Bible Yohane 10:17 M’agya dɔ me, ɛfiri sɛ mede me kra ma sɛ mɛfa bio. Yoh. 26 Mada wo din adi akyerɛ wɔn, na mɛda no adi akyerɛ wɔn, na ɔdɔ a wode dɔɔ me no bɛtena wɔn mu, na me nso mewɔ wɔn mu.

[Hyɛ nso]: Awurade Yesu kaa sɛ: "M'agya dɔ" me, ɛfiri sɛ mede me nkwa to hɔ sɛdeɛ mɛfa bio wɔ tumi sɛ mɛfa bio.Eyi Ɛyɛ ahyɛdeɛ a menyaa firii "m'Agya" hɔ " ama yɛn anaa sɛ wɔnam Kristo so bɛyɛ wɔn dea. Asɛmpa nokorɛ no yɛ "wɔawo no foforɔ" na ɛwɔ Yesu honam fam nkwa → Wei nti na Yesu bɔɔ Agya no mpaeɛ sɛ: "Mewɔ wɔn mu na wo nso wɔ me mu, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛyɛ koraa." biako, na wiase ahu sɛ wo na wosomaa Bra me nkyɛn na wonhu sɛ wodɔ wɔn sɛnea wodɔ me no. Mada wo din adi akyerɛ wɔn, na mɛda no adi akyerɛ wɔn, na ɔdɔ a wode dɔɔ me no bɛtena wɔn mu, na me nso mewɔ wɔn mu. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

(2) Dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho

Momma yɛnsua Bible Mateo 22:37-40 na yɛnkenkan no: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Fa wo koma nyinaa ne wo kra nyinaa ne w’adwene nyinaa dɔ Awurade wo Nyankopɔn ahyɛde a ɛto so abien no te sɛ, “Dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho.” ofipamfo te sɛ wo ho.” Leviticus 19:18 Mma ntua so ka, na nnwiinwii ntia wo man, na dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho. Mene Yehowa.

[Hyɛ nso] : Awurade Yesu nam atifi hɔ kyerɛw nsɛm a osuae so kae sɛ: "Dɔ Awurade wo Nyankopɔn fi wo koma nyinaa mu, wo kra nyinaa mu ne w'adwene nyinaa mu. Eyi ne mmara a edi kan na ɛkyɛn so. Nea ɛto so abien no te sɛ nea ɛte saa ara, kyerɛ sɛ." , "dɔ wo yɔnko" "Sɛ wo ho". ahyɛde a edi kan deɛ ɔdɔ Awurade mo Nyankopɔn; ahyɛdeɛ a ɛtɔ so mmienu Ɛkyerɛ sɛ wobɛdɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho! Amen. Ɔsoro Agya dɔ Yesu, na Yesu nso dɔ Agya → Efisɛ Yesu di Ɔsoro Agya no apɛde so na ɔde Ne nipadua ne nkwa “kronkron, bɔne, na ɛnporɔw” ma! Ɔde ne ho mae sɛ "wɔmma" yɛn, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛn a "yegye no di", kyerɛ sɛ, wɔn a "yɛyɛ" n'apɛde no, benya na yɛanya Kristo nipadua ne ne nkwa, kyerɛ sɛ, yɛbɛhyɛ foforo no onipa na hyɛ Kristo. Hwɛ Yohane 1:12-13 ne Gal. 3:26-27 → Wɔde yɛn "nipa foforo" no ahyɛ Kristo nipadua ne ne nkwa. →Eyi ne Honhom Kronkron asɔredan ne Honhom Kronkron tenabea! Amen. ; Mesrɛ wo, sua pii Sɛ yɛsan kɔ nea mekae kan no so a [Wɔde bobesa foforo gu nkuku foforo mu].

→ Sɛnea Awurade Yesu ka kyerɛɛ Toma sɛ: "Nea wahu me no ahu agya no; mewɔ Agya no mu, na Agya no wɔ me mu → Efisɛ Agya Nyankopɔn yɛ mmɔborohunufo ne ɔdɔfo! Ɛnam asɛmpa no nokware so." Yesu Kristo ho-"awo foforo" a yɛwɔ , sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebenya Kristo nipadua ne ne nkwa→Wɔ saa kwan yi so no, . Agya no wɔ Yesu mu ne yɛn mu → "Yɛn Nyankopɔn ne nokware Nyankopɔn koro pɛ Nyankopɔn Baako ne ade nyinaa Agya, nea ɛsen ne nyinaa, ɛnam ne nyinaa so, ne ne nyinaa mu. Hwɛ Efesofo 4:6 . →Sɛ Yesu "hu" yɛn nipadua na ɔte ase a, "ohu" n'ankasa nipadua ne n'asetra! Efisɛ yɛyɛ ne nipadua akwaa → ne nnompe dompe ne ne honam mu nam! Kristo dɔ yɛn sɛnea Ɔdɔ Ne ho no! Amen → eyi Eyi ne nokware a ɛwɔ nea Yesu kae no mu: “Dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho.” Enti, so wote ase? Hwɛ Efesofo 5:30 .

Ma w'ani da hɔ sɛ "dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho". Adam, rekyerɛkyerɛ anuanom sɛnea wɔde onipa honam dedaw no bedi dwuma de- Dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho, ɛnyɛ sɛnea Kristo te, sɛnea wɔde nkyerɛkyerɛ ne nsusuwii hunu kyerɛkyerɛ wo → Hwɛ yiye na wɔamfa nkyerɛkyerɛ ne nsusuwii hunu hunu ankyerɛkyerɛ wo, anyɛ saa fa nkyerɛkyerɛ ne nsusuwii hunu hunu nkyerɛkyerɛ, ɛnyɛ sɛnea Kristo te, na mmom sɛnea nnipa atetesɛm ne wiase mfitiase sukuu ahorow te Fa mo nnommum. Wɔsom me kwa efisɛ wɔkyerɛkyerɛ nkurɔfo wɔn mmara nsɛm sɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ. ’” Hwɛ Mateo 15:9 ne Kolosefo 2:8 .

Awurade Yesu ma yɛn ahyɛde foforo [ . dɔ wɔn ho wɔn ho ]. Ɛnam eyi so na obiara behu sɛ moyɛ m'asuafo, "sɛ modɔ mo ho a." Enti, so wote ase?

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Kristo dɔ: ɔmpɛ sɛ obiara bɛyera, na mmom sɛ obiara bɛgye nkwa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoeɛ nka m’abusua adɔfoɔ, nuanom mmarima ne mmaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue Bible no na yɛnbom nkenkan: 2 Petro ti 3 nkyekyem 9 Awurade bɔhyɛ no nnya mmaa mu, na nnipa binom susuw sɛ Ɔtwentwɛn ne nan ase, na mmom ɔma mo ho kwan ! Amen

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ ". yesu dɔ "Daabi. nson Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa [asɔre no] soma adwumayɛfo ma wɔkɔfa aduan fi mmeae a ɛwɔ akyirikyiri wɔ wim, na ɔkyekyɛ aduan ma yɛn wɔ bere mu na ama yɛn honhom mu asetra ayɛ adefo! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu ani na ɔmmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware! Wo dɔ kɛse no ada adi na asɛmpa no mu nokware no ada adi Wompɛ sɛ obiara bɛyera, na mmom wopɛ sɛ obiara sakra na ogye asɛmpa no di - te nokware no ase → nya nkwagye. . Amen!

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Yesu dɔ mpɛ sɛ obi bɛyera, . Nti Ɛmmra sɛ wɔbɛgye nnipa nyinaa nkwa

(1) Yesu dɔ mpɛ sɛ obiara bɛyera

Momma yensua Bible na yɛnbom nkenkan 2 Petro 3:8-10 → Anuanom adɔfo, ade biako wɔ hɔ a ɛnsɛ sɛ mo werɛ fi: Awurade fam no, da koro te sɛ mfe apem, na mfirihyia apem te sɛ da koro. Awurade nnya mmaa ne bɔhyɛ no so, na ebinom susuw sɛ Ɔtwentwɛn ne nan ase, nanso nokwarem no, Ɔtwentwɛn ne nan ase, na mmom Ɔwɔ abotare ma mo, ɔmpɛ sɛ obiara bɛyera, na mmom sɛ obiara bɛba adwensakra mu. Nanso Awurade da no bɛba sɛ owifo. Saa da no, ɔsoro de dede kɛse bɛtwam, na ogya bɛhyew honam fam nneɛma nyinaa, na wɔahyew asase ne nea ɛwɔ so nyinaa.

[Hyɛ nso]: Ɛdenam atifi hɔ kyerɛwsɛm kyerɛwtohɔ ahorow a ɔsomafo "Petro" onua no suae so kae sɛ: "Anuanom adɔfo, mma mo werɛ mfi ade biako: Awurade fam no, da koro te sɛ mfe apem, na mfirihyia apem te sɛ da koro → Ebetumi ayɛ." ahunu sɛ Onyankopɔn ahennie mu no, nkwa yɛ daa Awerɛhoɔ, osuo, yareɛ, ɛyaw biara nni hɔ bio Amen → "Ɔsoro foforɔ ne asase foforɔ" a Awurade hyɛɛ ho bɔ no nnya mmaa mu .Nnipa binom susuw sɛ ɛyɛ akyɛde, nanso ɛnyɛ apɛde Onyankopɔn mma saa kwan yi so nkutoo na mubetumi anya ɔsoro Agya no agyapade Amen! wɔ Apam Dedaw no mu." "→Ɛda no, ɔsoro bɛtwam dede kɛse, na wɔde ogya asɛe nneɛma nyinaa, na wɔahyew asase ne nea ɛwɔ mu nyinaa. Nanso yɛn a "Onyankopɔn awo yɛn" sɛnea ne bɔhyɛ te no, Yɛrehwɛ ɔsoro foforo ne asase foforo kwan, yɛrehyɛn daa ahenni a Awurade ahyɛ ho bɔ no mu → baabi a trenee bɛtena.

(2) Ɛmmra sɛ wɔbɛgye nnipa nyinaa nkwa na wɔate nokware kwan no ase

Momma yensua 1 Timoteo ti 2 nkyekyem 1-6 wɔ Bible mu na yɛnkenkan no: Mehyɛ mo sɛ, nea edi kan koraa no, mommɔ nkotɔsrɛ, mpaebɔ, ntamgyinafo ne aseda mma obiara, mpo mma ahene ne obiara a ɔwɔ tumi onyamesom pa, trenee ne asomdwoe asetra. Eyi ye na ɛsɔ Onyankopɔn yɛn Agyenkwa no ani so. Ɔpɛ sɛ wɔgye nnipa nyinaa nkwa na wɔte nokware kwan no ase . Na Onyankopɔn baako ne ntamgyinafoɔ baako wɔ Onyankopɔn ne nnipa ntam, onipa Kristo Yesu a ɔde ne ho maeɛ sɛ agyedeɛ maa nnipa nyinaa, sɛdeɛ wɔbɛda no adi wɔ berɛ a ɛsɛ mu no. Yoh (anaa nkyerɛaseɛ: bu wiase atɛn; saa ara wɔ aseɛ ha) yɛ sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛtumi afa ne so agye wiase nkwa.

[Hyɛ nso]: Ɛdenam atifi hɔ kyerɛwsɛm kyerɛwtohɔ ahorow a ɔsomafo "Paul" suae so tuu Onua Timoteo fo → Mehyɛ wo sɛ di kan srɛsrɛ, bɔ mpae, srɛ, na moda ase mma nnipa nyinaa! Saa ara nso na ahene ne wɔn a wɔwɔ tumi nyinaa nso, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛn a yɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma no bɛtra ase asomdwoe ne onyamesom pa mu. Eyi ye na Onyankopɔn ani gye ho. →Yɛn Nyankopɔn pɛ sɛ obiara sakra →gye asɛmpa no di na ɔte nokware no ase→Ɔpɛ sɛ obiara nya nkwagye. Amen! Efisɛ asɛmpa no yɛ Onyankopɔn tumi na ɛhwehwɛ obiara a ogye di! Amen. →Onyankopɔn dɔ wiase araa ma ɔde ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro "Yesu" maa wɔn, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a obiara a ogye no di no rensɛe na mmom obenya daa nkwa. Efisɛ Onyankopɔn somaa ne Ba "Yesu" baa wiase sɛ ɛnyɛ sɛ ɔmmɛbu wiase fɔ (anaasɛ wɔakyerɛ ase sɛ: sɛ obebu wiase atɛn; saa ara na ɛwɔ ase hɔ), na mmom sɛ ɔmma wiase no ntumi nnya nkwa denam Ne so. →Obiara nnu ne ho→Munnye asɛmpa no nni na te nokware no ase→Anuanom a Awurade dɔ mo, ɛsɛ sɛ yɛda Onyankopɔn ase daa wɔ mo ho; Amen! Enti, so wote ase pefee? Hwɛ 2 Tes.

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Yesu dɔ: Baby da asɛmpa no mu nokware adi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoeɛ nka m’abusua adɔfoɔ, nuanom mmarima ne mmaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nkɔ 2 Korintofo 5:14-15 na yɛnbom nkenkan: Ɛfiri sɛ Kristo dɔ hyɛ yɛn sɛ, ɛfiri sɛ obiako wu maa nnipa nyinaa, na ɔwu maa nnipa nyinaa, na wɔn a wɔte aseɛ no rentra ase mma wɔn ho bio, na mmom deɛ ɔwuiɛ na wɔanyan no ama wɔn te ase.

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ ". yesu dɔ "Daabi. nsia Kasa na bɔ mpae sɛ: Abba Ɔsoro Agya dɔfo, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea pa [asɔre] no soma adwumayɛfo ma wɔde aduan fi akyirikyiri kɔ soro, na ɔkyekyɛ aduan ma yɛn wɔ bere mu na ama yɛn honhom mu asetra ayɛ adefo! Amen. Awurade Yesu nkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mu nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware ahorow. Ɛbɛdaa adi sɛ Kristo dɔ no kanyan yɛn! Efisɛ yedwene - te sɛ ademude a wɔde ato dɔte anwenne mu no, "ademude" no bɛda asɛmpa no kwan ankasa adi, na nnipa nyinaa nnye nkwa ! Amen!

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Yesu de . te sɛ anigye a ɛma obi nya anigye Yɛn, "Baby" na yɛda asɛmpa no mu nokware adi

Momma yɛnsua 2 Korintofoɔ 5:14-15 wɔ Bible mu na yɛnkenkan no: Ɛfiri sɛ Kristo dɔ hyɛ yɛn, ɛfiri sɛ yɛsusu sɛ ɛfiri sɛ obiako wu maa obiara no, wɔn nyinaa wuwuiɛ mma wɔn ho bio, na mmom wɔn a owui na ɔsɔre maa wɔn. Na 2 Korintofoɔ 4:7-10 Yɛwɔ saa ademudeɛ yi wɔ dɔteɛ nkukuo mu de kyerɛ sɛ saa tumi kɛseɛ yi firi Onyankopɔn na ɛnyɛ yɛn. Atamfo atwa yɛn ho ahyia wɔ afanu nyinaa, nanso wɔankyere yɛn, nanso wɔn abam mmu, nanso wɔmmɔ yɛn, nanso wonkum yɛn; Yɛde Yesu wuo ka yɛn ho daa sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a Yesu nkwa nso bɛda adi wɔ yɛn mu.

[Hyɛ nso]: Ɛdenam atifi hɔ kyerɛwsɛm kyerɛwtohɔ ahorow a yebesua so no, yehu sɛ Kristo dɔ na ɛkanyan yɛn efisɛ yesusuw sɛ esiane sɛ Yesu wu maa obiara nti, owu maa obiara; Amen. Yɛwɔ saa "ademude" yi a wɔde ato dɔte nkuku mu de akyerɛ sɛ saa tumi kɛse yi fi Onyankopɔn hɔ, ɛnyɛ yɛn nkyɛn na wɔtow hyɛ yɛn so wɔ afanu nyinaa, nanso ɛnyɛ sɛ yɛakyere yɛn, nanso yɛn abam mmu; .Wɔantow agu, nanso wɔankum no. Yɛde Yesu wuo ka yɛn ho daa sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a Yesu nkwa nso bɛda adi wɔ yɛn mu. Amen!

(1) Baby da asɛmpa no adi

Dɛn ne asɛmpa no? Momma yensua Bible Luka 24:44-48 Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Nea meka kyerɛɛ mo bere a na me ne mo wɔ hɔ ni: Wɔakyerɛw wɔ Mose Mmara ne Adiyifo ne Nnwom mu sɛ: Nea wɔka fa me ho nyinaa ɛsɛ sɛ ɛba mu.” kaa asɛmpa no wɔ ne din mu kyerɛɛ amanaman nyinaa, ɛfiri sɛ moyɛ saa nneɛma yi ho adansefoɔ nso, monsan kɔ 1 Korintofoɔ 15:3-4, a me nso mekaa mo deɛ no: Nea ɛdi kan no, Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne sɛdeɛ Bible kyerɛ no. na wɔnyanee no da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa sɛdeɛ Bible kyerɛ no.

[Hyɛ nso]: Ɛdenam atifi hɔ kyerɛwsɛm a yɛhwehwɛ mu so no, yɛkyerɛw sɛ "Awurade Yesu" no ankasa kae sɛ: "Ɛsɛ sɛ biribiara a wɔakyerɛw afa me ho wɔ Mose Mmara, Adiyifo ne Nnwom no mu no ba mu Sɛnea wɔakyerɛw wɔ kyerɛwsɛm no mu no, Kristo Ɔno." bɛhunu amane na wasɔre afiri awufoɔ mu da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa, na wɔbɛka adwensakyera ne bɔne fafiri ho asɛm wɔ ne din mu akyerɛ aman nyinaa, ɛfiri Yerusalem. Moyɛ saa nneɛma yi ho adansefo! Amen.

na ɔsomafo "Paulo" a ɔkaa nkwagye asɛmpa kyerɛɛ Amanaman mufo → Nea me nso mekaa kyerɛɛ mo ne sɛ: nea edi kan no, Kristo wu maa yɛn bɔne sɛnea Kyerɛwnsɛm no kyerɛ no, → 1 sɛ yɛbɛde yɛn ho afi bɔne ho, 2. Abubu mmara ne mmara no nnome--hwɛ Romafoɔ 6:6-7 ne Romafoɔ 7:6. Na wosiee no → 3 Wode akwakoraa no ne ne nnwuma too mu - twee Kolosefo 3:9 na wonyanee no da a eto so abiɛsa sɛnea Bible kyerɛ no. →Kristo wusɔre bu yɛn bem! Amen. Hwɛ Romafo 4:25 . Sɛnea Bible ka wɔ 1 Petro Ti 1:3-5 - ɛnam "Yesu Kristo wusɔreɛ firii awufoɔ mu" so, wɔsan wo yɛn bio → "yɛn", Amen! Na yɛanya anidasoɔ a ɛte aseɛ, na yɛanya agyapadeɛ a ɛnporɔ, nkekaeɛ nnim, na ɛnsɛe, a wɔde asie ɔsoro ama mo. Mo a Onyankopɔn tumi nam gyidie so de mo sie no, mobɛnya nkwagyeɛ a wɔasiesie sɛ wɔbɛda no adi wɔ berɛ a ɛtwa toɔ no mu. Eyi ne asɛmpa a Awurade Yesu kaa → asomafo Paulo, Petro ne asomafo afoforo. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

(2) Ademude no kwan ankasa da adi

Momma yensua Bible Yohane Ti 1:1-2 Mfitiaseɛ no na Asɛm no wɔ hɔ, na Asɛm no ka Onyankopɔn ho, na Asɛm no nso yɛ Onyankopɔn. Na Asɛm yi ka Onyankopɔn ho mfiase no. Nkyekyɛm 14 Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ ɔhonam na ɔtenaa yɛn mu a adom ne nokorɛ ahyɛ no ma. Na yɛahu n’anuonyam, anuonyam a ɛte sɛ Agya no ba koro no de. Nkyekyɛm 18 Obiara nhuu Onyankopɔn da, gye sɛ Ɔba a ɔwoo no koro no a ɔwɔ Agya no kokom. 1 Yoh. (Saa nkwa yi ada ne ho adi, na yɛahu, na afei yɛdi adanseɛ sɛ yɛrebɔ mo daa nkwa a na ɛwɔ Agya no nkyɛn na ɔne yɛn yi ne ho adi no.) Sɛdeɛ kronkronyɛ Honhom no kyerɛ no, ɛnam awufoɔ mu wusɔreɛ so, Wɔdaa no adi sɛ ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn Ba a ɔwɔ tumi kɛse. Hwɛ Romafo 1:4 .

[Hyɛ nso]: Mfitiaseɛ no na Tao wɔ hɔ, na Tao ka Onyankopɔn ho, na Tao nso yɛ Onyankopɔn. Saa Asɛm yi ka Onyankopɔn ho mfitiaseɛ → ɔbɛyɛɛ honam, Ɔbaabun Maria nyinsɛnee no na Honhom Kronkron woo no, na wɔtoo no din Yesu! Amen. Ɔsomafo Yohane kae! Ɛdefa mfitiase asetra kwan no ho fi mfiase no, yɛate, yɛahu, yɛde yɛn ankasa ani ahu, na yɛde yɛn ankasa nsa aka. (Saa nkwa yi ada adi, yɛahu, na afei medi adanse sɛ mede daa nkwa a na ɛwɔ Agya no nkyɛn na ɛdaa ne ho adi kyerɛɛ yɛn no ma mo). Bere a yɛne Kristo nyanee yɛn no → yenyaa Yesu Kristo, Onyankopɔn Ba a ɔdɔ no no nipadua ne ne nkwa → yɛwɔ saa “ademude” yi a wɔde ahyɛ dɔte nkuku mu de “akyerɛ” sɛ tumi kɛse yi fi Onyankopɔn hɔ, na ɛnyɛ yɛn hɔ. ...Yɛsoa Yesu wuo wɔ yɛn mu daa, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a Yesu nkwa nso bɛda adi wɔ yɛn mu. Amen! Enti, so wote ase pefee? Hwɛ 2 Korintofoɔ 4:7,10.

YOO! Eyi ne baabi a me ne mo kyɛ me fekubɔ no nnɛ Ɛsɛ sɛ mutie nokware asɛm no pii na mokyɛ pii! Ɛsɛ sɛ wode wo honhom nso to dwom, de wo honhom yi ayeyi, na wode afɔrebɔ a ɛyɛ dɛ ma Onyankopɔn! Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Agya Nyankopɔn no dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Kristo dɔ: ɔma yɛyɛ yɛn Ɔsoro Agya no adedifoɔ
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoeɛ nka m’abusua adɔfoɔ, nuanom mmarima ne mmaa! Amen. Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no nkyerɛ Hebrifo ti 9 nkyekyem 15 Eyi nti, Ɔbɛyɛɛ apam foforo no ntamgyinafo esiane sɛ Ne wu no mpata bɔne a nnipa yɛe wɔ apam a edi kan no mu nti, Ɔmaa wɔn a wɔafrɛ wɔn no tumi nyaa daa agyapade a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ no.

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "Yesu Dɔ" no. Daabi. nnum Momma yɛmmɔ mpaeɛ: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa [Asɔre no] soma adwumayɛfoɔ sɛ wɔmfa aduane firi akyirikyiri mmra na wɔmfa mma yɛn wɔ berɛ mu, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛn honhom mu asetena bɛyɛ ahonyadeɛ! Amen. Awurade Yesu nkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mu nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware ahorow. Kristo abɛyɛ apam foforo no ntamgyinafo Efi bere a owui sɛ ɔregye wɔn a wɔwɔ apam a edi kan no mu na wahyɛn apam foforo no mu no, wama wɔn a wɔafrɛ wɔn no anya daa agyapade a Agya no ahyɛ bɔ no. . Amen! Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Yesu dɔ ma yɛyɛ Agya no daa agyapade no adedifo

(1) Mmabarima nya agyapade no di;

Dane na kenkan Genesis 21:9-10 → Afei Sara hunuu Misrini Hagar sɛ ɔredi Abraham ba no ho fɛw, na ɔka kyerɛɛ Abraham sɛ, “Tum akoa yi ne ne ba no! Isak." Afei dan kɔ Galatifo ti 4 nkyekyem 30. Nanso dɛn na Bible ka? Ɛka sɛ: "Tum akoa no ne ne ba no! Na akoa no ba renyɛ ɔdedifo ne ɔbea a ɔde ne ho no ba."

Hyɛ nso: Ɛdenam atifi hɔ kyerɛwsɛm a yɛhwehwɛ mu so no, yɛkyerɛw sɛ ɔbabarima a "afenaa" Hagar woo no no, wɔwoo ɔbabarima a ɔbea a ɔde ne ho "Sarah" woo no no sɛnea bɔhyɛ no te. Eyinom ne "mmea" mmienu a wɔyɛ apam mmienu → Apam Dedaw ne Apam Foforo no. apam dedaw no →Mmofra a wɔwo wɔn no, wɔde "mogya" na ɛwo wɔn, na wɔ mmara ase no, wɔyɛ "nkoa, bɔne nkoa" na "wontumi" nnya agyapadeɛ no, enti ɛsɛ sɛ wɔpam honam mma;

Apam Foforo →Mmofra a "ɔbea a ɔde ne ho" awo wɔn no, wɔde "bɔhyɛ" anaa "Honhom Kronkron awo wɔn". Wɔn a wɔwo wɔn sɛnea honam te → "Yɛn honam dedaw no fi honam mu" bɛtaa wɔn a wɔwo wɔn sɛnea Honhom → "wɔn a Onyankopɔn awo wɔn", enti ɛsɛ sɛ yɛpam wɔn a wɔawo wɔn honam mu na ma wɔn a "ɔbea a ɔde ne ho awo wɔn" kyerɛ sɛ, Honhom Kronkron → "onipa foforo" no nnya Agya no agyapade. Enti, so wote ase pefee? Mente ase. Amen.

Yɛn nipa honam dedaw no, yɛn awofo na wɔwoo yɛn, wɔbɔɔ yɛn fi mfutuma mu sɛ "Adam", wɔwoo no sɛnea honam te → bɔne awo yɛn, wɔwoo yɛn wɔ mmara ase, yɛyɛ bɔne nkoa, na yentumi nnya ɔsoro ahenni no agyapade . →Hwɛ Dwom 51:5 Wɔwoo me wɔ bɔne mu, bɔne fi bere a me maame nyinsɛn me. → Enti, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔbɔ yɛn dedaw no asu kɔ Kristo mu na wɔbɔ no asɛnnua mu de sɛe bɔne nipadua no na waguan afi owu nipadua yi mu. Ma wɔn a "ɔbea a ɔde ne ho" no awo wɔn → 1 nsuo ne Honhom Kronkron nwo wɔn, 2 wɔmfa Yesu Kristo asɛmpa nwo wɔn, 3 wɔnyɛ "onipa foforɔ" a Onyankopɔn awo wɔn, nnya Ɔsoro Agya no agyapadeɛ . Enti, so wote ase pefee?

(2) Egyina mmara so na ɛnyɛ bɔhyɛ no so

Momma yensua Bible Galatifo 3:18 Na sɛ agyapade no nam mmara so a, ɛnyɛ bɔhyɛ no so na Onyankopɔn de agyapade no maa Abraham. ne Romafoɔ 4:14 Sɛ wɔn a wɔfiri mmara no mu no yɛ adedifoɔ a, gyidie yɛ kwa na bɔhyɛ no yɛ kwa.

Hyɛ no nsow: Sɛnea mmara no kyerɛ na ɛnyɛ bɔhyɛ no mu no, maka akyerɛ me nuanom mmarima ne mmea wɔ nsɛmma nhoma a atwam no mu. Ɛnnɛ adeɛ titire ne sɛ yɛbɛma anuanom mmarima ne mmaa ate sɛdeɛ wɔbɛnya Ɔsoro Agya n’agyapadeɛ no ase. Esiane sɛ mmara no kanyan Onyankopɔn abufuw nti, wɔn a wɔwoo wɔn sɛnea ɔhonam te no yɛ bɔne nkoa na wɔn a wofi mmara no mu ba nkutoo na wontumi nnya agyapade no → "wɔwo wɔn sɛnea bɔhyɛ te" anaa "Kronkronni no awo wɔn." Honhom" yɛ Onyankopɔn mma ne Onyankopɔn mma nko ara na wobetumi anya wɔn Ɔsoro Agya no agyapade. Wɔn a wɔka mmara no ho no yɛ bɔne nkoa na wontumi nnya agyapade no → wɔyɛ mmara no dea na ɛnyɛ bɔhyɛ no dea → wɔn a wɔka mmara no ho no atetew wɔn ho afi Kristo ho na wɔahwe ase afi adom mu → wɔatwa nhyira a Onyankopɔn de ahyɛ wɔn bɔ no mu. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

(3) Yɛyɛ yɛn Soro Agya no agyapadeɛ

Deuteronomium 4:20 AWURADE yii mo firii Misraim, dadeɛ fononoo mu, sɛ ɔbɛyɛ mo ɔman ama mo ankasa mo agyapadeɛ, sɛdeɛ moyɛ nnɛ no. Ti 9 Nkyem 29 Nokwarem no, wɔyɛ wo nkurɔfo ne w’agyapadeɛ a wode w’ahoɔden ne w’abasa a woteɛ mu baeɛ no. Dan kɔ Efesofoɔ 1:14 bio.Saa Honhom Kronkron yi ne yɛn agyapadeɛ ho bɔhyɛ (mfitiaseɛ nkyerɛwee: agyapadeɛ) kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛgye Onyankopɔn nkurɔfoɔ (mfitiaseɛ nkyerɛwee: agyapadeɛ) de akamfo n’anuonyam. Hebrifoɔ 9:15 Yei nti na wabɛyɛ apam foforɔ no ntamgyinafoɔ, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wɔn a wɔafrɛ wɔn no bɛnya daa agyapadeɛ a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ no, na wawu de apata bɔne a wɔyɛeɛ wɔ apam a ɛdi kan no ase no.

Hyɛ nso: Wɔ Apam Dedaw mu → Yehowa Nyankopɔn yii Israelfo fii Misraim na wofii dade fononoo mu, bɔne nkoa wɔ mmara ase → sɛ wɔbɛyɛ nnipa titiriw ama Onyankopɔn agyapade Nanso, esiane sɛ na Israelfo pii “annye” Onyankopɔn nni nti. na wɔn a wonnye nni nyinaa yɛ Bankruptcy sare → som sɛ kɔkɔbɔ ma wɔn a wɔwɔ nna a edi akyiri no mu. Mmofra a yɛwo wɔn nam bɔhyɛ a ɛne "gyidi" → "Honhom Kronkron" no yɛ yɛn agyapadeɛ ho adanseɛ kɔsi sɛ Onyankopɔn nkurɔfoɔ → Onyankopɔn agyapadeɛ bɛgye de ayɛ n'anuonyam. Amen! Esiane sɛ Yesu ne apam foforo no ntamgyinafo nti, wɔbɔɔ no asɛndua mu na owu maa yɛn bɔne → mpata maa yɛn bɔne. paw a wɔadi kan ayɛ "Ɛne sɛ, mmara apam, a ɛnam so gyee wɔn a na wɔwɔ mmara no ase → fii bɔne ne mmara mu → ne wɔn a wɔafrɛ wɔn no kwan ma wɔhyɛn mu." Apam Foforo "Gye daa agyapadeɛ a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ no." . Amen! Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Yesu dɔ: ɔma yɛn ɔba
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoeɛ nka m’abusua adɔfoɔ, nuanom mmarima ne mmaa! Amen.

Momma yemmue yɛn Bible ahorow no nkyerɛ Efesofo ti 1 nkyekyem 3-5 na yɛnbom nkenkan: Nhyira nka yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo Nyankopɔn ne n’Agya! Ɔde honhom mu nhyira biara ahyira yɛn wɔ ɔsoro mmeae a ɛwɔ Kristo mu no: sɛnea Onyankopɔn paw yɛn wɔ ne mu ansa na wɔrebɔ wiase sɛ yɛnyɛ kronkron na yɛn ho nni asɛm wɔ n’anim esiane ne dɔ a ɔwɔ ma yɛn nti ɔpaw yɛn wɔ ne mu no, ɔhyɛɛ yɛn ato hɔ sɛ wɔnam Yesu Kristo so gye wɔn sɛ mma, sɛdeɛ n’apɛdeɛ teɛ. . Amen

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ ". yesu dɔ "Daabi. 4. 4. Momma yɛmmɔ mpaeɛ: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea pa [asɔre no] soma adwumayɛfo ma wɔde aduan fi mmeae a ɛwɔ akyirikyiri wɔ wim kɔ, na ɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛn honhom mu asetra bɛyɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Awurade Yesu nkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mu nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware ahorow. Te aseɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn paw yɛn wɔ Kristo mu ansa na wɔrebɔ wiase no, wɔnam ne Dɔba no mogya so gyee yɛn na ɔhyɛɛ yɛn sɛ yɛnam Yesu Kristo so nnya ɔba. . Amen!

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

(1) Yɛbɛyɛ dɛn anya Onyankopɔn ba?

Momma yensua Bible Galatifo Ti 4 Nkyekyem 1-7 Mekaa sɛ deɛ ɔnya "ɔsoro ahennie" no ne agyapadeɛ no nyinaa wura, nanso berɛ a na ɔyɛ "abofra" no, ɛkyerɛ berɛ a na ɔhyɛ mmara ase na ɔyɛ bɔne akoa →--a ohufo ne mfitiase sukuu a mfaso nni so So wowɔ ɔpɛ sɛ wobɛyɛ ne akoa bio? owura, kyerɛ sɛ, "mmara" ne ofiehwɛfo, kosi bere a n'agya de ama no." Saa ara na ɛte bere a na yɛyɛ "mmofra" na wiase mfitiase sukuu → "mmara" na edi yɛn so. Bere a ɛhyɛɛ ma no dui no, Onyankopɔn somaa ne Ba, a ɔbaa bi a wɔfrɛ no Ɔbaabun Maria woo no, a wɔwoo no wɔ mmara ase → Esiane sɛ na mmara no nam honam so yɛ mmerɛw na ontumi nyɛ biribi nti, Onyankopɔn somaa ne Ba, a bɛyɛɛ Bɔne nipadua nsɛsoɔ a wɔsom sɛ bɔne afɔrebɔ na wɔbuu bɔne fɔ wɔ honam mu - hwɛ Romafoɔ 8:3.

(2) Wɔwoo yɛn wɔ mmara ase, gye wɔn a wɔwɔ mmara ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi anya ɔbabarima

Ɛwom sɛ wɔwoo "Yesu" wɔ mmara ase de, nanso esiane sɛ onni bɔne na ɔyɛ kronkron nti, ɔnyɛ mmara no muni. Enti, so wote ase? →Onyankopɔn yɛɛ "Yesu" a onni bɔne no sɛ ɔbɛyɛɛ bɔne maa yɛn →ɔgye wɔn a wɔwɔ mmara ase no sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi anya mmabarima a wɔagye no ayɛ wɔn ba. →"Hyɛ no nsow: Sɛ wogye wo sɛ mma a, ɛyɛ 1 sɛ wobɛde wo ho afi mmara no ho, 2 wobɛde wo ho afi bɔne ho, na 3 wobɛtwe akwakoraa no afi hɔ." → Esiane sɛ moyɛ mma nti, Onyankopɔn asoma Ne Ba Honhom, "Honhom Kronkron" a ɛkɔ wo mu (mfitiase nkyerɛwee no ne yɛn ) koma mu teɛm sɛ: “Abba! Nyame! Amen. Enti, so wote ase? --Hwɛ 1 Petro ti 1 nkyekyem 3. →Yebetumi ahunu sɛ ɛfiri seesei rekɔ no, wonyɛ akoa bio, kyerɛ sɛ, "bɔne akoa," na mmom woyɛ ɔba, na ɛsiane sɛ woyɛ ɔba nti, wonam Onyankopɔn so yɛ ɔdedifoɔ. "Wwɛn" sɛ woannye nni a "Yesu agye wo "afi mmara no mu, bɔne mu, ne dedaw no mu". Saa kwan yi so no, wo "gyidi" no nni wo Nyankopɔn bayɛ. So wote ase?

(3) Onyankopɔn ahyɛ yɛn ato hɔ sɛ yɛnam Yesu Kristo so benya ɔba ansa na wɔrebɔ wiase.

Momma yensua Bible Efesofo 1:3-9 Ayeyi nka yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo Nyankopɔn ne n’Agya! Ɔde honhom mu nhyira biara ahyira yɛn wɔ ɔsoro mmeae a ɛwɔ Kristo mu no: sɛnea Onyankopɔn paw yɛn wɔ Ne mu ansa na wɔrebɔ wiase sɛ yɛnyɛ kronkron na asodi biara nni n’anim esiane ne dɔ a ɔwɔ ma yɛn nti Ɔpaw yɛn wɔ Ne mu a Wɔahyɛ da ato hɔ, sɛ yɛ, "wɔahyɛ ato hɔ" sɛ ɔbɛfa yɛn sɛ mma denam Yesu Kristo so, sɛnea n'apɛde mu anigye pa te, de akamfo n'anuonyam adom, a ɔde ama yɛn wɔ ne dɔfo Ba "Yesu" mu no. Yɛnam Ɔba dɔfo yi mogya so na yɛanya ogye, yɛn bɔne fafiri, sɛnea n’adom ahonyade te. Saa adom yi na Onyankopɔn de ama yɛn bebree wɔ ne nyansa ne ne nteaseɛ nyinaa mu, ne nyinaa te sɛ N’ankasa ne tirim pa, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛtumi ahunu n’apɛdeɛ ho ahintasɛm. --Hwɛ Efesofoɔ 1:3-9. Saa kyerɛwsɛm kronkron yi ama emu ada hɔ yiye, na ɛsɛ sɛ obiara te ase.

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Kristo dɔ: ɛma yɛyɛ Onyankopɔn trenee
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoeɛ nka m’abusua adɔfoɔ, nuanom mmarima ne mmaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible mu nkɔ 2 Korintofo 5 ne nkyekyem 21 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Onyankopɔn yɛɛ nea onnim bɔne biara sɛ bɔne maa yɛn, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛyɛ Onyankopɔn trenee wɔ ne mu. Amen

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ ". yesu dɔ "Daabi. 3. 3. Momma yɛmmɔ mpaeɛ: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Mmea a wɔwɔ suban pa [asɔre ahorow] soma adwumayɛfo! Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Awurade Yesu nkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mu nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware ahorow. Onyankopɔn yɛɛ nea onnim bɔne biara sɛ bɔne maa yɛn, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛyɛ Onyankopɔn trenee wɔ Yesu Kristo mu ! Amen.

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Yesu dɔ no bɛyɛɛ bɔne maa yɛn sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛyɛ Onyankopɔn trenee wɔ ne mu

(1) Onyankopɔn ma wɔn a wonni bɔne

Momma yɛnhwɛ 1 Yohane 3:5 na yɛnbom nkenkan → Monim sɛ Awurade yii ne ho adi sɛ ɔrebɛyi onipa bɔne, a bɔne biara nni mu. Reference - 1 Yohane 3:5 → Wanyɛ bɔne biara, na nnaadaa biara nni n’anom. Reference - 1 Petro Ti 2 Nkyekyɛm 22 → Esiane sɛ yɛwɔ ɔsɔfo panyin bi a waforo akɔ soro, Yesu, Onyankopɔn Ba no nti, momma yenkura yɛn asɛm no mu denneennen. Efisɛ yɛn sɔfo panyin no ntumi nnya yɛn mmerɛwyɛ ho tema. Wɔsɔɔ no hwɛe wɔ biribiara mu te sɛ yɛn, nanso na onni bɔne. Nkyekyɛm - Hebrifo 4 nkyekyem 14-15. Hyɛ no nsow: Mfitiase ntease a ɛwɔ "bɔne a enni mu" a Onyankopɔn de ma ne "bɔne biara a wonnim", te sɛ abofra a onnim papa ne bɔne. Yesu ne Asɛm a wadan honam → yɛ kronkron, bɔne nni mu, mfomso biara nni ho, na ne ho ntew! Papa ne bɔne ho mmara nni hɔ → Baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ! Enti wanyɛ bɔne, efisɛ na Onyankopɔn Asɛm wɔ ne komam, na na ontumi nyɛ bɔne! Awurade kwan no mu dɔ na ɛyɛ nwonwa paa! Amen. Minnim sɛ wote ase anaa?

(2) Yɛ bɔne ma yɛn

Momma yɛnsua Bible no na yɛnbom nkenkan Yesaia 53:6 → Yɛn nyinaa te sɛ nguan ayera, obiara adan akɔ n’ankasa kwan so; → Ɔsoaa yɛn bɔne no ankasa wɔ dua no so sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a, esiane sɛ yɛawu ama bɔne nti, yɛbɛtra ase ama trenee. Ɛnam ne mpire so saa mo yareɛ. Reference - 1 Petro 2:24 → Nyankopɔn maa deɛ onnim bɔne (a onnim bɔne) no yɛɛ bɔne maa yɛn, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛyɛ Onyankopɔn tenenee wɔ ne mu. Nhwehwɛmu—2 Korintofo 5:21. Hyɛ no nsow: Onyankopɔn de yɛn nyinaa bɔne too Yesu a "onni bɔne" no so, ɔbɛyɛɛ bɔne maa yɛn, na ɔsoaa yɛn bɔne. Enti, so wote ase?

(3) Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛyɛ Onyankopɔn trenee wɔ ne mu

Momma yɛnsua Bible, Romafoɔ 3:25-26, Onyankopɔn nam Yesu mogya ne onipa gyidie so paw Yesu sɛ ɔmfa nkyerɛ Onyankopɔn trenee ɛfiri sɛ ɔnam n’abodwokyɛreɛ so ma nnipa bɔne a wɔyɛeɛ wɔ berɛ a atwam no mu betumi ada ne trenee adi saa bere yi mu, ama wɔahu sɛ ɔno ankasa yɛ ɔtreneeni na ɔbu wɔn a wogye Yesu di no bem. →Ti 5 Nkyekyɛm 18-19 Saa ara na mfomsoɔ baako so buu nnipa nyinaa fɔ no, saa ara na trenee adeyɛ baako so bu nnipa nyinaa bem na wɔnya nkwa. Sɛdeɛ onipa baako asoɔden nti nnipa bebree yɛɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ no, saa ara na ɛnam onipa baako setie so maa nnipa bebree yɛɛ ateneneefoɔ. → Saa ara na mo mu binom teɛ, nanso wɔhohoroo mo ho, wɔtew mo ho, wɔmaa mo bem wɔ Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu ne yɛn Nyankopɔn Honhom mu. Nhwehwɛmu—1 Korintofo 6:11.

Hyɛ nso: Onyankopɔn de Yesu sii hɔ sɛ mpata a ɔde bɛtew wo ho afi bɔne nyinaa ho denam Yesu "mogya" so, Ɔnam onipa gyidi so bɛda Onyankopɔn trenee adi, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a onipa behu sɛ ɔno ankasa yɛ ɔtreneeni na ɔbɛbu wɔn a wɔyɛ gye Yesu di. Adam baako asoɔden nti, wɔn nyinaa yɛɛ bɔne; Enti Yehowa yɛɛ ne nkwagye → Onyankopɔn yɛɛ ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro, Yesu, sɛ ɔbɛyɛ bɔne ama yɛn → sɛ obegye ne nkurɔfo afi bɔne mu na wagye wɔn afi mmara nnome mu → 1 wɔade wɔn ho afi bɔne ho, 2 Bere a wɔade wɔn ho mmara ne nnome no ho, 3 na wɔayi Adam nipa dedaw no afi hɔ. Na yɛagye yɛn sɛ Onyankopɔn mma, na yɛayɛ Onyankopɔn trenee wɔ Yesu Kristo mu. Amen! Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Yesu dɔ: mmara no mmamu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoeɛ nka m’abusua adɔfoɔ, nuanom mmarima ne mmaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no mu nkɔ Mateo 5:17-18 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: "Mma nnsusuw sɛ maba sɛ merebetu Mmara no anaa Adiyifo no afi hɔ. Manba sɛ merebetu Mmara no afi hɔ, na mmom sɛ merebɛma abam. Nokware mise mo sɛ, kosi sɛ ɔsoro ne asase betwam no, jot biako anaa jot biako mpo rentwa." twam fi Mmara no ho .

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ ". Yesu dɔ ma mmara no ba mu 》Mpaebɔ: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea pa [asɔre] no soma adwumayɛfo ma wɔde aduan fi akyirikyiri kɔ soro, na ɔkyekyɛ aduan ma yɛn wɔ bere mu na ama yɛn honhom mu asetra ayɛ adefo! Amen. Bɔ mpaeɛ sɛ Awurade Yesu bɛkɔ so ahyerɛn yɛn honhom mu ani na wabue yɛn adwene mu ama yɛate Bible no ase sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahunu honhom mu nokorɛ na yɛate aseɛ sɛ Yesu dɔ ma mmara no di mu na ɛma Kristo mmara no yɛ pɛ. Amen

! Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Yesu dɔ ma mmara no ba mu na ɛma ɛba mu

[Encyclopedia Nkyerɛaseɛ].

Nea edi mũ: mfitiase ntease ne pɛyɛ, a ɛboa nkurɔfo ma wohu wɔn apɛde

Complete: edi mũ, di mũ, ɛyɛ pɛ, di mũ.

【Bible Nkyerɛase】

(1) Yesu dɔ ma mmara no ‘ma mu’: Onyankopɔn nni fɔ, . ma Yɛbɛyɛɛ bɔne efisɛ obiara ayɛ bɔne → bɔne akatua ne owu → na esiane sɛ Yesu wu maa obiara nti, wɔn nyinaa wuwui. Saa kwan yi so no, wontumi nyi mmara no mu nkyerɛwde biako anaa tittle biako mpo mfi hɔ esiane Yesu " " . te sɛ "Mmara no abam. Wote ase pefee?

(2) . Yesu dɔ "ma" mmara no ba mu: Efisɛ obiara a ɔdɔ afoforo no ama mmara no abam → Onyankopɔn dɔ wiase araa ma ɔde ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro a ne din de Yesu mae maa obiara a ogye no di → 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa bɔne ho ahofadi, . 2. 2. wɔade wɔn ho afi mmara no ho, . 3. 3. Fa akwakoraa no to nkyɛn, . 4. 4. Momfa "onipa foforo" no nhyɛ na mohyɛ Kristo →fa yɛn "onipa foforo" a Onyankopɔn awo yɛn no kɔ ne Dɔba no ahenni mu. Saa kwan yi so no, yɛremmu mmara no so, mmara biako mpo → Yesu dɔ → ne ɔdɔ a ɛne sɛ "dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho"! Efisɛ Ɔmaa yɛn ne nipadua ne ne nkwa a "ɛmporɔw"! Amen. Enti Yesu dɔ "wie" mmara no . Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Momma yensua Bible no na yɛne no nkenkan Mateo 5:17-18 sɛ: “Mommma momma sɛ merebɛsɛe Mmara no anaa Adiyifo no. na mmom sɛ mɛma aba mu nokorɛ, mese mo sɛ, ɔsoro ne asaase so mpo Ne nyinaa ayera, mmara no mu nsensaneeɛ baako mpo rentwam, kɔsi sɛ ne nyinaa bɛba mu.

[Hyɛ nso]: Efisɛ wɔn nyinaa ayɛ bɔne na wɔatɔ Onyankopɔn anuonyam - hwɛ Romafo 3:23 → Bɔne akatua ne owu - twe adwene si Romafo 6 23 → "Hyɛ no nsow: Sɛ Onyankopɔn ansoma ne Ba koro Yesu sɛ ɔmmɛgye yɛn nkwa a, . yɛn Nyinaa bɛhyɛ mmara no atemmuo a ɛtene ase."→ Onyankopɔn dɔ wiase saa. "Awurade na ɔyɛɛ ne nkwagyeɛ--Dwom 98:2"→ "Ɔde ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro no maa wɔn, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a obiara a ɔgye no di rensɛe." , na mmom wobenya daa nkwa. --Hwɛ Yohane 3:16 → Onyankopɔn maa nea na onnim bɔne (mfitiase nkyerɛwee kyerɛ sɛ onnim bɔne biara) yɛɛ bɔne maa yɛn --Hwɛ 2 Korintofo 5:21 → Awurade bɛpopa nnipa nyinaa bɔne nnipa" → wawu Wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho firi bɔne, mmara ne nnome ho - twe adwene si Romafoɔ 6:7 ne Gal 3:13 → gye wɔn a wɔhyɛ mmara ase sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛnya Onyankopɔn ba! Amen- - Hwɛ Plus ti 4 nkyekyem 4-7.

Eyi ne nea Yesu kae: “Monnsusuw sɛ maba sɛ merebɛsɛe Mmara no anaa Adiyifo no.” Mamma sɛ merebɛsɛe, na mmom sɛ mɛyɛ pɛ. Nokorɛ mise mo sɛ, kɔsi sɛ ɔsoro ne asase bɛtwa mu no, nwoma baako anaa nwoma baako mpo rentwa mfi mmara no ho kɔsi sɛ ne nyinaa bɛba mu. nti Yesu dɔ ma mmara no ba mu . Amen! Saa kwan yi so no, so wote ase pefee? --Hwɛ Mateo 5:17-18

Momma yensua Romafo ti 13 nkyekyem 8-10 na yɛne no nkenkan: Mommfa biribiara ka obiara gye sɛ mobɛdɔ mo ho mo ho, na mommu no sɛ ɛka bere nyinaa, efisɛ nea ɔdɔ ne yɔnko no adi mmara no so. Sɛ nhwɛso no, mmara nsɛm te sɛ "Nsɛe aware, Nkum, Nwia ade, Mma w'ani bere", ne mmara nsɛm afoforo nyinaa abɔ mu wɔ kasamu yi mu: "Dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho." Ɔdɔ mpira afoforo, enti ɔdɔ ma mmara no ba mu.

[Hyɛ nso]: Ɛnyɛ sɛ yɛdɔ Onyankopɔn, na mmom Onyankopɔn dɔ yɛn na ɔsomaa ne Ba sɛ ɔmmɛyɛ yɛn bɔne mpata. .

Twe 1 Yohane 4:10 → Sɛnea ne mmɔborɔhunu kɛseɛ teɛ no, ɔnam Yesu Kristo wusɔreɛ so asan awo yɛn foforɔ → 1 afiri bɔne mu, 2 afiri mmara mu, 3 yi onipa dedaw no ngu, 4 hyɛ" Foforo no onipa "hyɛ Kristo" → Obiara a Onyankopɔn awo no no nyɛ bɔne, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn asɛm te ne mu, ɔrentumi nyɛ bɔne, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔwoo no. Hwɛ 1 Yohane ti 3 nkyekyem 9 ne 1 Petro ti 1 nkyekyem 3 → Onyankopɔn ayi yɛn, “nnipa foforo a Onyankopɔn awo wɔn,” akɔ ne Dɔba no ahenni mu. Reference - Kolosefoɔ 1:13 Baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ. Saa kwan yi so no, yɛremmu mmara ne bɔne so, na sɛ bɔne nni hɔ a, wɔremmu yɛn atɛn.

--Hwɛ 1 Petro ti 1 nkyekyem 3. Yesu dɔ → ne ɔdɔ a ɛne sɛ "dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho"! Efisɛ Ɔmaa yɛn ne nipadua ne nkwa a bɔne nni mu, kronkron, na ɛnporɔw, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebetumi anya Kristo nkwa na yɛanya daa nkwa! Saa kwan yi so no, yɛyɛ ne nnompe dompe, ne ne honam honam → n’ankasa nipadua ne n’asetra Enti, ɔdɔ kɛse a Yesu dɔ yɛn ne sɛ "wobɛdɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho" sɛnea wodɔ w'ankasa wo nipadua no. Amen! So wote ase? Yesu dɔ ma mmara no ba mu na ɛma ɛba mu. Amen! Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Kristo dɔ: Onyankopɔn ne ɔdɔ
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoeɛ nka m’abusua adɔfoɔ, nuanom mmarima ne mmaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nkɔ 1 Yohane ti 4 nkyekyem 7-8 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Anuanom adɔfo, ɛsɛ sɛ yɛdɔ yɛn ho yɛn ho, efisɛ ɔdɔ fi Onyankopɔn hɔ. Obiara a ɔdɔ no, Onyankopɔn awo no na ɔnim Onyankopɔn. Deɛ ɔnnɔ ɔdɔ no nnim Onyankopɔn, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn yɛ ɔdɔ .

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛbom asua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ "Onyankopɔn ne Ɔdɔ". Bɔ mpae: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya Kronkron, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea pa [asɔre] no soma adwumayɛfo ma wɔde aduan fi akyirikyiri kɔ soro, na ɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛsɛ mu, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛn honhom mu asetra bɛyɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ kɛse! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware, efisɛ ɔdɔ fi Onyankopɔn hɔ, na obiara a ɔdɔ no, Onyankopɔn awo no na onim Onyankopɔn. Onyankopɔn dɔ yɛn, na yenim na yegye di. Onyankopɔn yɛ ɔdɔ, deɛ ɔtena ɔdɔ mu no tena Onyankopɔn mu, na Onyankopɔn tena ne mu. Amen!

Mpaebɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Yesu Kristo Dɔ: Onyankopɔn ne Ɔdɔ

Momma yensua 1 Yohane 4:7-10 wɔ Bible mu na yɛnbom nkenkan: Onua dɔfo, . Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛdɔ yɛn ho yɛn ho efisɛ ɔdɔ fi Onyankopɔn hɔ . Obiara a ɔdɔ no, Onyankopɔn awo no na ɔnim Onyankopɔn. Deɛ ɔnnɔ ɔdɔ no nnim Onyankopɔn, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn yɛ ɔdɔ. Onyankopɔn somaa ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro no baa wiase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛnam ne so bɛtra ase, Onyankopɔn dɔ a ɔwɔ ma yɛn no da adi wɔ eyi mu. Ɛnyɛ sɛ yɛdɔ Onyankopɔn, na mmom Onyankopɔn dɔ yɛn na ɔsomaa ne Ba sɛ ɔmmɛyɛ yɛn bɔne mpata.

[Hyɛ nso] : Ɛdenam atifi hɔ kyerɛwsɛm a ɔsomafo Yohane hwehwɛɛ mu no so kae sɛ: "Anuanom adɔfo, ɛsɛ sɛ yɛdɔ yɛn ho yɛn ho, →_→ efisɛ "ɔdɔ" fi Onyankopɔn hɔ; emfi Adam a wɔde dɔte bɔɔ no no hɔ. Na Adam fi ɔhonam mu." na na akɔnnɔ bɔne ne akɔnnɔ bɔne →_→ te sɛ awaresɛe, efĩ, ahohwibra, abosonsom, nkonyaayi, nitan, ntawntawdi, ahoɔyaw, abufuw a ɛyɛ hu, akuw, mpaapaemu, atoro atoro, ahoɔyaw, asabow, ahohwibra Apontow, ne nea ɛkeka ho ahyɛ no ma Mekae mo kane na mereka akyerɛ mo seesei sɛ wɔn a wɔyɛ saa nneɛma no rennya Onyankopɔn ahennie - Gal.

Enti na ɔdɔ biara nni Adam mu, atoro - nyaatwom dɔ nko ara. Onyankopɔn dɔ ne sɛ: Onyankopɔn somaa ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro "Yesu" baa wiase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛfa ne so →_→ ɛnam Yesu Kristo a owui wɔ dua no so maa yɛn bɔne na wosiee no da a ɛto so abiɛsa a wonyan no! Amen. Yesu Kristo wusɔreɛ afiri awufoɔ mu →_→ san wo yɛn foforɔ, enti ɛnyɛ Adam na wɔawo yɛn, ɛnyɛ honam fam awofoɔ →_→ na mmom 1 nsuo ne Honhom na wɔwoo yɛn, 2 Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no gyidie na ɛwo yɛn , 3 Onyankopɔn na ɔwoo wɔn. Amen! Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Onyankopɔn dɔ a ɔwɔ ma yɛn no da adi wɔ ha. Ɛnyɛ sɛ yɛdɔ Onyankopɔn, →_→ na mmom Onyankopɔn dɔ yɛn na ɔsomaa ne Ba sɛ ɔmmɛyɛ yɛn bɔne mpata. Nkyekyɛm--Yohane 4 nkyekyem 9-10.

Onyankopɔn ma yɛn Ne Honhom ("Honhom" kyerɛ Honhom Kronkron), na efi saa bere no yɛhu sɛ yɛte ne mu na Ɔtena yɛn mu. Agya no somaa Ɔba no sɛ ɔmmɛyɛ wiase Agyenkwa; Obiara a ogye tom sɛ Yesu yɛ Onyankopɔn Ba no, Onyankopɔn te ne mu, na ɔtena Onyankopɔn mu. (Sɛnea wɔatwerɛ no - Awurade Yesu kaa sɛ! Mewɔ Agya no mu na Agya no wɔ me mu → Sɛ yɛtena Kristo mu a, kyerɛ sɛ, wɔsan wo yɛn bio na wonyan yɛn sɛ "nnipa foforo" a Kristo nipadua ne ne nkwa wom → Agya no tena me mu Amen wote ase pefee?

Onyankopɔn dɔ yɛn, yenim na yegye di . onyame ne ɔdɔ Nea ɔtena ɔdɔ mu no tena Onyankopɔn mu, na Onyankopɔn tena ne mu. Saa kwan yi so no, ɔdɔ bɛyɛ pɛ wɔ yɛn mu, na yɛanya ahotoso wɔ atemmu da no mu. Efisɛ sɛnea Ɔte no, saa ara na yɛn nso yɛwɔ wiase yi mu. →_→ Esiane sɛ wɔasan awo yɛn na wɔanyan yɛn nti, "onipa foforo" no yɛ Kristo nipadua no fã, "ne nnompe mu dompe ne ne honam honam." Enti yenni suro biara wɔ "saa da no" →_→ Sɛnea ɔte no, saa ara na yɛn nso yɛwɔ wiase. Amen! Enti, so wote ase pefee? Nkyekyɛm—1 Yohane 4:13-17.

Hymn: Onyankopɔn ne ɔdɔ

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

articles.title: Nsɛmmisa a emu yɛ den ho nkyerɛkyerɛmu: Awaresɛefo ahorow abiɛsa wɔ Bible mu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka anuanom mmarima ne mmea nyinaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nkɔ Adiyisɛm Ti 17 Nkyekyɛm 1-2 Abɔfoɔ baason a na wɔwɔ nkuruwa nson no mu baako baa me nkyɛn bɛkaa sɛ, “Bra ha, na mɛkyerɛ wo asotweɛ a wɔde bɛma aguaman kɛseɛ a ɔte nsuo no so, a asase so ahene ne no bɔɔ awaresɛeɛ. , wɔn a tena asase so na wɔnom n’adwamammɔ bobesa . "

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ ". Nguaman Ahorow Abiɛsa a Wɔwɔ Bible Mu 》Mpaebɔ: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa [asɔre no] soma adwumayɛfo ma wɔkɔfa aduan fi mmeae a ɛwɔ akyirikyiri wɔ wim, na ɔkyekyɛ aduan ma yɛn wɔ bere mu na ama yɛn honhom mu asetra ayɛ adefo! Amen. Awurade Yesu nkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mu nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware ahorow. Te "nguaman" ahorow abiɛsa a wɔaka wɔn ho asɛm wɔ Bible mu no ase na kyerɛkyerɛ Onyankopɔn mma sɛ wɔntwe wɔn ho mfi Babilon aguaman no asɔre no ho .

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

Adwaman a odi kan

---Asɔre a ɛne Asase so Hene no ayɛ biako---

Momma yɛnsua Bible wɔ Adiyisɛm 17:1-6 Abɔfoɔ baason a na wɔwɔ nkuruwa nson no mu baako baa me nkyɛn bɛkaa sɛ, “Bra ha, na mɛkyerɛ wo aguaman kɛseɛ a ɔte nsuo so no asotwe mo asase no so.” Bere a mihuu no no, ɛyɛɛ me nwonwa kɛse. Hyɛ no nsow: Asɔre a asase hene ne asɔre no ne amammuisɛm ne nyamesom bom → ne "ahintasɛm"! Abɔnten so no, "Kristofo Asɔre" no wɔ hɔ, na wuntumi nhu nokware no mfi atoro no mu na wɔfrɛ no "ahintasɛm" → Nanso mu no, asase so ahene ne "ɔno" reyɛ awaresɛe, asɔre no, ne wɔn reyɛ biako wɔn ho wɔn ho, de wiase nnyinasosɛm ne nnipa nyansapɛ di dwuma, na wonni akyi Kristo nkyerɛkyerɛ no sɛnea nnipa atetesɛm te → "Asɔre" yi ne ahintasɛm - Babilon aguaman asɔre Ɔkɛseɛ no.

Adwaman a ɔto so abien

---Wiase nnamfo---

Yakobo Ti 4 Nkyekyɛm 4 Mo awaresɛefoɔ, munnim sɛ wiase adamfofa yɛ Onyankopɔn ntam nitan? Enti, obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔyɛ wiase adamfo no yɛ Onyankopɔn tamfo Hwɛ Gal.

[Hyɛ nso]: Awaresɛefoɔ a ɔdi kan no yɛ mmerɛ sɛ wɔbɛhunu no, kyerɛ sɛ, asɔre no ne asase hene no ne wɔn ho wɔn ho ayɛ apam ama wɔn ho wɔn ho anya mfasoɔ wɔ abɔnten so no, ɔhyɛ "Kristo" asɔre no din, nanso wɔ ne mu no ɔne ɔhene no bɔ aware, na ɔteɛm sɛ "Yesu" wɔ n'anom, nanso nokwarem no ne ti ne ne tumi ne ɔhene . Wɔ wiase asɔre dodow no ara mu no, nnipa pii anom n’aguamammɔ bobesa, a ɛyɛ wiase no Konfusio Foforo ne mfomso a ɛdaadaa nkurɔfo Eyi kyerɛ sɛ asɔre no ka wiase nyansapɛ ahorow, Konfusio Foforo, te sɛ Taosom, Konfusiosom, Buddhasom bom ne afoforo nso de nsusuwii ne nkyerɛkyerɛ a ɛho tew na ɛnfrafra ba asɔre no mu. Nnipa pii anya awaresɛefo asɛm ne ahonhommɔne ahonhom, ahonhommɔne a akyide “na” awo wɔn. Na wɔn nyinaa bow nsa wɔ hɔ, na na wonnim nokware no;

Ɔwaresɛefoɔ a ɔtɔ so mmienu no yɛ wiase adamfo, te sɛ abosonsomfoɔ, abayifoɔ, awaresɛeɛ, efĩ, asabofoɔ, ahodwirideɛ, ne nea ɛkeka ho a wɔwɔ ɔdɔ ma wiase no, wowia, wokum, wobɔ awaresɛeɛ, woka ntam atoro, na wohyew aduhuam Baal. , na wodii anyame foforo a wonnim akyi - twe adwene si Yeremia 7:9 so.

Adwaman a ɔto so abiɛsa

---Egyina mmara a wodi so--- .

( 1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa ) . Mmara no di nnipa so bere a wote ase

Romafo Ti 7 Nkyem 1 Afei anuanom, a mote mmara ase, mise mo se, Munnim sɛ mmara di onipa so bere a ɔte ase?

[Hyɛ nso]: Wei kyerε sε - berε a na yεyε honam mu no, na watɔn yεn ama bεne dedaw - twe adwene si Romafo Ti 7:14 → Enti, bere a yεn honam te ase, εne sε, "bεne nipadua" no da so te ase no, wכkyekyere yεn na mmara no bɔ ho ban - Gal. 3 Ti 22 - Nkyekyɛm 23, efisɛ bɔne tumi ne mmara, bere tenten a yɛte ase, kyerɛ sɛ, bere tenten a "nnebɔneyɛfo" te ase no, mmara no di yɛn so na ɛto yɛn ano hye. Enti, so wote ase?

( 2. 2. ) . Wɔde abusuabɔ a ɛda bɔne ne mmara ntam no "toto" ɔbea ne ne kunu ntam abusuabɔ ho

Romafoɔ 7:2-3 Sɛdeɛ ɔbaa wɔ kunu no, mmara no kyekyere no berɛ dodoɔ a okunu no tena ase, na sɛ okunu no wu a, ɔde ne ho firi okunu no mmara mu. Enti sɛ ne kunu te ase na ɔware obi foforo a, wɔfrɛ no ɔwaresɛefo;

[Hyɛ nso]: Ɔsomafo Paulo de [ . bɔne ne mmara ] twaka fa toto ho . ɔbea ne okunu ]abusuabɔ! Bere tenten a okunu no te ase no, ne kunu aware ho mmara na ɛkyekyere ɔbea. Sɛ okunu no wu a, ɔbaa no de ne ho firi ne kunu mmara mu. Sɛ ɔyere gyaw ne kunu na ɔware ɔbaa foforo a, na ɔreyɛ awaresɛe. --Marko 10:12 "Ɔhonam mu awaresɛe."
Romafoɔ 7:4 Enti, me nuanom, mo nso moam Kristo nipadua so wuwu maa mmara no, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a mobɛyɛ afoforɔ dea, deɛ ɔte aseɛ afiri awufoɔ mu no dea, na yɛaso aba ama Onyankopɔn .

( 3. 3. ) . Sɛ ɔbaa "ɔdebɔneyɛfoɔ" te ase na ɔba Kristo nkyɛn a, ɔyɛ ɔwaresɛefoɔ

" ɔdebɔneyɛfo "ntotoho" ɔbaa "Sɛ ɔte ase a, akwankyerɛ biara nni hɔ". mmara" Seesei ara kunu wu ," ɔdebɔneyɛfo "Daabi" tetew wɔn ho mu " Okunu mmara no anohyeto ahorow, . "Sɛ wosan ba a". Kristo ", wo frɛ kɛkɛ". ɔwaresɛefo "Ɛyɛ [ honhom mu aguaman ]. Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Nnipa bebree te sɛ "mprako" a wɔatew wɔn ho na wɔsan kɔ atɛkyɛ mu na wɔteɛm sɛ "Awurade, Awurade" na wɔdannan wɔn ho "wɔ wɔn koma mu" na wɔsan kɔ Apam Dedaw mu kunu" date no so. Ɔkwan foforo so no, sɛ wowɔ kununom "abien" → Apam Dedaw mu kunu biako ne "Apam Foforo" kunu biako a, woyɛ "ɔpanyin → honhom mu ɔwaresɛefo". ". Galatifo 4:5 Onyankopɔn somaa ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro no sɛ ɔmmɛgye wɔn a na wɔwɔ "mmara" ase no sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a mobɛba Awurade Yesu Kristo nkyɛn; nanso bebree "san bae" na wɔpɛe sɛ wɔyɛ nkoa wɔ mmara no ase. Wɔyɛ nnebɔneyɛfo. Saa nkurɔfo yi "resɛe aware", "honhom mu awaresɛe, na wɔfrɛ wɔn honhom mu awaresɛefo." Enti, so wote ase?

Luka 6:46 Awurade Yesu kaa sɛ: "Adɛn nti na wofrɛ me, 'Awurade, Awurade' na wonyɛ osetie ma me nsɛm? Woka! So ɛteɛ?" mmara no afei "de ne ho" fi mmara no ho, ama yɛn kwan ma yɛasom Awurade "Adebɔneyɛfo a wonni ahofadi mfi mmara no ho no ntumi nsom Awurade So ɛsɛ sɛ yɛsom Awurade sɛnea honhom (honhom: anaasɛ wɔakyerɛ ase." sɛ Honhom Kronkron no)?Ɔkwan foforo no, ɛnyɛ ɔkwan dedaw no sɛnea amanne ahorow no te.

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Onyankopɔn dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

2021.06.16

articles.title: Wɔde abusuabɔ a ɛda bɔne ne mmara ntam no toto abusuabɔ a ɛda ɔbea ne ne kunu ntam no ho
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoeɛ nka m’abusua adɔfoɔ, nuanom mmarima ne mmaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no nkyerɛ Romafo ti 7 nkyekyem 1-3 na yɛnbom nkenkan: Anuanom, afei mese wɔn a wɔte mmara ase sɛ, munnim sɛ mmara di onipa so bere a ɔte ase? Te sɛ ɔbea a ɔwɔ kunu no, mmara kyekyere no bere a okunu no te ase no, nanso sɛ okunu no wu a, ɔde ne ho fi okunu mmara ase. Enti, sɛ ɔware ɔbarima foforo bere a ne kunu da so te ase a, wɔfrɛ no ɔwaresɛefo;

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ ". Wɔde abusuabɔ a ɛda bɔne ne mmara ntam no toto abusuabɔ a ɛda ɔbea ne ne kunu ntam no ho 》Mpaebɔ: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbea a ɔwɔ suban pa【 asɔre 】Soma adwumayɛfoɔ - nam nokorɛ asɛm a wɔatwerɛ na wɔaka wɔ wɔn nsam, a ɛyɛ wo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no so. Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Awurade Yesu nkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mu nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware ahorow. Esiane sɛ yenim sɛ "mmara" no di nnipa so bere a yɛte ase nti, yɛnam Kristo nipadua so wuwu ma mmara no, na ɛma yɛsan kɔ Awurade Yesu a wɔanyan no no nkyɛn! Sɛ "ɔdebɔneyɛfo" no nnwui mmaa "mmara" no - ɔtwe ne ho fi mmara no ho na ɔdan kɔ obi foforo nkyɛn a, wɔfrɛ no ɔwaresɛefo - honhom mu ɔwaresɛefo .

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

(1) Mmara no di nnipa so → bere a wote ase sɛ "ɔdebɔneyɛfo".

Momma yɛnsua Romafoɔ 7:1-3 wɔ Bible mu na yɛnkenkan no sɛ: Anuanom, afei mese mo a mote mmara ase sɛ, munnim sɛ mmara di onipa so berɛ a ɔte aseɛ? Te sɛ ɔbea a ɔwɔ kunu no, mmara kyekyere no bere a okunu no te ase no, nanso sɛ okunu no wu a, ɔde ne ho fi okunu mmara ase. Enti sɛ ne kunu te ase na ɔware obi foforo a, wɔfrɛ no ɔwaresɛefo;

[Hyɛ nso]: Ɛdenam atifi hɔ kyerɛwsɛm kyerɛwtohɔ ahorow a ɔsomafo "Paulo" suae so kae sɛ: "Anuanom, afei meka kyerɛ wɔn a wɔte mmara no ase → kyerɛ sɛ, wɔn a wɔte "apam a edi kan" no ase, kyerɛ sɛ, Apam Dedaw no mu mmara no, don 't monim se mmara "di nnipa so" Se mpo "deboneyfo" no te ase a? Korintofoɔ 15:56 → Bere tenten a "ɔdebɔneyɛfoɔ" no. Mmara no tumidi ɛyɛ" amumuyɔ ".Enti, wote ase?

(2) Wɔde abusuabɔ a ɛda bɔne ne mmara ntam no toto abusuabɔ a ɛda ɔbea ne ne kunu ntam no ho

Ɛha na ɔsomafo "Paulo" de "abusuabɔ a ɛda bɔne ne mmara ntam" toto "abusuabɔ a ɛda ɔbea ne ne kunu ntam" ho →_ Sɛnea wɔde "ɔbea" toto "ɔdebɔneyɛfo" a ɔwɔ "kunu" ho no to the law.Wɔde okunu nso toto mmara ho.Bere tenten a ɔte ase no, sɛ ne kunu wu a, ɔbea no de ne ho fi ne kunu mmara a ɛne "aware" no mu; Enti, sɛ ne kunu te ase a, ɔyɛ obi foforo dea (kyerɛ sɛ, "ɔbea" no nnya mfaa ne ho mfii "aware" mmara no mu ) sɛ ɔbɛyɛ ɔwaresɛefo a, wɔfrɛ no ɔwaresɛefo; okunu wu, ɔde ne ho fi ne kunu mmara mu sɛ ɔbɛyɛ ɔwaresɛefo mpo a, ɔnyɛ ɔwaresɛefo.

Enti abusuabɔ a ɛda "nnebɔneyɛfo ne mmara" ntam no yɛ ade koro → Romafo 7:4 Me nuanom, mo nso monam "Kristo nipadua" so wui maa "mmara" no :19 "Paulo" kaa sɛ → Mewuo "mma mmara" ɛnam mmara no nti! Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔde mo bɛbrɛ afoforo, mpo nea wonyan no fii awufo mu → [Awurade Yesu Kristo] nkyɛn, na yɛasow "honhom mu" aba ama Onyankopɔn.

(3) Sɛ ɔbaa bi te ase sɛ "ɔdebɔneyɛfoɔ" na ɔba Kristo nkyɛn a, ɔyɛ ɔwaresɛefoɔ

Sɛ mo "nnebɔneyɛfoɔ" tena ase "a monwu mma mmara no, a "wonguan" mfiri mmara no nkoasom mu, na sɛ modan kɔ "Kristo" nkyɛn a, mobɛfrɛ "aguaman" [honhom mu aguaman]. . Enti, so wote ase pefee?

Nnipa bebree te sɛ "mprako" a wɔatew wɔn ho na wɔsan kɔ atɛkyɛ mu twitwiw wɔn ho na wɔde wɔn anofafa teɛm sɛ "Awurade, Awurade" na wɔdan wɔn ho na "wɔ wɔn koma mu" san kɔ Apam Dedaw mmara no so. paw a wɔadi kan ayɛ Husband" date. Ɛno kyerɛ sɛ wowɔ Okununom "abien" → Apam Dedaw mu kunu baako, woyɛ "apanyin → honhom mu awaresɛefoɔ". ". Galatifo 4:5 Onyankopɔn somaa ne Ba a ɔwoo no koro no sɛ ɔmmɛgye wɔn a na wɔwɔ "mmara" ase no sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a mobɛba Awurade Yesu Kristo nkyɛn; nanso bebree "san bae" na wɔpɛe sɛ wɔyɛ nkoa wɔ mmara no ase. Wɔyɛ nnebɔneyɛfo. Saa nnipa yi "rebɔ awaresɛe" ne "honhom mu awaresɛe", na wɔfrɛ wɔn honhom mu awaresɛefoɔ. Enti, so wote ase?

Luka 6:46 Awurade Yesu kaa sɛ: "Adɛn nti na wofrɛ me, 'Awurade, Awurade' na wonyɛ osetie ma me nsɛm? Woka! So ɛteɛ?" mmara no "de ne ho" afei deɛ, ɛma yɛn kwan ma yɛsom Awurade "Adebɔneyɛfoɔ a wɔnni mmara no ntumi nsom Awurade."

Sɛnea honhom foforo (honhom: anaa wɔkyerɛ ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron) te, ɛnyɛ sɛnea amanne dedaw no te. → Nanso sɛ Honhom Kronkron na ɛkyerɛ wo kwan a, ɛnde wonni mmara no ase. Enti, so wote ase pefee? Hwɛ Galatifo ti 5 nkyekyem 18

Ɛyɛ! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Agya Nyankopɔn no dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

2021.06, 14 na ɛwɔ hɔ

articles.title: Baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoe nka me nuanom mmarima ne mmea adɔfo a wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn abusua mu! Amen.

Momma yenbue Bible no mu nkɔ Romafo Ti 4 ne nkyekyem 15 na yɛnbom nkenkan sɛ: Na mmara hyɛ abufuw abufuw na baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ. .

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ ". Baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ 》Mpaebɔ: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya Kronkron, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbaa pa [asɔre no] soma adwumayɛfoɔ - ɛnam nokorɛ asɛm a wɔatwerɛ na wɔka wɔ wɔn nsam, a ɛyɛ yɛn nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa → de paanoo firi akyirikyiri firi soro ba ma yɛn aduane wɔ berɛ a ɛsɛ mu, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛn Honhomfoɔ nkwa dɔɔso sen saa! Amen. Srɛ Awurade Yesu sɛ ɔnkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu ani na ɔmmue yɛn adwene mfa nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu wo nsɛm, a ɛyɛ honhom mu nokware→ Te ase sɛ baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ na mmom baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, bɔne nyɛ bɔne. .

Mpaebɔ, nkotɔsrɛ, ntamgyinafoɔ, aseda, ne nhyira a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

(1) Abusuabɔ a ɛda mmara ne bɔne ntam

Asɛmmisa: So mmara bi wɔ hɔ a "di kan"? Anaasɛ ɛyɛ "nea edi kan" a ɛyɛ fɔ?
Mmuae: Nea edi kan no, mmara no wɔ hɔ, afei bɔne nso wɔ hɔ. →Baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ; Amen! →"Efisɛ bɔne tumi ne mmara" →Mmara tumidi ne [sɛ wobedi mmarato, bɔne, ne nnebɔneyɛfo so]. --Hwɛ 1 Korintofoɔ 15:56 ne Romafoɔ 4:15.

Asɛmmisa: Dɛn ne bɔne?
Mmuae: Mmara a wobu so no yɛ bɔne → Obiara a ɔbɛyɛ bɔne no bu mmara so; Hwɛ 1 Yohane 3:4

Asemmisa: Dɛn nti na "bɔne" ba?
Mmuae: Bere a na yɛwɔ honam mu no, "wɔwoo" bɔne esiane "mmara" nti. →Na yɛwɔ honam mu no, na akɔnnɔ bɔne a wɔde mmara awo no reyɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn akwaa mu, na ɛsow owu aba. Hwɛ Romafo 7:5

→ "Ɔhonam akɔnnɔ bɔne, akɔnnɔ, yɛ adwuma wɔ akwaa mu" → Sɛ wonyinsɛn akɔnnɔ a, ɛwo bɔne na sɛ bɔne nyin koraa a, ɛwo owu. Hwɛ Yakobo 1:15

Asɛmmisa: Ɛhe na yɛn bɔne nipadua fi?
Mmuae: Yɛn nana [Adam] na wɔwoo yɛn nipadua a ɛyɛ bɔne no. → Eyi te sɛ nea bɔne nam onipa biako so baa wiase, Adam, na owu fi bɔne mu bae, enti owu baa obiara so efisɛ obiara yɛɛ bɔne. ...Nanso efi Adam so besi Mose so no, owu dii hene, wɔn a wɔanyɛ bɔne te sɛ Adam mpo. Ná Adam yɛ onipa a na ɔbɛba no ho nhwɛso. Hwɛ Romafoɔ 5:12,14

(2) Abusuabɔ a ɛda mmara, bɔne ne owu ntam

Asemmisa: Esiane sɛ "owu" fi "bɔne" mu nti, yɛbɛyɛ dɛn aguan afi owu mu?
Mmuae: Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wuguan fi owu mu a, ɛsɛ sɛ wuguan fi bɔne ho → Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wuguan fi bɔne mu a, ɛsɛ sɛ wuguan fi mmara no ho.

Asɛmmisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na yebetumi aguan bɔne?
Mmuaeɛ: "Gye di" sɛ onipa baako wɔ Kristo mu "wuiɛ" maa obiara, na wɔn nyinaa wuwuiɛ. →"Nea wawuo no, wɔade ne ho afiri bɔne mu"--Hwɛ Romafoɔ 6:7

→"Gye di" na obiara wuwui, "Gye di" na wogyee ne nyinaa firii bne mu. Amen!

Yɛnnam aniwa so nantew, na mmom gyidi so → Adehu mu na me honam te ase, na gyidi nti wɔbɔɔ me dedaw no asɛnnua mu na ɔne Kristo wui. Enti, so wote ase pefee? Hwɛ 2 Korintofo 5:14 .

Asɛmmisa: Ɔkwan bɛn so na wobetumi aguan mmara no?
Mmuaeɛ: Yɛawu ama mmara a ɛnam Kristo nipadua so akyekyere me, na seesei yɛade yɛn ho afiri mmara no ho → Enti, me nuanom, mo nso moawu ama mmara no nam Kristo nipadua so .Nanso ɛfiri sɛ yɛwuiɛ mmara a ɛkyekyeree yɛn no ho no, seesei yɛade yɛn ho afi mmara no ho, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛsom Awurade sɛnea honhom foforo (honhom: anaa wɔkyerɛ ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron) te na ɛnyɛ sɛnea amanne kwan dedaw no te. Hwɛ Romafo 7:4, 6

(3) Baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ

1. 1. Nnipa a wɔte saa Baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ : Efisɛ mmara no kanyan abufuw (anaa nkyerɛase: ɛma nkurɔfo hu asotwe) wɔ baabi a mmara nni hɔ no, mmarato biara nni hɔ. Romafoɔ 4 Ntamgyinafoɔ Nkyekyɛmu 15
2. 2. Na sɛ mmara nni hɔ a, bɔne awu --Romafoɔ 7:8
3. 3. Sɛ mmara nni hɔ a, bɔne nyɛ bɔne : Ansa na mmara no reba no, na bɔne wɔ wiase dedaw nanso sɛ mmara nni hɔ a, wɔmfa bɔne nyɛ bɔne. Romafo 5:13
4. 4. Sɛ wowɔ mmara no a, wɔbɛbu wo atɛn sɛdeɛ mmara no teɛ : Obiara a ɔbɛyɛ bɔne a mmara nka ho no, ɔbɛyera nso a mmara no nka ho; Romafo 2:12

[Hyɛ no nsow]: Mmofra a wɔwoo wɔn fi Onyankopɔn hɔ no wɔ "Kristo mmara", na mmara no mu nsɛm tiawa ne Kristo - hwɛ Romafo 10:4 → Kristo mmara no ne "te sɛ" ! Dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho ! Amen. Efisɛ sɛ ɛnyɛ "afobu" mmara no a, anka bɔne ne nsɛmmɔnedi biara nni hɔ . Enti, so wote ase pefee? nti Onyankopɔn Asɛm yɛ ahintasɛm Wɔda no adi kyerɛ Onyankopɔn mma nkutoo! "Abɔntenfoɔ" a wɔte no deɛ, wɔte, nanso wɔnte aseɛ sɛ wɔhwɛ a, wɔhunu, nanso wɔnnim. Hwɛ 1 Yohane 3:9 ne 5:18.

YOO! Ɛnnɛ mepɛ sɛ me ne mo nyinaa kyɛ me fekubɔ no, Awurade Yesu Kristo adom, Agya Nyankopɔn no dɔ, ne Honhom Kronkron nhyɛsoɔ nka mo nyinaa ho daa! Amen

2021.06.13

articles.title: Wɔada Onyankopɔn trenee adi wɔ mmara no ho
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Asomdwoeɛ nka m’abusua adɔfoɔ, nuanom mmarima ne mmaa! Amen.

Momma yenbue yɛn Bible no nkyerɛ Romafo ti 3 nkyekyem 21-22 na yɛnbom nkenkan: Na afei Onyankopɔn tenenee a ɛda adi wɔ mmara no ho, sɛdeɛ mmara ne adiyifoɔ no di ho adanseɛ no: Onyankopɔn tenenee a ɛnam Yesu Kristo mu gyidie so ma obiara a ɔgye di, a nsonsonoeɛ biara nni mu .

Ɛnnɛ yɛbɛsua, ayɔnkofa, na yɛakyɛ ". Wɔada Onyankopɔn trenee adi wɔ mmara no ho 》Mpaebɔ: Abba dɔfo, Ɔsoro Agya, yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo, yɛda wo ase sɛ Honhom Kronkron ka yɛn ho daa! Amen. Meda wo ase Awurade! Ɔbaa pa no [asɔre no] somaa adwumayɛfoɔ nam wɔn nsa so ma wɔtwerɛɛ na wɔkaa nokorɛ asɛm no, a ɛyɛ wo nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no! Wɔde aduan fi wim fi akyirikyiri na wɔde ma yɛn wɔ bere a ɛfata mu na ama yɛn honhom fam asetra ayɛ nea ɛyɛ fɛ! Amen. Awurade Yesu nkɔ so nhyerɛn yɛn honhom mu aniwa na mmue yɛn adwene mu nte Bible no ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛte na yɛahu honhom mu nokware ahorow. Te ase sɛ wɔayi Onyankopɔn “trenee” adi wɔ mmara no akyi . Mpaebɔ a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no, .

Bɔ mpae, srɛ, da ase, na hyira! Mesrɛ yei wɔ yɛn Awurade Yesu Kristo din mu! Amen

(1) Onyankopɔn trenee

Asɛmmisa: Ɛhe na wɔda Onyankopɔn trenee adi?
Mmuae: Afei wɔayi Onyankopɔn tenenee adi wɔ mmara no ho.
